Actually, she was both obese, and wore a puffy diaper underneath her outfit.
1113211.content:
Grief.

In the dictionary, it is defined as "Deep sorrow, especially if caused by the death of a loved one".

However, for the youthful spry brunette known as Katherine Pryde...

It felt like the world she knew was crumbling before her fingertips like sand on the beach.

When the kind-hearted Professor Xavier announced with a heavy heart that Kitty's parents were withdrawing her from Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters, it felt as if a thousand needles pierced her heart all at once. Of course, the entire X-Men outright objected such a forced notion, but it wasn't something that even the famed heroes could do a thing about, for it was the choice that Kitty's parents had made.

And so, with sorrow in her heart, Kitty was left with little alternative but to say a saddened farewell to the people she fondly referred to as her "second family".

== Present Day ==
== Two Weeks Later ==
== England ==

Standing just outside of the local airport, Kitty, dressed in an overcoat with a fashionable hat, holding her suitcase in both hands, as the stereotypical English rain downpour around her. The emotional baggage of unwillingly leaving the people she called family still fresh in her mind's eye.

Though, as to what brought here all the way to Jolly ol' England... Apparently, her parents received an invitation for their daughter to attend a rather prestigious school known as "The Academy of the Order of the Friars of Saint Francis of Wycombe", or simply abbreviated as "The Wycombe Academy".

Of course, Kitty was initially reluctant to attend this new school, thinking that there was something shady about the whole thing, but she had to reluctantly comply at to her parents' behest to attend, which lands her in her current situation at present.

A few minutes passed...

Then thirty minutes...

And finally an hour...

And eventually, she was greeted by the arrival of a pristine antiquated limousine. It stopped only just a few feet away from her, to which the chauffeur promptly opened the rear door to allow it's passenger to exit the elegant vehicle. And with that, out came the Headmistress, Emma Frost...
1113211.title: Kitty Pryde, Transfer Student

choices: There was someone else inside the limo with them.
There was a whole table of cuisines splayed out before them.
Actually, it was something else instead...
11132113.content:
What Kitty Pryde had soon witness was quite an..."unusual" sight to behold, as the heavyset blonde calmly and gracefully exited the vehicle, appearing before the smaller brunette.

"Oh my. Aren't you such an adorable cherub?" She chirped, taking note of the young Pryde's adorably petite physique, a subtle twinkle in her sapphire blue eyes. Meanwhile, on the other end of the spectrum, Kitty took a substantially long moment or two, gazing over the entire physical appearance of the woman standing before her.

In appearance, the blonde woman had this air of "Nobility" and "Elegancy" to her, especially with her all-white ensemble and flowing ivory cape with the fur collar around her shoulders. However, in contrast to the woman's choice of attire, there was a far more notable aspect about her:

Her weight and overall size.

From what Kitty would guess, the woman had to at least weigh in at approximately the four-hundred pound mark, with nary a sign of dimpling or unsavory blemish in sight. The woman had these wealthy plump breasts, which pressed against her corset-like one-piece clothing, which was only surpassed by the woman's substantial yet matronly boulder of a belly. However, Kitty couldn't help but feel like something felt...off, regarding what she was wearing underneath such expensive clothing, but it was a mere thought for the time being.

"Um...E-Excuse me? Are...A-Are you Miss Emma Frost? The headmistress of the, um..." Kitty stammered, looking back at the brochure to properly ascertain the school's full name then continued, "...The Academy of the Order of the Friars of Saint Francis of Wycombe? ...I-I'm sorry if I'm mispronouncing it."

"*giggle* It is quite alright, my dear." Emma retorted, reassuring the younger woman of her shyness, to which she then performed a small curtsy and elaborated, "...And to answer your question, I am indeed Emma Frost. Headmistress of Wycombe Academy."

And like a lioness circling it's prey, Emma Frost looked over Kitty from nearly every angle with eyeing curiosity, to which she then asked, "...And if I must wager a guess, you must be the lovely Katherine Pryde, are you not?"

"...Y-Yes. Yes I am, Miss Frost. B-But...M-My friends call me "Kitty Pryde". If, um...I-If that's okay with you." She timidly answered, obviously feeling a little tense due to being examined in such a manner by a person she had no familiarity with. Of course, Emma Frost couldn't help but become quite amused with the young woman, to which she then reassured, "Quite the adorable name, my dear. And please...You can call me "Emma", if it makes you feel more comfortable."

"Um...O-Okay." Kitty complied, and like a mother coddling her child, Emma Frost calmly and gently guided Kitty towards the limousine as she said, "...Do not fret, my dear Kitty. I'm most certain you will be quite at home in Wycombe Academy. Now, what do you say we get out of the rain?"

"I...I would like that." Kitty answered, being personally escorted by the rotund Emma Frost. However, she couldn't figure out what exactly was making all these *rustling* and *crinkling* noises, despite being in close proximity with said sounds.

From there, Emma Frost allowed Kitty to enter the vehicle first, only to then enter inside herself, making sure her elegant ivory cape was not caught when the door was closed. And with that, the chauffeur proceeded to return to the driver's seat to escort his charges back to the illustrious Wycombe Academy.

Once inside, Kitty couldn't believe how...extravagant, it was inside the limo. Looking at her interior surroundings, she soon noticed...
11132113.title: The Elegantly Infantile Headmistress

choices: Later that night, Rahne escorts Kitty to their dorm room.
A week later, Kitty began to experience a bad case of bedwetting.
Two weeks later, the Freshman Fat began to show itself on Kitty's body.
111321131.content:
"Oi, Teach! Who's the wee lassie we got 'ere?" A voice rang out, initially startling Kitty somewhat. Though, it was there that Kitty Pryde soon caught a gaze at the newest individual in proximity within the luxury vehicle.

Judging from her appearance and vocal accent, Kitty could very easily tell that this person was undoubtedly Scottish, sporting a short mane of fiery red hair, as well as an equally heavyset physique, albeit not as vast as the headmistress, but enough to be distinct.

Although, instead of a lavish ensemble like Emma Frost, the Scottish redhead wore a one-piece schoolgirl-esque uniform, complete with a plaid skirt. Speaking of the lavishly dressed Emma Frost, she soon sat beside Kitty, just as the limousine began to move, to which the rotund blonde then quipped, "Come now, Rahne. Surely, you haven't forgotten about the arrival of your new roommate already?"

"Roommate?" Kitty questioned, initially flabbergasted at how she was going to have a roommate, only for the ivory-dressed woman to compensate, "My sincerest apologies, Katherine! I should've told you sooner! Anywho, allow me to introduce you to your new roommate-"

"Rahne Sinclair's me name! So..." Rahne interjected, to which she then got really close to Kitty, whilst the sudden *crinkling* filled Kitty's hearing once more, as the feisty redhead then blurted, "...Whit kinda d'you hae?"

"Um, excuse me?" She rebutted, becoming quite confused as to what exactly she was talking about. Meanwhile, Emma Frost couldn't help but chuckle some from Rahne's feisty curiosity, obviously finding amusement towards the Scot girl's child-like wonder. Of course, she soon stepped in and retorted, "Again my apologies, Katherine. Though, to put it simply..."

And with that, Emma Frost began to use her telepathic abilities to converse with Kitty, as she telepathically continued, "...She is simply curious about your Mutant abilities is all."

In reaction, Kitty was completely taken by surprise, quickly putting two and two together, which ultimately culminated in her gleefully yelping, "You...Y-You're Mutants! You're just like me!!"

"*giggle* Indeed we are, Katherine." Emma replied, a plump gloved hand gesturing over towards Rahne, only for Kitty to bear witness to a surprising metamorphosis. In appearance, Rahne's body began to take on more lupine features, as reddish-brown fur began to grow and sprout from every part of her body, which gave her short fiery red hair to look more akin to an exaggerated wolven mane. Her teeth sharpened into a pair of lupine fangs, as her fingernails became a pair of claws on each hand, along with a short canine tail floofing out from behind, with her legs becoming digitgrade to cap it all off.

Suffice to say, Kitty couldn't help but be amazed by the sight before her, as Rahne mock howled at an imaginary moon to sell the look, to which Emma then coyly teased, "Down, girl."

"Whatever ye say, Teach!" Rahne complied, just as swiftly reverting back to her human form, where it was soon Kitty Pryde's turn to speak, with only astonishment in her voice while she asked, "This is amazing! But...I-I don't understand, Miss Frost. Are you like Professor Xavier?"

"*giggle* ...In a way. I suppose you can say I am England's equivalent of Charles Xavier, my dear Katherine. Right down to being the proud owner and headmistress of an illustrious academy, no less. Now..." She explained, laying the truth the bear before Kitty, to which she then presented a bountiful spread of cuisines before the brunette and politely asked, "...Would you like something suitable to eat? I have a guess that the food provided to you on the plane wasn't as substantial."

"Well...I guess it would be rude to refuse. Sure, I'll bite!" Kitty chirped, grabbing a few steaming scones, taking a bite out of them one after the other. "Mmm! These are pretty good!" She chirped, her tastebuds soaking in the delectable taste of the scones.

However, whilst Kitty was busy stuffing her gullet, Emma Frost watched as the baked treats began to slowly work on Kitty's systems, mentally noting to herself, "Hmm... She has begun to eat them. Excellent. And don't worry, my dear. I'm sure you'll become..."acquainted", with the new meat on your bones in due time, along with a surprise or three as well."

Fortunately, Emma Frost blocked her mind off from having her agenda revealed to Kitty Pryde, who appeared as if she was in a gluttonous trance, scarfing down several handfuls of sweets at a near breakneck pace. Of course, such binging was bound to show itself on the young Pryde's physical form, as her stomach began to slowly but surely bloat and expand outwards, yet not enough to stick out a great deal to be conspicuous.

Suffice to say, Emma contemplated how this school year will be quite..."unique".
111321131.title: Kitty's New Roommate & Foodstuffs

choices: From there, Emma Frost let Kitty in on a little secret.
And with that, it was business as usual for Rahne and Kitty.
1113211312.content:
"*sigh* Not again..."

Kitty said, bearing an unamused demeanor on her face. Wise men would say that "A lot can transpire in the span of a week". Though, she certainly didn't expect THESE kinds of changes.

Some of it good, while some of it was legitimately bad.

When she first arrived at Wycombe Academy, the first thing she noticed right off the bat was how..."Substantially endowed" all the female students and some of the female staff were, along with unsubtle hints of what could be underneath their specifically designed attire.

However, it wasn't all bad. After all, she and Rahne quickly became fast friends, not just outside of class. Plus, Kitty soon found out that she was transferred into a school for Mutants, similar to Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters, but in England.

Eventually, much to her own personal shame, Kitty began to experience this bad case of bedwetting, always waking up with soaked bedsheets. At first, she tried to disguise this source of shame from her new best friend/roommate out of attempting to preserve her personal dignity. Of course, having the abilities of a wolf, Rahne was easily able to discover her bestie's wetting predicament. In fact, they made a deal regarding Kitty's "issue", as the young Pryde recalled her friend's words:

"Look, Kitty. I understand the shame of wetting the bed, so I'm not going to judge ye. However, if it starts getting bad, we're gaunnae hae to blether this to Headmistress Frost aboot yer..."issue". Okay?"

Of course, the bedwetting wasn't the only change in her daily regiment she had undergone, as Kitty stood before her pee-stained bedsheets, now sporting a somewhat chubbier physique, complete with a small but developing potbelly, fuller breasts, plumper butt, and the subtle beginnings of a double chin.

She stood there in her nightgown, with her panties dampened some in the front. Suffice to say, it felt rather embarrassing for her. Fortunately, her new best friend was there to console her, to which the redheaded Scottish Mutant then asked, "Dae ye want to head to Miss Frost's office, lassie?"

== Headmistress Emma Frost's Office ==
== 10 Minutes Later... ==

Meanwhile, within the bowels of her personal office, adorned with numerous trophies and shelves full of works of literature, Emma Frost was looking over some of the student records, inspecting to see if their educational grades were up to snuff, a plump gloved finger tapping against the mahogany oaken surface of her lavish study. That is until...

*Knock!*
*Knock!*
*Knock!*

She heard a series of rattling knocks at her double doors, to which she promptly answered, "You may enter."

And with such permission granted, Rahne and Kitty soon entered their Headmistress's proverbial lair, with Rahne hauling in the rolled-up bedsheet from Kitty's bed slung over her shoulder. From there, the duo swiftly closed the doors behind them to allow some privacy.

From there, Emma Frost soon diverted her full attention upon the two roommates, keenly gazing upon them with intent, to which she chirped, "Ah, Miss Pryde and Miss Sinclair! To what do I owe the pleasure from you two lovely ladies?"

"Actually, Teach... We hae to blether to ye aboot something. It's important." Rahne retorted, her Scottish slang prevalent as ever. From there, she then unfurled the bedsheet before the heavyset headmistress, thus revealing the full truth to the leader of Wycombe Academy.

"...I see your point, Miss Sinclair. I take it that this is your bedsheet, Katherine?" Emma calmly hypothesized, to which Kitty reluctantly and timidly nodded her head in confirmation, obviously quite embarrassed by her current predicament, meekly uttering, "...Y...Y-Yes, Miss Frost. I...I-I-I don't know wh-what's going on w-with me."

Upon seeing her newest student feeling so ashamed of herself, Emma calmly stood up from her wheeled chair, waddled over towards the embarrassed Kitty, to which the *crinkling* sounds filled the air once more. From there, she placed her plump gloved hands upon Kitty's shoulders, then quickly pulled her into a matronly embrace, akin to a mother coddling her child.

"...I am terribly sorry for this, my dear. You have my utmost sympathies." She caringly whispered, showing her sympathy towards the young girl. But then, as if it was preordained in her mindset, the bloated blonde, now with a reassuring smile across her lips, looked back at Kitty and said, "...You know, I believe I may have a solution to your predicament, my dear. ...If you are willing to make a few necessary changes to your lifestyle, of course."

Upon hearing that, Kitty swiftly looked back at the headmistress, a glimmer of hope in her eyes, to which she instinctively hugged Emma Frost, despite her arms not fully reaching around the woman's body, and chirped, "Thankyouthankyouthankyou!"

"...Well, if it will allow you to be more at ease, please follow me." The larger woman quipped, to which Kitty followed suit, unaware of what the headmistress had in mind...

== 5 Minutes Later... ==

Several minutes later, after waiting out in her study, Rahne was soon re-greeted by the return of Emma Frost and Kitty Pryde. However, the Scottish redhead easily noticed what was newly different about her new bestie, as Kitty fidgeted a bit in her new puffy undergarments.

"Um...M-Miss Frost? Are...A-Are you sure about these...things? They're very bulky." She asked, noting with clear clarity at how thick and padded the diaper she now wore actually was, as she could easily feel how the padding positioned between her legs forcibly pushed her legs apart some, giving her a semi-noticeable waddling gait, as well as making her butt appearing to have doubled in size.
1113211312.title: Kitty In Pampers

Emma Frost answered, coyly patting Kitty's newly diapered behind twice or thrice, which explicitly enticed a beet red blush of embarrassment upon the brunette's fuller face, obviously not used to having such cumbersome undergarments before, not since she was a baby.

"Aye! Indeed ye will, Kitty!" Rahne quipped, obviously trying to reassure her bestie that wearing such bulky diapers wasn't all bad as she thinks it will be, to which she cheekily handed Kitty a more fitting Academy uniform. Of course, Kitty then reluctantly shrugged, as she then began to undress out of her nightgown in order to don her school attire.

"Um...With all due respect, Miss Frost, but...A-Are these REALLY necessary? Something feels...off." Kitty asked, as she began to equip the one-piece uniform shirt onto her body, still feeling a bit uneasy considering what was transpiring. However, becoming rather sympathetic towards the younger brunette's apprehension of the whole situation, Emma let out a empathetic sigh, then inevitably confessed, "*sigh* ...Well, I suppose it won't do harm to tell you the truth, my dear."

"Wait...What are you talking about?" She questioned, becoming rather confused as to what exactly Emma was going on about, only to then feel the bloated blonde waddle over to her to do up the button flap on her onesie-like uniform shirt. From there, while she carefully and properly dressed Kitty, Emma Frost then calmly elaborated, "Now, I'm not entirely sure how to properly put this into words, but...Katherine; This school...has a curse attached to it."

"Cursed? Come on, Miss Frost. There are no such thing as curses." Kitty scoffed, as she felt the larger woman button up the diaper flap on her onesie-esque shirt, thinking that the headmistress was pulling her leg. However, it was Rahne's turn to chime in as she chirped, "I'm afraid it's naw wee ghost story laddies and lassies tell each other around the campfire. What dae ye think we're wearing under our uniforms?"

Upon hearing what her best friend and roommate just told her, Kitty was struck with a surprising revelation, her noting the crinkly bulges around the waistlines of both the headmistress and her bestie, hearing the enciting *rustle* and *crinkle* noises from the motions made by both individuals chafing about. Finding the right words to say to them, Kitty eventually spoke up and questioned, "...H-How long has it been like this?"

Eventually, Emma looked back towards the diapered Kitty Pryde, to which she promptly responded to her question via plainly answering...

"Honestly, I am not sure, but I believe it started when I began bringing in new students. They've all had the same bedwetting incidents and whatnot as well." Emma admitted with concern. Kitty took a moment to digest this information as she played with her new uniform's collar. Finally, she looked at Emma.

"S-So is that why we gotta wear-" she began, nodding to her thick diaper. Emma and Rahne both nodded. "I'm afraid so, Katherine. Ever since new students arrived, we have been plagued by bedwetting and messing ourselves, myself included." Emma confessed gently, nodding to her large diaper. Kitty didn't say anything as she poked her diaper through her onesie uniform. Then, she turned to her roommate, classmate and bestie. "R-Rhane, was it this bad for you?" She asked. Rahne smiled and nodded gently.

"Aye. I was barely here for two weeks a'fore me bladder stared actin' up. In fact, I wet meself five times in classes a'fore I came ta Miss. Frost here for help. I've been in these nappies for a year now since I started attendin' this school." Rahne confessed, her diaper crinkling loudly. Kitty just looked at the duo, clearly still trying to figure things out. While she still didn't fully believe in curses, she did know this one was apparently all too real. "W-will it remain after I leave here?" She finally asked. Emma and Rahne both nodded.

"I am afraid so, Kitty. I thought when we leave for holidays and whatnot, it would fade away. But I was proven wrong after Christmas my first year here when the girls and teachers all revealed that they had wet and pooped themselves repeatedly, forcing them to keep their diapers on at all times, unless they managed to reach the loo or were already in it." Emma explained.

"B-but curses can be broken, can't they? W-what if we learn how the curse came to be and if it can be destroyed?" Kitty offered. But both Rahne and Emma shook their heads. "I fear it would not work, Katherine. We have been trying for a year to figure out the curse and it's weaknesses, but have come up with nothing." Emma confessed gently. Kitty honestly felt like bawling her eyes out. She was just 13 and a half, she couldn't need diapers!

Then, Emma looked at the clock. "And on that note, girls, I do believe it is time for breakfast. The cafeteria is making lots of good food and I cannot stand missing a meal." she smiled kindly, putting a hand on Kitty and Rahne's shoulders and steering them for the cafeteria.

"Oh goody. I'm so starved I could eat a horse!" Rahne smiled eagerly. Kitty nodded in agreement, her potbelly gurgling in equal hunger. Though, secretly, Kitty was wondering about the curse and how worse it would get as she stayed at Wycombe.

1113211312121.content:
Meanwhile, as the two best friends trekked through the halls of Wycombe Academy, Kitty couldn't help herself regarding what was revealed to her back in Miss Frost's office, mentally contemplating with herself as she thought, "I...I just can't believe all of this. I mean... I'm going to be turning fourteen. I shouldn't be needing to wear diapers. Why is this happening?"

"Oi! Earth to Kitty! C'mon lassie!" Rahne chirped, quickly noticing how much her roommate was involuntarily spacing out, to which she responded by shapeshifting her hand into a lupine claw-like hand, using her now canine fingernails to emit an even louder finger snap.

Fortunately, it was more than enough to easily snap the distracted Kitty Pryde back to terra firma, as the chubby diapered brunette instinctively blinked twice and thrice in initial confusion and stammered, "Huh? Wha?"

"Ye alright, Kitty? Ye were spacin' out on me." Rahne asked, showing obvious concern toward her bestie, placing a hand on the girl's shoulder. In response, with the audible *crinkling* noises emanating from her own bulky diaper filling her ears, Kitty blushed and ultimately confessed, "...I-I'm sorry, Rahne. It's just that-"

"-You're naw used to what's gonna happen? *sigh* Aye, I ken whit yer sayin', lassie. If it helps, ye willnae be alone when ye hae to gang." She answered, giving off a rather reassuring posture towards her friend, which seemed to be quite effective in putting Kitty at ease.

"...Thank you, Rahne." Kitty spoke, thanking her friend in the process, to which they wen on their merry way towards the Cafeteria.

== Wycombe Academy Cafeteria ==

Over at the Cafeteria, amongst the rabble and gossip of the other round pamper-wearing schoolgirls, one student sat by her lonesome, as if she was waiting for some friends of her's. In appearance, much like the headmistress herself, the teen girl sported a flowing mane of straight golden blonde hair, with shimmering blue eyes. However, much like the entire student body and school staff, she too wasn't spared from sporting a more chubbier physique and equally padded undergarments.

Currently, she was in the midst of devouring a platter full of jelly-filled sprinkled donuts for breakfast, only to then hear an all too familiar voice, "Oi! Illy! Yoo-Hoo!!"

A few tables across from her, she easily became aware of a certain Scottish Mutant's greeting, to which she responded by turning her head briefly as if to non-verbally say, "Get over here.", to which they complied with such an answer, waddling their way over to where she was sitting.

From there, they sat before the heavyset blonde, carrying their own assortment of sweets and edibles upon two trays for each of them. Of course, during her first week here at Wycombe, Rahne first introduced Kitty to one of her other friends, Illyana Rasputin. However, Kitty soon found out that Illyana was actually the younger sister of one of her friends back at Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters; Peter Rasputin, also known as "Colossus".

Suffice to say, upon hearing of this, Illyana was relieved to hear that her brother was doing quite well over in America, which garnered a great deal of respect towards the young Pryde. Obviously, Illyana gave off a warming smile towards Kitty, which showed how close they've became as friends, only to then resume her binge assault on the small hill of cuisines.

In an attempt to strike up a friendly conversation with her, Kitty spoke towards Illyana, taking a bite out of some blueberry pancakes as well, and said, "So, Illyana...How's it going with your training? Learned any new skills?"

"...Not much, Kitty. Though, I did learn how to deflect energy blasts with my sword..." She replied, bearing a thick Russian accent, which made Kitty feel a little nostalgic in regards to Colossus. After all, despite the man's Mutant abilities of Super Strength and being to turn his skin into a flexibly hard steel-like tissue, he was a rather "Gentle Giant" as it were.

Plus, Kitty was actually surprised when she first saw Illyana's Mutant ability to harness and use magic, thus garnering her the now-famous nickname "Magik", with the word having a "K" instead of a "C" in it. Overall, much like her nickname's namesake, Kitty became rather curious with Illyana's more supernatural abilities.

Of course, the trio conversed for about half an hour, including the part where Kitty was now in diapers just like them, to which Illyana offered her sincerest sympathies. Eventually, their morning classes had soon begun, starting off with...

Braddock was rather obese, weighing in around 350 pounds, though she still had somewhat of a hourglass figure. She had purple hair and, like most of the staff, wore a thick diaper under her uniform.

Braddock would... let me... just teleport with... my... portals." Illyana groaned, laying on her back. "Man... I probably... shouldn't've eaten... those last... 10 blueberry... pancakes. My belly's killing me." Kitty moaned in agreement. Psylocke waddled over with a smile. "Well done, lassies. You completed the mile in good time." She said. Then she turned to the other girls.

"Alright ladies. Tomorrow we'll take an off day as most of you did manage to do most of the mile today. Let's head back in and get ready for your next class!" She called. Huffing, puffing and groaning, the girls all started waddling to the locker room.

"Is it lunchtime yet?" Rahne asked hopefully. Kitty looked at her watch. "Nope. It's only 7:50, Rahne." Kitty confessed with a smile as Illyana laughed as they waddled after their classmates. "Blast. I was hopin' ta sink me teeth into a juicy hamburger with cheese, pickles, ketchup, mustard, onion and bacon!" Rahne groaned. Both Kitty and Illyana moaned in delight at the thought, their bellies rumbling in equal delight. "Now you've done it, Rahne. How're we gonna focus on our next few lessons while we're waitin' for lunch?" Kitty playfully teased her bestie as they changed into their uniforms, having reached the locker room. "Sorry Kitty. It's jost that I'm starvin'. Runnin' a blasted mile does that to me belly." Rahne replied as her tummy rumbled in agreement.

After getting changed, the trio went to their second class, which was...

111321131212112.content:
Math was with a woman called Neena Thruman. Nicknamed "Domino" due to her black and white hair and white face with a black spot over one eye, she was a fairly cool teacher in Kitty's eyes. Similar to Emma and Psylocke, Domino was obese and diaper clad. Unlike most of the teachers and students, she wore only a t-shirt and her thick diapers in class.

Kitty, Rahne and Illyana all found their seats at the front of the class and Domino waited until the other girls were ready before beginning her lesson.

"Good morning girls. Today we'll be covering basic geometry and algebra. Don't worry if you don't get it, I'll be happy to help you." she smiled kindly as she wrote a few problems on the board. The hour passed fairly quickly, with Kitty and the girls working on the problems Domino had written down for them. Finally, the bell rang and the girls got ready for their next class. "Okay, remember girls, there'll be a quiz in two weeks so study hard!" Domino called as they left with a grin.

As Kitty waddled with Illyana and Rahne to her next class, she let out a giant fart. "Och! Kitty! That reeks!" Rahne protested playfully, shoving her bestie's shoulder. Kitty blushed as she then froze, a look of pain on her face. "Kitty? Are you alright?" Illyana asked with concern. Kitty bent over, clutching her stomach as she squatted and started straining and grunting. A second later, with a very loud *POOOOOOOTTTTTTTTT!!!!* she pushed a large, hot, sticky and smelly load of poop into her diaper. After she finished, Kitty stood up and, upon noticing several girls looking at her aside from her besties, she went deep red. Without a word, she turned and raced away, tears of humiliation pouring down her cheeks.

Kitty didn't stop running until she reached her and Rahne's dorm room and, not even bothering with her full diaper, flopped face first onto her bed and started bawling her eyes out with loud sobs. After a few minutes, there was a knock on the door. "Katherine, may I come in?" Emma Frost's voice asked gently.

Kitty sniffled and sat up, whining as she felt her poop squish against her plumper butt. "C-Come *hic* in, Miss. Frost." she hiccupped sadly. Emma slowly waddled inside and smiled gently as she saw Kitty's bulging, poopy diaper. "W-what's wrong?" Kitty asked. Emma smiled as she sat down next to Kitty. "Miss. Sinclair and Miss. Rasputin just told me what happened on your way to your next class. Are you alright?" she explained with concern. Kitty hiccupped again before shaking her head in dismay.

"N-no. I'm s-so e-embarrassed! I-I haven't pooped my pants since I was three! And now I j-just took a major dump in- in front of e-everyone!" Kitty sobbed, burying her face in her hands as she kept crying. Emma gently rubbed Kitty's back reassuringly.

"It will be alright, Kitten. Everybody here has had a similar accident in or before a class since this curse began. I actually anticipated you would poop your diaper before or during lunch today." She confessed. Kitty looked at her, tears still rolling down her chubby face. "R-really?" she asked with one more hiccup. Emma nodded and gently hugged Kitty like a mother would a daughter.

"It will be alright, Kitty. According to Miss. Rasputin, everybody was only staring out of sympathy. Not amusement or anger at you." She revealed. Kitty smiled despite her teary eyes. It cheered her up that her friends weren't laughing at her.

"Now, why don't you change your nappy and take a nap? Tonight, I would like to have you eat with me in my private quarters." Emma smiled. "Okay." Kitty sniffled as she got up and took her full diaper off and started cleaning up. "I will tell your next few teachers that you wanted to lay down after your accident. They will understand since, like I said, this has happened before." Emma said reassuringly as she waddled out. "Thanks, Miss. Frost." Kitty said as she taped her new diapee on and got dressed again. She then sunk onto her bed and decided on following Emma's advice about taking a nap before dinnertime.

A little later, Rahne and Illyana came in to check on Kitty as she woke up. Rahne's diaper was bulging and smelly while Illyana's was soaking wet and bulging with poop as well. "'Ow're ya doin' Kitty?" Rahne asked her bestie. Kitty smiled at her friend's concern. "I'm doing much better. Thanks." she smiled. "Miss. Frost told us you were having dinner with her tonight so we should make sure you don't eat too much. She said she's having the chiefs make a really big dinner a'fore the two o' ya." Rahne added with a smile. Kitty grinned as she nodded.

"So, how was lunch?" she asked, having slept through it. "It was good. Turns out Rahne's prediction about it being hamburgers was right. She pretty much licked her tray clean and you can smell the result in her diaper!" Illyana joked with a smile. Rahne smirked and stuck her tongue out. "Well, at least I didn't flood me nappy with pee like you did after a-drinkin' four cans of lemonade and soda!" she retorted. Illyana blushed slightly. "Yeah, that might not have been a good idea." she agreed.

Kitty just giggled at her two besties playful jeering of each other. "When did Miss. Frost say I should head down for dinner?" Kitty asked after a moment as her two besties started getting changed into cleaner diapers. "She said ye could drop in at anytime, lass." Rahne smiled as she finished putting a clean diaper on. Kitty nodded and, upon looking at her alarm clock, saw it was 5:56 P.M. "Guess I should probably go now." she smiled nervously as she stood up. Rahne and Illyana both smiled assuredly to her.

"Dinna fast yerself, Kitty. We've both had dinner with teach a'fore an' it's actually very nice." Rahne said as she hugged Kitty, their diapers crinkling loudly as they were pressed together. Kitty nodded, waved goodbye and waddled off to meet Emma.

What next?

1113211312121121.content:
Soon, Kitty waddled up to Emma's office for the second time that day. She gently knocked on the door. "Come in." Emma's voice said politely. Kitty took a deep breath and did so. There was Miss. Frost, already seated at a large oak table.

"Ah, Miss. Pryde. Glad to see that you could make it." said Emma with a grin. Kitty nervously sat down across from Emma, her face stating that she was clearly nervous. Emma just gently patted Kitty's hand with hers. "It is alright, Katherine. I am not going to bite your head off. I have dined with students before." she pointed out. Kitty blushed and nodded sheepishly.

"S-sorry, Miss. Frost. I'm just a little jittery." Kitty apologized. "Perfectly understandable, Kitty. Now, I hope you enjoy our dinner tonight." Emma smiled as the chiefs came out with several trays of food. Hamburgers, fried chicken, steak and lobster. As well as desserts such as cake, pie, doughnuts, eclairs and all kinds of yummy treats. Kitty was so hungry, she feared she was going to start drooling over the food. Emma giggled slightly at Kitty's reaction, causing the brunette to blush deeply again.

"Well, let's eat!" Emma smiled as she grabbed a large plate and started piling food onto it. Kitty quickly did the same. Once she had loaded her plate to overflowing, she used her knife and fork to cut a piece of chicken. However, to her surprise, Emma was eating a drumstick with her hands, loudly tearing chunks of meat off the bone. Upon noticing Kitty's surprise, Miss. Frost swallowed and belched loudly before smiling kindly.

"I will not hold you against eating like you normally do, Kitty. You must be hungry." Emma smiled sweetly. Kitty thought for a moment and then, dropping her fork and knife, grabbed her own drumstick and began tearing equally big chunks off it, sauce and grease smearing her face as she did. After that, she grabbed a large scone and crammed it into her mouth, chewing loudly as she did.

"How does it taste so far?" Emma smiled. Kitty swallowed loudly before answering. "This has gotta be the best meal I've ever had!" She smiled truthfully. Unknown to the young girl, her belly was now beginning to expand more, slowly forming into a large potbelly. "I am glad to hear it, Kitty. Now, let's eat it all before it gets cold." Emma smiled as she went back to stuffing her mouth with scones, burgers and other foods. Kitty nodded and quickly followed suit, cramming 3 cheeseburgers, four doughnuts and 6 scones into her mouth at once.

The duo didn't have speak anymore as they scarfed down the mountain of food like crazy. Manners were tossed out the window as they chugged, chomped, belched, hiccupped, slurped and licked their way ahead , slowly shrinking the feast down.

Soon, the entire table was littered with empty plates, pie tins, pitchers and glasses. "Well *BBBURRRRPPPP* that was a very fine meal." Emma smiled with a large burp as she rubbed her enormous tummy, which gurgled and sloshed happily. "And how was your meal, Kitty?" she asked the equally stuffed and happy 13 and a half year old.

"*UUUUUUUURRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPP* Definitely... really yummy... Emma..." Kitty panted after letting out an even bigger burp than Emma just had. She gently poked her now genuine gut as it gurgled in delight at being so full. "Do you feel better?" Emma asked Kitty as, huffing and puffing, the duo managed to stand up, sweating slightly as they did. "Yeah I do." Kitty grinned.

The duo then slowly waddled to the door of Emma's office. " You should probably get back to your dorm, Kitty. It's nearly curfew and I doubt you want to be in detention on your second week here." Emma smiled. "Thanks *Buuuurrrraaaappp* again for the *hic* meal, Miss. Frost. It really was awesome!" Kitty smiled with another loud burp, this time with a hiccup.

"I'm *urp* glad you *hic* enjoyed *burp* yourself Kitty *hiccup*. Now, head off to your dorm please." Emma smiled back, giving Kitty a fleeting hug before gently pushing Kitty towards the hallway. Kitty smiled, gave a wave, and waddled back to her dorm, burping loudly most of the way.

Rahne and Illyana were both waiting up for Kitty when she finally came in. "Well, how'd it go, Kitty?" Rahne asked kindly. "It went really *uuuurrrrrpppp* well." Kitty smiled, unleashing another rumbling burp. "We can see that." Illyana smirked, playfully poking her friend's tummy, causing poor Kitty to fart loudly again. "Och! Seriously, Kitty. I think ya need ta see the nurse 'bout yon stinky booty!" Rahne giggled teasingly. "Maybe I should've passed on the baked bean burritos." Kitty agreed sheepishly, rubbing her belly as it gurgled and rumbled, happy to be full of such good food.

The trio then talked for awhile before Illyana went to her dorm for the night. Rahne and Kitty got into their nightgowns, crawled into bed, bade each other goodnight and were soon sleeping soundly, Kitty often burping loudly in her sleep as she dreamed about food all night long.

What next?

Just as she started to inhale them, she noticed Emma watching with a smile. At this, Kitty blushed red.

"Oh. Um... I-I'm sorry, Miss. Frost. D-Do you w-want some?" She asked sheepishly. Emma chuckled and shook her head. "It is alright, Kitty. I already had lunch and I'm quite sure you can handle this banquet on your own." She smiled kindly. "Okay." Kitty shrugged as she then stuffed the six doughnuts into her gullet.

Unknown to Kitty, however, Emma Frost watched as the banquet started working on Kitty's systems, mentally noting to herself, "Hmmm. She's begun to eat them. Excellent. And don't worry, my dear. I'm sure you'll become... 'acquainted' with the new weight on your bones in time. Along with a surprise or three as well."

Luckily for her, Emma had blocked her thoughts from having her agenda revealed to Kitty Pryde, who now seemed to be in a gluttonous trance, loudly scarfing down giant handfuls of sweets at a surprising pace. Of course, such binging was likely going to reveal itself on the young Pryde's physical form as her belly started to bloat and expand outward, not enough to stick out to be conspicuous.

Ultimately, Emma anticipated this school year to be... "interesting".
111321132.title: There was a whole table of cuisines splayed out...

choices: Lunchtime arrives. Kitty makes Emma take her to a new buffet and she pigs out.
1113212.content:
Kitty just calmly eyed the laughing Emma. Unknown to her or the others, Emma had altered Kitty's mind overnight to make it seem like she'd always been big, fat and diaper dependent since infancy. "I don't know why you're laughing, Frost. You know I've always been like this since I was in preschool." Kitty told the laughing Emma, completely unphased.

She then bolted down her second enormous helping of eggs, pancakes, waffles, french toast, sausage and the pitcher of orange juice. She burped loudly and then headed for her room, her diaper sagging considerably. Emma wasn't chuckling for long however. The second the plumper Sprite had left the dining room, the other X-Men (Cyclops, Nightcrawler, Wolverine, Colossus and Storm) all turned on her.

"What'd you do to her, Frost?" Logan snarled, his claws inches from Emma's pale face as he pinned her to the wall with the other hand on her shoulder. "I merely made her what she is: A big, fat baby. Miss. Pryde is now compelled to eat her feelings and use diapers until I lift it from her." Emma smirked, despite the clear life/death situation she was currently in.

"How long will it last?" Storm demanded, her eyes flashing warningly. Usually she was calm and polite, but she did have a temper that, when unleashed, was alarming. Emma seemed to notice this as her smirk finally faltered slightly.

"At least a week." She admitted. "Then, since you see Katya as an infant, we believe it is only right you be responsible for her." Colossus said with a glare. "What do you mean, boy?" Emma asked with a small snarl.

"He means you're gonna be like the kid's wet nurse. Yer gonna change her an' feed her for the week." Logan explained with a slight smirk at the look on Emma's face. Emma considered her options and discovered there weren't any.

If she tried to fight, the others would easily subdue her as she still hadn't recovered from her and the Hellfire Club's recent battle with the team at the mansion a week ago and if she tried to run, they'd easily capture her. Her only option was to serve as Kitty's nanny for the week.

"Very well." Emma spat reluctantly as Wolverine freed her. "We knew you'd see it our way, Frost." Cyclops said with a smirk at her glare of resignation. "You may start by helping Kitty with her diaper." Storm ordered with a barely indifferent expression.

Emma stomped upstairs to Kitty's room in annoyance. The 13 and a half year old girl was on her bed, playing with her belly fat by poking her finger in it with a smile, her fluffy diaper bulging with Kitty's recent bowel movements.

Kitty noticed Emma standing in the doorway and frowned slightly. "What do you want, Frost?" she practically spat as she heaved her plump body up. The White Queen growled quietly and forced a smile on her face.

"For at least this week, I am to serve as your nanny of sorts. I will change your nappies and give you anything you wish to eat." Emma explained with a strained smile. Kitty thought about this for a moment and then smiled.

"Okay. First, you can get me a big plate of bean burritos." Kitty smiled. Emma looked at her in shock. "But it's only," she glanced at Kitty's alarm clock, "9 in the morning. Surely you would prefer breakfast foods like doughnuts or cinnamon rolls?" Emma offered. Kitty simply smiled and shook her head.

"Nope. Bean burritos is what my big tummy's cravin' right now." She said firmly, her belly rumbling hungerly. White Queen sighed in defeat and went downstairs. After a while, she came upstairs with the large plate of burritos. Kitty smiled and leaned back.

"Now, feed me." she ordered. Emma snarled but, upon seeing a glaring Colossus behind her in the hallway, reluctantly sat down by Kitty's bedside and began putting each burrito into the 13 and a half year old's eager mouth. Kitty only chewed each one once or twice before swallowing them. After a time, the plate was empty and Kitty was rubbing her tummy in delight.

Emma sighed and stood up. "At least this wasn't so tedious. Maybe now that brat will shut up until lunch." she thought to herself as she started for the door, only to hear a fart and a putrid stench hit her nose. "Miss. Frost... I made another stinky!" Kitty called in a mimicking baby voice. Emma's eye twitched and her lip trembled in dismay.

Reluctantly she led Kitty over to her desk and laid her on it. Holding her breath, Emma slowly un-taped Kitty's diaper and nearly fainted from the massive stench from it. Kitty giggled as Emma tossed the very full diaper into the trash can beside her before starting to clean Kitty's poop covered butt and legs. "That tickles, Frost." She giggled as she felt the wet cloth rubbing her large butt and meaty legs clean. Finally, Emma had taped Kitty into a fresh big, fluffy diaper and Kitty was on her bed, reading a comic book. "Is that all for now?" Emma asked through very gritted teeth. "Yeah, you're good, Frost. I'll call if I make another poopy or wee-wee." Kitty smiled as she went back to her comic book.
1113212.title: She is unphased. White Queen made her think she...

choices: Kitty throws a fake tantrum to get dessert.
Kitty gets into a pooping contest with the little girl next to her.
11132121.content: Emma's next task was to take Kitty to new buffet in town. The White Queen did everything she could not to attack the crowd that gathered around them, staring, whispering, and taking photos on their phone. Kitty was doing her part by stuffing her face with extra spicy food in the most childish way possible. She also belched loudly and drooled while she ate, forcing her rival to wipe her chin. Emma wasn't sure how much worse it could get but she about to find out.
11132121.title: Lunchtime arrives. Kitty makes Emma take her to...

choices: At the institute, Kitty eats all the food for a midnight snack (thanks to Emma)
111321212.content:
As she leaned back, rubbing her full tummy, Kitty noticed a young six-year-old girl wearing a t-shirt and a fluffy diaper of her own. The girl seemed to be on her own as there weren't any adults with her. "Excuse me, little girl? Who're you?" she asked politely.

Upon hearing the 13 and a half year old's voice, the girl turned. "My name's Claire. I'm six years old." she said with a smile. "Where's your mommy and daddy?" Kitty asked. "Mommy's working in the kitchen and Daddy's overseas on a business trip." Claire replied. She then eyed Kitty's diaper. "Why're you in a diaper like me?" she asked, causing Emma to smirk to herself.

"I've been like this since I was younger than you." Kitty replied, still believing these altered memories of Emma's. Then, Kitty farted quietly and pushed a normal sized load of poop into her diaper. Claire smirked at this.

"I can make a bigger poopy in my diaper." she smiled. Kitty frowned at that. "I don't think so, kid. I poop a lot bigger than this so I really don't think you can." Kitty smirked. Claire frowned now. "Uh huh. Mommy says I'm the biggest pooper she knows!" she snapped. "Maybe in your kindergarten class, kiddo. But not against us big kids." Kitty retorted.

Emma, who still been smirking at Claire's question, started to frown as she read Kitty's mind, realizing what was going to happen next. "Don't you dare, Katherine! No! Don't you dare! As your forced nanny, I am firmly forbidding you to-" Was all Emma managed to get out to Kitty before Kitty did exactly what Emma had tried to prevent.

"Alright, little girl. You wanna prove it, then let's have a pooping contest." Kitty decided as she stood up and stood in front of Claire. Thankfully, most of the crowd who'd been watching Kitty had left after she'd finished her meal so the buffet was mainly empty now.

Kitty smirked at Claire and squatted down into a sitting position. After doing so, she began grunting and straining hard, her face reddening slightly at the strain. After a few seconds, she felt something coming.

*PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!! !* A bigger load of poop entered her diaper. Kitty smirked at Claire, who merely smirked and squatted down now herself.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRR RCCCCCCCCCCHHHH!!!* A bigger load of poop entered Claire's diapee, bulging it out at the bottom. Kitty frowned in annoyance.

"Top that, you big bully!" Claire smirked. "Oh, it's on now!" Kitty snarled as she squatted deeper this time, her diaper bulging slightly. With a bigger fart, a much larger load entered her diaper, causing her to smirk in delight while Claire frowned. "Good thing I ate all those spicy foods during lunch." Kitty smirked at her.

On and on it went, Kitty and Claire farting and pooping their diapers, each fart and poop bigger than the last one, their diapers bulging and sagging more and more. Emma just groaned and bowed her head in dismay at Kitty's humiliating performance.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBLLLLLLLLLLLLLOOOOOOOOOOOO OOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!*< br />
*PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT TTT!!!*

*FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!*

Finally, the two girls, their diapers full to bursting, ended their pooping competition. To Kitty's dismay, Claire had won the contest. "Told ya I'm a bigger pooper than you." She giggled as she went over to her mother, who was ready to head home. Kitty just stared after the girl in absolute dismay and rage. "Katherine, you-" Emma began, only for Kitty to cut her off.

"IT'S NOT FAIR! I'M SIX AND A HALF YEARS OLDER THAN HER! I SHOULDA BEEN THE BIGGER POOPER! IT'S NOT FAIR! NOT FAIR! NOT FAIR! NOT FAIR!" Kitty screamed as she stomped her feet and began screaming at the top of her lungs.

"You may be the older girl, but right now you are acting like an insufferable brat like her!" Emma scolded, raising her own voice in fury. Kitty just glared at her reluctant nanny in anger and hatred. Then, she grabbed a piece of cake and threw it at Emma's face.

*SPLAT!* The huge slice hit Emma in the face and then plopped onto the ground! "Nyah! I think I've made my point, you big bully!" Kitty huffed with a smile as she grabbed another slice and stuffed it into her mouth.

"Now, c'mon Frost! Time for you to change my diapee!" she ordered. The frosting covered Frost snarled as she stormed after Kitty into the ladies room, Kitty had already got the changing table ready and was laying on it.

"You will pay for this, you insufferable brat. Tonight, you will feel very ravenous at midnight and eat all the food in the kitchen as your snack. You will also become hungrier than you are now for the remainder of this week." Emma snarled telepathically since Kitty was still pouting over her loss to defend herself from this newest command.
111321212.title: Kitty gets into a pooping contest with the litt...

choices: They are angry at Emma. They know her work and decide to worsen her punishment.
1113212121.content: That night, Emma's new mental command took effect and Kitty proceeded to devour every scrap of food in the mansion. By morning, all the X-Men living with her awoke to find their cupboards bare and their teammate more bloated. She sat at the dining room table nursing a massive, aching belly while burping and hiccupping and letting her now very filled diaper stink up the place. Everyone glared angrily at the sight.
1113212121.title: At the institute, Kitty eats all the food for a...

choices: Kitty massively poops her diaper and sits on Emma, wearing the bulging diaper.
11132121211.content:
As Kitty slowly regained her senses, she noticed the older X-Men glaring at her. "Guys? What's *urp* wrong? A-am I *hic* in trouble?" she asked as she kept rubbing her massive belly in agony. "Oh *belch* man, my *groan* poor *moan* tummy. Why'd *hic-urp* I *hiccup* eat that *burp* last jar *hic* of *urp* chocolate chip *hic* *hic-urp* cookies?" Kitty groaned a second later as her large gut rumbled in pain.

"We aren't mad with you, Kitten. Why don't we go to the medical bay and get you something for your stomach ache?" Storm suggested as she helped the bloated and queasy feeling 13 and a half year old girl up and to the medical bay, Kitty still burping and hiccupping loudly and her diaper sagging noticeably.

Not long after, Storm returned after putting Kitty back in bed. "The poor child. She was snoring as soon as her head touched the pillow." Ororo remarked with a slight grin at the memory. "How is Katya?" Colossus asked. "She shall be alright, Colossus. I gave her some medicine and changed her." Storm smiled in assurance.

At that moment, Emma came in and noticed the mess caused by Kitty's pig out. "Oh my. What happened here?" she asked in mock surprise. "You tell us, Frost. You're the one who made the kid hog out." Logan snarled, getting into Emma's face.

"What are you talking about, Wolverine?" Emma demanded as she kept a weary eye on his claws, inches from her throat. "Knock it off, Frost. We know your handiwork. You caused Kitty's hunger to increase and made her eat herself sick last night." Scott snapped.

"She deserved it, Cyclops. That brat humiliated me at the buffet yesterday, first by eating like a messy infant, then by getting into a vulgar pooping contest with a little girl and pitching a temper tantrum when she lost!" Emma snarled back.

"That may be, White Queen, but you are to act as her nanny until the end of the week when your hold on her concludes. I believe this calls for us to worsen your punishment." Storm replied in fury. Emma stared at the angry mutants in front of her. She could try to use her mental powers on them, but she knew they would come for her after recovering and make her continue her punishment anyway.

"What is it?" She demanded. "For the rest of this week, you will also wear and use diapers in addition to being Kitty's nanny. You will not change yours until she is changed or if she allows it. You will also serve as she personal feeder if she is hungry and/or wishes to eat in her bed." Ororo ordered as Emma frowned. "And you'll do what 'Roro says, Frost, or there'll be trouble." Logan smirked as he released Emma.

With a quiet snarl, White Queen went to her room and changed into a thick fluffy diaper of her own. She then waited for the X-Men to tell her when Kitty woke up while fuming over her newest humiliation.

Soon, Kitty was awake and sitting up in bed, feeling pretty hungry despite her massive tummy ache that morning. When Storm came to see her, she found Kitty talking with Colossus' little sister Illyana, who was visiting them for the time being.

"<Why are you in diapers, Katya?>" Illyana asked in her native Russian. "<'I've always been like this, Illyana. I don't know why it's so new to you guys.>" Kitty replied, having learned a great deal of said language from Colossus. The six year old frowned thoughtfully but didn't say anything. "Excuse me, Illyana. I would like to talk with Kitty for a moment." Storm smiled at the little girl.

Illyana nodded and left to find Peter and ask him why Kitty was fatter and in diapers since it was clear to the young child that Kitty wasn't aware anything was off. "What's up, 'Roro?" smiled Sprite as she sat up straighter.

Soon, Emma came waddling up to Kitty's room holding a massive tray of chili burgers and chili cheese fries for Kitty. "Here you go, Pryde." She spat as she placed the tray on Kitty's lap. "Thanks, Frost. Wait here and you can take the tray down." Kitty smiled as she began loudly and sloppily scarfing down her meal at top speed, to Emma's disbelief as she watched the younger female eat like a pig again.
11132121211.title: They're angry at Emma. They know her work and ...

1113221.content:
Kitty Wolverine and Rogue were just hanging around watching T.V. It was just some mindless show when suddenly it was interrupted by the news with a anchorman looking serious. "Sorry to interrupt your show but there is breaking news. Councilman Kingston as been taken hostage we now go live to reporter Taylor "said the anchorman as the camera went off of him and to the live coverage with a reporter holding a mic.

"Thanks Tom it appears Councilman Kingston as been taking hostage by a group of three mutants that are part of the
group known only as the Morlocks which is pretty ironic since the Councilman is pretty pro mutant we will update you as the story unfolds "said Taylor as the camera switched off making Wolverine sigh.

"You know the drill suit up and let's go "ordered Wolverine. Rogue and Kitty both nodded. Kitty quickly got dressed into her blue costume with the eye mask while Wolverine got dressed in his shirtless orange-yellow and brown outfit and Rogue dressed in her green and black costume. Once done they headed out to save the Councilman. In Kingston's office, two of the Morlocks were standing gaurd a couple of feet away from the Councilman, when suddenly Wolverine burst through the wall, sending the two Morlocks flying but they quickly recovered Wolverine quickly attacked the largest of the two Morlocks cutting him cross the face while Rogue flew through the hole in the wall and attacked the other Morlock, knocking him down again.

"Kitty get the Councilman "ordered Rogue. Kitty nodded and headed for the Councilman, slowly at first but, upon not seeing the third Morlock, Kitty sprinted over to the young man, who was wearing a black suit. But before Kitty could reach him a female Merlock stepped out of the shadows she had black hair and scars running across her face. Kitty was about to attack her when suddenly the Morlock's blue eyes turned in to hypnotism-like swirls. Kitty felt her mind became foggy. Then she started to hear a voice inside her head while she started swaying side to side, her eyes becoming colorful swirls as well.

"Listen to Scar. You will do whatever I say "said Scar inside Kitty's head. Kitty could feel bits of her mind fall away from her. Suddenly the connection was broken by Rogue kicking Scar in the head, knocking her a few feet away. She quickly got up, was grabbed by the two other Morlocks and teleport away.

"You ok?" asked Rogue, helping Kitty up

"Yeah I'm fine "said Kitty shaking her head. It still felt a little funny but Shadowcat decided to keep that to herself. They quickly went to Wolverine and made their way over to the Councilman, who was hiding behind a desk.

"You okay, councilman?"asked Rogue helping the man up.

"Yes. Thank you so much for saving me "said the Councilman as they escorted him out of the building and into the hands of the medics. Later that night Kitty was lying in bed and her stomach suddenly rumbled. She thought it was strange since she was never hungry at this time but quickly gave into her rumbling stomach and headed down stairs making herself three peanut butter and jelly sandwiches and a couple of slices of leftover pizza. After a few minutes, she left the table, feeling rather bloated and happy, letting out a rather deep burp as she did.
1113221.title: Yeah

11132211.content:
Kitty woke up the next morning feeling wet and uncomfortable. She removed the covers to see a huge pee stain on her orange PJ bottoms and a large wet patch in the middle of the sheets. Figuring out what had happened, she blushed, clearly embarrassed. "Oh my god! Well... it's a one time thing." said Kitty quickly grabbing a pair of clean clothes and jumping into a shower. Once she cleaned herself up, she quickly got dressed, grabbed her urine soaked PJ bottoms and removed the sheet from her bed. She made her way to an old closet at no one used much anymore and shoved them inside. She knew she should probably just put them in the washing machine but she didn't want the others to know while she was doing this. Kitty was unware that her belly was a little rounder than usual as she made her way to the kitchen. She saw Rogue Phoenix and Wolverine each having breakfast. "Morning "said Kitty walking over to the fridge.

"Morning. Now hurry up and make your breakfast." said Phoenix as she eat a a slice of toast. Wolverine just grunted in response and Rogue was busy making a bowl of cereal.

"Ok " said Kitty as she went around making herself breakfast. She ended up making herself a whole stack of pancakes covered in maple syrup.

"Are you sure you want to eat all that. It's quite a lot "said Rogue, suprised by the amount of pancakes Kitty was going to eat.

"It's fine. I'm just really hungry this morning." said Kitty as she kept eating the pancakes, manging to finsh all of them while having maple syrup covering her face when suddenly the TV came on saying a bank robbery was going on.

"Alright. You know the deal suit up." ordered Wolverine. Everyone got up, Kitty having a little difficulty due to her being bloated and got ready with the others after wiping the maple syrup off her face, licking the parts her tongue could reach off as well.
11132211.title: The next morning

111322111.content:
As they arrived on scene, the X-Men took cover behind the wall. "Alright. Here's the plan: Kitty, you go through the wall and get the hostages while we get the robbers." Ordered Wolverine. Kitty nodded and made her way to the back of the bank and walked through the wall. As she did so Kitty felt something grow very heavy in her pants and an awful smell. As she looked at the big bulge in the back of her suit, Kitty realised that she had pooped herself. She was slightly embarrassed, but was brought out of thoughts by gunfire and quickly went to the hostages. "Quickly, come with me "said Kitty. The hostages scrunched up their faces at the smell, but did as they were told and Kitty quickly got them out of the building and to the safety of the police. After a couple of minutes, the rest of the group came back.

"How did getting the hostages go?"asked Phoenix, but before Kitty could answer, she was interrupted. "And what's that smell?" asked Rachel looking around, trying to find the source of the smell.

"Oh I farted." lied Kitty, not wanting them to know. "But yeah it went fine." she said with a shrug, not noticing that Rogue was giving her a "I don't believe you look". Later that afternoon,Kitty was changing out of her outfit, desperately wanting to get rid of her poopy outfit, she was suddenly suprised by Rogue's voice.

"So were ya plannin' on tellin' us ya pooped your pants or..." said Rogue, making Kitty blush.

"Yeah. But it's a one time okay? So don't tell anyone." begged Kitty.

"Fine but to make sure it doesn't happen again, Ah'm puttin' ya in diapers." said Rogue with a shrug.

"What?!?!? No!" shouted Kitty, refusing.

"If you don't than Ah'll tell the others." said Rogue. Kitty nodded her head, not wanting the others to know and so she followed Rogue to the supermarket and Rogue grabbed a pack of thick, white Pampers diapers.

"If you're gonna make me wear them, can you at least get the one with flower patterns on them?" asked Kitty with an annoyed look. Rogue just shrugged, grabbed the flower ones and paid for them. When they got home, Rogue helped sneak the diapers up to Illyana and Kitty's room.

"Do ya need help putting them on?" asked Rogue with a chuckle.

"No." said Kitty, slamming the door on Rogue's face and quickly got changed into the first diaper. She had to admit it was pretty comfortable and she was sure she wouldn't have to wear them for long
111322111.title: The robbery

choices: The group start to think something wrong
1113221111.content:
It had been a whole week since Kitty had started to wear diapers and she had gotten quite use to them. Plus she could spend time eating instead of going to the bathroom and a big change had happened to her.

She had became chubby. Her belly being big, round and jiggly and her appetite had also grown, causing her to sometimes have three servings each meal. One morning Kitty woke up late and quickly got up, her orange pjs stretching over her belly. She quickly got changed into her way too tight clothes before she walked to the kitchen to see it was empty and saw a note on the table. It read "Kitty an emergency popped up. We tried to wake you but you wouldn't wake up so we left you. Be back soon " it read in Illyana's somewhat messy hand writing.

"Ok." said Kitty as her stomach let out a loud rumble. "Better feed it." said Kitty, patting her belly, not notching how big it was and went over to the fridge.

Seeing her options, she took out a box of left over pizza and made many different types of sandwiches to peanut butter to ham and cheese and went into a feast eating them all, getting some on her clothes. She was so busy eating, she didn't notice herself wetting her diaper until it was completely soaked. After an hour of eating, Kitty sat back rubbing her bloated belly and burped loudly just as Rogue and Illyana walked in and looked at Kitty, surprised.

"Kitty what happened?"asked Rogue walking over to the fridge to see it empty. "Did you actually eat all the food?"asked Rogue, a little upset that her teammate and friend had done so.

"Yeah I was a bit hungry." replied Kitty with a shrug, rubbing her big belly.

"What's that smell?" asked Illyana, holding her nose as the stench of Kitty's pee reached her nostrils.

"Oh Kitty's wearin' diapers now "said Rogue with a smug smile on her face

"Rogue!!!" shouted Kitty a little embarrassed as her chubby cheeks turned bright red.

"Okay. Do you need help changing your self ?" Asked Illyana, a little awkward that the information she had just learned about her best friend and roommate.

"No I can do it myself "said Kitty struggling to get up and waddled away, leaving the two concerned girls.
1113221111.title: A week later

choices: Try and find out what happened
Try and get help for Kitty
11132211111.content:
The next morning all the X-Men were sitting in the kitchen all having breakfast apart from Kitty who was still fast asleep "Have you guys noticed something different about Kitty?"asked Phoenix as she sat down buttering a slice of toast while the others started to eat their own breakfasts.

"Yeah now that you mention it she is looking a lot bigger than normal "replied Wolverine with a shrug as he eat his own bowl of cereal.

"Plus the whole thing about her wearing diapers "said Rogue getting a glare from Illyana since they were suppose to keep it a secret but maybe with the others knowing they might be able to help the situation.

"Wait when did Punkin start wearing diapers?" asked Wolverine with a confused look on his face as he processed the new information he had just learned about his teammate and friend

"About last week I found that she'd pooped herself so Ah decided it was best to put her in diapers to make sure she doesn't ruin all her sheets or outfits. She didn't like the idea at first but she's gotten use to it." said Rogue with a small smirk.

"Hmm I wonder if there any connection between Kitty sudden weight gain and her loss of bladder control?" Asked Phoenix with a thoughtful look on her face.

"Probably but we'll need to find out how it connects." suggested Rogue trying to figure out what was going on. Their conversation was interrupted by Kitty walking into the room, her belly jiggling as she walked over to the table and made herself a stack of pancakes covered in syrup and whip cream and strawberry on top and sat down

"So what're you guys talking about?" Asked Kitty her mouth already filled with pancakes, syrup running down her double chin.

"Nothing much " replied Rogue. "So has anything strange happened to you lately?" Asked Rogue, rising her eyebrows.

"Nope." said Kitty digging into her pancakes. The rest of the group just shrugged. It was clear Kitty wasn't any help.
11132211111.title: The group start to think something wrong

111322111111.content:
It had been a couple of days since the group had started to suspect there was something really wrong with Kitty. "Something incredibly strange has happened to Kitty." said Rogue as she was hanging off her bed upside down, facing Illyana who had a thoughtful look on her face as well.

"Yeah but the question is what must of caused her to start wetting herself and to put on that much weight." said illyana with a shrug as she as she played with her finger nails

"Well there's only one way to find out "said Rogue, getting off the bed and motioned for Illyana to follow her. She just shrugged and followed they went down the hall and opened the door to see Kitty struggling to pull off her very wet and poopy diaper, her big belly getting in the way of her seeing what she was doing. She turned around to see Rogue and Illyana looking at her, making Kitty blush, her belly jiggling slightly.

"Need a little help with that?" asked lllyana with a small smirk, making Kitty blush even more. Kitty thought about it for a few seconds. she was having trouble seeing what she was doing thanks to her belly but getting changed would be embarrassing but she decided it was best. Kitty simply nodded, laid down on the bed and lllyana started to change her, removing the soaked and poopy diaper and throwing it over her shoulder, with it landing in the bin with a rather big PLOP.

"So Kitty about all the strange things at been happening to you lately... can you think of anything strange that happened to you before this all started?" asked Rogue watching as lllyana put on a fresh diaper on Kitty. Kitty took a couple of seconds to replay all the events that had happened over the past couple of weeks then the event with Scar popped into her mind

"Well when we were saving the Councilman, one of the Morlocks made me stare into her eyes then my mind went strange for a few seconds then it stopped." said Kitty with a smile shrug.

"I think that one was trying to mind control you but it didn't work and left you with some side effects." said lllyana helping Kitty sit up, her belly flowing onto her lap.

"I think her name was Scar or something." said Kitty rubbing her belly.

"Well we need to find her maybe she could fix this." said Rogue.
111322111111.title: Try and find out what happened

1113221111112.content:
Rough Kitty and lllanay all went to confront scar they had managed to locate one of the Morlocks hideouts. They entered through a open window. 1152221113.content:
How about the following?

1) A Social Experiment:
Charles Xavier, aka Professor X decide to test a new project that has been in his mind as of late. What would be the effects of changing the physical appearance, and maybe some personality traits, within a few members of a certain group on the relations within this group. He chooses to use three of his fellow X-Men as test subject and see how the situation evolves…

2) Wishing for Revenge:
Adversary, without interfering directly with Earth, hatch a plan to spread chaos into the human world, starting with influencing some of those he perceived as Key figures within one of the major groups that could interfere. In this case X-Men. Targeting Rogue and her friends…

3) Dawn of World Peace:
A new omega mutant emerges from the shadows, this shadowy figure desire only to have the entire planet in peace. To do so he starts using his powers to fatten up people around the globe, starting with what he conceives as major threats. Omega mutant as Ororo Munroe…and friends who got caught in the line of fire.

4) Accidental exposure:
Rogue, one day as she strolls around town, accidentally absorb the ‘abilities’ of a common person walking at her side. Unknown to her this person is a feedie/foodie and she inadvertently receive the subconscious desire to see herself bigger and to include more junk food in her diet…
How will this change her and her circle of friends?

5) Something else…
1152221113.title: Other ideas

choices: Both Storm and Rogue want to make peace. They offer lunch.
11522211131.content:
Charles Xavier is a man with a vast knowledge and powerful psionic abilities.

It isn’t chance that he is the leader of the X-Men group and the leading figure in his School for gifted young’s. Still, as time went on and within a seemingly period of calm he started to reflect about some tests and projects he had thought about in the past but, had never the opportunity to make them real. Specifically, he had been tinkering with the idea of seeing the effects in human/mutant relationship when physical changes were to be applied to determinate people under a specified set of condition.

On that fateful day, as he was sitting behind his desk in the empty classroom, waiting for the next class to arrive, he saw through the window on the garden three particular persons that were chatting between themselves and thought about bringing that project to life using those girls as test subjects. The more he looked at them the more he realized they would be perfect for that personal project of his. The girls under his scrutiny were Storm, which was an omega mutant and so a major threat to most and a most useful ally to others, Rogue, a being powerful enough with her capability to drain powers and abilities from her opponents, and Shadowcat, that while not as powerful as her two friends, she still could be an annoying adversary to face with her ability to make herself insubstantial.

With a hidden smile he opened his mind, making sure that no others around the mansion could feel what he was doing and began tampering with their minds, starting to input into them thoughts and subconscious feelings that would bring them to his ultimate goal.

Professor X had thought long and hard on what changes he could actively promote in his test subjects and reached the conclusion that, for the best results, all he had to do was to promote a sensation of well being toward being overweight in the minds of his ‘guinea pigs’.

‘Yes, girls. You shall be part of a marvelous experiment indeed.
Nothing harmful will come to you. I’ll make sure of that. Just follow my voice and do as I say…’

The girls were sitting in the garden, enjoying a moment of peaceful quiet, Ororo, alias Storm, was currently meditating trying to relax a bit after her last classroom teachings. It had been a particularly difficult one since some of her students seemed to be interested more in her body than in her teachings. For that she told herself to talk with them singularly to let them understand their mistakes. Rogue, instead was laying down on a bench, reminiscing about her past, still battling internally with the desire to be freed of her powers and the need to protect and support her allies. Still, since she couldn’t have any direct contact, she wondered what she could do to enjoy life a little. Finally, there was Shadowcat, the bubbly young girl had matured somewhat and while still being a bit immature, she was getting her bearings toward being more responsible, although, she took some time to just be herself. As she was doing currently, phasing through the tree in the garden joking and kidding as she made only a portion of her body emerge from within the tree bark.

As Xavier worked his ‘magic’ on them, none of them actually realized something was happening but, some thoughts began to circulate within their minds, changing their focus on life as it should have been.

Storm, conflicted on how to deal with her students began to tinker with the idea of changing herself a bit, to see if with a less distractive body, her lesson could proceed more smoothly. True, she didn’t want to end up unable to perform her duties but, maybe, if she were less toned her students could become more focused on what she said, instead of what she looked. It wasn’t a conscious thought, it was more like a whisper carried by the wind that she managed to hear with her mind that, strangely enough, remained stuck within her.

Rogue, instead, as she depressed herself about her future and the need to enjoy something in life seemed to reach the conclusion that noting she could do was actually going to change her life majorly, still she could try to be less strict in certain aspects of her life, not when it came to covering her body, of course. She didn’t want to have her friends in danger but, maybe, if she could act less rigidly from that moment on, she could actually find something to make her life more…pleasant.

The third girl, instead, began to feel strange, it wasn’t the first time that something or someone tried to tamper with her mind, so she appear to be more focused on the sudden thought than her two friends but, still, after the briefest sensation of having someone else there with her, she seemingly forgot about that and a strange new thought seemed to snake its way into her mind.

‘I wonder…what'd happen to my powers if I were to occupy more space than I currently do? Could it be an advantage when I’m needed to disable electronic instruments?

And what if I have more mass to make my martial arts capabilities more effective?

Mmm…this might not be a bad idea after all.’

As the three girls became more enraptured with these strange and yet, so alluring, new ideas, one of their stomachs growled, making all three of them blush simultaneously. Storm, the more motherly of them, was the first to blame herself.

“Sorry, girls. All the stress in my classrooms is apparently getting to me. I think I’ll go prepare myself something from the kitchen, just to tide me over till lunch.”

Just as Ororo stood up, both Rogue and Shadowcat agreed to the idea, joining their friend, still blushing a bit, since each thought of being the one responsible.

“Y-Yeah Storm…” Rogue stammered a bit “I totally agree with you. I mean, I could use a small snack right now.”

“Yeah, girls! Alright! I mean…I think I may join you for a bite…must've had a too light breakfast this morning.”

As the girls left the garden and moved into the house, Xavier kept following them in his mind, he hadn’t do anything to effectively change their behavior yet, but as he had simply put some subconscious thoughts into them he was amazed by the results.

‘I wonder if they’re so susceptible to my thoughts due to my powerful abilities or if they were already having some inner thoughts of their own that simply helped my suggestion to stick through?
Still, it’s an advantage for me, so that I can bring forward my social experiment and with them I’m sure it will be a success.’

As they walked through the mansion they barely met anyone around, most students were either in class or elsewhere in the garden, enjoying the wonderful weather outside. While most of the teachers were either in class or, as in Wolverine case, doing some odd jobs around. As they entered the empty kitchen, each of them seemed to move with absolute decision toward a certain destination, as if it hadn0t been a simple, momentary thought that had brought them there, but a very essential need.
