Storm quickly went to the fridge, opening it and getting out from it a tub of Vanilla Ice cream, with that she filled almost completely a small bowl she took from one of the cupboards. Once the bowl was filed, she slowly placed the tub into the fridge and with spoon simply began to dig in into her small-ish snack, enjoying the taste of the cold ice cream on her tongue.

Rogue, instead, opted to open one of the many cupboard, taking out a half liter bottle of soda and a bag of chips, helping herself with few handfuls from it, before washing them down with a few sips from her bottle. In truth, she didn’t really wanted to eat but, since she was convinced her body had different ideas she thought to comply with it as she waited for lunch time to roll around.

Shadowcat, making use of her powers, simply walked through a cupboard and emerged on the other side holding a jar of chocolate chip cookies, quickly bringing one of them within her lips, stopping from pushing a second one only when her friends shot her a glare.

“...What?”

“So…” Began Storm, as she cleaned the last spoonful of ice cream. “That is why cookies are so scarce in this kitchen, lately.”

“Umf. And to think that I was being suspicious of Nightcrawler. Should have known it was you, all along.”

Shadowcat, already one hand within the jar, turned suddenly toward Rogue, with an embarrassed and angered look in her eyes.

“Rogue! Th-That’s just not fair! Wh-Why both of you are ganging up on me? I-I like these cookies, true. B-But I’m no thief!”

Shadowcat then, still holding the jar, simply let herself phase through the floor, leaving the room offended by the accusation from who she believed were her friends. As she appeared in her room, feeling anger and embarrassment, she began chowing down on the cookies as if there was no tomorrow, trying her hardest not to start crying. The other two girls, seeing Kitty’s reaction, soon felt guilty and, after quickly polishing their snacks, went after her. Storm, in particular, was feeling deeply sorry for her negative outburst toward the younger girl. She knew that even the less malicious rumor could hurt others and so wanted to amend to her friend. Rogue, too was a bit ashamed of herself.

Who was she to negatively comment on what the others do, especially when she hadn’t any evidence?

As the two stormed out of the kitchen, a figure suddenly popped out into it, making sure that the coast was clear, before opening the cupboard and grabbing a few containers of cookies from there. Nightcrawler, hugging within his body the few containers he had snatched from the cupboards, simply vanished into thin air, teleporting himself away from there.
11522211131.title: Experimenting social relationships

choices: Rogue had doubled down on what she had ordered before.
Shadowcat brought back four plates filled to the brim with meat and BBQ sauce
Both girls brought back one, massive, platter each
115222111311.content:
As both girls reached Shadowcat's room, they heard her sniffling inside and this pushed even more heavily on their hearts. Both of them knew they'd acted horribly toward Kitty, it had come out of their mouth almost immediately, the negative comments, but they didn’t actually mean it. Still, their younger friend seemed to have taken the accusation rather personally and now refused to talk with them.

No matter how hard they knocked or how loudly they asked to enter the room, Shadowcat refused to listen to them. This went on for a few minutes until, with no more patience to spare, Rogue kicked the door open, revealing the sniffling figure of Kitty, crumpled on her bed. Both girls slowly walked in until they were stopped by the crying 14-year-old girl, who assaulted them with fiery words.

“What now!? What more do you two want? Want to accuse me of something else? What've I done to you to deserve to be treated like this? I thought you were my friends, that I could trust you…instead all you wanted was to…”

Rogue, moving closer to the frantic girl, quickly grabbed her arm, with her gloved hands, forcing her to turn toward them, to see the tears streaming down of her own eyes.

“Look, Kitty, we didn’t want to hurt you. We…we talked without thinking. I’m sorry.”

“We…are sorry.” Added Storm moving forward and kneeling beside Shadowcat.

“We shouldn’t have said such mean things to you. I’m truly sorry for what happened in the kitchen. I wish I could return back and take back my words but, I cannot. That is why, to ask you to forgive us, we would like to treat you to lunch. What do you say? We can go wherever you want to go, no fuss about the location. What do you say, Kitty?”

The youngest girl, sniffling less than before, before saying anything, jumped forward, closing her arms around both Storm and Rogue, this last one making sure not to get in contact with her skin, hugging them both.

“Thank you, guys! I just felt so angry, so…betrayed. But it warms me knowing you didn’t really mean those words…Although, I gotta confess something.”

Here, Shadowcat broke the hug and sat on the edge of the bed, before continuing.

“I'm kinda addicted to those cookies so I may've taken a few out the jar during the past few nights…heh heh.”

For a minute there was silence in the room, until all three girls burst out laughing and joking with each other, revealing that each of them had snuck a few in the past, avoiding notice from the others.

With the tension gone within them, Kitty suddenly sprang up from her bed, as she began walking around the room, a finger on her chin as if deep in thought.

“Something wrong, Kitty?” Said Storm, curiously watching the youngest girl deep in thought.

“Nope. Just thinking about where you two are going to treat me to lunch.” Replied the girl, grinning widely, as the two older girls scowled jokingly at her.

Professor X had followed the events with his mind and decided once more that the three friends were just the perfect test subjects for his project. He had only to nudge them a bit more in the right direction, before starting to input a more definite sets of planted thoughts in their minds.

As Shadowcat pondered where to go, a sudden idea sprang in her mind, she wasn’t really sure where she took that notion, but it suddenly seemed the perfect way to close up the situation they were all in.

“I got it, girls! I’ve heard of this new buffet style place that opened recently. Anyone who's gone there's been talking about it as a cool place. And, most importantly, the owner isn’t against mutants at all, so we could go there…so you two can also enjoy a good meal. What do you think?”

Quickly, both Storm and Rogue agreed that, indeed, it was a good idea. What they didn’t know was that the place wasn’t as normal looking as it seemed. Indeed, any customer who went there, left the place giving the best review they could of the place. It could have seemed strange that an all-you-can-eat place that had opened up by barely a week, already had better reviews than most other restaurants in town. Still, people seemed blind to this strangeness, and kept returning to it, unaware of what was happening right under their eyes.

It was already lunchtime when the three X-girls entered the restaurant and, just as soon as they passed the entrance a smiling waiter reached to them, showing them around a bit, before taking them to their table, explain to them the rules of the place.

“Welcome ladies, welcome to The Food Heaven. Are you all together? Good, follow me. I’ll accompany you to your table.”

As they walked the waiter showed them how the place was built, not only there were the massive isles where food could be collected by bringing the plates but, all around the hall there was a mechanical moving belt that let food circulate around the various tables, giving the customer the chance to pick something from it without the need for leaving their seats.

“Here we go, ladies. Now, we have a strict no leftovers policy so whatever you carry to your table have to be eaten if you want to include it inside the All you can eat Menu. Selected packages and offers can be chosen from to decide your meal, and you can see all the details from the interactive menu here at your table. Mainly, the Buffet style menu includes beverages and food, no limit on the number of refills you wish to do, for the price of 10 dollars per customer. As I said before, due to our no leftovers policy, the plate left with food in it will be charged at full price. Single plates prices can be consulted with the menu. Hope you’re enjoy your meal and stay. For any need, don’t hesitate to call one of us waiters and we will assist you as best as we can.”

After politely excusing himself, the guy left them on their own, as he went to greet more customers entering the restaurant.

The three friends looked around ecstatic, checking out the place and enjoying already the heavenly aroma’s coming from all around them. Quickly, they sat and began scrolling through the various options but, in the end, they decided to just pick the buffet style menu and start from there.

Quickly they separated and each went to a different section of the place, carrying a few plates with them. After a while, upon returning to their table, each could see that the other had decided to treat this occasion as if it was a cheat day.

Rogue was the first to return to their table, bringing with her two plates full of different kinds of pasta. One was a common looking mac ’n' cheese while the second one was a plate of fried Chinese noodles with pork and eggs. Both plates were quite larger than what they usually used at the mansion but, she told herself that it wasn’t the end of the world if she let herself go for once.

Following her, was Ororo. The African girl returned balancing three plates with her, the first two filled with different kinds of Chinese noodles, while the third one was some kind of tasty looking stew she had found while walking around. Last one to arrive was Shadowcat, she returned holding with both hands a massive bowl of Japanese ramen which, compared to the rather short teenage girl, appeared to be even bigger.

“Wow, Kitty…pretty hungry, today?”

“Well, Rogue, I gotta confess I’m starving but I see you’re no less hungry than me, huh?”

As the two half joked with each other, Ororo broke the building tension with a smirk.

“Come, ladies. Let us just enjoy some freedom today…and, if someone is going to have the prize for hunger…it should go to me, don’t you think?”

As the other two laughed at that, the three friends began to eat and, as soon as the first bite passed within their lips, they began to literally tear at the food they had brought with them. It was so delicious that all of them couldn’t stop from shoveling more and more of it within their lips. In less than twenty minutes, all three of them had cleaned their plates, almost licking the plates. And yet, as much as their bellies had bloated quite a bit, neither of them felt full, nor satisfied.

Kitty, who'd even drank all the soup from her bowl, simply stood up, albeit a bit slowly, and turned toward her friends.

“Well, I think I’ll go for round two. Girls?”

Rogue stood up along with her and quickly they walked away, searching for something to catch their eye, while Ororo, sat there, feeling as her, usually tight, abs had been replaced by a itty bitty bloated belly. Still, sitting there she noticed the mechanical beltway just bringing plates loaded with cuts of meat and fried mix ups. Interested she quickly grabbed a few out of it and placed them right under her nose.

Smiling a bit, due to the amazing smell coming from her plates, she noticed that for once, she maybe had taken more than she could possibly consume. In front of her, in fact there were now two plates with quite large portions of beef stroganoff and the third platter filled with a mix of fries in all shapes and sizes.

Before she could delve into her meal, her friends returned to the table with their choices and she noticed that…
115222111311.title: A peace offering…With Lunch.

choices: Rogue comes back with quadruple the food she'd just eaten
Two hours later, the X-Ladies are very stuffed and gassy
1152221113112.content:
Kitty was coming back to the table, carrying four plates full of meat and BBQ sauce. Kitty hummed happily as she placed each one down in front of her before sitting down.

"Um, Kitten... are you sure you can eat all that?" Ororo asked gently. Kitty rolled her eyes. "C'mon, Ororo. Gimme a break. I can eat as much as I want here. Besides, your meal isn't exactly small itself." She retorted as she eyed Storm's two plates loaded with beef stroganoff and the tray loaded with fries. Ororo blushed as she realized Kitty did have a point.

"You are right, Kitty. My apologies." Storm said with an embarrassed smile. Kitty grinned. "It's okay Storm. You're just hungry like me." She smiled as she patted her friend's hand assuredly. Then, her stomach growled hopefully.

"Okay, okay already! Geez belly, gimme a minute!" She fumed, causing Ororo to smile and chuckle slightly. Kitty then grabbed a BBQ sauce drenched drumstick and tore a giant chunk of meat off, getting sauce on her face and fingers.

Storm just smiled as she began eating her own feast of stroganoff and fries. The duo kept eating and eating, unaware of their stomachs bloating even more. As she ate, Storm wondered what was taking Rogue so long to come back to the table.

"Kitty, did you see Rogue while you were grabbing your current meal?" she asked. Kitty, sauce smeared around her mouth and now dripping onto her uniform top, shook her head as she swallowed the latest mouthful of meat she had packed into her mouth.

"Nope. Sorry, 'Roro. I thought I saw her near the farther part of the conveyor belts, but I could've imagined it." Kitty replied as she began attacking her fourth plate of ribs, loudly tearing the meat off and licking and smacking her lips and fingers as she did.

Ororo frowned as she looked up at the belts but then her stomach gurgled with hunger and she returned to eating as well, while still trying to keep an eye for Rogue.

The two X-Ladies kept wolfing down their newest meals as they waited for Rogue to return with her next meal. Finally, the duo leaned back slightly and sighed in contention.

"Man, that was the best barbeque I've eaten in a long time." Kitty sighed, sucking on her BBQ sauce coated fingers as she lounged in her seat, patting her bloated belly.

"I agree Kitten. Though, for some reason, I still want... more." Ororo remarked as she rubbed her own bloated belly as it bulged against her t-shirt. Kitty nodded in agreement.

"That makes it unanimous." she giggled, stifling a big burp a second later. Ororo just rolled her eyes in amusement and chuckled as Kitty kept going on and on about the delicious food here. She had to agree with Kitty. The food was very delicious and she could see why it was so recommended after only a few weeks of operations. At the same time, she was wondering about Rogue.

Then,
1152221113112.title: Shadowcat brought back four plates filled to th...

11522211131121.content:
"There's Rogue." Kitty smiled as she kept licking her saucy fingers and plates off. Ororo turned and, sure enough, there was Rogue.

As she got closer, Ororo and Kitty couldn't believe their eyes. Rogue had gotten quadruple the amount of food she'd just eaten. Rogue's plates were overflowing with mega sized burgers, hot dogs, bacon strips, corn on the cob, what seemed to be an entire turkey, blueberry pie, chocolate cake and a honey glazed ham. Ororo's belly rumbled at this beautiful sight and she heard Kitty's tummy mimicking hers. Neither of the duo spoke as Rogue managed to place each meal down as she sat down again.

"At least we know now why you took so long to come back." Ororo smirked at Rogue, who smiled sheepishly. "What can Ah say, 'Roro? Ah'm a hungry gal today." she smiled as she tore a drumstick off the turkey and began chomping on it.

"Come, Kitty. Let us go get some more food." Storm smiled at Kitty, who nodded eagerly and was already standing up in delight. With that, the duo headed to the conveyor belts and started looking for tasty treats.

Ororo soon began loading her tray after reaching her decided location. Soon, it was overflowing with a large ham, biscuits, corn on the cob, more beef stroganoff, fries, bacon, ham and cheese sandwiches and a huge pumpkin pie.

Kitty, meanwhile, went to a different part of the belts and was soon loading her own tray. Soon, it was heaped with mega sized burgers, doughnuts, eclairs, a giant heap of bacon, death by chocolate cake, chocolate chip, sugar, peanut butter and molasses cookies, hot dogs and other sugary/greasy foods.

Rogue eyed the two X-Ladies' trays when they returned with a smirk. "So, Ah ain't the only one who's takin' advantage of our cheat day, huh?" she joked, patting her big belly as it bulged against her black costume and green sleeve-less top. Kitty stuck her tongue out at Rogue playfully as she sat down.

"Gimme a break. You're not exactly one to talk yourself, Miss. Piggy." She giggled, poking Rogue's gut with her finger, causing Rogue to let out a gentle burp as she blushed sheepishly. Kitty just smirked and then plopped five cookies into her mouth at once.

"I must admit I do feel peck-ish again, Rogue. Though, I do not know why." Storm admitted thoughtfully as she sunk her teeth into the first large ham and cheese sandwich, moaning in delight at the taste.

Kitty, meanwhile, placed three large doughnuts on her index finger and then inhaling them. Swallowing them in one giant gulp, she smiled and then crammed three large hot dogs drenched in ketchup and mustard into her mouth, smearing said condiments and the grease around her mouth as well with some of them dribbling onto her uniform's top too.

The three X-Ladies kept eating and eating their massive meals, unaware of what was happening to their bodies as they did.

As she inhaled all the corn on the cob she'd gotten, Rogue's large gut slowly shrank, the fat moving mainly to her hips, butt and boobs. While her belly still resembled a boulder, it was considerably less round while said body parts were much bigger/heavier and her arms, legs, fingers, feet, toes, hands and face were also softer and chubbier.

Ororo, loudly slurping/guzzling an extra jumbo chocolate milkshake, also seemed to plump up in her legs and hips while her booty grew even larger. Her hips began getting even bigger while her already huge booty cheeks strained at her pants. She'd also developed a round face and bigger boobs, fatter arms, hands, fingers, feet and toes.

Kitty's body was starting to chub itself out as she devoured her cake. Her thighs widened slightly as pudge covered her arms and legs. Her boobs and butt also plumped up, though not as much as Rogue's or Storm's. Her face also became soft, with a double chin soon appearing as her belly, arms, legs and other body parts plumped up.

The trio just kept eating and eating, oblivious to these changes as they kept wolfing down their unhealthy meals. They seemed to have grown addicted to eating, regardless how much they'd eaten before.

This was obvious because as soon as a new thing of food was reached, the trio completely dove into it, tearing chunks of whatever it was. The waiters soon caught on to this and began bringing the large plates to the X-Ladies' table.

At first, the plates were brought in with some type of logic, but they gradually became more and more chaotic. Massive cheeseburgers, dripping with grease, were soon followed by very huge piles of glazed doughnuts, which were soon joined by massive pots of chili and rightly followed by large, frosted cakes.

At first, Storm handled the burgers, Rogue the chili and Kitty the doughnuts and cake. Storm stuffed three burgers into her mouth at once before swallowing them and cramming another three in. Rogue was busy loudly gulping down the chili, getting quite a bit of it on her clothes and face, but like Storm, she didn't care a bit. She just smiled, burped loudly and kept on a-chugging.

Kitty was having the time of her life with the doughnuts and cakes. First she poured half the first tray into her mouth, bulging her cheeks like a chipmunk's as she chewed away. After swallowing that, she grabbed two large slices of a seven layer pound cake and crammed those into her mouth. Then she repeated this until the first doughnut tray and cake were gone before she inhaled a big, plump red velvet cake, burping loudly after doing so.

Then, the girls switched. Kitty took the hamburgers, Rogue took the cakes and doughnuts and Storm the chili. Kitty actually managed to stuff five of the mega cheeseburgers into her mouth at once as she did so. Storm did what Rogue had done with the chili and slurped it straight from the pots, also getting chili on her already grease stained clothes and face.

Rogue gulped down two stacks of doughnuts at once before eating an entire four layered chocolate cake with chocolate pieces on it in just two monster sized bites.

Finally, Storm was given the doughnuts and cakes, Rogue the cheeseburgers and Kitty the chili. Storm poured 15 different doughnuts into her gullet as she moaned in delight at their tastes before stuffing a fistful of cheesecake into her mouth as well.

Rogue crammed six cheeseburgers into her gullet at once before swallowing loudly and downing another six while Kitty guzzled the remaining pots of chili even more sloppily than her friends did, dripping big globs of it onto her uniform top, which was already covered with frosting, powdered sugar, grease, BBQ sauce, ketchup and mustard.

Finally, the three X-Ladies leaned back in their seats and burped loud and long as they massaged their large bellies in delight at their gorge. Storm's belly was poking out from under her shirt, now resembling a brown boulder and her whole body was soft and doughy.

Rogue wasn't much better as her gut was straining against her costume more than ever. Her face looked like a ball of dough and her whole body jiggled with fat.

Kitty was just as bad as her friends were. Her belly was big and round, her body resembled a boulder in roundness and she was almost bigger than her two older teammates.

The waiter came up a second later. "Excuse me, ladies, but the buffet is closing soon. However, if you would like to continue eating, I'll speak to the chief. What would you like to do?"
11522211131121.title: Rogue comes back with quadruple the food she...

choices: The trio eat an enormous breakfast the next morning. Kitty goes to dance class
The girls sneak a massive midnight snack.
115222111311211.content:
The trio stared at each other for a moment. Then, Ororo slowly turned back to the waiter. She stifled a very big burp, bulging her cheeks as she did before answering.

"N-no *burp* thank *belch* you. We *urp* have *burp* eaten *hic* enough for *burp* today. Thank *hic* you. We will take the... check... now... please..." she gasped in between burping and hiccupping from her fullness. Rogue nodded in agreement, her double chin jiggling as she did while Kitty merely let out a giant burp while massaging her big belly.

The waiter nodded and walked off to get their check, leaving the three bloated and pooped out X-Ladies to catch their breaths. After a few minutes, Kitty, still rubbing and poking her ginormous gut, spoke up.

"I *burp* gotta say *urp* that was the best *belch* food I've *hic* eaten in *hic-urp* a long time *booorrrppp*. Man, is my tummy full." She groaned in delight, despite her bloated belly.

"Ah'm with ya sugah. We really gotta come back here again sometime." Rogue agreed as she stroked her bulging belly in equal delight as she eyed her fat and youngest teammate with a grin.

"I admit I too feel happy from eating so much. Normally I would disprove of eating so much in one day, but, I shall make an exception for this yummy and delicious food." Ororo admitted with a grin as she poked her belly, watching a sausage sized finger sink into the squishy, warm and brown flesh.

Soon the waiter came back and, after Ororo paid the check, he and two other waiters helped the bloated girls to the doors.

The trio started for the mansion, but it soon became apparent that, despite it not being far away, the walk was doing the trio more harm than good in their bloated forms.

Within ten minutes, Storm was leaning against a lamppost, clutching her side as she wheezed and panted heavily, sweat running down her greasy and plump face as she did.

Rogue had sat down on a bus bench, also wheezing and panting, sweat running down her own doughy face as she leaned back, her massive boobs and belly raising and falling as she tried to get oxygen back into her body.

Kitty, meanwhile, had simply belly flopped onto the ground and was now laying on her massive belly, gulping like a beached trout, her tongue nearly touching the pavement as she wheezed, gulped and panted loudly.

"I'm... so... pooped..." She groaned. "So... am... Ah... sugah... mah feet... are... killin'... me..." Rogue groaned in equal exhaustion as she managed to lift her head up to eye her younger teammate and friend sprawled on the sidewalk.

"Surely... the... mansion was... not... that... far... away... when we... walked... here?" Ororo gulped after a minute, wiping her sweaty and greasy forehead off with a large meaty hand.

"Maybe... we... should... just... call.. a... cab?" Kitty finally wheezed. The other two nodded as they kept trying and failing to get enough energy and oxygen into their large bodies. Kitty managed to pull her phone out of her tights and, after trying and failing to type the number in with her own sausage sized fingers, used voice command to call a taxi.

After a few minutes, the taxi pulled up and the fat, sweaty and greasy X-Ladies heaved themselves into it. They were cramped in the back together, but merely assumed the taxi was out of date enough to be or feel cramped.

Not long after, the trio arrived at the institute and waddled inside. Rogue was the one who broke the silence.

"Gals? If... we... go back... soon... we'd... better... use... the... cab... ta... get... too an'... from it..." She remarked.

Kitty and Ororo both agreed and the trio waddled to their bedrooms, cleaned themselves up and plopped into bed, dreaming about food and how nice it was to let go and eat like they'd done.

While this happened, the fat they'd gained, slowly worked its' way around their bodies, fattening them up even more in their hips, boobs, butts, faces, arms, legs, toes, feet, fingers and hands during the night.
115222111311211.title: The X-Ladies are very stuffed

choices: The chief cackled evilly as his plan seems to be proceeding well
Rogue’s suit rips apart. The young woman gasps but doesn’t stop eating
1152221113113.content:
As Storm indulged in the deliciously cooked meats and fried foods she had taken for herself, she didn’t notice a thing as someone entered her mind, checking her thoughts and status.

Professor X, even though still inside his mansion, felt like as if standing next to Ororo as he red her mind. He could see that his action had led the mutant woman to let herself go, reducing the standard of physical perfection she usually went by. He also noticed that he was getting some weird vibes from the restaurant they were in but discarded the thought. Roaming through the restaurant it didn’t take him long time to find Rogue and Kitty, the two were currently standing next to a few containers of food, unable to choose what they wanted to pick. Since they all made part of his experiment, he smiled within himself and gave them a little mental push.

‘Kitty, it’s a cheat day…nothing harmful will come from it. Enjoy yourself to the fullest…Can’t you feel your stomach grumbling? It need food to work properly. Satisfy it.’

‘Rogue, why not trying to live life as much as you can? One plate? Two or even four? Follow your hunger…and you’re getting pretty hungry, aren’t you?’

As he closed the connection he tiredly crashed against his chair, yet, he was smiling. The three test subjects were showing a great promise already…


At the restaurant, Ororo had already cleared the first plate of Strogonoff, her belly bloating already a bit, as a small sliver of her skin began to emerge between her long tight pants and the sleeveless top and jacket, she was wearing. Besides, she didn’t feel full, yet, so she placed the empty plate aside and brought the fried mixed plate in front of her when she saw her friends returning. As soon as she spotted them, she gaped open mouthed.

Both Kitty and Rogue were closing on their table with a massive platter on their hands, she couldn’t believe in seeing that both massive platters were literally overfilled with food. As the two girls finally seated the table trembled for a moment with the added weight of their plates.

“Kitten? Rogue? What…?”

“Er…maybe Ah took a bit too much? But it’s okay…Feelin' ravenous today.”

With that Rogue began to literally assault all the food in her platter, mostly massive double decker hamburgers and huge hot dogs, with the sparse presence of fried greens and salty fries. As she started munching through those she quickly grabbed the ketchup and mayo, as she began to literally cover the entire platter with those sauces, making it even more greasy and with a higher calorie content.

Kitty, instead had filled her own platter with an immense selection of junk food and confectioneries. The massive palter was indeed choked full of hot dogs and greasy, multi dickered, hamburgers. Right between that huge carb fest, there were also mounds of bacon strips right along with at least a dozen donuts, a few éclair and even a couple of slices from a Devil’s food cake. She too began attacking the plate with a ferociousness that Storm had never seen before, as the greasy sauce began to smear her lips and chin, slowly dribbling even on her clothes. Kitty, seeing the interrogative stare of Ororo, simply smiled, swallowed and replied to her as if it was the most normal of the things.

“What? I’m just hungry…and I was dying for both fast foods and sweets…so, that’s perfect!”

Storm, seeing her two friends enjoying their meal so much, decided to let herself go, and so she started imitating them, taking plates from the conveyor belt, filling herself up as she too began to feel a rising hunger coming from her belly.

As time passed, all three of them managed finally to demolish whatever they had brought to the table. Needless to say, the girls who had entered that buffet, were very different from those that were now seated at that table. Storm was belching quietly, as she caressed her bloated belly which had definitively opened the gap between her pants and her top, the globular stomach rested on her thighs, a boulder like belly, round as a ball and yet, not filled up to capacity.

Rogue too, was in a similar situation, her clothes, already tight when she entered the restaurant, were now on the verge of ripping apart on the torso, as her round belly pushed mightily against her black outfit, making her sleeveless green top appear more like a makeshift bra than anything else. She was laying on the back of her chair, caressing her bloated tummy and yet, she still was feeling quite a bit hungry.

Kitty, of all of them, was the one most impacted.

Being the shortest and the youngest, the results of her binge were the most dominant on her figure. Her belly had grown massively in size, pushing tightly against her clothes, as it weighed her down, and yet, both her face and her clothes, drenched in grease and powdered sugar, were evidence enough of just how ravenous she had been.

Except she was still hungry.

As the trio breathed slowly, regaining their energy from all that time spent eating, they suddenly noticed one of the cute waiter boys coming toward them. As he stepped up to their table, he smiled seeing that all plates on it had been emptied.

“I take it you ladies have enjoyed your meals?”

“Y-Yes…*Belch*! Pardon me….It was all very good…”

The waiter, not at all impressed by the belching, smiled at the girl with the white dyed mohawk hair as he turned toward the other two, complimenting each of them and informing them of something.

“Ladies, I’m sorry to say this but it’s almost closing time. Still, if you wish to stay here and have some more, we will inform the chef about it. This is an ‘All you can eat’ buffet…if our Guests return home hungry, we haven’t done our job well. So, what is gonna be?”

All three friends looked each other in the eyes, as a grinning smile appeared on their faces, before turning all three toward the waiter replying with a definite “Yeah, we’ll having some more!”

From then on, for their enjoyment, the waiters began to bring platefuls of food directly to their table, as they were the only customers still present in the restaurant, meaning that whenever one of them cleaned a plate, another filling meal presented itself under their eyes. The three girls began to be so engrossed in the act of eating that they barely noticed the effects that all that food was having on them.

Kitty was already cleaning out a plateful of baked corns with glazed ham slices, when her bloated belly began to shrink, the weight and fat slowly distributing itself overall on her body, chubbying it out. Her curves began to soften as fatty rolls began to make their appearance on her front and on her back, her thighs widened a little bit, as a small layer of jiggling pudge covered her arms and legs. Her face too softened up, with a second chin starting to appear.

Rogue, just as she had cleaned a massive platter with an entire roasted turkey, also began to soften up, although she began to grow mostly I her breasts, which began to grow larger and heavier, and on her hips, widening hip quite a bit. Her belly, although it had softened up was still quite small. Ororo, instead, as she finished guzzling a massive milkshake offered by one of the waiters, seemed to be expanding mostly on her hips and legs, as her ass seemed to grow out of control. Her already wide hips began to wide up hugely, with her ass check that started to wobbly overflow the chair she was sitting on, pushing to their stress limit the pants she was wearing.

All three of them seemed to have become addicted to eating, no matter how much they had eaten before, as soon as a new plate was placed before them, they totally dived in it, taking huge chunks of whatever it was. At first, the plates seemed to be carried over with some kind of logic but, after some time, everything seemed to grow more and more chaotic. Massive hamburgers, drenched in grease, were soon followed by huge piles of glazed donuts, which were then replaced by large pots of chili, rightly followed by large frosting covered cakes.

The girls kept gorging on the amazing food that was being presented to them, unaware of what their bodies were experiencing, just as if a trigger had been activated within them turning them into human waste disposal machines.

Still, as they gorged and guzzled, three things happened at the same time. First, Professor X checked on them, smiling in seeing how his project was already providing good results. Then, from the kitchen doors the Chef watched with admiration and fascination as those guests kept on eating his food and, finally….
.
1152221113113.title: Massive platters for a massive hunger

choices: The trio manages to return home safely
As they return to the mansion, they stop by a donut shop for a quick snack
Xavier intervenes sending them back to the buffet for a second round
11522211131134.content:
As the chef was sure that the three new guests were too engrossed with their food, he let out a small cackling laughter.

Everything in his plan seemed to be going steadily. As he closed the door and returned inside the kitchen he couldn’t stop smiling. He was an honest man, he hadn’t any superpower to call his own and that had made him jealous of the mutants, at first. Then he realized that with those superpowers, the mutants could wipe out mankind and humanity wouldn’t have stand a chance. So, to his jealousy, it soon began to appear hate for the mutants. Still, he was a peaceful man and he knew he couldn’t fight them directly so a plan hatched within him.

He had no power, but he had his culinary skills.

Adding to that some hunger stimulants and metabolism suppressors, he concocted his personal plan to stop the mutants from destroying the world. Once hey were going to be all so fat that all they wanted to do was eat, he could have called it a victory for mankind. That was why he had spent so much on those mutagenic tracer installed on the entrance of the restaurant, once he could know which of his guests was a mutant he could stuff them full of food, changing them in the eating machine he needed them to be.

‘Sure…’ he thought to himself a he prepared the next batches of blueberry pies to be brought to his current victims ‘…A few humans will end up as big, if not bigger, gluttons than them…but it’s a small price to pay for everyone to be freed of the mutant threat.’

And yet, he knew he couldn’t push it too much in one day. Already he had stopped providing stimulants to the food of those three mutant girls there. Still, he already had made preparation to have them back in his restaurant soon enough.

The girls though, were still gorging gluttonously with all the food brought to them.

Neither of them knew how long they had been staying there eating and yet, as the stimulants in their bodies began to fade, they too began to slow down in their consumption. Rogue was the first one to stop. With her now exaggerated hourglass figure, her breast had become more of a hassle than anything else. Weighing her down as they had grown massively, losing almost all of their perkiness, they were kept somewhat lifted up only by the small-ish potbelly she had developed. Her hips too had widened hugely, forcing her to seat with her legs spread apart a bit. As she swallowed the last cupcake on her platter, the last of three dozen she had been given, she burped a bit and simply crashed on the table, unable to continue, feeling completely stuffed and yet, happy for once.

Storm followed her example ten minutes later.

The African girl had grown hugely during the almost endless lunch they had, her ass cheeks were now hugely wobbling masses of lard. Piling heavily on her enlarged thighs and legs, her poor pants hadn’t managed to resist during her binge, ripping apart in several places. She was still covered for the most part but, several gaps had opened letting several inches of fatty ass to spill out. As Ororo managed to swallow down the last taco she had been given, she too almost collapsed on the back of her chair, as she massaged a bit both her massive ass and globular belly.

Kitty Pryde was the last one to give up. While rogue crashed, she managed to eat a whole pot of lentil stew. Burping and farting away trying to make some more room. As Storm collapsed, she cleared out a large plate filled to the brim with cookies and ice cream.

And finally, just as she had cleared out that last plate, her clothes seemingly exploded off her, ripping into shreds, leaving her almost naked but she didn’t seem to notice anything apart form the fact that she was finally feeling contently full. As she swallowed down her last morsel she smiled and turned toward the waiter standing beside her.

“I…I think…we’re…done…now. Could you…bring us…the check?”

With that she, too, collapsed, using her humongous belly as a pillow.

Of the three, she seemed to have bee growing the most. With her forms growing apple shaped, her belly was massive, it hung bloated, down on her legs, almost up to her knees, as did similarly her ass. As it almost overflowed her chair. Her face too had softened up quite a bit more, with a second chin definitely there, and the hint of a third one starting to appear.

As the waiters cleaned the table, and them, they also gave to the three girls some time to rest a bit, before waking them up telling them that it was time to close the buffet. The three mutants didn’t seem baffled to have spent most of their day in that restaurant, nor of how their bodies had grown. But that was simply because nether of them could see herself truly. Charles Xavier, since he had followed their descent into gluttony, had made so that their minds couldn’t see the physical changes within themselves. This was made to make sure that no false data was going to be collected as his experiment went on. Also, because he wanted to see what reaction would the others have in seeing their friends so much fattened. As he broke the contact, he couldn’t wait to see the three girls waddle slowly through the halls of the mansion.

He wondered briefly if someone would have the courage to approach them asking the dreaded question.

As Kitty, Storm and Rogue woke up and stood from the table, each of them felt as if there was something that wasn’t quite right but, unable to see how vastly each of them had changed, they simply dismissed the thought. As Rogue paid for their meal, since it was a treat that they had decided to offer to Kitty, one of the waiters reached to them, smiling gently.

“Ladies, please to wait a moment, before you go.”

“Ye…*burp*…es?”

Storm, feeling definitely stuffed, turned as a burp escaped her lips, although the waiter didn’t seem to notice it.

“I’ve wanted to let you know that, since you’re first timers in our restaurant, and since you’ve enjoyed so much our products, the Owner would like to offer you a special discount within our establishment. In this case, we offer you a fifty percent discount on all your expenses if you come here to eat at least four times a week, while a thirty percent discount if you should decide to hire our personal catering service directly to your home. I must admit you must have made quite an impression on the Boss, we have only a handful of Clients to which this deal has been offered to. Also, with the discount, the no leftover policy is removed. So any residual can be brought home or home delivered, as you would prefer.”

Kitty, without even waiting for her friends' response, greedily nodded several times, just before Storm slapped her lightly on the head.

“Excuse my friend's eagerness. Sometimes she doesn’t think before speaking. Anyway, we will think about it, if possible, and let you know the earliest.”

With that the waiter nodded gently, with small smile on his lips and helped the three fattened beauties out of the building. As they were outside, swollen bodies shown to the world in their largeness, the three mutants slowly began the hard trek home, although it had took them only few minutes to get there in the first place. As a few meters passed, with their overburdened bodies getting completely drenched in sweat, the three girls stopped suddenly, completely out of breath.

“*Huff*…didn’t seem…to be…so far away…”

Storm, huffing and puffing, stood against a lamp post trying to regain her breath. Her huge ass, shaking and wobbling as she tried futilely to calm her heartrate down. Rogue and Kitty didn’t fare that much better. Rogue was currently seated on a nearby bench, completely collapsed on it as her potbelly bobbed up and down, as she breathed heavily. Kitty, instead was sitting down on the street, trying as hard as she could to recover her energies. As time passed and neither of them could recover enough to start moving again, it was Rogue who first piped up with a proposal.

“Girls…what if…we call…a cab?”

Storm, trying hard to find air enough to speak, simply nodded, barely breathing out a yes, just as Kitty took out her phone and tried vainly to call a taxi with her sausage like fingers, until she simply went on internet and spoke with a trembling voice asking for a cab.

As they waited there, Storm finally managed to pipe up, having recovered some much-needed oxygen in her overburdened, overstuffed, body.

“Must remember…for tomorrow…to go there with…the cab.”
11522211131134.title: Evil plans by some not so evil person

choices: The X-Ladies end up having a midnight snack
Next morning, the trio have a ginormous breakfast
115222111311341.content:
After a few minutes, the cab Kitty had ordered rolled up. The cabbie looked shocked at the three bloated women, but didn't say anything as they opened the door and started to climb in.

Kitty got in first, sitting by the other door. Rogue went next, followed by Storm. "Oomph!" Kitty grunted as she was pressed slightly against the door by Rogue's girth. "Rogue, do you mind scooting over a bit? I'm pretty much wedged to the door." she said, wriggling around uncomfortably. "Sorry sugah. But Ah'm jammed between you an' Ororo." Rogue replied apologetically as she rubbed her big tummy with her fat, gloved hand.

"Well, excuse me. I cannot help it if I am squishing you two. This cab is probably so worn down, it is possibly too small for us." Storm retorted as she also put a chubby hand on her brown boulder of a belly. The cabbie didn't seem to hear this comment. He just looked at the trio as they wriggled and jiggled, trying to get some degree of space between their large, fatty bodies.

"Where to, ladies?" He asked calmly. "Westchester." Storm grunted as she managed to cross one of her salami sized legs over the other so Rogue could have at least a little more leg room as Rogue managed to wriggle over slightly so Kitty could move away from the opposite door.

The cab driver nodded and set off. The three X-Ladies didn't say anything as they just kept catching their breaths and rubbing their full bellies. Storm was burping slightly as she breathed in and out, patting her tummy as it poked out between her shirt and pants.

Rogue was smiling as she rubbed her large orb of a belly with both hands, hiccupping slightly as she ran her hands over the bloated flesh.

Kitty, meanwhile, was grinning broadly as she lightly drummed on her rather big orb of a tummy. After a moment, she froze, a gurgling noise coming from her belly. Rogue and Storm noticed this.

"Kitten... are you alright?" Storm asked. Kitty didn't answer as her cheeks swelled up. It looked like she was gonna be sick, which was somewhat understandable, given how much the trio had eaten over the last several hours. Her belly gurgled even more now.

Then, *BBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!* Kitty belched loudly. "Excuse me." she giggled, blushing furiously. Rogue and Storm looked at her with weird expressions.

"Kitty. That was good, but that ain't how ya burp. This is how ya really burp." Rogue smirked, pressing on her belly and sloshing it slightly. Then, *BBBBBBUUUUUURRRRAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!!* She let out a long, rumbling burp. "Neat, Rogue." Kitty smiled as she kept rubbing her tummy.

"Both of you do not know how to burp." Storm smiled as she strained hard, the large brown orb of a tummy gurgling and sloshing. After a few minutes, *BBBBBBUUUUURRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!* She let out the biggest burp yet.

Kitty and Rogue eyed each other mischievously. "Why, Storm. If Ah didn't know any better, Ah'd say y'all are challengin' Kitty an' me to a burp off." Rogue smirked.

Storm grinned in equal mischievous amusement. "Why, Rogue. Why would I do that?" she chuckled.

"Oh it is on, sugah!" Rogue declared. "Yeah. I was burping champ at Deerfield Middle before I joined the X-Men, Ororo! I'm gonna kick your guys' tushies!" Kitty giggled in delight.

"Rogue, you are so confident with your belching abilities, why don't you go first?" Storm suggested with a smirk.

"Why thank ya, sugah." Rogue giggled as she began straining hard while pressing on her squishy bloated tummy.

*BBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!!* A large belch escaped her lips a second later.

"Not bad. But I can do better." Storm smirked as she began sloshing her brown belly with her hands, moving it up and down and side to side as it started gurgling and rumbling.

Then, *BBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!! !* A bigger burp flew out of her mouth.

*YYOOOOOOOUUUUUU CCCAAANANNNN'TTTTTT BBBBBEEEEAAAAATTTT MMMMEEEEEEEEEE.* Rogue burped with a smile.

*WWWAAANNNNNAAAAA BBEEEEETTTTTTT RRROOOOOOGGGGGGGUUUUUEEEE* Storm belched back with an equally big grin as she patted her belly.

Then, "My turn." Kitty giggled as she began violently jiggling, sloshing and pounding her belly. After a moment, it burbled, it gurgled, it jiggled, it wobbled. Kitty's cheeks puffed up more and more with pressure and then... it happened.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRPPP!* Kitty let out the biggest burp of all, shattering the cab's windows and nearly sending it into a ditch.

*SSSEEEEEE? TTTTHHHHAATTT'SSSS HHOOOOWWW YOOOUUU BBUUURRRPPPP!* Kitty belched in victory as she then giggled and rubbed her tummy in delight.

"Woah, Kitty. Ah guess Ah shoulda taken your burpin' stories more seriously." Rogue admitted with a smile as she and Kitty high fived.

"I agree Kitten. Your burps were pretty impressive." Ororo smiled as Kitty blushed at the compliment. Then, "We're here." the cabbie said as he pulled up to the mansion.

"Thanks. Sorry 'bout your windows." Kitty apologized as she handed him a few dollar bills extra than what Storm had paid him.

The girls started to climb out, only to run into a slight problem: Storm was stuck due to her wide hips and booty. "C'mon, 'Roro! Pull!" Rogue said as she began helping her teammate and friend out. "Yeah. With all that chili she ate, I don't wanna be behind Rogue's big butt anymore than I already am!" Kitty joked, eyeing Rogue's large hippo butt cautiously.

"Ah wouldn't talk sugah. You an' Ororo both ate the same large amount of chili Ah did." Rogue reminded her as Storm finally managed to wriggle out with Rogue's help. Rogue also got stuck slightly but she was able to pop free quicker.

Then, it was Kitty's turn. She only got her head and arms out before she got stuck herself. "Hold on sugah." Rogue smiled as she grabbed Kitty by her plump hands and began to pull. But even with Rogue's super strength, Kitty was just barely budging. Being the shortest and youngest, her girth was bigger than Rogue and Storm's, even with her fat having moved to other areas of her body.

"C'MON!!" Rogue grunted as she kept pulling. "Any harder Rogue, and you'll pull my arms off!" Kitty protested. She did feel bad for getting stuck too and she was doing her best to help.

"Would you like me to aid you?" Storm asked Rogue as the latter finally took a moment to catch her breath, wheezing and gasping, sweat rolling down her soft, plump face.

"That... that'd be... great.... Storm.... thank.... ya..." Rogue managed to gulp out between wheezes and gulps of air. Storm smiled and wrapped her arms around Rogue's large belly while the southern gal took Kitty by the hands. "Hold on now, Kitty!" Rogue said as she and Storm began pulling hard.

But it was no use. Even with Storm helping, Kitty only slid a little bit more. Then, "I... believe I have... an... idea... we... could try." Ororo wheezed as she and Rogue took another break.

"What?" Kitty asked, hoping she was going to be freed soon. The cab's doorframe was digging into her sides and was actually starting to hurt.

"When Rogue and myself pull, you use your powers to phase free." Ororo explained. "Okay. Let's try it." Kitty agreed. So, Rogue and Storm retook their places and began pulling again. "OKAY, KITTY! PHASE NOW SUGAH!" Rogue grunted as the two older X-Ladies kept pulling. Kitty closed her eyes, took a deep breath and phased.

A second later, she popped free and belly flopped right on top of Rogue due to her girth and momentum being more than both had expected. Storm had managed to stumble back in time. The two younger X-Ladies blushed sheepishly as they realized where Kitty was and managed to heave themselves up.

The three X-Ladies didn't say a word as they waddled into the Mansion and went to their respective rooms. They barely had enough energy to clean themselves up and squeeze into their pajamas before flopping into bed and drifting off to Dreamland.
115222111311341.title: The trio manages to return home safely

choices: The following morning, the other X-Men share their doubts about the three ladies
During the night, Xavier does something to their minds and to someone else…
Following Morning, the three friends deals with a clothing shrinkage problem
115222111311342.content:
The three la(r)dies sat in the cab, squishing each other’s flab.

Still, as uncomfortable as it was for each of them, they yet had to understand why they were feeling so perturbed. In the end, each of them simply thought that the cab had to be so run down that they were forced to sit tightly against the other. As the ride progressed, suddenly Rogue piped up, asking the driver to stop even though they were almost there at the mansion. Storm, massaging her widened hips, not really understanding how big they really were, turned a puzzled look to her friend.

“Rogue? Why did you ask the driver to stop? We’re almost home?”

Kitty Pryde, instead, having seen what had picked the interest of her white streaked friend, eagerly nodded making her chins wobble slightly and her arms too.

“Well, Ororo, since we’re almost there Ah thought maybe we could pick up a donut or two…you know, for later?”

The fattened, white haired mutant smiled a bit within herself. She didn’t want to be the first to admit it but, even though they had finished lunch just a couple of hours before, was feeling rather famished. Still, trying to be the mother Hen as she usually did, she accepted but adding a remark for her two friends.

“Alright, but just a couple.”

Getting out of the cab was quite the feat for the three newly fattened ladies, yet, after a bit of prodding and pushing, they managed finding themselves short of breaths but right in front of the bakery. Waddling slowly, one by one, they entered the place finding themselves suddenly surrounded by a treasure trove made of sweets and treats. As they waddled toward the counter, though, Professor X was checking on their progress with quite an interested mind.

‘I see…No matter that they’ve eaten more than enough to satisfy their normal intake two or three times over. But, they still are growing hungrier yet. Mmm. This must be studied further. I have to try and let themselves go just as they did at the Buffet.
The more their exterior changes, the more effective will be the results of the experiment. ’

The professor, then, did something he normally wasn’t fond of doing. He entered the mind of the clerk at the shop and imprinted into it the idea that the three new customers were their millionth customers and so they could have all they wanted for, almost, free.

As the professor did that, he felt his energies dwindle and so had to abruptly cut the link, taking care to rest, while promising himself to check on them as soon as they returned into the mansion.

The three bloated beauties had managed to reach the counter, although each of them was feeling rather down in energies, so they actually thought that a load on sugary things was just what they needed. But, as they reached the counter, the clerk looked at them and quickly showed them to a table near the counter, while providing, especially for Storm, wide seats for them to seat on.

“Here ladies, have a seat here. You’re our millionth customers of the month so, you’re awarded with a discount of the ninety-five percent to our store wares. Let me know your order and I’ll bring them right here to you.”

Kitty didn’t make any fuss about it, ordering immediately a dozen jelly filled donuts, followed suit by Rogue which instead went for an extra large milkshake and three pieces out of a chocolate sheet cake. As those two ordered, Ororo tried to contain them.

“Girls! We said just a couple of donuts…haven’t you eaten enough already?”

“Lighten up, 'Roro…” said Kitty thickly as she massaged her massive belly rolls, anxiously waiting for her order. “It’s a cheat day, isn’t it? Plus we’ve got this deal they’ve offered to us. If we don’t use it it will be a shame.”

“Yeah…*slurp*…” Reinforced Rogue, as she began drinking from her massive milkshake, her already overburdened belly starting to bloat out eve more. “We should definitively take advantage of that!”

As her two friends seemed to have gone all hog, Ororo finally decided that if they were to act like pigs, she should then be the one out eating all of them.

“Well…if you put it that way. Sir? May you bring me a Devil’s food cake? No, not a slice. A full cake, please.”

As she said that, under the surprised stares of Kitty and Rogue, both girls decided that if that was the game to play, they could compete too. Right after that thought the girls began to guzzle and munch all the way, letting out all they had to show each other that they could eat more. It soon began some sort of competition within them. With Storm taking huge chunks of the cake, smearing her face with it, just as Rogue began to chug milkshake after milkshake, downing them one after another almost as fast as Kitty was downing donut after donuts. As the girls lost themselves once more into their gluttony, their bodies began to expand once more.

Storm practically exploded out of her outfit, her pants completely ripped in two, leaving her in her, tighter than ever, panties. And even though her jacket was still, somewhat, wearable the same could not be said for her top. This one had in fact turned into a make-shift bra, pushed up by her quickly bloating, and filling up, belly. Rogue was right beside her, although, since her hourglass shape couldn’t grow much larger, the rest of her seemed to be catching up. Especially her belly that began growing out and about, getting wider and hanging lower on her thighs as she kept clearing whatever was offered to her.

But the real deal was with Kitty. Shadowcat was growing hugely, her already massive stomach seemed to be outgrowing even her diminutive body, filling up on sugar treats as she kept eating and eating. Her overall shape blossomed out soon, with her arms getting fatter and fatter, as bingo wings began to form under her arms and her legs began to bloat out so wide to resemble tree’s trunks. And yet, as if blind to how big the three ladies were getting, the clerk kept bringing more and more from pastries to pies, and even full cakes to each of the lardy ladies.

It was as if a beast had awakened inside their bodies, even though they were starting to feel full, and they heard their clothes ripping apart, not one of them found herself able to stop from having more. Within themselves they reasoned that they were going to have one more pastry, then it became one more slice.

Until they reached the limit at one more cake, just another one and we will stop.

As that limit was reached, even though they were blinded by the mind tricks of Professor X, each of them began to wonder how they could eat so much. Rogue, as she grabbed a Bundt cake from the table, bringing it to her lips, wondered if they were, maybe having too much of it. That didn’t prevent her from consuming it whole, but it still gave her some doubts.

Ororo, too, was having these issues. Especially since she could feel her ass cheeks overflowing the chair she was seated on, and yet, she almost inhaled the thirty six chocolate glazed donuts that she had been served.

Even Shadowcat, the most gluttonous of them, was having doubts. Not because she couldn’t see her feet anymore, since all that stood within her and the floor was now a round belly, but because her grabby arms were trying futilely to grab at the next sheet cake and she wasn’t even close to it.

“G-Girls…? I…I think…maybe…we should…stop. Ororo…Rogue…don’t you think…we’ve had…enough?”

At first Storm felt like rejecting the idea, but, as she felt herself stuffed, once more, over the brim she had to concede, while nodding in defeat as she felt herself getting tired and tired, even though she thought they had to feel pretty energetic with all the confectioneries eaten. Rogue, as she inhaled the last morsel of cake, feeling it slowly travel from her throat into her vastly overburdened stomach, stopped too, while slowly nodding.

As they rose from the chairs, wobbling all over, they paid what was due and left the place as they began to waddle at a crawl’s pace toward the mansion.

“We…We didn’t…overate…too much…didn’t we?”

As they waddled slowly, bloated like overinflated zeppelins, and yet blind to their massively fattened bodies, Rogue was the first to speak, as her tired and breathless voice spoke slowly, whit huge intake of air between each word, almost. Her two friends, in an equally overfilled state, took their time to respond, although only Ororo actually spoke, as Kitty was far too pooped to even speak.

“I…don’t…think…so. A…good…night…sleep… and we'll feel…better…tomorrow.”

As they finally managed to enter into the mansion, the three bloated beauties slowly separated to go each in their own bedroom. Rogue, as soon as she was in her room, simply collapsed on her bed, as her body digested the massive amounts of food she had consumed in that day, letting her body slowly deflate quite a bit, while gaining a serious poundage yet. Kitty did almost the same. As she reached her bedroom she went to her bed and soon fell asleep, as her humongous belly began to shrink once more, spreading the fat gained throughout her entire body.

Storm, even though she felt completely drained of energies, still managed to get into the shower, to clean herself a bit. After both the buffet and the bakery, she had managed to get herself pretty much covered in food stains and frosting. Finally clean, although she noticed to have taken much more time than usual, she finally went to bed letting her body, too, digesting the massive amount of calories received that day.

Still, as she began to fall asleep, she realized with a smile that it was nice to let herself go like that, occasionally.
115222111311342.title: Pit stop for a light snack

choices: Enjoy a snack and then go to buffet for lunch time.
Stay under Jean care, mall in the afternoon and dinner at buffet
Separate, one to stay with Jean as the others go to the buffet
1152221113113421.content:
Morning came and the three friends woke up feeling refreshed and restored. Storm was the first of them to wake up, and to shower herself. While in the shower she inspected her body but, although she felt like she had put on weight, she herself couldn’t see any exterior damage ad so simply discarded the idea.

Truth was very different.

The cheat day she had with her friends had brought quite a few pounds on her frame but her mind, due to Xavier manipulation, wasn’t really able to pick up such changes. And so, Ororo, finished showering and began to put on her clothes, finding out that they were feeling tighter than they had ever been, and yet he didn’t recognize this as a problem.

‘Must have shrunk in the wash…mmm…yes, that must be it’

Rogue and Kitty had the same issue and yet, neither could face the issue at hand. Both deciding that it was probably old clothes or washing malfunction that prevented them to wear their clothes properly. One thing all of them shared, though. As if planned, their three bellies began to rumble noisily, asking for food and since it was breakfast time, the three ladies left their rooms and walked toward the kitchen.

Ororo was the first to find out that walking seemed way more tiring than it ever was, still, she marched on although her chubby belly wobbled at her every step making her feel weird, especially so since she couldn’t see it herself. Rogue, instead, seeing that walking was definitely a chore, lifted herself into the air and began to float slowly through the hallways.

Kitty was the one that had gained the most between them, while Ororo had a small potbelly and a wider ass, and Rogue seemed to bring out an inflated hourglass shape, Shadowcat had apparently gained almost everything in her overall form making her squishier and softer in her body and on all of her appendages.

So much so that when she tried to leave her room, she found herself unable to pass through the door without a hitch. Having instead to use her powers to phase through it, as she also did when she realized she would have to walk all the way to the kitchen.

In a short time, the three ladies met in the kitchen and, as soon as they were there, each of them received dubious, and one interested, stare from the other X-Men there with them. As Jean Grey cooked and prepared breakfast, dutifully helped by Wolverine, the other X-Men whispered among themselves as they watched their three friends come into the kitchen looking rather zaftig than what they usually appeared. Cyclops was the first to try and break the ice.

“Ororo, Kitty? Do you…Do you feel alright?”

“What do you mean, Scott? I feel great today…a bit hungry, but still…”

“Yeah, Cyclops…Me and Storm are feeling wonderfully. It’s such a good morning…”

“What I meant is…err...Have you gai…”

“SCOTT! Could you come over here and give me a hand, please?”

Jean interrupted Cyclops and forced him to leave the question at that, as Ororo, Kitty and Rogue shared a wondering stare, as they waited for the breakfast to be prepared and served. Cyclops though wasn’t the only one who had noticed the additional inches on each of them, and yet, every time somebody tried to make a remark about their figures, Jean was there shushing them up. In a short while, although most had tried to say something the three friends had remained as clueless as they had been waking up, what they noticed was that Jean seemed to act a bit strangely toward them.

After almost half an hour, as their other friends had left, one by one, in the kitchen there was only Jean and the three chubby ladies. The psyker then, finished preparations and soon left quite the platter to each of the three friends, leaving each one of them stupefied by the sheer mass of food awaiting them.

Ororo looked in disbelief as she had in her plate six donuts, two slice of shortcake a couple of muffins and some milkshakes. She tried to politely refuse but, after being rebuked that breakfast was important, she didn’t discuss it anymore and went at her meal with gusto. Rogue, instead, was facing a junk food fest in her plate. In fact, Jean had left in front of her four hotdogs drenched in ketchup and mayo, two cheeseburgers and two massive double decker hamburgers, all of this accompanied by three XL sodas.

As Rogue tried to replay, jean simply shaked her head.

“You need your carbs to start the day in the right way.”

Kitty, instead, was the only one who accepted her platter without a fuss, as she received it from Jean she simply dived in with gusto, enjoying the two bowls of fried chicken, the massive mound of fried bacon strips and the surrounding fried chips.
As Jean watched the three girls going at it at the massive, unhealthy, breakfast, she couldn’t stop herself from feeling excited. It had been always a fantasy of hers to be able to cater to girthier people and now, with Storm, Rogue and Kitty growing themselves to that size, she couldn’t help but assist them.

When Breakfast was over, as Jean cleaned the dishes and left the three bloated beauties to recover, the three friends tried to discuss what they were going to do in that day. Kitty, although appearing the most exhausted by the meal just consumed was the first who piped up and proposed to return to the All You Can Eat Buffet.

“I tell you, guys…We should totally go there…it was so good…and the…discount! We’ve gotta accept it…”

Ororo moved slowly the head from side to side, as she massaged her bloated belly.

“We…*urp*…We went yesterday...since it was a … cheat day. We can’t… go back there…today…”

Rogue, as she stifled burp after burp, having downed her three sodas almost one after the other, was having difficulties to speak but, as she managed to release some more gas, she joined the discussion.

“I’m with…Kitty this time…’Roro. We’ll…just have…a bite to eat…and return. No big…Deal…”

As their discussion progressed, Professor X tuned in on them to see their progress and was ecstatic to see them talking about food, right after such a massive meal. For a moment he thought about the strange behavior of Jean but in the end, he let it at that. There was going to be time to investigate in that direction. Now he wanted to focus on his three test subjects.

Quickly, by sending out subliminal messages, he eroded Storm defenses, making her more susceptible to side with what the majority of the group decided to do, while he also increased Rogue confidence in her superior genetics, as well as boosting up Kitty’s desire for more. In this way, his three guinea pigs surely would have gone down the path that he wanted them to pick. Exiting from their minds he stood silently around them, watching as the discussion proceeded.

“So…” Said Storm “We either go to the buffet…or we go to the mall and, after, to the buffet, is that correct?”

Kitty, already licking her lips, nodded eagerly. No matter that her bloated belly almost touched the table, she was already feeling hungry for more and, although she wondered what would happen if she asked Jean to prepare her something, she also wanted to go straight away to the buffet.

So much so she could barely wait her friends to decide.

Storm, thought about it for a bit. She had been against returning to the buffet so soon, for one this was no cheat day and then, she was afraid that even with her heritage, her genes couldn’t resist much more food before turning her into a fattie. Poor Storm, if only she could see herself. Right after her meal, her belly and hips had already gained a few more inches and yet, she was blind to them.

Still, the idea to go back to the buffet was also enthralling. The food there had been so good that she still seemed to remember the taste of it.

Rogue was the second most decided of them, she too wanted to go back at the buffet. She had noticed that her girls seemed to have grown larger since her last visit and was clearly excited by the prospect. Although she had still the no touching issue, having curves on her otherwise lean body, couldn’t be but a plus, in her book. Still, as much as she wanted, she also wanted to try and go to the mall, to try and see if something interesting was there to do.

As the girls digested their meals they had almost reached a decision when, suddenly, Jean appeared at the doorway with a smile plastered on her face.

“Hey girls! I see you’re still here…How about I prepare you a mid-morning snack? You girls may need the energy if you wanna go out again today…”

As this new proposition hung in the air, the girls decided to…
1152221113113421.title: Doubts and Breakfast

choices: The trio learn of the discount's benefits
An hour later, the X-Ladies are stuffed and gassy
11522211131134212.content:
After a moment of thinking of the new proposition, Kitty, Storm and Rogue all decided to stay under Jean's care for the morning, then hit the mall for the afternoon and then the buffet for dinner.

"Alright, Jean. We shall take this mid-morning snack." Ororo decided with a smile as Kitty and Rogue both nodded in agreement. Jean smiled as she then set to work, preparing the 'snack' for her friends.

Soon, she returned with the first few trays for the trio. For Kitty, she had whipped up a massive stack of flapjacks drenched in maple syrup and butter, a heap of chocolate doughnuts, a huge pile of bacon and a tall glass of chocolate milk. Upon seeing it, Kitty's tongue practically flopped out of her mouth and she began drooling at the sight. The second Jean had placed it in front of her, Kitty tore into the unhealthy breakfast foods. First, to Jean, Rogue and Ororo's shock, she crammed five doughnuts into her mouth, followed by six flapjacks, bulging her cheeks out a great deal.

With only a few quick and loud chews, Shadowcat then swallowed the entire mouthful of food with a long, loud gulp, the giant bulge sliding down her neck. Then, she chugged half her chocolate milk down, gaining a milk moustache on her upper lip.

"Here's yours Rogue." Jean smiled as she gave the southern belle her massive tray. Rogue moaned in delight. Hers had several jumbo burgers drenched in grease, along with fried chicken, five slices of Jean's homemade chocolate cake and a heap of corn dogs. Rogue immediately tore into her snack as well.

"And for you, 'Roro..." beamed Jean brightly as she handed Ororo her massive tray. Ororo's eyes nearly popped out of her head at it. Because on this tray was five massive double decker cheeseburgers, ten normal hamburgers, six slices of apple pie and a XXXL soda.

"Jean I could not possibly-" Ororo began gently. "Ororo, I'm hurt. I thought you would enjoy such a nice meal. After all, you did just eat six doughnuts, a couple of muffins, two slices of shortcake and some milkshakes." Jean said, clearly dismayed by her friend's clear attempt to turn down her food.

Ororo, blushing slightly as she realized Jean had a point, nodded and then started inhaling her food as well, causing Jean to smile as she watched the trio keep eating like beasts.

Kitty was busy loudly inhaling her food, getting chocolate frosting, grease and syrup on her face as she did, her belly bloating more and more with each bite. Not that it mattered to Shadowcat. The youngest X-Man just burped and hiccupped as she kept it up.

Rogue wasn't any different. She tore through her burgers with ease, grease and ketchup dribbling down her chin, only for her to lick it up upon feeling this. After licking the plate her burgers had been on clean, Rogue then grabbed six corn dogs in each hand and then plopped them into her mouth at once, chewing loudly, her cheeks bulging as her belly also slowly bloated out as she then plopped a plump slice of her cake in as well.

Ororo, meanwhile, was also going to town on her feast. Instead of eating her massive double decker burgers in normal or large bites, she simply stuffed them whole into her mouth, one at a time before she chewed and swallowed them. The same went for her pie and normal hamburgers as she inhaled those, her brown belly also starting to bloat and plump up.

After this meal, Jean brought them more food. Kitty received a tray filled to the brim with 6 slices each of apple, blueberry, cherry, raspberry, pumpkin and banana cream pie, 9 slices of chocolate cake and red velvet cake respectively, three double decked burgers and 10 large, warm and gooey chocolate chip cookies.

Rogue meanwhile, received 20 triple cheeseburgers, 15 large soft pretzels, 17 cupcakes and 22 ham sandwiches on white bread with tomato, cheese, pickles, relish and mayo with an olive on top.

Ororo was given a large banana split with four bananas, 10 scoops each of strawberry, vanilla and chocolate ice cream, a big spray of whipped cream, a generous helping of hot fudge topping and a plump cherry on top, a whole Devil's pound cake, 2 trays of chocolate eclairs and a big bowl of butterscotch pudding.

Finally, the three X-Ladies leaned back in their chairs, stuffed and very happy. Jean then approached them with a wide grin. "Had enough for now?" she asked as she eyed the licked clean plates and trays in front of her friends.

"*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!* Yeah... Jean. I'm... stuf-urp-fed." Kitty groaned after burping loudly while patting her round belly, which gurgled quietly under her blue blouse. Out of the trio, she was once again the bigger bellied. She had put on some weight around her body again as well.

"Ah'm with Kitty, Jean. Ah think Ah'd explode if Ah eat anything else right now." Rogue agreed, stroking her bloated tummy with a chubby hand, occasionally burping slightly, her cheeks bulging as she cover her mouth with her other hand.

"They... are... both... right... Jean... I am so... full... wild horses... could not... move... me..." Ororo panted in agreement as she massaged her own big, squishy, warm and soft brown boulder sized gut.

"I'm glad to hear it. Since you three seem pooped, why don't you rest before going to the mall?" Jean suggested with a kind smile as she began clearing the plates, bowls and trays away using her telekinesis to do this chore.

Kitty didn't need to be told twice. She rested her head on her arms and began snoring softly. Rogue just leaned back and closed her eyes, smacking her lips slightly while nodding off herself. Storm just smiled at her two bloated friends and teammates as she mimicked Kitty and, resting her head on her soft, flabby and squishy arms, fell asleep as well.

Jean smiled as she watched the trio sleep off their massive 'snacks'. She was excited to see how big they were getting every time they ate and she couldn't wait to keep feeding them. Especially Kitty. Out of the trio, Shadowcat seemed to be the biggest eater. Of course, that was probably her metabolism growing like her body and thus needing more food for fuel, but still...

"Kitty really seems the most interested in eating until she either pops like a balloon or is sick to her tummy. Feeding her is going to be rather fun. Of course, I wouldn't exactly put Rogue and/or Ororo out to pasture either." Jean thought to herself as she watched her snoring friends, their new fat going to other areas of their bodies yet again.

After an hour, Jean woke the trio up and, after they stretched and yawned, they went to change their clothes to go to the mall. This, of course, was easier said than done.

In her and Illyana's bedroom, Kitty struggled to get into a pair of jeans that could fit her hippo butt and hips. After five pairs all failed, she just tugged on a pair of stretchy sweatpants that were okay to wear in public. She just barely managed to squeeze herself into a t-shirt before going downstairs to wait for her friends.

Rogue wasn't fairing much better. Her boobs had swollen considerably both overnight and during her nap and so most of her bras were pretty small. Finally, she managed to squeeze them somewhat comfortably into a bra that still worked well. After going through the same ordeal with her shirts and pants, Rogue finally managed to squeeze into a pair of jeans and a tank top.

Ororo was having the same trouble. Most of her leather clothes were too tight or pinched her fat somewhat painfully. Finally, Ororo just pulled on her original pair from that morning and walked downstairs to see Kitty and Rogue's own clothing problems.

"I believe we may need to pay a visit to a clothes store at the mall." Storm simply said as the younger two X-Ladies nodded in agreement. "They probably just shrunk in the wash and we didn't notice it." Kitty shrugged, still oblivious to her and her friends' girths.

Soon, the taxi Storm had called to take them into the city arrived and the girls squeezed into the back together. Not long after, they pulled up to the New Salem Mall.

The three girls quickly went to the nearest plus-sized store and after a while, came out in new, larger clothes. Kitty wore an XXXL blue t-shirt, plus-sized jeans, bigger panties and an also bigger bra. Rogue and Storm had also picked out larger clothes of their likings as well and were currently wearing one set.

Rogue had on a nice plus-sized t-shirt, along with large pants and a bigger bra. Despite the dangers of her wearing a t-shirt, Rogue decided as long as no one touched her, she'd be okay.

Ororo, meanwhile, had chosen a larger version of her current leather costume and clothes in general. Though a sliver of her belly was still visible, her new black shirt covered it well.
