After another hour of walking around the mall, the girls swung by the food court. After choosing a table, the trio sat their bags down and then began ordering from different booths. Soon, the trio staggered back to their table, carrying numerous takeout trays containing pizza, fried chicken, burgers, fries, milkshakes, sodas, Chinese takeout, and others.

After scarfing those down, the trio headed home to get ready for their night at the buffet. After squeezing into their snug uniforms, the trio climbed into another cab and soon arrived at the buffet. Upon entering, they were greeted by the same waiter from the day before.

"Ladies. Welcome back. I trust you have come to back for more of our fine food, correct? Also, have you thought about the discount we offered you yesterday?" he smiled.

Kitty, Storm and Rogue had talked about it over the ride and Kitty had finally convinced Ororo of the discount's usefulness. As the waiter listened, the trio accepted the offer. "Splendid! Now, follow me." He smiled as he led them to a different area of the restaurant.
11522211131134212.title: Stay under Jean's care, mall in afternoon and...

choices: Buffet à la carte/Mansion Mind tricks
Mansion chemically induced hunger/Buffet special feeding room
11522211131134213.content:
As Jean proposal hung in the air, the reactions to it were vastly different between the three friends.

Storm rose from her chair, although with some difficulties, and made to leave the room.

“Sorry Jean, I think I’ll go directly to the buffet... Kitty, Rogue?”

As she waited for her friends she tried to look as inconspicuous as possible. It wasn’t she didn’t like Jean it was only that she didn’t trust her own senses around the woman. At the buffet, at least, she could use her will to stop eating if she was going to eat too much. Kitty and Rogue, seeing Ororo standing up looked at each other for a moment, until each decided what to do for the day.

“Coming ‘Roro!”

“Ah think Ah’ll pass guys…”

Rogue herself was surprised in hearing herself saying that. She had wanted to go to the buffet once more but, after hearing Jean and knowing that the woman was as lean as her, she thought that maybe she could give her some advice on how to grow more voluptuous. Kitty and Ororo, too, seemed shocked for a moment but, without wasting any time, they simply accepted their friend's decision and moved on toward their decided location.

As Storm and Shadowcat, although feeling quite snug in their uniforms, left the mansion opting to take a cab to go at the buffet, Rogue remained seated in the kitchen, watching interested as Jean slaved away at the stove.

“Oh, Rogue…I see that there is someone here who knows how a proper diet has to be followed.”

“Yeah, well… To tell you the truth Ah wanted to go too but, Ah think you could help me with something…”

Jean, as she cooked, turned an intrigued stare toward the bloated mutant.

“What about?”

“You see, Ah’m tryin' to get some more curves on mah lean body and, since you’ve got a perfect shape Ah thought…”

“Say no more. I’ll coach you and you’ll see that you’ll be the most curvaceous girl in the mansion. I so vow it!”

And so, Jean quickly grabbed a plate and, after having it filled with a dozen donuts and a few pastries, slid it in front of Rogue, inviting her to dig in.

“Now, Rogue, I’ll help you achieve your dream as much as I can but you’ll have to do what I tell you. You will need lots of carbs, proteins and some sugar for this to work so, leave the cooking to me and dig in.”

Rogue, seeing as the other woman seemed to take her request so seriously, decided to follow her new Curve-Coach directives and, without further ado, began to chow down on the plate she had in front of her. As she munched on the donuts she realized that Jean had to be a great cook, cause those were the best she had ever tasted. As she cleared treat after treat, unnoticing of how her belly seemed to bloat out more at her every bite, she saw that more was soon going to come as Jean was already placing in a plate a few burgers and even a steak.

‘Jean seems to know what she’s doing…Ah better follow what she tells me to do…’

Meanwhile, Ororo and Kitty had just left the cab which had brought them to the buffet they loved. Upon entering, a little surprised it was already open by mid-morning, they were greeted by one of the waiters, which recognized them almost immediately.

“Ladies, welcome back. I see you’ve come to enjoy our fine foods once more, isn’t it? Well, that’s truly good. As you can see there is already a few people in here but, we will find you the perfect table for you all. On and, by the way, have you thought about the discount offer we’ve proposed yesterday?”

Storm and Kitty had discussed it during the trip and, finally, Kitty managed to convince Ororo about the usefulness of the offer. So, as the waiter accompanied them toward a table close to the buffets, and within range of the finishing beltways, they both accepted their offer, making sure that also her missing friend, Rogue, was inserted into the list.

“Splendid! Now, here’s your table. Should you need anything, please to let us know. Enjoy your meal.”

As the waiter moved off, Kitty was already standing and closing in toward the buffet, under the stupefied gaze of Ororo. Still, spurred by her Kitten's actions, also she rose from the table and moved closer to the buffets, searching for something that intrigued her. After a few minutes, both girls returned to their table, each with her fair share of plates. Kitty was first with just a couple of plates filled with apple fritters and a smallish tray with buttery cookies and a tall glass of chocolate milk. Ororo, instead, returned with two small trays filled by éclairs and jelly filled donuts.

As the two girls seated, both began enjoying the food, unaware that the kitchen staff had been already informed by the owner and filled each of their portions with appetite stimulant and metabolism suppressors. As the two mutants ate with abandon, each could feel her own hunger rising the more she ate. Until both stopped tasting their food but simply swallowed it as fast as they could. Leaving their plates almost licked clean, both Ororo and Kitty shared a look of ravenous hunger and, same as before, both rose from their seats to fill their plates once more.

As time passed both girls made trip after trip toward the buffet lines, bringing more and more food each and every time they rose, due to this their uniforms, already snug to begin with began to get tighter and tighter across their bodies. Storm, as she had already a dozen plates under her belt, could feel her pants cutting tightly in her mid-section, so much so she began to unfasten her belt and opening them up, to give her growing belly more and more room to expand. Kitty, instead, didn’t seemed fazed by the fact that her uniform was stretching out to accommodate her bloating figure. She was feeling so ravenous that even when the spandex like cloth began to tear at her belly button, she still kept shoveling food in her mouth.


Meanwhile, at the mansion, Rogue wasn’t faring much better.

Under Jean care, for the last two hours, she had kept eating whatever the other woman brought to her, making short work of burgers, hot dogs and chicken wings by the pound as Jean seemed an indefatigable cooking machine. The once lean mutant was looking quite bloated already, her belly ballooning out under her very eyes and yet, as she was presented with yet another platter, this time filled with ribs almost submerged in BBQ sauce, she still leaned forward to munch at it.

Jean was feeling ecstatic. Rogue seemed to be insatiable, and yet, she knew that sooner or later she had to slow down. Otherwise all that her growing buddy had eaten was going to be wasted when she would feel sick. But, for sure, she was going to give her another round of burgers before stopping. And then, maybe, it could be the case to use the special medicine she had bought just for similar cases?

Rogue, instead, was already feeling quite sated, and yet she kept going, knowing that Jean had only the best interests toward her. Still, as she cleared ribs after ribs, she couldn’t lie to herself that she wasn’t enjoying all that food. In truth, it wasn’t as good as the one from the buffet but, it still was good enough.

As she kept going, her belly still bloated up more and more, already filling her lap and starting to mash against the table, as her uniform too began to stretch way too much and a slight sound of stitches under pressure could barely be heard.


After countless trips to the buffet line, both Kitty and Ororo were feeling stuffed and pooped, and yet, both were still quite famished. Their figures had bloated out even more, with Storm almost bursting out of her clothes. For which she decided to get her jacket off, leaving herself with just her top, now used mostly as a bra, and her pants, left wide open with her belly pooching over it. The African beauty had lost count of how many plates she had consumed. Last number she remembered had been plate sixteen. Yet, as full as she was feeling, she still felt a powerful hunger begging her to get more food. But she was way too tired to simply move from her seat. Her body had, once again ballooned in every direction, although her hips and ass seemed to have absorbed the most from her meal. Already she was slightly overflowing the chair on which she was seated, and her hands were rather busy kneading and massaging the large, bloated, belly that protruded in front of her.

Kitty wasn’t faring any better, she was even in worse condition. Last plate she remembered taking was plate twenty-three, but after that her hunger had been too much to control and she soon found herself in a whirlwind of gluttony that now left her speechless, breathless and as mobile as a beached whale.

Her suit had ripped apart all around her midsection, leaving her bare belly to jut forward, filled up to the max with delicious, fattening food, and yet, she too was feeling still rather famished for more.

But as the two bloated la(r)dies were unable to move, one of the waiters approached providing a solution to their problems…
11522211131134213.title: Division within the group

115222111311342132.content:
Ororo and Kitty were hungry but could not manage to move an inch of their bodies. Not even for a moment this event worried them, as they both were too filled up with food to think clearly but, as much as stuffed they were, they still were hungry for more. Which was quite a predicament for they couldn’t move.

One of the waiters, though, seeing as the two that their boss wanted to get as round as possible, noticed the situation they were in and moved closer to them to propose a solution.

“Ladies, I see you’ve enjoyed your meal…but are you done or would you rather keep going after a breather?”

“M-More…still…so hungry…but, so…tired…”

Even Storm was surprised by how easily and rapidly she had answered back to the waiter and yet, it was the truth. Kitty, opposite to her, couldn’t answer but, as she hiccupped, she nodded in agreement to her friend statement.

“Well, Ladies, since you’re Special Guest, we have a solution to your problems. A few of my colleagues will help you go to a private room we have in the back. There, you shall be able to continue your meal without the need to move a finger. Would that be ok with you?”

As the two girls nodded, a fleet of young waiters moved toward them, assisting them into standing and accompanying them toward the private room where they could resume their meal. As the two were moved away, the main waiter looked at them and wondered.

‘They’re already this big and it’s only lunch time…True, for the most part is bloating but…how big will they get in the feeding room?’

At the mansion, Rogue was feeling just as her friends were at the buffet.

She was stuffed full, completely filled up to the gills, and yet, Jean was still seemingly cooking more. The once lean, now resembling more of a ball with arms and legs, mutant, could only stare with desperation as the other woman kept preparing more and more food.

“J-Jean…? I…I think…I’ve had…enuff…”

The other woman though seemed deaf to her pleads, until she turned around and cleaned away the last remnants of the massive midmorning ‘snack’ she had provided to her friend, which had lasted up to almost lunchtime.

“Oh, I know Rogue. You silly, we can’t have you eating all the time..." 'For now, at least)' "...You may rest a bit and take a nap…I’ll wake you up as soon as its lunch time.”

Hearing those words Rogue blessedly fell almost immediately asleep, but as she slept away her humongous meal, Jean moved closer to the bloated heroine, caressing her filled up body, where the suit hadn’t ripped yet. As she inspected her friend, heavily snoring, Jean wondered dreamily at how larger and girthier she could manage to make her before she would realize it. In truth, she had a way to ensure Rogue growth but, she was afraid of using it.

‘I could use those drugs I bought…But would it be fair? And yet, when another occasion like this could present itself to me?
If I don’t use it now, when will I?
No, there isn’t time to be picky. Don’t worry Rogue, will manage to bring you blimp sized before you may have time to say Cake…’

Jean, then, as she kept preparing the lunch she had promised Rogue, while making sure that their fellows X-Men weren’t going to intrude on them, she simply added a few drops of one of the drugs she had brought on the black market, this being a powerful appetite enhancer. The other, she had acquired through a common enough store, being bulk-up powder to be used through gain shakes.

As lunchtime approached, barely an hour later, Jean began to sweetly prod Rogue awake.

“Wakey, wakey. It’s time for Lunch, AnneMarie…”

“Mmm…How much…have I…slept?”

Rogue felt groggy and, still, a bit stuffed. Yet, her stomach getting used to be fed such massive portions, already began to grumble a bit asking to be fed.

Jean smiled innocently and, shamelessly, lied to her friend, telling her that she had slept way over the real thirty minutes that it had been, then, without further ado, she began giving to her widening friend what was going to be only nominally considered lunch. The woman began by leaving a plate with two Double Bacon Cheeseburgers, with bacon and fries to the side, along with two tall glasses of shakes.

“Here you go, Rogue. You may start with this…I’ll bring next course in a few.”

Rogue, shaking away the last of her grogginess, leaned forward and, feeling more comfortable, she moved closer to the plate and grabbed the first double burger with both hands, giving it a big bite.

Immediately the enhancer went to work within her system and Rogue felt herself growing hungrier and hungrier by the bite. She still, didn’t worry though. Between the subliminal orders from Professor X and the fact that at the buffet she had felt the same, she didn’t worry herself about it. Preferring instead to simply let her hunger and gluttony drive her from there. Jean kept providing plateful after plateful, slightly increasing the portions she was giving to her friend, and yet Rogue kept cleaning each and every plate she received. Her body working overtime to process all those calories it was receiving, quickly storing them as fat in order to speed up the process.

Rogue’s body seemed to literally balloon as more and more food went eaten, her hourglass figure quickly changing in a more rounding shape. Sure her breast and ass still were growing massively but, her belly too had begun growing larger and larger. Her ass soon began to overflow the chair she was seated on, while her breasts started to move to either side of her, pushed away by the dome of a belly she was getting. Jean, seeing this development, began to try cooking faster and faster, wanting to enjoy the show as much as she could.


At the buffet, instead, both Storm and Kitty had been finally moved to their special private room, this one was as luxurious as it could be. Extremely comfortable couches, massive stout tables, there were even two massive 52” flat screens, one in front of each of the girls. Both girls were ecstatic about the location but, as their hungry bellies rumbled, they still were feeling quite hungry. Yet the waiters quickly positioned them on a massive, comfortable, couch and soon left, replaced by a few guys dressed as chef’s which moved closer to the two ladies.

The one closest to Kitty, brought forward an iPad, on which there was represented which way the meal was going to be served. As Kitty scrolled through the menus, her new double chin slightly squished against the other, she finally decided to go with the option called ‘à la carte’ which meant that food was going to be brought to her by one of the waiters there, until she asked for it to stop.

Ororo, which also was checking through a similar booklet, was undecided. Each choice seemed good but, in the end, her belly decided for her. With a grumbling sound louder than the usual, her finger stopped on the ‘Beltway’ method.
At that, Storm’s waiter nodded and in no time a portable mechanical beltway was mounted and directed toward the African mutant.

To her was given a small remote through which she could select the speed of the belt transporter.

Soon after, both girls began to go back at their meals.

Kitty, quickly cleaned plateful after plateful, almost uncaring toward what was brought to her. Her waiter moved each plate to her, letting her clean it out completely before getting a new one from a trolley stationed nearby. Shadowcat suit’s began to rip more and more, tearing apart not only at her mid-section but also at her thighs, as her entire body was seemingly filling up. And yet, the girl couldn’t stop herself.

The hunger she felt was pushing her to have more and more, as she started to act more and more piggishly, with smears of food on her face and uneaten bits falling on her bloating breasts and belly. Her plates soon began to be overfilled with fried up concoctions of chickens, burgers, sausages. At a certain point even ice creams and cakes that were given to her had been previously fried, granting them this crunchy fried cover to their cold insides. Kitty enjoyed each plate to the fullest and seemed unstoppable in her consumption.

Storm, instead, at first had started to regret her chosen method. Food was brought forward though the transporter directly into her mouth, all she had to do was to open up her lips and munch and swallow. Yet, also she was making a mess of herself, with bits of food falling all over her breasts and shoulders. That happened until a waiter noticed and simply adjusted the output of the transporter, making so that it would go perfectly into Storm open mouth.

From that point, the weather controlling mutant simply abandoned herself to the pleasure of filling her gut up, feeling her hunger getting sated and, yet, increased at her every bite. As Kitty was filling out nicely, getting herself quite rounded, Ororo was getting fuller mostly in her ass and hips, as they began to grow wider and larger, as more calories entered her body. But she didn’t care or noticed, all of her focus was on the next mouthful she was receiving, be it a massive triple patty hamburger, a whole pizza pie, in slices, or even a massive cake. As she gulped down each item, she could almost feel it heaviness falling int her overfilled gut, rapidly being converted into fat to make room for more.
115222111311342132.title: Jean uses her tricks/Buffet special room

choices: Buffet meals end / Rogue fall asleep at the table
1152221113113421321.content:
Rogue seemed to wake up suddenly.

Last thing she remembered was to be in the kitchen where her friend Jean was helping her with her lunch. Now, though she found herself in an empty, endless, hall. Everything in there was of a pristine white and yet, it was a place that gave her serene and peaceful thoughts.

As she looked around, she suddenly spotted a figure walking toward her. She blinked several times noticing it was the Professor.

“Professor? Is that you? Ah can’t believe it…where are we?”

“Rogue, relax. I have invited you into my own mind. This is a place of peace. I sensed that you were starting to worry about something and so I decided to bring you here so that we can talk about it in privacy.”

“Ah…Ah don’t know wha’ you are talking about.”
“Yes, you do, Rogue. I can see it in you. There is this fear…this worrying within you. Tell me all about it. I will help you as much as I can.”

AnneMarie, slowly began to open herself up. The Professor was saying the truth. She was worried about something.

“Ah…Ah know you’re right. I…I’m afraid of mah body. I can feel mahself getting…bigger. And more body means more danger…for me.”

The figure of the professor laughed a little.

“There is nothing to be worried about, Rogue. Just listen to my voice…you’re not growing…you’re just skin and bones… Why worry about such foolish things…be merry…eat freely…”

Rogue could do nothing to stop the psionic assault, her mind was suddenly invaded by these images of her living a happy life, in a fit and toned body, enjoying whatever pleasure there was to be taken.

In the real world, though, Jean stared deeply at her friend sitting at the table. She was the one using her abilities to convince the southern belle that nothing was wrong.

That everything was ok, and still the southern girl, submitting to the mental assault, kept gorging at whatever there was in front of her. AnneMarie, completely subdued by the psionic attack to her mind, began to see what the figure of the professor was saying to her.

“Ah…Ah understan’. Ain’t got no need to starve mahself…Ah’m in perfect shape…”

“Yes, Rogue…you can freely move…you don’t have any issue with your body…eat and be merry.
Now…Open your eyes and see the truth surrounding you…”

As the figure said that, Rogue felt herself being grabbed and moved away from the empty, endless, white room. Blinking her eyes repeatedly she found herself back in the kitchen, between her hands a massive triple bacon cheeseburger, half eaten as a morsel was still in her mouth.

Swallowing she looked around for a moment.

She saw Jean busily cooking something at the stove, she saw the table in front of her still covered in plates and platters full of foodstuffs, there were hot dogs covered in ketchup and mayo, burgers as big and stuffed as the one she was eating, mounds of fried bacon strips, alongside with deeply fried onion rings.

And yet, there was still more on the back of the table, in the forms of minced meat pies, blueberry pies, even a massive three-layered devil’s-food cake. As she grabbed an extra-large milkshake at her side, slurping out half of its content in one sitting, she wondered since how long she was there sitting at the table but, it didn’t matter in truth.

Moving back her chair, she slowly managed to stand up, her bloated body jiggling and wobbling at her every movement. Yet she managed, albeit slowly and, on a whim, she moved closer to Jean, hugging her from behind.

“R-Rogue? What’s…What’s going on?”

“Nothing…Ah just feel like Ah’m a new woman.”

Jean, was only feigning surprise. She knew what her southern friend was thinking, she had been into her mind, after all. As she watched AnneMarie waddle around, a smile on her fattened face, she gave herself a pat on her back.

‘I was right. The mind is stronger than the body. Now that Rogue is utterly convinced of being toned and fit, she won’t have any issue in moving around…whatever her weight is.

True, she may be moving a bit slower but, she will move and walk. Now, I only need to let her grow some more…she could use to put on a few more pounds.’

“Well…Good for you! Now, get back at your seat…there’s still so much more for you to have, before finishing lunch.”

“Aye Aye, Ma’am!” Replied Rogue laughing a bit as she waddled back to her chair, plopping down and returning to stuffing herself.

Quickly she grabbed the half-eaten burger and bit off half to eat, smearing her face with grease and sauce, and yet she munched on it happily, even though her inflated gut grumbled angrily as it tried to digest the massive calorie influx it was receiving.

Meanwhile, at the Buffet, Ororo and Kitty had completely lost the sense of time.

Both girls were still gorging on the food brought to them, their bodies showing exactly how long they had been at it. Kitty had been moved to a couch, as the waiters kept bringing her delicious plates rich of heavy calories placing such platters and bowls directly onto Shadowcat's torso.

Storm instead was still seated under the automatic beltway she had chosen, although the food coming from it had switched from fast food to pastries and small cakes. The African super mutant actually was enjoying more these kinds of treats, they were often so small she could simply swallow them whole without wasting time on chewing, letting then her stomach to work on them, making room for more.

Both mutants were in an eating trance, their bodies were so stuffed and full and yet, the taste of the food, and the enhancer hidden within it, were forcing them to keep asking for more, even though their own bodies were seemingly at their limit.

Charles Xavier, although still in the mansion, was there with them, soothing them, whispering to them suggestions, making them forget about trifling things like duty and the need to stay fit.

His powerful abilities were being used to change both girls, to make them more pliable to become what he needed for his project. And so, he kept pouring his powers over them, forcing them to believe completely in what he was saying to them.

‘You are at your top physical form. There is no gorging, this is only snacking.

You can freely move, there is no weight keeping you down. Yet, you’re hungry for more.

You need more. You deserve it.’

He knew that his pupil, Jean, was doing a similar job to Rogue and, although normally he would have reprimanded her for that, he didn’t say anything. It was all in benefit of his experiment.

With his powerful suggestion, both girls kept stuffing themselves, without a worry.

Even when Kitty’s costume completely ripped apart, leaving her bloated gut completely visible, she didn’t seem to mind that much. All she was focused on was the next platter that one of the waiters was bringing her. A massive Thanksgiving turkey surrounded all around by deliciously fried potatoes.

Albeit slowly, she managed to snatch one of the legs as she began to tear chunks of meat from the bone, moaning in pleasure.

Ororo was in a similar situation. With the new suggestions received she actually managed to lift herself from the chair on which she was seated, although her massive ass and widened hips forced her to move at a slower pace than what she was used to.

Still, although her pants had completely ripped from the thighs down, leaving her wearing a sort of Daisy Dukes shorts, she completely ignored that as she placed herself more comfortably on the ground, using her own fattened ass as a cushion, while she opened her mouth wide to get as much pastries she could from the beltway.

The waiters surrounding them were all watching mesmerized the spectacle in front of them. Each of them had had his, or her, share of gluttonous clients but, seeing the two bloated beauties with their bellies bloated and stuffed so tightly, that more than resembled overfilled balloons, as they kept stuffing themselves was a shockingly experience.

Each waiter, though, knew that the one rule of the place was to let their guest leave only when completely stuffed and so they kept bringing more and more toward the girls. As one, a couple of waiters, decided to join in the action, moving each closer to one for the two ladies.

As Kitty was devouring the left breast of the turkey, she suddenly found a large spoon, filled with mashed potatoes in her way. Without even thinking she simply opened her mouth, still full of turkey meat, and let the spoon feed her the potatoes.

This trend continued for quite a while, even when the turkey was completely cleaned, and a large taco was brought to her lips. Right beside this treat, a handful of fries was being shoveled into her mouth, and yet she accepted the gift heartily.

Storm too was seeing this happening to her, as she was just sitting there, mouth open, swallowing pastries from the beltway, a waiter approached her and pushed into her mouth a whole slice of cake, forcing her to swallow more and more frequently than before.

Under such a deluge of treats it was obvious that…
1152221113113421321.title: Stuffing continues

choices: Professor X convinces the girls to wear diapers in order to increase eating time
11522211131134213211.content:
Kitty and Storm couldn't really hold much more food in their very big bellies. Storm's face was smeared with frosting, crumbs and glaze from the pastries she'd been eating. Her belly resembled a big boulder as it hung over her shorts, rumbling and gurgling quietly as she rubbed and messaged it. She had never felt so stuffed in her life.

Kitty, meanwhile, was feeling just as full and stuffed. Her belly was full from all the wonderful fattening and greasy food she had been given to eat. She sat there, her tongue lolling out as she panted and burped, a big, goofy grin of delight on her face as her tummy rumbled and gurgled in approval of her fattening.

At the mansion, Rogue was feeling very pooped out from the feast Jean had given her. Her belly was just as swollen as Storm and Kitty's and it was very happy from being stuffed. Jean, who was cleaning up the kitchen by now, turned to notice a droopy-eyed Rogue yawning loudly as she sat in her chair.

"Why don't you take a nap, Rogue? It'll help you regain your strength." She suggested with a smile. "Okay, Jean." Rogue said as she let out a giant yawn and slowly rested her head on her arms on the table and was soon snoring softly. The redheaded telepath smiled as she turned the lights off and left the kitchen, leaving the obese southern gal snoring peacefully.

Meanwhile, Kitty and Ororo were waddling to the entrance of the buffet, being aided by two waiters. Ororo had contacted the cab from before to bring them back to the mansion and it was already waiting for them. The waiter from before smiled at the duo.

"Thank you again ladies. I hope to see you again, next time with your friend." He added with a grin as he saw them off. Ororo turned and smiled at him. "I'm sure she will be glad to accompany us then. Thank you again for a delightful meal." she said.

Kitty, grinning in delight, nodded excitedly. "Yeah. Thanks for all that food! It was really *UUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRPPPP!* yummy in my big tummy!" she smiled as she put a hand on her massive gut. The waiter smiled at the 14-year-old's antics.

"It was our pleasure, young lady. Have a safe trip home and enjoy your evening." He told them as Kitty and Storm slowly managed to climb into the cab, this one much roomier than the one from the night before. The duo didn't say anything as the cab drove them home. They just sat there, smiling in delight as they digested their massive meals all the while.

Meanwhile, in his office, Professor X smiled as he had mentally tracked the trio's progress. Though he knew he would likely need to end the experiment soon before the trio really did become too obese to even move, he wanted to try one more thing.

He noticed that while the trio were able to eat massive amounts of food every meal, he noticed that they still needed to stop every so often to use the bathroom, forcing them to delay finishing their meals until this was taken care of.

"There must be someway for me to help them in this regard." He thought to himself as he mentally viewed the cab bringing Kitty and Ororo to the mansion.

Then, he smiled as an idea came to him. "Of course. It is so simple, I nearly overlooked it! I will advise them to do so in the morning as they wake up." Xavier thought with a grin as he wheeled into his room to get ready for bed.

In the main hallway, Kitty and Ororo had just entered the mansion. Both of them were smiling as they kept rubbing their large bellies. "Man, that was great, 'Roro. But I'm really pooped now." Kitty remarked with a large yawn as she stretched.

"I agree Kitten. Besides, it is fairly late. We'd better get some rest now." Storm said with a big yawn of her own as they both waddled to their rooms, unaware of the suggestion Professor X would soon put in their minds the next morning.

As they slept, Kitty, Rogue and Storm all dreamed of food. Kitty dreamt she was standing in a field and it was raining double cheeseburgers, which she eagerly gobbled down. In reality, she was actually munching on her spare pillow, which, upon noticing, she quickly spat out while still half asleep.

"Dumb burger pillows. Not as tasty." she mumbled as she laid back down and went back to her meaty and cheesy paradise dream with a smile and a sigh of delight.

In her attic bedroom, Ororo was dreaming she was in a world filled with different pastries that she began pigging out on, her belly swelling more and more.

In the kitchen, Rogue was dreaming she was eating all kinds of deep fried southern foods as she kept getting heavier and heavier herself.

All three X-Ladies moaned in delight at their dreams, their massive tummies rumbling and gurgling as well as the night wore on with food related dreams and cravings.

115222111311342132111.content:
The next morning, the trio slowly woke up one by one. As they did, Professor X began his plan to help the girls increase their eating time. He started with Kitty. The 14-year-old was just starting to get dressed when she sensed something in the back of her head.

"Shadowcat, I have a suggestion for you to increase your eating time. Why not wear and use diapers? They will allow you relief from needing the bathroom during meals. Believe me, they will be easier than having to repeatedly needing to use the loo during your eating." Professor X told her mentally. After a few minutes, Kitty accepted this as she realized that the voice did have a point about diapers saving precious eating time by having her simply peeing and pooping them.

Upon succeeding with Kitty, Professor X then set his thoughts on Rogue and Storm as the duo also barely managed to squeeze into their snug uniforms, the only thing aside from their bras and panties that could fit them at this point. In her attic, Ororo was finishing squeezing into one of her remaining pairs of pants when Xavier's voice made itself known.

"Ororo, you have become very healthy now. But all the same, you should wear and use diapers in order to ensure more eating time. Think of the time saved from needing to use a bathroom during your meal. Kitty is planning on doing so and I am sure Rogue will as well." He told her. Ororo was quiet as she considered this. Sure, needing to take a potty break during a meal was annoying for the trio nowadays but still, this seemed rather surprising. But, in the end, she decided it couldn't hurt to do so.

In her room, Rogue was busy barely managing to squeeze into her tight costume when Professor X began talking to her mentally, causing the southern girl to pause in tugging on her lime green sleeveless t-shirt over her black one piece.

"Rogue, you and the others have been becoming very healthy over the last few days. Yet, you have to waste time using the toilet when you could be eating. Therefore, I suggest you try wearing and using diapers. It'll be quick and easy to relive yourself then." He said. Rogue, like Kitty and Ororo, was quiet as she thought about the suggestion and ultimately agreed to it.

A few minutes later found the trio going downstairs for breakfast and finding only Jean present. "Hi, guys. Scott and the others've already had breakfast. I've just finished preparing yours." she smiled as the trio sat down. She then came up with Kitty's breakfast tray. It was choked full of bacon, doughnuts, eclairs, pancakes and scrambled eggs. Kitty licked her lips and began wolfing down the food at breathtaking speed, her belly beginning to bulge even more.

"Now yours, Ororo." Jean smiled as she handed Ororo her tray, which had pancakes, waffles, scrambled eggs, eclairs and bacon on it. Like Kitty, Storm hungerly licked her lips and began scarfing her food down to her belly's delight as it too began becoming bloaty.

Rogue, meanwhile, received a tray full of pancakes, eggs, waffles, doughnuts, bacon and eclairs, which the southern gal began inhaling at top speed as well.

Once they'd finished, the trio all leaned back and belched in unison, big grins on their food covered faces. Jean then came up with a grin. She held three big diapers in her hands and a rubber mat under her arm. "I read your minds during breakfast and learned you guys're considering wearing and using diapers to help with getting more eating time. I think that's a good idea." she explained with a smile.

"Which is why I went out last night while you were sleeping and bought a few boxes of extra-large diapers." Jean added with a smile. "Who wants to be diapered first?" She asked. Kitty rose her chubby hand and arm, the fat jiggling slightly.

Jean helped Kitty onto the mat, which she'd placed on the floor and helped pull Kitty's leggings, tights and panties off. Then, she gently taped the thick diaper on and helped Kitty back into her leggings and tights. Kitty's diaper was bright pink with a unicorn and a big rainbow on it.

Ororo went next. Her diaper was grey with thunder clouds on it. "A perfect match", Ororo thought to herself as Jean taped it on her. "as my codename is Storm after all."

Rogue's, meanwhile, was bright white with a flowery pattern on it. Jean carefully helped Rogue get diapered, being careful not to touch Rogue's crotch or other bare body parts as she did. Now, all three big X-Ladies were snugly in diapers, the bottoms of their costumes bulging somewhat visibly.

"It feels kinda nice and cozy." Kitty admitted as she waddled around, mainly due to her diaper's size as her weight gain from the previous night had largely vanished, leaving only her bloated body from its' result, the same with Ororo and Rogue.

Rogue agreed. "They feel like a very fluffy cloud ya can use as a potty." she agreed with a laugh as she poked hers through her costume. Ororo smiled as she adjusted to her bulky diapee as well. "They truly do feel comfy, Kitten. These should help us considerably during our feast at the buffet this afternoon." she smiled as the trio set off to relax before going to the buffet.
115222111311342132111.title: Professor X convinces the girls to wear diapers...

choices: The X-Men arrive to free them. Professor X admits his experiment to the trio.
1152221113113421321111.content:
Later that afternoon, Kitty, Rogue and Storm arrived at the buffet via taxi. Upon entering, they were immediately whisked to the room Kitty and Ororo had gone to the day before. Once again, the iPads were brought out and Kitty chose the 'a' la carte' again while both Storm and Rogue went and decided on the 'beltway' option.

Unknown to them, the chef was watching with a wide grin as the trio's stuffing began. After watching them become obese both here and at Xavier's due to small drones he'd bought, he knew that he could now capture the three mutants and force feed them into immobility. With that, he moved to prepare the machine that would help him do this.

In the special room, Kitty was happily clearing plate after plate of food, smears of it getting on her round doughy face and bits of it landing on her boobs and belly. Once again, she was enjoying each meal to the fullest and almost didn't give a care to what it was as her belly and body filled up more.

Soon, once more, her plates became overfilled with fried chicken, burgers and sausages. The waiters even brought out the deep fried cakes and ice cream again. Kitty just smiled as her fattening meals kept on coming like crazy as she kept filling up like a ball.

Ororo, meanwhile, was loudly munching on the pizzas, cakes and pastries that were coming into her mouth. She moaned in pleasure and delight as this happened, her brown belly expanding more and more as the food was made into fat, similar to Kitty's.

Rogue, at the same time, was enjoying her own beltline of fried foods and desserts, loudly chewing and swallowing them quickly as they poured into her mouth. The southern girl moaned with great pleasure as she did this over and over again.

After a while, Kitty was moved to the same couch as yesterday and began receiving the same platters and bowls of heavy calorie filled food placed on her belly while Storm and Rogue's belts switched from fast foods to pastries and small cakes, which they merely gulped down without chewing.

The chef chuckled evilly as he kept watching. Soon, it would be time for him to have the three girls brought into the kitchen and into his feeding machine. Now, he'd placed sleeping pills into Kitty's turkey and mashed potatoes, Ororo's cake and Rogue's burgers, which were now carried to the trio.

Kitty almost drooled upon seeing that wonderful and delicious turkey being placed on her tummy again. Grabbing a drumstick, she tore a giant chunk off and moaned in pleasure as she then allowed a big spoonful of mashed potatoes to be stuffed into her maw as well, despite it being stuffed with turkey meat.

Storm and Rogue were now also undergoing the feeding process in addition to their pastries and small cakes still pouring in as well. Finally, the trio were allowed to stop. They all sat there, panting and moaning in delight. Kitty spoke first as she rubbed her now boulder sized belly.

"G-Guys... *hic* I... don't know about you... *burp* but I'm really pooped. I need a *hic-urp* nap." She yawned, the sleeping pills taking effect. Storm and Rogue looked equally droopy eyed and tuckered out from what they thought was their feast as well.

Without a word, the trio slowly went to sleep where they were, Kitty using a pillow on the couch to rest her head while Rogue used Ororo's shoulder and Storm used her own pillow. As they slept soundly, the chef signaled his lackeys to roll them to the kitchen.

Soon, the trio were strapped into large chairs, their fat arms and legs strapped down to the arms and legs of said chairs. There were even belts strapped over their tummies. Slowly, as they kept snoring, Rogue woke up first. "Dang, that was a good nap." She mumbled as she tried to stretch... only to find she couldn't. Confused, the southern girl looked at her strapped down arms and legs. Slowly, her brain woke up completely. "Hey! W-What's goin' on, here?!?!" She asked, realizing her strength wasn't working in breaking either her arms or legs free, Professor X's messages (excluding her mobility and hunger) fleeing her mind as she struggled to break out.

Ororo woke up now. "Rogue? What's goin' on?" she mumbled as she slowly fully awakened as well. "Ah don't know, 'Roro. Ah jus' woke up and mah powers don't work on these here straps." Rogue admitted as Ororo eyed her bounds as well. Curious, she tried to fire up her powers, but met the same result as Rogue.

"My powers do not work on them either." She realized in equal concern and panic. "Ah think we'd better wake Kitty." Rogue said, nodding to the snoring 14-year-old blubber butt next to Storm. "Kitten! Kitten, wake up!" Ororo ordered. "Mmmmm. Not now 'Roro." mumbled Kitty, still dreaming. "Yeah, I'll be a model for your edible diapers." she mumbled a second later, mimicking eating said diapers in her sleep. "Kitten, wake up now!" Ororo shouted. "Huh?" Kitty mumbled as she slowly opened her eyelids reluctantly.

"Hey... what's goin' on, guys? Where are we and why're we tied down?" She asked, becoming more awake now. "We do not know, Kitty. But our powers do not work on the straps." Ororo admitted. "Wait a sec... Ah think we're in the kitchen of the buffet." Rogue realized as she got a better look at their surroundings.

"That's right. And it's where you'll be fattened into immobile blobs by me." the chef said as he came out of the shadows. "Who're you?" Kitty asked. "Name's Seymour Arbuckle. I'm the owner and chief of this establishment." the chef smirked. "Why are you making us immobile?" Storm demanded.

"Simply because I hate mutants. There was a time when I was jealous of them but then I realized that you could wipe out humanity with your powers. So, I decided to use my cooking skills to make you so fat, you can't destroy the world. I've been adding hunger stimulants and metabolism suppressers to your food to make you as big as you are now." He smirked.

"You are a madman! Our friends will notice our absences and come for you." Storm snarled. Seymour smirked and activated the feeding machine. Kitty's chair went to it first. Out came a giant plate filled with cookies and ice cream. Kitty tried to fight her still present hunger, but finally gave in and allowed the machine to stuff the cookies and dairy treats into her mouth nonstop before switching to cakes and other desserts, with frosting, crumbs, pie filling and other food debris beginning to land on her middle.

Storm then found herself being stuffed with tacos nonstop nearby. She tried to resist her cravings as well, but couldn't and so allowed taco after greasy large taco to be crammed into her maw, spilling lettuce, meat, tomato and other taco fillings onto her boobs and gut as it swelled up, Ororo barely having time to scoop said crumbs into her mouth in between each taco.

Rogue was brought over to a large meatball sub which immediately began cramming itself into her mouth, smearing tomato sauce around her mouth and her costume. Once it was gone, a huge roast beef sandwich with swiss cheese began forcing its' way into her.

After dealing with this for a bit, the girls switched. Kitty went to the tacos and chimichangas, Ororo went to the sandwiches and Rogue was sent to the desserts. "I'll leave you freaks to your well deserved fate." Seymour chuckled as he left the trio behind in the kitchen, ballooning up more and more as they were forced to keep eating.

"Guys *munch, gulp* I... I *burp* can't take... *mmmph* much more food..." Kitty moaned as she was stuffed with both a taco and a chimichanga at the same time. "I *urp* agree with *munch* *chew* *burp* with *belch* you, Kitten. My own tummy is *mmph* getting very full as well." Ororo admitted as she kept getting stuffed with sandwich after sandwich, sauces and other condiments littering her face before a large ham and cheese sandwich was stuffed into her maw with a sound of protest from Ororo.

Then, a very awful smell reached their noses. "Uh, guys? Ah *burp* *munch* *munch* *chew* *chew* *gulp* think Ah just took a poop in mah diaper." Rogue admitted sheepishly as she was force fed a large slice of a eight layer wedding cake. Then,

*BBBBBBLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRCCCCC CCCCCHHHHHHHHHHH!!!* Kitty let out a massive fart and pooped her own diaper. "Well, I'm *munch* *humph!* in the same *mmurph* boat as you, Rogue. I just used my diapee." She confessed as they switched again, Kitty to the sandwiches, Ororo to the desserts while Rogue went to the Mexican foods.

"Surely, *munch **gulp* *burp* the others will notice our absence soon. Otherwise, we will pop like oversized parade balloons!" Ororo said as she was force fed a very big pumpkin pie as Rogue found her mouth being stuffed with six tacos and chimichangas at the same time while Kitty was nearly choked by a massive peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
1152221113113421321111.title: At the buffet, the chef captures Kitty, Rogue ...

11522211131134213211111.content:
Meanwhile, the X-Men were wondering where the trio were. They knew the trio had gone back to the buffet after their large breakfast but the trio still hadn't returned.

"Where could Katya, Rogue and Ororo be? I know they enjoy staying at the buffet late, but the buffet should've closed up an hour ago." Colossus remarked as he looked at the wall clock. Kitty had told him that on Sundays, the buffet closed at 9 in the evening. It was now 10:01. "Something must've happened to them. That could be the only reason they aren't here." said Cyclops. True, he and Jean were only visiting the X-Men, but he did care for the three missing X-Ladies.

At that moment, Rachel went rimrod straight. "What's wrong, Rachel?" asked Nightcrawler upon seeing her do this. "Shhh!" Rachel hissed as she listened to the telepathic message Kitty was putting out.

"Rach! It's *mmmmppph* Kitty! Me, 'Roro and Rogue're *gulp* trapped in the buffet's kitchen! The chief's taken *munch, gulp* us hostage! He's planning on fattening us up to immobility! He wants to do the same thing to all mutants! You *urp* gotta tell the others! We can't hold much more food!" Kitty desperately pleaded as she was stuffed with more food by the feeding machine.

"They're still at the buffet. The chief's taken them hostage and he's fattening them up. He wants to do the same thing to all mutants." Rachel told the others. "Sounds like he an' I need ta have ourselves a little talk." Logan snarled, popping his claws out and snarling viciously. He was close with the trio, especially Kitty, having a father/daughter friendship with her.

"We better tell Professor Xavier." Scott said promptly. "There is no time for that, Cyclops! Kitty and the others need our help now!" Kurt protested. "Nightcrawler is right, comrades. If we don't hurry, Katya and the others will pop like balloons!" Colossus agreed in equal concern for his friends, especially his ex-girlfriend Kitty.

Soon, the six were racing to the buffet. Upon arriving, Logan used his claws to cut into the doors with a snarl. Unknown to them, Seymour was watching them on a security screen. "So, the ladies' friends have come to rescue them, eh? We'll see about that!" He smirked as he nodded to the waiters loyal to him.

In the dining room area, "So where's the kitchen?" Scott asked. "I'm trying to pinpoint Kitty's location now." Rachel replied as she began doing so. Then, "Got her! The kitchen's near where the bathrooms are in the back." Rachel said after managing to pinpoint Kitty, Rogue and Storm's location.

Then, several waiters arrived. "If you wanna get your friends, you're gonna have to go through us first." smirked the head waiter. "Bub, I was hopin' you'd say that." Logan smirked, popping his claws out. With that, the fighting began.

Logan tackled the head waiter, who grabbed a nearby broom to defend himself, only for Logan to slice it in half with his claws. Frowning in rage, the guy grabbed a chair and tried to smash it against Logan's head, only for the shorter man to grab it and then shove it sideways, knocking the guy off balance and giving Logan a chance to knock him out with a punch to his face.

Nearby, Colossus was fighting six waiters at once due to his size and strength. He threw two of them against the wall, another into a booth, two others onto the conveyer belt and the final one outside.

Rachel was using her telekinesis to deflect and/or return hits being aimed at her by three other waiters. Finally, she defeated them all at once by sending them flying into the men's room with her telekinesis.

Nightcrawler was doing pretty well himself as he was teleporting to dodge hits while also returning his own while teleporting.

Cyclops and Jean were working together to take out their opponents with ease. However, one waiter got a lucky shot in on Scott, knocking the former X-Man down. "Cyclops!" Jean shouted in alarm, only for her opponents to get the upper hand on her as well.

Suddenly, *CLANG!* One of Jean's opponents crumpled with a groan. Shocked, Jean saw the young waiter who had often served Kitty, Rogue and Storm during their last few visits standing above her wielding a frying pan. "Are you alright?" He asked, helping her up.

"Yes. Why'd you-" Jean began. "Because I'm sick of being against mutants like my uncle." the young man replied with a smile before using his frying pan again as another of Jean's opponents went for them. "Your uncle's the chief?" Jean asked.

"Yeah. Dad owns this place and he's pro-mutant like me and Mom are." confirmed the man. "Did you call your dad when Shadowcat, Rogue and Storm were kidnapped?" Jean asked. "Yeah I sent him a text. He's on his way. I'm Justin Arbuckle." the man replied.

Then, a young brunette waitress, wielding a large tray, appeared and smashed it against one of Scott's opponents' head. "Oh, and that's my fiancee Josie." Justin smiled, nodding to said girl as she helped Cyclops up.

"Nice to meet you. Big fan of you guys." Josie smiled to them. "Where are our friends?" Colossus asked, the fighting having briefly stopped as all the waiters were defeated. "They're this way." Josie said as she and Justin led the X-Men to the kitchens.

Meanwhile, Kitty, Rogue and Ororo were still being stuffed full of food. Kitty whimpered in pain as another chili burger was crammed into her mouth while Storm was forced to eat a giant cheesecake and Rogue ate a huge bean burrito. Kitty, Rogue and now Storm's diapers were full to bursting. Without a word, Logan cut Kitty's arms free, allowing the obese 14-year-old to undo her belly's restraints while Justin helped her free her legs as Jean helped Storm and Rachel and Kurt helped Rogue and Josie shut the machine down.

"You guys okay?" Josie asked them once the trio had shakily managed to stand up on their own fat legs and feet. "Sure. As *UUUURRPPP!!!* long as you define 'okay' as 'suffering a bellyache'." Kitty moaned as she rubbed her poor tummy while it gurgled and rumbled in agreement.

"I *BBBBBUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAPPPP!!!* agree with Kitten. I am very full and feel like I may burst." Ororo agreed with an equally pained moan as she rubbed her big brown orb of a middle. Rogue merely burped and hiccupped in response, her own face full of pain.

"Let's get you outta here." Logan said. Then, "Well, well, well... so my captives' friends got past my servants, eh?" Seymour smirked as he stood in front of them, some of the waiters having recovered from the previous fight. He noticed his nephew and nice-in-law to be standing by the X-Men. "Justin... Josie... move aside. You've disappointed me enough today." He warned them.

"No, Uncle Seymore. We've had it with your plans. I looked up to you when I was a kid. Dad also admired you. You were his big brother. Why'd you change so?" Justin demanded. "Because I knew mutants like these fools can destroy the world if they choose. I wasn't about to let that happen." Seymore snarled in response.

"That's no excuse, Seymour." said a voice. Surprised, Seymour turned to see a man, not much younger than him, standing in the doorway. "I couldn't believe it when Justin told me that you'd captured these three fine heroines and what you planned for them, simply because they were born different. It's like Justin said, you were my idol when we were growing up. I don't know how you could've let your jealousy and then paranoia take over but it stops now. I've called the police and they're on their way to arrest you and your men." said Mr. Arbuckle firmly, but sadly. At that, Seymour took off running while his men raced for the X-Men.

"Please, Cyclops... allow us." Storm told Scott as he, Logan, Kurt, Jean, Colossus and Rachel got ready to fight. Without another word, she, along with Rogue and Kitty, took off for their opponents.

To the X-Men's shock, the obese Storm and Rogue soon proved to be very capable against the waiters. Storm used her big brown belly to have one bounce off her, allowing Rogue the chance to take him down. Rogue then used her big butt to sit on two other waiters, smothering them into dreamland before using her super strength to put two more into a wall while Storm used a controlled twister to knock the remaining ones out cold.

In the dining room, Seymour was running for the door as fast as he could, when suddenly, "CANNONBALL!!" Kitty's voice was heard about him. Shocked, all Seymore had time to see was a massive boulder sized belly plummeting towards him before Kitty belly flopped on him just as Mr. Arbuckle, Wolverine, Cyclops, Rachel, Nightcrawler, Jean, Colossus, Josie, Rogue and Storm arrived. "Nice one, Kitty." smiled Rachel as Kitty rolled off the knocked out Seymour and managed to climb back onto her feet.

"Thank you so much girls. If it hadn't been for you and your friends, I may've never known of my brother's plans." Mr. Arbuckle smiled. "To make it up to you, starting tomorrow, you can have all the food you want for free." He smiled. The trio smiled in thanks at the offer. "You got it." Kitty smiled as Storm and Rogue nodded.

Later at the mansion, "So... let me get this straight, Professor... this was all for some kinda social experiment?" Kitty asked as she, Rogue and Ororo talked with Xavier in his office, clad in only their bras and thick diapers.

"I'm afraid so, Kitty. I know it almost put your lives on the line tonight and I am very sorry for that. I will do whatever I can to make it up to you." Xavier replied calmly and sincerely. "Well... Ah guess bein' this fat really ain't too bad. Sure gives me an excuse ta not keep exercising." Rogue shrugged.

"I must agree with you Rogue. I'm so plump now, my students will likely focus more on their lessons instead of my body." Ororo agreed. Kitty also nodded in agreement.

"And who knows? Maybe this extra blubber'll help when I need my powers to short circuit big electronics and help my martial arts." Kitty agreed as she poked her big belly in delight, thinking about it.
11522211131134213211111.title: The X-Men arrive to free them. Professor X admi...

115222111311342132111111.content:
3 weeks had passed since the fight at Food Heaven and Kitty, Storm and Rogue were none the worse for said adventure. They'd discovered, thanks to experiments from former X-Man Beast, that, while still sumo sized, they were also stronger, despite quickly becoming fatigued easier while moving too much or exercising too hard.

They also discovered that Professor X's messages to them from that first day were also coming true. Storm discovered that, due to her body being more plump, doughy and basically, fat, her students did focus more on their lessons instead of her body, though some did like her new obesity, even bringing her cakes, pies and cookies to snack on.

Rogue, meanwhile, had discovered something that helped her act less rigidly than before: eating. She realized she enjoyed her massiveness and the fact that it increased her strength. So, she began lazing around more and spent most of that time gorging herself on junk foods. Beast had made a suppressing pill that, when consumed, meant you couldn't gain anymore weight despite eating more unless you wish to put on said weight, which all three X-Ladies had taken.

At the same time, Kitty had discovered her new girth did help her with disabling electrical grids and it did improve her martial arts. She was very happy with her blubber like Rogue and Storm and enjoyed many an hour gorging out with them.

Meanwhile, Jean had decided to stay at the mansion and serve as the girls' personal chief for breakfast, snacks and occasionally lunch and dinner, as the girls had obviously taken Mr. Arbuckle up on his free food offer every day.

One day, Kitty woke up clad in only her extra large pink bra and panties. She, along with Rogue and Ororo, had decided to go back to wearing panties after Professor X had stopped the experiment following the fight with Seymour. Though they did occasionally miss their diapers, the trio felt it was a good idea. With a smile, Kitty rolled out of bed and stood up, smiling at her big 400 pound body in the mirror. Humming happily, she pulled on her new extra large Shadowcat costume, which was now much stretchier thanks to modifications made to it.

She walked downstairs and entered the kitchen to find Jean cooking up a storm as usual as Rogue and Ororo also came in, garbed in extra large versions of their own costumes. Upon hearing them, Jean looked up and smiled at the trio.

"Good morning, girls. I've got breakfast already for you three." she smiled as she began handing over their trays.
115222111311342132111111.title: 3 weeks later

choices: Someone arrives bringing new treats for them
They both decide to go for some clothes shopping
1152221113113423.content:
With a restful night of sleep, the three X-girls digested all that they had consumed at the restaurant. Their bodies, bloated and filled with food, began to deflate as all they had consumed was digested and processed. As Morning came the three beauties woke up, each in her own fashion, finding out that although they weren’t as big as the day before, they still had seemed to grow somewhat.

Ororo was the first to wake up, getting out of her bed wearing her soft white PJ, immediately noticed that her body had deflated somewhat from the previous day. Encouraged by the fact that she could see her feet again, she quickly disrobed and looked at herself in her mirror. Both her white panties and bra seemed a bit constricted on her dark chocolaty skin and her belly still pushed out in front of her a fair bit, but she couldn’t actually see it.

Thinking that everything was ok, Storm quickly began to wear her skintight pants, with the tank top and light-colored jacket but realized almost immediately that they didn’t seem to fit very well on her frame. Her pants wouldn’t go over her thighs, pulling as much as she could, she couldn’t make them rise of another inch. Her top and jacket didn’t seem to fare any better. The top wasn’t covering much over her belly button, pushed up by her still fattened belly and her jacket seem unable to close over it.

Puzzled she quickly tossed those clothes aside, remaining in her white undies and tried to figure out what to do.

Kitty woke up second. On the previous day, she had indulged way more than her weather controlling friend and, as she went straight to sleep, she hadn’t noticed the toll that her blue costume had taken during her binge. As she slowly woke up, she soon saw that her costume was completely ripped apart. Large gashes in the fabric were all over it. Especially at belly and ass height. There the costume had simply teared itself apart in the futile tentative to keep its wearer covered. Shadowcat, although pouting over the loss of her costume, didn’t put too much though on it.

In the end, shrugging her shoulders, she removed it standing in her room clad only in her panties and bra, both pink, as she tried looking at herself without a mirror. Her body, although it had largely deflated, still had a thick layer of fat all over it, making even her undies feeling tight over her skin. Yet, Kitty, even though she could barely see the tip of her toes over her fattened middle, didn’t seem to care that her clothes weren’t wearable anymore, as she felt her tummy grumbling in hunger, deciding that she could think about her issue after a nice breakfast.

Rogue woke up in a similar situation, her suit hadn’t hold up to her engorged frame, quickly ripping apart, leaving her body mostly naked as it changed from a cool looking suit to a tattered rag of dark colored cloth. Still, as she rapidly woke up, she immediately saw the danger she was facing. For she couldn’t let any inch of her skin to be touchable and so she began to try and fashion something out of the bedsheets to cover herself up. In her haste to cover herself, she never thought about looking at herself first, so it went unnoticed to her how her hourglass figure had expanded even more, as her body digested all the calories, she had ingested the previous day.

Unknowingly to each other, both Ororo and Kitty, left the safety of their rooms to go in the mansion kitchen. The first, feeling rather secure since she knew that most of the mansion residents would be away on mission, the latter instead, didn’t seem to worry about it at all. She was just too hungry to care what others could think of her waking around in her pink undies.

As they both reached the kitchen, they greeted each other, slightly thinking that the other was still in a great shape, and yet both looked surprised when they saw that on the table there were some massive treats waiting for them. On the table, in fact, there were two massive platters, each with a name tag on it. Both girls seated near their own platters and quickly unveiled them looking surprised, in Ororo’s case, and happy, in Kitty’s case, on the contents left for them. Along with the platters, both found a note from the Professor, asking them to enjoy the treat on the table since both of them seemed to having been too focused on missions lately, and in dire need of enjoy some time off.

Kitty couldn’t believe her eyes, right in front of her, towering over her in height, was a massive ten-layer chocolate tower cake. A huge thing, usually seen only at weddings, and yet her tummy grumbled in pleasure as it requested her to have a go at it, demanding Kitty to quench their hunger. Storm, instead, as she unveiled her plate stared shocked and with open mouth to the humongous burger awaiting her. It was a massive thing, easily the size of a car wheel.

As she inspected it, she noticed straight away that it was a massively large triple cheeseburger with pickles, ketchup, slabs of bacon, tomato and other veggies and sauces, making it a massive greasy treat. She also quickly red the note and, although being surprised by the Professor request, she was too engrossed in seeing, and smelling, the huge burger under her eyes to think of anything else.

While Kitty began by standing up and taking slice after slice from the highest layers, Ororo tried time and time again to lift the massive burger, finally managing to balance it in her grasp, before biting into it, taking a huge chunk of meats and sauce. As she did so, though, not only she smeared her face with sauce and grease, but also some of it fell from the burger, landing directly on her naked skin and undies. And yet, as she was enjoying the flavor so much, she didn’t even think to stop.

She tried to take more and more out of it, as she began to crave all that massive thing inside of her.

Kitty, instead, had managed to restrict herself on the first, topmost, layer of the cake but, as her taste buds were assaulted by the deliciously tasty flavor of the cake, she gave in, letting out all the pretense of education, as she began to scoop up pieces of it directly with her hands, stuffing her mouth more and more as icing and pieces of cakes began to fall all over herself. As they gorged, so their bellies began to expand anew and, while this was securing their panties from being dirtied, their bras began to be covered in cake and greasy sauces, with the occasion glob of missed food.

Both girls, as they kept eating, began to lose all control over themselves, something within them and in the food turned them into food addicted monster, as they kept gulping ad munching, unaware of the toll this was taking on their bodies.

When the two had finished gorging, as the food in front of them had been completely erased from existence, both girls felt pleasantly full and yet, something seemed to bother them. Ororo, laying back against her chair, was a complete mess. Her face was smeared with mayo, ketchup and grease, as equally dirty were her hands and most of her swollen top portion gut. Yet she had managed to finish the entire burger, as a slightly drunken smile was on her lips.

Burping out as she cleared some space in her bloated belly, she looked down and noticed that a few remnants of the burger were stuck in the middle of her cleavage. Still feeling somewhat hungry she began scooping them up.

Kitty, instead was laying belly up on the table. Unable to move and feeling just like a beached whale would, she had managed in clearing the massive tower cake and yet, as she still licked her hands, finger by finger, as they were completely covered in chocolate, she couldn’t stop thinking at how good it had been.

Yet, her body too was covered in chocolate since, during her frenzy she had moved onto the table pushing herself against the cake like a feral animal.

Still, as the two bloated girls lay there, panting and burping….
1152221113113423.title: Clothing issues in the morning

choices: Go at the local Food Court, junk food galore!
Go to the All you can eat Buffet, the food there was amazing
See how Rogue is doing / Something else…
11522211131134232.content:
As both Storm and Shadowcat were resting in the kitchen, their bellies apparently satisfied for the moment, the two girls noticed that they had a similar problem in common.

“Hey…Kitten…seems you forgot to wear your clothes…today…”

“Well,’Roro…You seem to have done the same…haven’t you?”

“Eh…right. I don’t know what to think…My clothes don’t seem to fit anymore…”

“Yeh…mine too. Must have shrunk…We’re eating healthy so…it can’t be ‘that’”

“Yes…Guess so. Still, we need new clothes. Wanna come…with me…to the mall? We can go there…in normal clothes…so to not be…recognized.”

“Sure, ‘Roro…will be a pleasure. Just…lemme…stand up…”

As both ladies slowly rose from their resting, they quickly went back to their rooms and changed in somewhat more normal clothes, although, both still had some issues with those.

After a few minutes, first to reach the entry of the mansion was, surprisingly, Shadowcat. Replacing her Blue costume with a more normal looking pair of jeans and an oversized t-shirt which looked rather tight on her still full belly.

As she waited a bit, her stare fell on a seemingly misplaced plate with a few donuts nearby. Without really feel hungry anymore, but simply bored, she snatched a few as she waited, enjoying their taste. As she was munching on the last one, Ororo appeared in the hallway, moving rather quickly toward her.

Storm, was dressed somewhat differently from her usual, having changed her leathers with a rather large pair of sweat pants and jacket, although both were still white in color.

“Ready to go, Kitten?”

“Yeah…*gulp* Let’s go. Er, did you…?”

“Don’t worry. Already called a cab.”

Meanwhile, Rogue had just finished covering herself with her bedsheets as she came out of her room. Moving slowly, she managed to reach the kitchen but instead of finding her two friends having breakfast she found Nightcrawler trying to take some cookies from a cupboard.

“So it was You who stole the cookies so frequently!”

“Ach! Ya…it was me. Yet, I could share…if you keep silent?”

Rogue, still covered in her bedsheet, smiled a bit thinking that there wasn’t going to be really any harm in it, as she accepted the deal.

“Alright but, on a few conditions. First, you shall deliver my share of those in my room…and second…Could you go and buy some clothes for me? I…I can’t really get out dressed like this and I don’t want to risk hurting anyone due to…my powers, you know?”

Kurt, understanding the situation nodded for both requests, especially since he could see a profitable way of getting rid of a troublemaker for his cookie stealing habit.

If he could manage to have a “meatier” Rogue around, for sure she would be blamed first. Plus, as he noticed how the bedsheet fell on her curvier body, he could see that with a slightly bigger Rogue, he could ogle her and enjoy the spectacle.

“Ach so! Will buy you clothes…but first deliver your share of cookies…Auf wiedersen!”

As he saluted in his German dialect, he vanished into thin air, quickly re-appearing in Rogue’s room, swiftly depositing a large cache of cookies packages, about two dozen’s of them, each holding thirty or so cookies, on her bed, before vanishing once more to buy her clothes.

Although he had actually forgot to ask her the size. Shrugging his shoulders, he decided to go with what he would think was going to fit her better.


After a very short trip in their cab, the two bloated X-Ladies in disguise, instead, arrived at the local mall, enjoying the respite of being completely hidden within the sheer amount of people wandering in there.

In truth, although both hadn’t changed that much, their bodies still had grown a bit fatter than usual so the chance of being recognized were, ironically, very slim for them both. As They went from shop to shop, both were growing sincerely depressed. No matter the shop they went, all clothes they could find were either too small or wrongly labeled.

After not even an hour, the two decided to rest a bit on a bench, as they discussed about their misfortunes.

“Can you believe it, ‘Roro? All clothes had the wrong label on them! Some shirts were marked as XL and yet I couldn’t even pull them down enough to cover my belly button. It’s insane.”

“I feel you, Kitten. I tried all the shops where I usually buy my leathers and yet couldn’t find any in my size. It has to be a mistake.”

Both ladies, still influenced by the Professor, couldn’t see the truth under their own eyes. It wasn’t the shops that carried the wrong size or label but it was that their bodies had gotten fatter, although they couldn’t see it. Still, after a few minutes rest, and a few milkshakes downed to restore their energies, both girls decided to try one more time, going to a new shop that neither had ever seen before.

It was called ‘Gordo’s’ and it seemed to be the answer to their problems.

As they both entered a young, lithe, woman hurried to them offering them her aid.

“Hello and Welcome to Gordo’s. I’m Stacy, may I be of assistance?”

“Actually, yes. We were looking for a…wardrobe upgrade. Lately our clothes…seemed to have had a mishap” Replied gently Storm as Kitty, piping up from behind her friend, added “Yeah, they must’ve shrunk.”

At this, Stacy rolled her eyes for a moment, knowing exactly which kind of clients these two were.

‘So you’re the type of fatties that doesn’t recognize yourself as fat, uh? Well, we’ve got clothes also for you...don’t you worry.’

“Well, don’t worry. I’m sure we will manage to help you in finding the perfect dress for any occasions. Would you mind following me? I’m a good judge of shapes and sizes and I think I know exactly the section in which you may be able to find what you need.”

As Storm and Shadowcat followed the girl, they soon found themselves surrounded by racks upon racks of clothing which seemed to fit perfectly on their bodies, although they hadn’t any labels on them. As Kitty enquired about this strange thing, Stacy seemed to reply as if it was a question, she was asked a million times already.

“We at Gordo’s manufacture our clothes by hand through the assistance of many seamstresses, for this reason you will never find a label on our clothes. Still, since we produce a huge selection, you will be able to find something to suit your tastes…”

As morning passed, both girls managed to find many clothes and dresses into which both could fit perfectly, although, following the advice from Stacy, they both purchased a few bigger sizes as well.

“Well, since you’ve told me that your previous clothes shrunk during washing, I’m sure a few clothes of one or two size bigger could only work at your advantage, wouldn’t you think?”

Still, both Ororo and Kitty were feeling happy in having found clothes that were finally, perfect for them. Storm had even managed to find an ensemble that was mostly similar to her old clothes, with a leather jacket and leather pants of a light gray color, which she finally managed to close on her still quite bloated paunch.

Kitty too, managed to snag quite a few clothes and dresses for herself but, as lunchtime approached, both girls began to feel a bit of hunger.

“So, ‘Roro. Now that we have solved our clothing problem, what do you think of having a bite to eat?”

“Well, Kitten, to tell you the truth…I’m feeling quite famished. Where would you prefer to go?”

As they looked around, they grossly restricted their choices to two options:

Either Having lunch there at the food court or going back to the buffet they had gone the day before.

“Either way…” finished Storm “…For me is the same. Wonder how AnneMarie is doing though…”

In the end Kitty decided to…
11522211131134232.title: Clothes Shopping sprees…or trying to at least.

choices: Hit the mall and then go to the buffet for a major pig out (using the discount).
Swim in the pool, watch tv and eat junk food during a movie marathon
11522211131134233.content:
As Kitty and Storm kept laying in the kitchen, panting and burping after their large gorge, Rogue was trying in vain to find clothes that could fit her inflated hourglass body. So far, aside from her costume, Rogue had tried on six different shirts and seven pairs of pants. Of all those, she'd ripped one pair of pants, and two of her shirts. Her bras were rather tight now due to her bigger boobs as well. Rogue was currently naked as she grabbed a pair of red panties.

Taking a deep breath, she began tugging the panties up. She made decent progress until she reached her chunky thighs. There, the panties could go no further. Rogue tugged and tugged in desperation but they remained wedged where they were, refusing to budge an inch.

"Uuugghhh!!! C'mon! Just a... little... more!!!" Rogue groaned as she kept tugging and pulling. Then, *RRRRRIIIIIIPPPPPPPP!!!!* Rogue's panties ripped loudly in the middle and fell to the floor, leaving the shapely southern belle naked again. "Aw man! None of mah clothes fit now!" she pouted in dismay. Then, she noticed her bedsheets. "Ah wonder..." Rogue thought to herself with a smile as she grabbed the sheets and set to work. After a few minutes, her makeshift clothes were ready. "Now Ah can get some breakfast." she smiled aloud as she waddled slightly downstairs.

She came down and found the bloated, food covered and clad in only bras and panties Shadowcat (who was trying very hard to lick her chocolate covered tummy) and Storm (who was loudly sucking her mayo, ketchup and grease covered fingers) still panting and burping.

"What happened to you two?" Rogue asked as she sat down between the duo. "We *urp* just ate *burp* the most awesome *hic* chocolate *belch* cake and *urp* triple cheeseburger ever!" Kitty replied between large burps as she kept trying to lick her big belly. "Kitty is telling the truth, Rogue. Professor Xavier left us these meals and told us to take some time off." Storm grinned as she finishing sucking her fingers clean, letting out a big burp of her own behind her hand. Kitty then noticed Rogue's makeshift clothes.

Rogue had fashioned a makeshift t-shirt and panties out of her spare bedsheets. "Uh, Rogue... you know that your homemade panties look like a diaper, right?" Kitty asked gently. Rogue looked at her sheet panties and blushed as she realized Kitty had a point. Her makeshift panties were somewhat diaper looking and she had even used a big pin to hold them up.

"Ah know. It's just that Ah couldn't fit in any of mah normal clothes so Ah used some o' mah sheets." Rogue explained. Ororo and Kitty eyed each other knowingly. "My clothes did not fit either this morning." Ororo admitted with a sheepish grin. "I didn't even bother trying any of mine." Kitty confessed as she finally gave up trying to lick her tummy and laid on her back again, panting and wheezing slightly at her hard work. Rogue and Ororo both grinned at their teammate after sharing a look with each other.

"Kitten, would you mind if we licked your belly?" Ororo asked. Kitty blushed at the thought but then, after thinking it over, smiled and nodded silently. Without another word, Storm and Rogue began running their tongues over Kitty's chocolatey belly.
