131.title: Mary-Jane Watson

choices: The duo have their burping contest after the feast. MJ wins.
The burping contest begins right after the meal. Felicia wins via her powers
131121.content:
One evening, Mary Jane Watson was alone in her friend Peter Parker's apartment. Peter was away on assignment for the Daily Bugle newspaper, where he worked as a photographer, taking pictures of his alter ego Spider-Man fighting criminals. MJ sighed as she lounged on the sofa. Her apartment was being debugged so Peter had offered his place until he came home.

Recently, MJ had revealed she had known about Peter and Spider-Man being one in the same for years since the night Peter's beloved Uncle Ben had been killed by a burglar Pete had failed to stop days prior during a television appearance and she had seen him leaving as Spider-Man after hearing the news.

Though unable to cope with it at first following Spider-Man's recent encounter with Puma, MJ had since come to terms with it and had opened up about her troubled past a few days after her confession to knowing Parker's secret. This seemed to be bringing them closer together, but there was still a bump in the road: Felicia Hardy, the Black Cat.

Peter had first met Felicia when she sprung her ailing father, Walter Hardy, out of prison to spend his final days at their family's house. Originally, Black Cat's powers of bringing bad luck were props engineered by her. But after a near death encounter with Doctor Octopus and the Owl during their gang war, she had accepted a offer from the Kingpin himself to obtain genuine superpowers that did what her tricks had done: bring bad luck to opponents in battle.

When she met Peter, Felicia had began following in Walter's cat burglar footsteps. However, after her first and second meetings with him and falling in love with Spidey, Cat began going straight and had briefly dated Peter before he revealed his true identity to her. Despite this, they were still friends and Felicia had recently decided to try and win Pete back.

At that moment, MJ heard someone on the rooftop and opening the skylight leading into the bathroom. "Pete? Nah, he said this assignment should take a few days since he's been sent to cover a new science expo in Mexico. But then who-?" MJ wondered as she stood up and grabbed a baseball bat in case she needed a weapon. Slowly, the door opened and MJ prepared to swing, only to stop when she noticed the young woman in front of her: Felicia Hardy herself, garbed in her Black Cat costume.

Felicia seemed just as thrilled at seeing MJ as MJ did with seeing her. The two women eyed each other for a moment and then MJ broke the standoff. "What're you doing here, Felicia?" she nearly spat in annoyance. Felicia smirked slightly as she answered.

"I was looking for Spider. I haven't seen him since two weeks ago." she explained. "He's at a science thing in Mexico for his job. I'm staying here since my apartment's being fumigated." MJ replied, still fighting the urge to swing her bat. "Oh? Well then, I'll be going. Tell him I'll see him when he comes back." Felicia smiled sweetly. "Wait a moment, Hardy." MJ spat, fury on her face.

"Yes?" Cat asked as she faced the furious redhead. "I've had it up to here with you trying to get back with Pete. He doesn't want to date you anymore. Why can't you see it?" Mary Jane demanded. "Because I know it's not true!" Felicia snarled. MJ was so pissed, she seriously considered swinging that metal baseball bat at Felicia's head. But she knew Hardy would likely use her powers to make MJ either miss or fall off balance, giving Felicia time to escape or counter. Then, she got an idea.

"Alright. I have an idea. We'll make a bet: whoever eats the most food and burps the loudest or biggest, can be Pete's girlfriend. That sound fair?" she offered. Felicia was quiet for a moment, as she considered the bet. Then, "You're on." Felicia smirked as they shook hands. With that, MJ began calling up a pizza joint, a hamburger restaurant, a Chinese takeout place and a KFC, placing big orders at each one as she shot glares with Felicia, who simply smiled as innocently as she could or knew how to.

Soon, the massive order was before them. MJ had ordered six large pepperoni, sausage and cheese pizzas, 10 orders of noodles, tangerine chicken and beef with mushroom, 9 Big Belly Burgers with ketchup, mustard, pickles, onion and cheese and 10 family dinners from KFC. "Ready to loose, Hardy?" MJ smirked as she and Felicia sat down on the sofa.

"In your dreams, Red." Felicia smirked playfully. "On your mark... get set... GO!!!!" MJ shouted as she and Felicia began attacking the food with great force.
131121.title: Black Cat

1311211.content:
After a few hours, empty wrappers, buckets of chicken, pizza boxes and take out containers littered the table and floor. A very bloated MJ and Felicia were leaning back on the sofa, their tummies swollen to the size of pumpkins. MJ had had to unbutton her pants and loosen her belt to make room for her large gut. "Ooohhhhh gooooddddddd!!!" she groaned as she rubbed her bloated middle in agony.

Felicia didn't seem to be much better. Her costume was stretched out considerably and the zipper had been pushed down by her own big belly, revealing her bra and massive midsection as she also panted and groaned in equal misery. "Maybe... we... overdid... it..." she panted in between each pant and moan. "Don't... forget... we still. gotta... have our burping... contest." MJ panted in response with a smirk as Felicia's eyes bulged behind her mask.

"I'll go first." MJ smiled as she took a deep breath and started straining, her jumbo tummy gurgling and sloshing as she began feeling a burp coming up. After a few minutes, her cheeks swelled up and she opened her mouth. *UUUURRRRPPPPP!!!!* She belched loudly. "Your turn, Hardy." she said with a grin. Felicia groaned in response as she began feeling the gas raising up in her.

After a second, *BBBUUUURRRRRRPPPPPPPPP!!!!* She burped a little longer and louder than MJ. "Good enough for you, Red?" she smirked as Mary Jane frowned in determination. "Oh yeah? Watch this one!!!" she snarled and began pressing on her gut, forcing more gas up.

*BBBBBUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!* MJ burped loudly, shaking the room slightly. Felicia glared at her opponent and smacked her belly very hard to get the gas going.

"UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAP!!!!* Now, both girls were doing whatever it took to get ahead of the other. They smacked, shook, jiggled and jostled their poor, bloated and stuffed tummies as hard as they could.

*OOOOOORRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!*

*BBBEEEELLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLCCCCCCHHHHH!!!!*

*BBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPP!!!!*

*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPP!!!*

*SSSSUUUUURRREEEENNNNNDDDDDEEEERRRR TOOOOOOO MMMEEEEEEEEE!!!* MJ burped loudly.

*NNNOOOOOTTTTTT AAAAAAA CCCCHHHHAAAANNNNCCCEEEEE, RRREEEEEEEDDDDDDD!!!* Black Cat belched back with a smirk.

"Fine, then. Have it your way, Hardy." MJ smirked as she grabbed a large bottle of soda and shook it up. Quickly she opened it and stuffed it into her mouth as the shook up soda started shooting out. Slowly, her cheeks bulged out as they filled up with the fizzy soda and then, with an effort, she swallowed the giant mouthful.

The two girls watched as MJ's belly swelled up even more from the soda's foam and then it let out a large rumble. MJ smirked as she felt her cheeks ballooning up from the pressure. "Oh shit." Felicia managed to say before her foe opened her mouth.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!*

MJ's burp shook the whole apartment, knocking books, a vase and other items over and causing Felicia to fall off the couch in shock. MJ smirked as she stood over her opponent. "Yield?" she asked with a grin. "Yes." snarled Black Cat.

As much as Felicia hated to admit it, MJ had won the eating and burping contest. With a sigh, Felicia heaved her massive body up and headed for the skylight in the bathroom to leave. "Good job on the contest. I'm sure you and Pete'll be very happy together." Felicia muttered as she got ready to leap up. But just as she did, *OOOMMMPPPHHH!!!* Felicia groaned as she plopped onto her massive booty, to MJ's surprise and slight amusement.

Frowning, Felicia tried again, only for the same thing to happen, this time Felicia landing on her flabby back. "What the hell?!?!" She asked as she heaved herself up again.

"Uh oh. Seems like Garfield had too much food and now can barely move." giggled MJ as she watched. Felicia stuck her tongue out in response and then headed for a window. "I'll just use the window." she huffed and began climbing out it. But when she got to her middle, she stopped. Felicia wiggled, jiggled and strained, but she was stuck. "Damn it!" She cried in dismay, kicking her legs in vain. MJ just smirked and went to work cleaning up Peter's apartment, still burping slightly while she did.

As for Felicia, she had to wait five hours until her bloating had gone down so she could slip through the window. Though she still retained a big red mark on her tummy as a result of her embarrassment for some time.
1311211.title: The duo have their burping contest after the fe...

13112111.content:
A month had passed since MJ and Black Cat's eating and burping contest. Now, Felicia was considerably fatter and gassier as she'd been training for a rematch against Mary Jane. Now, she was heading to Peter's apartment to challenge MJ to the rematch.

Upon arriving, she managed to squeeze through the skylight despite her boulder belly. As she came into the main part of the apartment, Felicia couldn't believe it. There, on the couch, was a very fat Mary Jane Watson. MJ's belly had swollen to boulder size as well, her face was big and round, with a double chin, fat arms, legs, fingers, toes, feet and a large ass. Due to her size, MJ was currently clad in only her bra and panties. She was also eating a massive pepperoni, sausage, mushroom and anchovies pizza by rolling it up and then stuffing it into her mouth.

As she swallowed with a giant gulp, MJ noticed Felicia. "Well, well, well... look at who waddled in." she smirked as she licked her greasy fingers off. "You're one to talk, porky." Black Cat retorted, poking MJ's giant gut with a finger, her own chubby finger sinking into MJ's rolls.

"Why're you here?" MJ scoffed as she grabbed a massive slice of pound cake and stuffed it sloppily into her mouth, chewing loudly as she then slurped a massive cola. "I'm here to challenge you to a rematch." Felicia replied. "You really wanna lose again?" MJ smirked. Felicia chose to ignore that as she then explained.

"I also thought we could try a farting contest as well as our burping contest." She told the obese redhead who was scarfing down junk food nonstop. MJ stopped and thought about it. She only did so for a second as she then smiled.

"You're on." She said as they went to grab food for their pig out/burp off and fart offs. Soon cookies, cakes, pies, doughnuts and things were sitting in front of them. "Ready to lose again, Hardy?" MJ asked with a smirk. Felicia didn't say anything for a moment.

Unknown to MJ, Felicia had made sure all of MJ's food was expired, thus would likely give her a tummy ache after eating all of them. "You bet." Felicia smirked back. "On your mark... get set... EAT!" MJ shouted as they set to work doing so, Felicia smirking as MJ ate the first expired pie, looking puzzled by the taste, but shrugging it off and kept eating.

Soon, all the food was gone, leaving two stuffed girls. "Ohhh gooooodddd..." MJ groaned, rubbing her stuffed belly. She did look slightly ill, but, to Felicia's shock, that was mainly due to being stuffed to the gills with food. MJ was still standing.

"But how? I made sure to grab the expired foods for her. Maybe they haven't fully digested yet? In any case, might as well try to win the burping and farting contest." Felicia thought to herself as she rubbed her own stuffed gut.

"Time for the burping and farting contest." MJ smirked at Felicia, who nodded in silence. MJ, once again, went first. She grunted and strained and then, *BBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRPPPP!!!* Out came a giant burp.

"Try this one on for size!" Felicia smirked as she grunted and strained, gas racing up her throat. Then,

*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPP !!!!* Her burp was bigger and longer than MJ's. The obese redhead snarled in fury at this.

The contest went on, with both MJ and Felicia letting out bigger and/or longer burps than the other each time.

*OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!*

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEELLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!*

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPP!!!*

Finally, Felicia frowned in concentration after this last burp of MJ's. Then, her mouth opened as her cheeks puffed up with gas.

*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPP!!!*< br />
MJ frowned in dismay as, evidently, Felicia had just won the burping rematch. "Alright, wise girl. Time for the farting contest." she snarled. Felicia smirked at this. "You really think you can win this one too? Well, I don't think you can." MJ jeered as she smirked.

Felicia frowned as MJ took a breather before starting the farting contest. "Okay. If the expired foods aren't gonna work anytime soon, I might as well give them a hand." she decided as she began using her powers so to speed up MJ's tummy ache during the competition.

"This time, I'll go first." Felicia told MJ. ""Go right ahead." MJ smirked as Felicia began grunting and straining, her face turning slightly pink from the straining. Then, *PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOTTTTTTTTTT!!*

Felicia let out a massive fart into MJ's face. The obese redhead snarled in rage at this. "Oh yeah? Well, taste this!" She spat as she began grunting and straining.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBLLLLLLLLLLLLLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO OOORRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPP!!!* MJ's fart topped Felicia's by quite a bit. Felicia growled in annoyance at her opponent.

And on and on it went, both girls farting loudly, each one smellier and/or louder than the last one they'd emitted just beforehand.

*PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!!*

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL LLLLLLLLLLLLLLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCHHH!!!*

Finally, MJ was just about to let another fart rip when suddenly, *RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUMMMMMBBBBLLLLEE!* Her big belly let out a deafening gurgle, causing the redhead to wince in agony. Felicia noticed this and smirked, knowing why MJ was in pain.

"Are you okay, Red?" she asked innocently. MJ winced as another massive belly cramp hit her, causing her to double over in agony. "Y-Yeah, Hardy. I'm *burp* fine. Just a little... queasy." MJ admitted as her face went bright green. Then, she burped ominously and ran for the bathroom, just barely making it before she finally gave into her queasiness.

*HHHHHHHHUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRKKKKKKKKKKKKK!!!* She vomited a second later into the toilet as Felicia watched in amusement from the doorframe. "You probably ate some bad food or something." Felicia offered innocently.

"Y-Yeah... wait a minute. You were the one to handle my food. Did you give me expired foods to eat?!?!" MJ snarled. "Nope." Felicia lied quickly with a smirk. MJ was about to say something when she let out a massive, smelly fart.

"Oh god! Now I think I've got dirreria!" MJ whimpered as she sat there in dismay, too weak and sick to bother trying to stand up so she could take a dump in the toilet. At that, Felicia took it as her cue to leave and did so via the window, smirking as she did.
13112111.title: Continue

1311212.content:
A half hour later, MJ and Felicia were both very bloated and stuffed to the gills with food. MJ had had to loosen her belt and unbutton her pants for her massive tummy to have room while Felicia had merely allowed her own gut to push the zipper of her costume down. Now that they had stuffed themselves silly, it was time for the burping contest, but MJ was feeling queasy.

Unknown to MJ, Felicia had used her powers to have MJ's chicken from KFC be spoiled and thus give her an upset tummy. Right now, it seemed to be working as MJ had a slight greenish hue to match her lime green t-shirt, which was stretched over her bloated belly, exposing her bellybutton.

"You alright, MJ?" Felicia smirked innocently. "Y-Yeah, Hardy. I'm (hurk) fine." MJ mumbled, gagging slightly as her tummy rumbled somewhat ominously in response. At that, Black Cat smirked evilly as she then turned her eyes to MJ.

"Alright, let's do this burping contest." she smiled. "I'll go first." Before MJ could say anything, Felicia took a deep breath and then opened her mouth after feeling the gas coming up from her big, blubbery tummy.

"*BBBBBBUUUUUURRRRRPPPPP!!!* Beat that, Red!" she smirked after letting a big burp escape her lips. MJ swallowed somewhat nervously, still not feeling good, and then felt the gas rising from her own massive gut.

*UUUUUURRRRRRAAAAPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!* She burped loudly, barely keeping the bile rising in her throat from escaping her mouth as well. "Your turn, Felicia." she smirked despite the cramp that suddenly flared in her tummy, causing her to whimper in agony as she clutched her poor belly.

Felicia smirked and shook her giant belly hard, causing it to rumble and gurgle loudly. Still smirking, she glanced at MJ before she opened her mouth upon feeling the belch coming fast.

*OOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRPPPPPPP!* She burped loudly and then gestured to MJ for her turn. Gulping nervously as the urge to toss her cookies grew even more urgent, MJ timidly jiggled, jostled and shook her gut to get a burp to appear. After a second,

*BBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPP!!!! * She burped loud and long, to Felicia's dismay and shock.

*Let's see you top tha-" she began when suddenly, *RRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUMMMMMMBBBBBBLLLLEEEEEEEE!!!!* Her large tummy gurgled more ominously than before. "Oh crap. I think I'm gonna be..." MJ began when she gagged again, even louder this time, causing her cheeks to swell up as she raced into the bathroom and barely got in front of the toilet in time.

*HHHHUUURRRRRRKKKKKKKK!!!!* Mary Jane barfed loudly as Felicia giggled to herself from the couch as she listened to her rival puking her guts out. "Oh god... I think I ate some bad chicken or something... my belly's killin' me!" MJ moaned before more queasiness returned, forcing her to bend over the toilet again as she began urping up more of her feast.

"I... think... you won... Hardy... oh god... my belly's so sore..." MJ moaned a second later from the bathroom after raising her head again and wiping her mouth. Felicia smirked and took her leave, leaving poor MJ with a bad tummy ache and a very bloated belly. It took MJ two hours to get her tummy to calm down again and she ultimately fell asleep on the bathroom floor.
1311212.title: The burping contest begins right after the meal...

131122.content: Who else can be MJ's opponent?
131122.title: Someone else.

1311221.content:
One afternoon, Mary Jan Watson and Gwen Stacy were hanging out at Gwen's house. Peter was away for an assignment for the Daily Bugle and so won't be back for a few weeks. Originally, MJ and Gwen had both vied for Peter's affection, but they'd moved past it and were now fairly close.

"Hey Gwen," MJ said after a few moments. "Hmmm?" Gwen asked, looking up at the redhead. "How'd you feel about having an eating contest with me?" MJ offered. Gwen was surprised by this idea. Usually, given her desire to be an actress, MJ usually tried to stay thin and now, she was willing to have an eating contest that would surely add some decent poundage on the redhead's body.

"Are you sure, Mary Jane?" she asked. MJ nodded with a smile. "No conditions. Just a friendly eating contest." MJ smiled assuredly. After thinking it over a few more minutes, Gwen smiled and nodded.

"Alright. You're on." She smiled as MJ grabbed the telephone and dialed a nearby pizza joint. "Yes, hello? I'd like to order 10 large pepperoni, cheese and sausage pizzas with a large size of breadsticks. Yes, that'd be fine. Thank you." MJ smiled as she placed the order and hung up before dialing another restaurant.

Soon, a massive pile of junk foods were on the coffee table in front of them. Aside from the 10 large pizzas, MJ'd also ordered 12 large buckets of fried chicken, 5 orders of Chinese food and 6 orders of tacos.

"Ready Gwen?" MJ asked with a smile to the blonde next to her. Gwen smiled and nodded her head. "I'm ready, MJ." she replied. "Alright. On your mark... get set... GO!!!" MJ declared as both girls began to devour the massive junk food feast in front of them at top speed.
1311221.title: Gwen Stacy

choices: Part of a new commercial she appears in
1312.content: How does she end up in diapers?

1313.title: WG and Diapered

13131.content:
Mary Jane walked into the studio for her first day on a new show. The show was about a 300 pound slob who wears and uses diapers. In order to prepare for the role, MJ had been stuffing herself with junk food and acting slobbishly for a month. She'd also taken to wearing and using thick diapers

The now 300 pound actress slowly walked in, munching loudly on a huge bucket of fried chicken, grease dribbling down her double chin as she slurped and smacked her fingers. She wore a thick Pampers diaper underneath her tight looking pants.

As she headed for her dressing room, MJ noticed a large actress who was to serve as her co-star on the new show. This girl was blond, with blue eyes and looked considerably plumper than MJ. Like the fat redhead, this actress also wore a big diaper under her pants and was currently eating a large chocolate cake sloppily, frosting and crumbs sticking to her round face and full lips.

MJ slowly walked over to her. "Hi, there. I'm Mary Jane Watson. What's your name?" she asked. The girl turned to face MJ and then, opened her mouth. *BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPP!!!*

She let out a massive burp into MJ's face, causing the redhead to cough and gag slightly at the stench. "Name's Breanna Mobley. I'm your co-star." she grunted to Mary Jane as she loudly gobbled down the rest of her cake before licking the plate clean and then tossing it into a nearby trashcan with a massive fart.

Mary Jane didn't know what to think. This girl had clearly been a slob for a long time, probably a lot longer than MJ, given that she was fairly bigger and seemed more adapted to slobby living.

Breanna slowly waddled around MJ, eying her carefully. "You don't look like you've been a slob for very long." She remarked, poking MJ's boulder-sized belly, causing the redhead to feel gas coming up. She winced slightly at the pressure and opened her mouth.

*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRPPPPPP!!!* She belched right into Breanna's face. Breanna was very surprised by this burp. "You're still somewhat small weight wise, but you burp like a true slob." she complimented. "Um... thanks?" MJ replied, unsure how to respond to this.

"You wanna have a burping contest?" Brenna asked after a moment. MJ was surprised by this question. "Um... alright." she finally decided. Brenna led her over to where the food and things were for the cast and crew.

Soon, the two had several bottles of soda in front of them. "We drink as much pop as we can and burp as big and as loud as possible each turn. Whoever burps the biggest, wins." Breanna told MJ, who nodded in understanding.

Breanna went first, grabbing a bottle and chugging it with ease. She wiped her mouth as she tossed it aside. A second later, she opened her mouth. *OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!*

A big burp flew out of her mouth. Breanna finished the burp and then nodded to MJ with a smirk. "Your turn, Red." she smiled. MJ took a deep breath and loudly gulped down a big bottle of root beer. Upon finishing it, Mary Jane felt the gas bubbling up in her belly as it began moving for her mouth. Soon, her cheeks puffed up and she opened her mouth.

*BBBBBBBBBBEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEELLLLLLLLL LLLLLCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCHHHHH!!!* She belched loudly. At that, Breanna frowned in fury. "Oh, it's on, bitch!" she snarled as she grabbed a big bottle of Sprite and loudly chugged and guzzled it in seconds.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!* She burped loudly.

On and on it went, MJ and Breanna chugging down soda after soda, their burps getting bigger and smellier than the last one each time.

*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!*

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEELLLLLLLL LLLLCCCCCCCCH!!!!*

*OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!! !!*

Finally, the duo were down to their last sodas. Breanna went first, chugging down a large Pepsi. Her soda logged belly sloshed and gurgled loudly as it filed up with this soda as well. With a smirk at MJ, Breanna opened her mouth.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!*

Her belch shook the studio floor, nearly causing her and MJ to take a spill. "Top that, you fake slob!" She laughed at MJ. Mary Jane frowned as she grabbed her final bottle, a bottle of Mountain Dew, and very loudly chugged it down at top speed.

A second later, her belly rumbled and gurgled. It jiggled and bounced from all the gas inside it. Slowly, MJ felt the gas building up. Then, she opened her mouth as her cheeks bulged like a chipmunk's.

*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!*

MJ's big bomb of a burp shook the whole studio this time. Several of the show's producers and crew fell onto the floor as a result of that giant burp. MJ smirked at the shocked Breanna. *FFFAAAACCCCEEEE IIITTTTTT, TTTTTTTTTIIIIIIGGGGGGEEEERRR, YYYYOOOOUUUU'VVVVEEEEE JJJJJJUUUUUUSSSSSTTT HHHHHIIIITTTTT THHHEEE JJJAAACCCKKKKPOOOOOTTTT!* She belched loudly to them as they stared at her in shock and disbelief. After a moment, the crowd all clapped and cheered for her.
13131.title: She does so for a role as a diapered slob

1511132222.content:
Kamala had decided to check out a new restaurant in town and ended up in a challenge they were hosting: if she could finish a twenty-ounce steak in under three minutes, she's earn a month of free meals. The young Inhuman had started strong, but was beginning to lose ground as time wore on. Her poor stomach just couldn't keep up. It was then that she thought of her recent experiments with her powers and decided to try something new.

"Embiggen!" Kamala's stomach was the only thing to expand this time and with it, her appetite. She now shoveled the steak in with far more gusto than before as her time slowly wore down. Eventually...
1511132222.title: A new restaurant opens up

choices: The next day Kamala begins cashing in on her free meals.
A month later, Kamala is obese and her powers've been positively affected.
15111322222.content:
Just as Kamala was finishing the challenge as Ms. Marvel, she noticed a bank robbery occurring nearby. Quickly stuffing the rest of her steak into her gullet, Kamala ran outside, her belly bouncing and jiggling. Upon entering the street, Kamala saw Shocker using his gauntlets to brake into the bank's vault.

Normally, Shocker was one of Spider-Man's foes, but Kamala had fought him before and she was sure she could do it again. Quickly, she ran into the bank, her belly bulging visibly. Taking a deep breath, Kamala then leapt from behind a pillar.

"Hold it right there, Shocker!" she shouted, stifling a burp as she did. Shocker whirled around... and stared at the bloated teenage Inhuman superheroine in front of him. Needless to say, Shocker was quite surprised by how much Kamala seemed to have let herself go since their last encounter as he eyed her boulder sized gut.

"You really think you can stop me? You're just a big butterball." He smirked. Kamala frowned. Sure, she looked like she'd been hitting the snacks hard but she hadn't made herself that fat! "That was way outta line, creep!" Kamala snarled as she squared off. Shocker smirked and sent a large blast from his gauntlet at her, Kamala couldn't get out of the way in time and it slammed into her new belly. To her shock, Kamala didn't feel the blast like she would've had she remained thin. Instead... it tickled and felt good.

Shocker was just as surprised as Kamala was. "How'd you-?" He began when, "EMBIGGEN!!!" Kamala shouted, enlarging her fist to the size of a wrecking ball and smashing it into Shocker, knocking him back into the wall. Unfortunately, Shocker's padded suit, in addition to protecting him from his own weapons, could also protect him from blows delivered by opponents.

"Gonna have to d better than that, kid!" He jeered as he began to run away with his loot. Kamala smirked and got an idea. Taking a deep breath, Kamala began running full speed for Shocker. Confused at first, Shocker then got his answer as to what Kamala was planning on when she scrambled up a fallen pillar and leapt off it and fell towards him, belly first. "BELLY FLOP!" She shouted, squishing him under her just as the police arrived.

With a slight effort, Kamala rolled off the knocked out Shocker and stood up as the officers came up and handcuffed Shocker. "Great job, Ms. Marvel." said one officer, his eyes only slightly eyeing her gut. "No prob, officers." Kamala smiled as she watched them take Shocker away. Then, she went back to the restaurant, where the owner was waiting for her.

"Congratulations, Ms. Marvel! You won the challenge before leaving to stop that villain! You've won a month of free meals!" He told her, causing Kamala to smile in delight. "This month is gonna be wickedly awesome." she thought to herself with a grin as she rubbed and pinched her belly fat.
15111322222.title: A villain intervenes. Ms. Marvel's new bell...

choices: Ms. Marvel gives her fans what they want. Embiggen!
151113222221.content:
Ms. Marvel came back the next day and ordered the first of her free meals, consisting of three huge steaks, some fried chicken, a platter of shrimp, and three sundaes for dessert. As before, she ate as much as she could and used her powers when she felt herself reaching her limit. "Embiggen!" Her belly expanded and enabled her to dive into her shrimp platter with gusto. Everyone cheered at the sight of her engorged gut and she grinned through her mouthful of seafood before moving onto her sundaes.

Everyone watched in awe as Kamala proceeded to combine the trio of ice cream treats into one huge one and chug it. Their cheers grow louder as they focused on her huge stomach. They begin to chant "embiggen" over and over, prompting her to use her powers once more. What could she do?
151113222221.title: The next day Kamala begins cashing in on her fr...

choices: Kamala goes back the next day and eats only desserts
1511132222211.content:
After embiggening her belly again, Kamala noticed a large table filled with desserts. Large cakes, numerous pies, cookies, doughnuts and ice cream sundaes all stood on the table, waiting to be devoured.

Without another word, Kamala, with a slight waddle, moved to the table. As her fans watched, Kamala grabbed the first chocolate cake and stuffed it whole into her mouth, stretching her cheeks and mouth considerably. She chewed for a few minutes and then swallowed with a giant gulp, a large bulge going down her throat.

Kamala then turned back to the table. "Dessert time!" She cheered as she began inhaling the food like crazy as her fans cheered her on. As she did, the owner watched in delight as Kamala dumped an entire Boston cream pie into her mouth from the tin.

"Sir, aren't you worried, her appetite'll put us out of business?" asked the chief. "No I'm not. Besides, with her here for the month, we'll likely get twice as many costumers." The owner smiled, nodding to several people who were filming Kamala's pig out.

Kamala kept eating and eating. She plowed through the cakes in minutes, the pies were inhaled soon after and the doughnuts disappeared down her gullet within minutes of being plopped in. The same held true for the cookies.

Kamala's brown belly kept getting bigger and bigger as she kept eating and eating. Finally, she licked the last ice cream sundae's bowl clean and tossed it onto the pile of empty and licked clean trays, plates and bowls, her tummy the size of a wrecking ball.

*OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!* She belched loudly a second later, her stomach grumbling from both delight and dismay of being so full.

"Did you enjoy your meal, Ms. Marvel?" the owner asked. "Yeah. It *UUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPP!!!* was really, really good!" Kamala smiled after burping loudly. Then, her belly grumbled loudly.

"But I think I got a tummy ache now." she added sheepishly. "See you tomorrow." Kamala said as she waddled out of the restaurant, her belly jiggling and sloshing loudly as she headed for home, burping and farting loudly while she did.

choices: The contest begins. In the end, Sue wins.
The contest starts. Jen wins in the end.
154321111.content:
Sue Storm, the Invisible Woman, had recently taken to binge eating by using her powers to render herself invisible and eat massive amounts of food. After a few weeks, she went to a buffet and saw something.

There, with a massive tray of food, was She-Hulk, a former member of the FF. Upon seeing all the food on her friend's tray, Sue smirked to herself. This was going to be fairly easy. She thought to herself as she slowly made her way to Jen's table.

Jen was just about to sink her teeth into a large turkey leg when, to her surprise, it rose up by itself and something began eating it as it hovered. Slowly, the turkey leg was chomped clean until only the bone remained. It then dropped onto her tray with a clatter.

"Weird." Jen remarked as she calmly grabbed a slice of cake, only for that to be yanked from her hand and that same strange unknown thing began munching on it until it was all gone. It was then that Jen slowly began to put two and two together. With a sly smirk she watched as her invisible thief began devouring the entire ham she had taken.

"Wonder if Sue would be willing to take me on in a belching contest?" She began aloud. The ham paused mid chomp, now almost completely devoured as a massive chunk was missing from the middle. "Nah. Sue really isn't the kinda girl to take part in something like that. She's too much of a lady." Jen continued, grateful she was the only one in the buffet aside from the workers in the kitchen and Sue.

When Sue still didn't expose herself, Jen smirked. "In fact, I'll bet she's a big chicken who wouldn't even wanna try and take me on in a burping contest!" She added. Finally, Sue couldn't stand it for another moment. She willed herself to become visible again.

As she did, Jen's eyes went wide. Sue had doubled in size weight wise. Her face was round and doughy with a double chin. Her body was big and plump. She had a large belly and a fairly jumbo butt. Sue glared at her jade green friend.

"Jennifer Walters, I accept your challenge! I will prove I can out-burp you!" She snarled as she kept chomping on the hambone in her meaty hand. Jen smirked as she allowed Sue to plop onto the chair beside her. "Bring it on." she chuckled.

155211331311.title: Pampers

choices: Kitty takes a normal sized dump in her diaper. She also wets it.
Kitty massively poops and pees her diaper.
1552113313111.content:
One day, Kitty was scrolling through the internet on her laptop when she found an article that interested her. Curious, she clicked on the site's webpage to read the rest of said article.

"Like, 'The Wearing and Using the same diaper for one week challenge. Wear use a diaper of your choice for one week and you could, like, totally win $50,000 dollars! Just send us either pictures of you in your diaper each day, Monday through Sunday or you can send daily videos via this website' webcam. Remember, you cannot use the toilet until after the contest and you are not to remove the diaper until then. This includes if you take a bath or shower. If you wish, you may have a family member or friend help you. Good luck and hope to see your stinky diaper on the site soon'!" she read aloud, her eyes wide in delight.

"Like, 50 million dollars for just wearing and using the same diaper for a week?!? That's totally kinda cool." she smiled. With that, Kitty quickly went to the grocery store and headed to the diaper section. "Like, if I'm gonna end up in the same diaper for a week, I'd better get a brand that can hold that long." she remarked as she eyed the different options very carefully.

Luvs. Goodnites. Huggies. All of those were good brands, Kitty knew from the ads from over the years. Then, she noticed the Pampers. "Like, these should be good. I've heard they're, like, totally absorbent and have heavy duty protection." Kitty remarked as she picked up the jumbo sized box of Pampers diapers and went to the checkout line. The cashier seemed shocked a teenage girl was buying diapers, but said nothing as Kitty paid for them and went back the institute.

Once in her room alone, Kitty took off her pants and panties. Carefully, she taped the thick Pampers diaper on and stood up, watching it. It really did feel comfy with the thick padding. Kitty experimented walking by taking a few steps. She waddled slightly due to her new diaper's thickness, but it wasn't really visible right now.

"Like, let's totally get started." Kitty smiled as she found the webcam's features and pushed 'Record'. "Like, hi there. This is Kitty Pryde. I'm 15 years old and I'm, like, totally going for that $50,000 by taking part in the 'Wearing and Using the same diaper for a week challenge'." She smiled. Then, she felt a rumbling in her lower tummy.

"Uh oh. Like, looks like I totally gotta go poopy." Kitty giggled as she squatted and began grunting and straining, her face turning lobster red as she did this.

Then,
1552113313111.title: she diapers herself

Once she was done, the diaper was a faint shade of yellow on the front and the back sagged down a bit. Kitty gently put her hand on the back of her diaper to see how much was done, and found that the lump filled out her whole hand.

Kitty: "Oh boy, Like, I hope I don't to go as much as that for the rest of the week, or this Pamper totally won't last till then."

Kitty then...

155211331311121.content:
Kitty decided to make room in her Pamper by squishing down the massive poop. So, she plopped down onto her bottom, smooshing the poop down well, wincing slightly at the loud squish it made, only to then realize, much to her surprise, that she enjoyed the poop on her butt. So, she shifted herself around a little more, smiling as she felt the wet, squishy and smelly poo rub on her butt.

"Like, that so totally feels good. Just hope I don't get too bad a diaper rash later." Kitty giggled as she stood up and turned back to the web cam. "Okay. That's, like, totally it for today. I'm Kitty Pryde signing off. See you guys tomorrow!" she smiled as she signed off. After she did, she felt the load of poop again. Due to her squishing it, it was flatter now but it still filled her hand.

Kitty smiled as she tugged on her pants, wanting to see how her pants looked with her Pamper on. They bulged a bit, but, to Kitty's relief, this didn't seem too obvious. "Like, the last thing I want is Scott and the others to totally see me in a diapee. They'll totally laugh at me. I'd, like, so totally better be careful until Sunday." Kitty told herself as she patted her diapered butt thoughtfully.

At that moment, Rogue came in. "Hey, Kitty." she said to her roommate, teammate and best friend. "Like, hey Rogue." Kitty smiled, trying to keep cool and grateful she'd stuffed her other Pampers under her bed. "What're ya doin'?" asked the southern goth girl as she picked up a horror novel and began reading it.

"Oh, like, totally nothing." Kitty said quickly. Then, Rogue wrinkled her nose as an odor hit it. "Oh mah god! What died in here?" she asked. Kitty blushed in embarrassment. She'd had so much fun playing in her diaper, she had forgotten to mask the stench with the air freshener she'd bought as well.

"Like, I... uh... totally farted Rogue. That's all. I probably had too many baked beans last night." Kitty said quickly, thankful she had eaten two helpings of said beans at last night's cookout. Rogue was quiet for a moment and then nodded and smiled.

"Yeah, Ah guess you're right. We told ya they're bound to make ya gassy as a balloon." she smirked. "Like, you guys totally did." Kitty agreed as she sat down, being careful not to squish her poo loudly and picked up a magazine to read as well.

As she did, Kitty couldn't help but wonder something, "Like, I totally wonder what'd happen if I load up on burgers and baked beans at Sunday's cookout, which'll celebrate the start of summer break? How much will I poop then?" she wondered with a thoughtful smile as she and Rogue kept reading their respective choices until dinnertime.
155211331311121.title: squished down the load in an attempt to make room

choices: Kitty convinces Rogue to join her. The duo make another video the next morning
1552113313111211.content:
The next day after breakfast, Kitty went to her and Rogue's room to post video #2 for the contest. Once she'd stripped to only her bra and still full and somewhat wet diaper, she turned on the camera.

"Like, hi there diaper lovers. Kitty Pryde here again and today I'm gonna make a poopie in my still full diaper for you." Kitty giggled as she squatted down and began grunting and straining. Slowly, the 15-year-old mutant felt the pressure building up in her backside. After a few more seconds, *PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTT!*

With that massive fart, Kitty felt the poop enter her diaper. Thankfully, thanks to her first poop the day before, Kitty was expecting the big dump. Sure enough, once again, it completely filled her hand. With a grin, Kitty turned to face the camera.

"Like, looks like I totally made a big stinky-winky in my diapee like a wittle girlie." she giggled like a baby girl as she showed off her even bulgier diaper to the camera. Then, Kitty began to waddle around the room, her diaper bouncing and jiggling behind her as she babbled like a toddler.

At that moment, Rogue was coming to their room when she heard Kitty's baby talk. "Baba doba gloobie globa poopie dapa." Kitty was babbling. Frowning, Rogue peeked through the keyhole and saw a surprising sight. There, laying on her back in only a bra and a full diaper, was Kitty. The brunette was showing her full diaper off to her laptop's camera, to Rogue's bewilderment and shock.

After a few minutes, Kitty decided to wrap things up. "Like, that's all from me today. Tune in tomorrow for more of 'Poopy Kitty'!" She giggled as she farted in her diaper before signing off. She was just tugging her pants on when Rogue came in.

"Oh! Hey Rogue. Like, um... what's up?" she asked innocently. "Ya can cut the hemming and hawin', Kitty. Ah saw ya through the keyhole." admitted Rogue. Kitty blushed bright tomato red. "What were ya doin' that stuff for, anyway?" Rogue wanted to know.

Kitty took a deep breath and began to explain. "Like, yesterday I found an ad that offered $50 million for just wearing and using the same diaper for a week and so I totally decided to enter it." Kitty confessed. Rogue was quiet for a moment. Then, she smiled.

"Alright, Ah'm in." she beamed. "Uh, what?" Kitty asked in surprise. "Unless y'all want me to tell the others 'bout your diaper exploits." Rogue offered with a smirk. After a moment, Kitty sighed and nodded. "Okay. Starting tomorrow, you're, like, totally my partner." She agreed as Rogue smiled happliy.

Kitty then eyed her reflection in the nearby mirror. As an experiment, she shook her butt at the mirror, jiggling the sagging lump in her diaper. This caused Kitty to giggle in amusement as she did it again, a little more forcefully to get an extra jiggle in her poop.

"Like, I totally made a big poopy in my diapee like a baby girl!" She giggled, covering her mouth with her hand as she shook her butt at her mirror again. As she stood up, still giggling, Kitty got an idea as she logged off after posting her first video on the site. She knew that none of the X-Men or New Recruits were present in the mansion. Professor X had gone to Washington for the week to meet with government officials while Wolverine took the other X-Kids and NRs on a survival training session during that same amount of time. Storm and Beast, meanwhile, had accompanied Xavier. Kitty had been allowed to hang back due to having a cold until yesterday evening. The others had decided to let her stay home to be on the safe side.

"Like, I totally have the whole mansion to myself!" Kitty squealed, jumping up and down, her full diaper bouncing with her. After a second, Kitty, clad in only her diaper and a t-shirt, went downstairs. She reached the den where a flat screen TV was waiting for her. Quickly, the 15-year-old plopped onto the sofa and turned the TV on. Finding a cartoon she liked, Kitty snuggled into the sofa and her full diaper, and began watching it. After a half-hour, Kitty's stomach rumbled loudly, causing her to remember she should grab dinner.

"Like, tummy hungry. Me gotta fill belly welly." she giggled like a toddler as she stood up and headed for the kitchen. Upon reaching it, she found a massive chocolate cake with a note on it. Noticing the note, Kitty grabbed it and read it aloud.

"Like, 'Dear Kitty. I made this chocolate cake for you as dessert for this week. I also made sure to pick up your favorite foods during my shopping trip the other day while out picking up your cough syrup. Hope you enjoy the cake. See you in a week, Love, Storm'." She read aloud. "Like, that was so totally cool of Ororo." Kitty smiled as she went to the refrigerator and opened it.

Soon, Kitty had whipped up a normal sized meal consisting of a medium steak with steak sauce, fries, a soda, salad and a slice of the plump chocolate cake. "Attention Diaper control: stopping to pick up supplies for a very hungry tummy." Kitty giggled as she picked up her fork.

155212.title: Weight Gain

1552121.content:
Slowly the sun rose above the Xavier institute. One by one the students woke up. Young Kitty Pryde also known as Shadowcat was no exception. Slowly she rubbed her eyes and looked around her own room.
When she first got here she did't really knew what to think. She was a mutant. Most people were't too fond of mutants. They made that very clear. Then she went living here. But to be honest it was't so bad here. This was her new home and to be honest she felt very good here. It felt like home. All other persons here felt like... well family. Sure there were rules, and if you broke them there was a chance you were punished but that's everywhere.
But what was the best thing was that her powers were here not strange or different. Everyone here had powers. Perhaps not the same like her but still they had something special that made them 1 force. The X-men.
Slowly the young teen sat up straight.

"Ah that was a good night sleep. Now I would like some breakfast. I gotta admit I'm pretty hungry. Like, don't you agree Rogue? Rogue?"

She took a look at the bed of her roommate and saw it was empty.

"Is she up already? Ah well. Like, it doesn't matter."

She quickly grabbed some clothes, got dressed and walked downstairs. She walked right through the kitchen door and looked around. No one was there.

"No one here. Probably enjoying their free day. But breakfast totally is, like, the most important meal of the day, and I'm starved."

She soon grabbed some bread and made four peanut butter jelly sandwiches and a big glass of orange juice for herself and started her breakfast. The tasted pretty good. Soon the sandwiches disappeared in her belly. She let out a soft girly: "burp!" and giggled. But for some strange reason she noticed she was still hungry. She grabbed the box of cereal and poured a big bowl full of cereal, whole milk and also poured some sugar over it. She just liked cereal more when there was a lot of sugar on top of it. Some others told her that there was already sugar in the cereal but telling her that was a lost cause. She just liked it more with sugar. And with no body else around she could do all she liked without receiving criticism. But after her first bowl, she noticed she still didn't feel full and took a second bowl before she was really full.

"Wow. Guess I was more hungry then I thought. Ah well I'm a growing girl after all."

She lifted her shirt a bit and looked at her belly and slowly rubbed it.

"Hm hmm. That feels good. Well I'm really full now."

155212132.content:
Kitty slowly got up still rubbing her belly wondering what to do with her free day and decided to watch some T.V. Perhaps a funny cartoon or sitcom. Problem was that a lot of others thought that those shows were a bit childish and rather watched something else. Still she wondered why she suddenly was so hungry. She was so lost in thoughts she bumped against Wolverine.

"Watch were you're going half pined."

"Oh! Sorry Wolverine. I was a bit lost in thoughts. What are you going to do?"

"Take my bike for a ride. Sometimes a man just wants to be on his own without kids around him."

Kitty looked over her shoulder while Wolverine walked further. She had sometimes mixed thoughts about him. He sometimes acted a bit grumpy and sometimes had a bit of a temper, but at the same time she knew he could be very nice. He would never hurt her or the other kids around here. If someone would attack her or one of the other kids, she would almost feel sorry for that person. Wolverine would go totally berserk at that that person. So he was nice and friendly but did't always show it.

She reached the living room . No one inside. She wondered why all the others were. Maybe outside playing. Well better for her. Then she could watch T.V without anyone else asking to change the channel. She watched T.V for about one and a half hour but suddenly noticed she was hungry again. She did't understand why. It was't like she did anything other then normal. She did't used anything. So why did she suddenly had such a big appetite. Perhaps puberty? Growth spurt? She must admit she would like it to grow a bit taller and got some more female curves.
She walked into the kitchen and after looking around for some time she found three bars of chocolate, on box of cookies, two family sized bag of chips and a two liter bottle of coke. She carried it all back to the T.V. As soon as her butt hit the couch she started stuffing the first chocolate bar in her mouth. She quickly finished him and started on the second. After that one was gone she devoured the third one in a record time and drank some of the coke. after that she started on the cookies. Eating them one by one taking sips of coke every now and then. After they were gone she ripped open the first bag of chips and pushed them in her mouth. To much focused on the T.V shows to really notice how full she was getting. She even finished the second bag of chips. After that she emptied the bottle of coke and let out a huge belch.
The teen laid lazy on the couch. Crumbs of cookies and chips around her mouth. Her belly a bit bloated thanks to her current snacks. She Finally turned the T.V of and looked at the empty box, two empty bags, some empty wrapper and one empty bottle.

"Men did I eat all that? I did't even notice."

The she suddenly felt how full she really felt.

"All right. Now I believe I ate it all."

She slowly lifted her shirt a bit showing her bloated belly. She pushed with her finger a bit in her belly button but finally started rubbing her belly and it did work. Slowly the full feeling got less. She lazy kept laying at the couch slowly she closed her eyes and fell asleep.

1552121321.title: She wakes up

15521213211.content:
Kitty slowly opened her eyes. Suddenly she remembered why she was in the living room. She saw the remains of her snacks. She fast stuffed the empty bags and wrappers in the empty box of cookies and threw it in the garbage bin.
She'd really made a pig of herself. But no one had been around to see it so it didn't really matter. She brushed the crumbs off her face. She suddenly noticed all the crumbs on her shirt and a few chocolate stains. While she stuffed the chocolate bars in her mouth, some small pieces fell of and had melted causing some brown stains. She walked upstairs straight to her room. She pulled off her shirt and looked for a new clean one. A minute later she walked back downstairs in a clean shirt.
Suddenly Nightcrawler appeared in a cloud of smoke.

"Oh Kurt! What's up?"

"Hello Kitty. I just wanted to tell you we gonna have lunch. It's such nice weather so we decided to eat lunch outside. Do you come too?"

Kitty thought about her recent snack. She really shouldn't. If she kept eating like this she would turn into a blimp in a few days. At the other hand she would like a bite to eat. How was that possible? She should have a tummy ache from eating so much food. Was something totally wrong with her? Perhaps she should ask Charles Xavier, or else Hank McCoy.
They were both the two smartest people she knew. Or the smartest mutants. But according to Charles Xavier mutants were people who were just a bit more evolved. Perhaps one of them knew what was going on with her.
She thought again about the lunch. Lunch did sound good and she didn't had a weight problem yet so one day of overeating wouldn't change that. Would it?

"All right. I'll come too. Lunch sounds good."

A minute later she came outside. Everyone was sitting at a table or on the field. One mutant ran around in her dog form with a sandwich between her jaws. She went sitting next to Kurt and grabbed two sandwiches and a glass of orange juice.

"What have you been doing all day? I have't seen you?" Rogue asked.

"Oh nothing much. Watched some T.V."

And also made a total pig out of myself, she thought but she didn't say that. She stopped thinking that quickly since Jean or Xavier could hear that thought in her mind. However they probably wouldn't tell anyone. But still.

"Have you seen Wolverine?" Kurt asked.

"Yeah I've seen him. Don't go bother looking for him. He went away on his bike. If he doesn't want to be found... you don't find him."

"Unless you have someone who's good at following tracks. Like Sabretooth." Spyke said.

"Oh I really hate that guy. He's so scary and mean," Kitty said.

"You hate him?" Kurt asked. "That goes double for Wolverine."

"Or even triple," Spyke said. "Those two really hate each other."

Kitty already finished her first two sandwiches and grabbed two more. She hoped no one would notice how much she consumed.

She looked at her side and saw Scott and Jean in the shadow of a tree. Eating and kissing. She felt a bit jealous. She would also like it to have a boyfriend. Well you had Lance who seemed to like her. But she didn't like him. Every time when Lance was in a bad mood he made an earthquake. And his friends weren't really people she liked to hang out with. Especially Toad. He ate insects and had the hygiene of a dead pig. Also the place they lived looked like it hadn't been cleaned in ages. What probably was the case.
She sighed and grabbed another two sandwiches.

"Wow Kitty. That are you fifth and sixth sandwich," Kurt said. "Are you feeling all right?"

"Yeah. I guess I'm just a little bit... hungry."

"If I would touch you long enough… would I then also gain some of your weight, or only your appetite?" Rogue asked with a naughty grin.

"You'll never find out, you rechargeable battery," Kitty said grinding her teeth.

But after her sixth sandwich she stopped eating. She must admit she did start to feel full.

After lunch

1552121321131.content:
Kitty walked to her room and sat on her bed. She was a bit angry at what Rogue said. Maybe Rogue just made a joke, but she said what Kitty was scared of. If she did keep eating like this she would lose her body for sure. She liked her body. Sure she would like it to have some more rounder female curves and to grow a few inches but she was slender and she was proud of that. She didn't want her flat stomach to turn into a overinflated beach ball. Then Rogue would really have something to laugh about.

She fell down on her bed and looked at the ceiling, thinking about what could have caused her hunger. Puberty? Sure that could cause some hunger but not this much. Did she ate anything strange or drink something strange? She couldn't think of anything. Not anything she didn't had before. At least not that she could remember. But she wasn't sure. Of course if she knew this would happen she would have put a little more attention to what she had been eating and doing.

Slowly her hand went right through her drawer and came back with a bag of candy. She liked it to chew on something when she was thinking. She kept pushing one piece of candy in her mouth after another and didn't notice how much she ate. At least not until she noticed the bag was empty. Had she eaten the entire bag? It had been pretty full. She looked at her alarm clock.

"This late already? Better get down or I'll be late for dinner. Hm I could of course...."

The next moment she faded right through her bed, through the floor and dropped out of the ceiling landing perfectly.

"So I can go down being perfect on time."

Slowly all other members gathered at the table for dinner.

"What's for dinner?" Kurt asked.

"Turkey, mashed potatoes and green beans." Storm answered.

Kitty looked with open mouth. She loved Turkey, and mashed potatoes. Green beans were fine but not special. Suddenly she knew the growing rumbly feeling in her belly. She wanted to eat. No! She wanted to pig out.

Pull yourself together Kitty she said to herself. You can't go making a pig of yourself. You're a human not a pig. She smiled a second at the thought that her name Kitty was also the name of a animal.

However she did grab a lot of food. She was able to eat well mannered. Ate without dropping anything on her clothes. But the food went down pretty fast.Turkey with greasy gravy and mashed potatoes went down so fast she barely had time to chew. After her first plate she took a second, and even a third. During her third plate she started noticing others were looking at her.

"What?" She asked. "Do I have something on my face?"

"Are you feeling all right?" Storm asked. "This is already your third plate. Normally you never eat so much."

"I just love Turkey and mashed potatoes," Kitty mumbled.

"You maybe do but your clothes don't," Rogue whispered.

Kitty wanted to give her a mean look but saw she had been right. Her belly was, thanks to all snacking and not yet digested food, pretty round and poked out between her pants and shirt. She blushed and hoped no one else had seen it.
After the last piece of food went past her lips she decided she was full for now. But she had't counted that Storm came with cake. She cut the cake in perfect slices. Kitty couldn't help herself. She grabbed with both hands a slice of cake and pushed them in her mouth. Suddenly she realized what she had done and looked around. Most people looked a bit shocked.

"I... I don't think I'm feeling well. Sorry I... I'm going to bed."

While she ran to her room she noticed she really didn't feel good. She had a terrible tummy ache. No wonder if you realized how much food was in it. She felt terrible. Her belly made gurgling noises in protest of being so incredibly full. She was in so much pain. In her room she quickly unbuttoned her jeans. At least it took some of the pressure off her belly. But still she was in a lot of pain and was hearing constant gurgling noises from her belly. Suddenly she remembered how good it felt if she rubbed her belly. She put both hands on her belly and started rubbing. Her belly felt kind of hard, like a bag of wet cement. Probably because of all the food inside it. She started rubbing her round belly. It did feel good and the pain did become a bit less. She continued rubbing her belly. It felt so good she didn't even notice that she fell asleep.

Kitty slowly opened her eyes. What day was it? That's right. It was Sunday. A nice free day. Then she noticed a familiar feeling. Hunger. Her belly rumbled and wanted food. Even after having a terrible tummy ache last night. But that was yesterday. That food had digested by now. She wanted food.

"How can I be this hungry? I don't understand. I really need to ask the professor what's wrong with me. Or else Mr. McCoy. He's smart. But I'm so hungry. What should I do first? Hmmm, guess talking with the professor is easier on a full stomach. Besides it's not like he's going anywhere. I can take a breakfast and ask him afterwards. Good idea."

She slowly walked downstairs. She hoped she didn't see anyone. She didn't liked her sudden hunger attacks but still she ate. But no body else needed to know that. She walked further and listened. She heard a lot of voices outside. Well it was a nice sunny day. Perhaps she could go swimming. If the water was warm enough. It would be a nice chance to wear her new bikini.
In the kitchen she saw Wolverine.

"Hi Wolverine. How was yesterday?"

"It was fine. Sometimes I just need to blow of some steam kiddo. But I need to work on my bike. If anyone needs me I'll be in the garage."

As soon if he left, she grabbed bread and peanut butter and jelly and made five peanut butter jelly sandwiches just for herself. She also poured in a tall glass of orange juice and fast stuffed the sandwiches in her mouth. They tasted good. She must admit that. That was why she was sad they were gone that fast. She decided to finish it with a few bowls of cereal with a lot of sugar. But instead of the two bowls from yesterday she ate three entire bowls. It seemed like it only got worse and worse everyday. This way she soon would be a blimp.
Suddenly she saw her belly poking out between her pants and shirt. She sometimes wore shirts that showed her belly but not in this way. And those times her belly was flat. Not round. She tried to pull her shirt down but it rode up again.

"Stupid shirt. I wish someone washed it in too hot water. But I know that's probably not what happened."

She ran back to her room and looked in her closet for a bigger shirt. She soon found one made sure it hide her belly. She brushed her hair a bit and decided she looked presentable enough and ran downstairs.

15521213211311111.content:
She stood outside the office of professor Xavier and softly knocked on the door and waited.

"Come in," She heard.

She faded through the door. She saw professor Xavier behind his desk and also Storm. Storm looked doubt full at her like if she knew something was wrong with her. She also saw Beast. It was sill a bit strange for her to see her old teacher with blue fur and claws but knew very well he had a heart made of gold and would rather fight with words and science then with his muscles. But if he needed to do that he would.

"Ah Kitty. Nice to see you. Why do you come to see me?"

"If it's about the cake don't worry," Storm said. "I've made plenty more. Besides you seemed to feel bad after…"

"No it's not that. But I did feel bad afterwards but that's not it. I seemed to have suddenly since yesterday a huge appetite."

"I don't think that's something to worry about Kitty. If you're hungry you just need to eat. You're a growing girl." Professor Xavier said calmly.

"No professor! It's not just a bit more. It's a lot more! I seem to don't have control! It started yesterday," Kitty said and started a list about what she all had consumed yesterday until the two slices of cake and the terrible tummy ache afterwards. "And today I woke up with a terrible hunger. I already ate five peanut butter jelly sandwiches and three bowls of cereal. Being a bit hungry I can understand that but this is not normal. Not for me. I have a small appetite. Now I have a appetite like The Blob."

"I see. That is strange. It seemed you can suddenly eat about three times what you normally eat. Just suddenly?"

"Well since yesterday morning. Could it have something to do with my mutant powers?"

"I never heard mutant powers effect someones appetite. Except maybe like someone like The Blob. I don't see any reason why your body would suddenly want more food. Did you do or eat anything strange?"

"Not that I can think of no."

"I believe it might have something to do with her mind," Beast said. "When your stomach is full it gives a sign to your brain so it knows it's full. If your appetite suddenly is so out of control it might be that someone is playing a trick at you. playing with your mind."

"You mean a telepath? Like professor X?" Kitty asked.

"Or Jean," Professor X said. "But I did't do anything and I know Jean would't do anything like this."

"Perhaps Emma frost? The white witch?" Storm suggested.

"She could do that," Professor X said. "But I seriously doubt it. Why would she do that? give Kitty a bigger appetite or making her gain weight I don't see how that would help her. That's not her style. But perhaps another telepath. This seems like just teasing."

"Just teasing?" Kitty yelled. I'm at risk of losing my body. I already have one shirt that's to small and… I don't wanna get fat."

The other three looked at her

1552121321131111131.content:
"Well I'm afraid there isn't much I can do." Professor X said. "I'm not even sure if it does have anything to do with your mind. If you really ate that much… I mean if your hungry or not your stomach doesn't grow. So I'm not sure how it can hold so much food all at once. You should have been throwing up."

Kitty shivered. She hated throwing up.

"But Kitty I'm here to help you. I will see if I can find anything. But at the moment I'm not sure I or anyone can do anything."

"But what can I do now. I just… can't control myself when I'm getting hungry. Like I'm two Kitty's. This one I'm now, and one that only wants to fill her belly. Not really caring about anything else. Not really caring what it is as long if it's edible. That's gonna ruin my perfect figure."

"I understand you don't want that but what do you want us to do?" Storm asked. "Change your appetite back to normal? We would love to but we don't know how. But we will look if we can find anything until then…"

Kitty walked out with a bowed head. Like someone who had been sentenced to death. She know what soon would happen. Soon she would be hungry again and ate a large meal. She could try to stop it, but was aware that it wouldn't do any good. She knew her hunger kept growing and growing until she couldn't control it and she stuffed herself. She might as well just eating large meals. Eating large meals would make her gain but maybe keep her hunger enough under control so she didn't made a total pig of herself. Otherwise Rogue would really have something to tease her with.

This is how it all started. Kitty did what she could trying to eat enough so her hungry side wouldn't take over. It did work most of the time. Lucky for her it was summer vacation. At school she wasn't allowed to eat during classes. However the eating of large meals did take a toll on her body. Slowly she started gaining all over her body.

155212132113111113111.content:
Kitty just woke up and rubbed her stomach. She had gained a lot of weight the past time. Of course everyone else started to notice. Kitty hadn't told anyone else about her hunger attacks except for Kurt. Professor X, Beast and Storm did their best to not let anyone else notice her problem by giving her some extra food she could consume in her room without anyone else knowing it.

Why did this happened to her? Who did this. Was it really a telepath? Then where was he? At school? Or was it a telepath or something else? Perhaps a mutant? Maybe just a disease? That would probably be the best option. In that case she wasn't alone and it was obvious it wasn't her fault. And who knows? Perhaps they would find a cure. If there was a cure.
She stretched herself once and looked in her mirror. She really liked her mirror. She took it from home. It was a full length mirror so she could see her whole body in it. When she was a little girl she could spend hours in front of it. Dressing herself up. Many times in her mother's clothes, wearing her mother's make-up.

She took off her night shirt and looked at her naked body. Her new potbelly. But when she looked higher she noticed some thing. Her boobs. She slowly put her hands on them and squeezed softly a bit. They were bigger. A least a entire cup size. She looked carefully at her body. The extra weight at her butt made it more curvy. The same went for her thighs. Even her arms gained some of the weight.

She know some people gained around their waist and other in their butt and thighs but it seemed she gained all over her body. Well that wasn't so bad. But the more she looked at her body, the better she felt. Those extra pounds. It didn't look so bad at here. Gave her a bit more female look while her face was still as pretty as before giving her something… cute. All that eating made her gain weight but had that been a bad thing? It didn't look that bad at her. She never would have realized this if she would't have gained. Perhaps she would look even better with even more pounds. Would she really gain on purpose? That was crazy. On the other hand why not? She realized it didn't matter at all. She would gain anyway. On purpose of not. The calories of those huge meals need to go somewhere. She would gain anyway. But perhaps that wasn't so bad. Was fat unhealthy? Well tell that to those girls who smoked a dozen cigarettes each day. Or the boys who drank half a dozen beers each day. Or the ones who used drugs. It was all wrong. Well those beers weren't really bad as long if you didn't drink to much of it.

"Besides those health problems only come when your dangerously overweight. I'm not near that. I'm just a bit chubby. Well I won't be for long. I'll gain weight everyday. I might as well enjoy it. Why is becoming fat so bad? I mean, like, there's anorexia everywhere or people totally starving in Africa."

She softly stroke with her hands over her new curves.

"That's decided. I'm gonna gain weight. Well I was gonna do that anyway but now I'm gonna like it."

Plump

Fat

or

1552121321131111131112.title: Skip another week

15521213211311111311122.content:
Kitty was sitting on her bed, softly poking her finger in her belly. She really had gotten fat the past week. She kept eating huge meals, not really caring what it was. At least it stopped her from losing control and eat everything in sight. Some of the others thought it was a bit strange. It was obvious she gained a lot of weight in a short amount of time. But at the other hand she liked it.

Her wobbling butt, and her rubbing thighs. Also her upper arms got flabby. Her cheeks were now pink and puffy and she had a second chin now. Her chest was bigger and of course her belly had taken a lot of the weight. She stuffed her belly swollen, bloated and round at every meal. It always shrunk a bit after the food digested, but then there was more fat added to the rest of her body. And her belly was bigger then before the stuffing.

Softly she poked her belly button. Her deep belly button. Before she started gaining she didn't had such a deep bellybutton. She enjoyed her new deep belly button and her new flab. It was soft and squishy. Also were warm and felt kind of nice. It was even fun to play with. She liked playing with it but that was only after the food had been digested. That meant she would soon be hungry again. After she had eaten her belly was round and stuffed like a balloon and kind of hard and less fun to play with since it was usually too full to bounce up and down rapidly.

Suddenly the door opened and Storm walked in with a bag and got out three big pizzas.

"Here you go," Storm said. "This should be enough to keep you full until dinner. I hope."

"Thanks Storm. I really appreciate it. But I really need to eat. I mean if I don't eat my hunger takes over. And then another Kitty takes over. The only way to stop her from taking over is eating."

"I feel so bad for you. Before Professor X found me I lived on the street. I was hungry a lot of the time. I know it's not fun to be hungry. But what you have is even worse. You're hungry and gaining like crazy."

"Well, do Beast and Professor X have any idea what happened to me what caused this?"

"If they did they would have told you. Don't you think? They don't have a idea. Perhaps you're right and it does have something to do with you mutation. Being able to pass through walls and things. I never heard of something like that but at the other hand how many people can go through walls? But it does't make sense. Why would you mutation cause you to get a huge appetite, while all others have a normal appetite?"

"I don't know. Do you think I like it?" Kitty asked with a very full mouth.

"Well no. However you do seem less stressed and less sad about your weight gain. Perhaps it is possible someone else is doing this. The question is: who is it? and : Why does he do it? I don't seem why he would do this. Or perhaps it's just a prank. Did you make some enemies?"

"Not that I know of," Kitty mumbled with her still full mouth.

"Well I got some work to do. See you later."

"See you later Storm. And thanks for the pizzas."

She happily munched on her pizzas. She was fine with gaining weight now, but Storm didn't need to know that.

Begins feeding Kitty the pizza somewhat forcefully

155212132113111113111223.title: Something else (your choice)

choices: On the way to the clothing store
1552121321131111131112232.content:
Kitty finally wolfed the last piece of pizza down. The next moment her pants button popped off, flying to the other end of the room. The next moment her zipper was forced all the way down, letting Kitty belly flow out like a river. Kitty smiled seeing how fat she had gotten she massaged her belly. This wasn't the first button she lost. She lost another pants button a day or two ago and a few on her blouses. She knew there was one thing that she needed to do. Go clothes shopping. She looked in her wallet. Just enough to buy about two outfits. But just to be sure maybe it was better to buy them a few sizes bigger. Then she had some room to grow. That was a good idea. Perhaps also look for some elastic clothing. That would, at least, last longer. She normally didn't wore much elastic pants but back then she was a skinny twig. It would be a part of her new lifestyle.

First she looked in the closet. She found one elastic pants that would fit around her tummy. She put her new pants on and walked out of her room. Downstairs there was suddenly a cloud of smoke and Kurt appeared.

"Hi Kitty. What are you up to?"

"Oh nothing special. Just going out. You know."

"You're really are in that gaining thing. If I wouldn't have been here the past weeks and I saw you, I would think you would be Kitty's twin sister who has troubles with her weight."

"Kurt you know I can't help it. If I don't eat enough I going totally crazy eating anything I can get my hands on. I emptied the entire fridge one evening. If I don't eat enough, at dinner I would eat my food and that of everybody else."

"But why didn't you tell anyone except me, Beast, Storm and Professor X?"

"Because… Well... they're adults. They're looking out for us. They wanna help us. Besides they're trying to find out what's wrong with me, and help me. But to do that they need to know about well the hunger. And as for you… well... you're my friend."

"I can understand that. I just don't get why you didn't tell the others. They will understand. Everyone has their problems. Now they just think you're a gluttonous pig. Not that you can't help it. However you are now fine with the wei..."

The next moment Kitty slapped her hands around his mouth.

"Do you want the whole institute to hear us? I don't want anyone else to know that. Now I going to the mall."

"Can I come with you?"

Kitty froze. Then she turned to him with a playfully mean grin.

"You wanna come with me... a girl... to the mall… to buy clothes?"

"Eh... I guess so. I just offered that."

"Fine. Why not? Sure you can come. But believe me. It's better if you put another face on."

Kurt pushed at his watch and his blue skin turned into a normal skin color.

"Now we can go."
1552121321131111131112232.title: Popped button

choices: Kitty's pants rip, exposing her rather small panties
Stop for more food as Kitty's getting hungry again
15521213211311111311122321.content:

Kitty's pants rip, exposing her rather small panties
