1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
"Well, since it was a tie, I don't think anything happens now." Scott replied after thinking about it. "So, we still have to do our own chores?" Jamie asked in dismay.

"I'm afraid so, little dude." Bobby said with a understanding smile. "But it was pretty awesome to see you guys eat like that." Spyke offered to the girls with a smile.

"Glad you *urp* liked *hic* it Evan *burp*." Jean groaned in between burps and a hiccup as she kept rubbing her sore tummy, still green as a lettuce leaf.

"Oh god. My tummy, like, totally hurts!" Kitty whimpered in agony as she rubbed the aching orb of flesh. "Mine too." Amara moaned as she tried hard not to vomit as she burped ominously.

"Mah belly's so stuffed, I think Ah'd explode if Ah try an' put one more thing into mah mouth." Rogue moaned in agreement as she laid against the wall so she was sitting up.

"I'm with you, Rogue. After that grub fest, I don't think I could eat another bite until breakfast." Tabitha groaned as she slowly messaged her jumbo tummy with both hands.

None of the guys said anything for a moment as they watched their female teammates burp, groan and moan in agony. They felt bad for their friends and wanted to do something that would cheer them up.

Jamie had an idea. "Hey, why don't we at least give them a belly rub? That helped at lunch when they had bellyaches." He offered. "Worth a shot." Scott agreed as Kurt, Spyke and Bobby nodded.

So, the five guys went over to their girl and knelt down. "*Urp* Scot? What *belch* are *hic* you *burp* *urp* doing?" Jean moaned as she felt her boyfriend's hands slowly start to rub and press her giant belly. Slowly, she felt its hardness fading and becoming soft again, lessening her pain.

"We're giving you guys belly rubs to help with the pain. It was Jamie's idea." Scott explained with a smile. Sure enough, Kurt was rubbing Boom-Boom's belly, Jamie was gently rubbing and pressing Kitty's while Bobby took care of Amara.

Evan, meanwhile, was gently messaging Rogue's orb of a belly while wearing cleaning gloves. "Feeling better?" He asked as he kept rubbing, pressing and pinching her belly.

"Oh mah god yes..." Rogue moaned in relief as the hard rock feeling in her tummy went away, replaced with soft squishy blubber.

"Totally." Kitty agreed as she smiled at the blushing furiously Jamie while he kept working away on her belly.

"Soooo gooooodddd..." Tabitha moaned in bliss as Kurt's furry fingers kept stroking hers gently.

*I agree." Amara smiled as Bobby's fingers ran over her brown skin, partially chilly to help dull the pain in her belly.

Then, all five girls' tummies rumbled loudly. "Like, now what?" Kitty asked nervously.

The guys all knew. "Not again!" Kurt groaned as the X-Boys quickly retied the towels around their noses just in time.

After a few more minutes, *PPPPPOORRRRRRTTTTTTTT!!!* Kitty let out another big fart. "Now I totally feel better." Kitty sighed in relief as the pain in her hippo belly lessened greatly after that big toot.

Then, "That's not fartin', Kit. This here is fartin'," Rogue smirked as her belly rumbled again.*BBBBLLLLOOOORRRRRPPPPP!!* A bigger fart slipped from her booty as she smirked again. Kitty playfully stuck her tongue out at her roommate, best friend and teammate.

"Both of you guys can't fart. Like Blue said this afternoon, this is why they call me 'Boom-Boom'!" Tabitha laughed as she strained hard. *FFFFFFFBBBBBBBBRRRRRRTTTPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!* Out came a fairly decent fart from her pants.

"Please! I thought we did this hours ago, Tabitha!" Amara giggled as she took a deep breath and strained hard. After a few seconds.

*PPPPPPOOOOOORRRRRAAAAAAPPPPPPTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!!!* A big, long fart escaped her large butt.

"Once again I see I gotta teach you girls how to make a stink!" Jean laughed as she began straining very hard. "Like, plug your nose!" Kitty shouted, quickly pinching hers closed as Rogue quickly grabbed a clothespin and clamped it on hers while Tabitha and Amara both tied some spare napkins around their noses just in time.

*BBBBBLLLLLLOOORRRRRRRAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!* Jean's fart was big, loud and really long. Soon, the entire dining room smelled awful. "Open-ack- a window!" Kurt choked. Even though he and the other X-Guys still had their masks on, Jean's stench was still able to get in their noses. Scott quickly ran over and threw the windows open, letting fresh air in.

"Aw, man! Jean, what did you eat last round! There wasn't any chili!" Rogue groaned in disgust. "I guess it was all the grease and stuff that can do it too." Jean shrugged with a smile.

"Feel better now?" Scott asked with a slight smile. "Yeah." Jean smiled as she and the others stood up. "Good. See you girls later." Spyke smiled as he and the other guys left.

"Well, that was quite a gorge." Rogue smiled as she rubbed her now completely soft tummy. "Yeah. But, like, I think I totally pooped my pants again with my farts." Kitty blushed as she felt that now familiar wet and smelly feeling.

"Not again!" Rogue groaned as she looked in her pants and saw the same thing as Jean, Amara and Tabitha all discover this mess in their panties and pants as well. "Like, maybe we should totally buy plus-sized diapers for teens." Kitty suggested, causing the girls to giggle at the idea.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: It's a tie so no one has won and no one nee...

1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
The girls were full for the rest of the day and also the entire night. No one of woke up for a midnight snack. Something everything was very thankful for. Next morning some birds were chirping outside the window.

"Can those stupid birds shut up?" Tabitha yelled.

Kitty looked at her friend. She saw Jane and Amara and Rogue. Since their sleepover the girls kept staying together. Well they all had the same problems and supported each other. That was the spirit of the institute. Helping gifted kids with their problems.

"Tabitha," Amara said. "Those birds perhaps woke you up, but you complaining about them woke me up."

"And me as well," Jane added.

"Sorry gals." Tabitha said. "How did you sleep?"

"Well I must admit it feels good sleeping with a full tummy," Rogue added.

"Your tummy was full?" Amara asked. "Mine was overfilled. It's a miracle I did't threw up."

"It ended up all right, did't it?" Tabitha said. But I could go for some breakfast. Lets get dressed."

Getting dressed was easier said the done. Some clothes were very tight and most would never fit them. However Kitty gave them some of her not so old clothes. Some of her new clothes still fitted her and the five went downstairs. All smiling when they saw a table full of food.

"Aha you're here," Storm said. "We made breakfast for you. After breakfast Professor X wants to talk to you. He maybe can find out what causes those hunger attacks and perhaps… stop them. I sure hope so."

"Yeah I hope so too," Amara said. "But now… food!"

All girls ran to the food. Storm looked a bit irritated. She knew the girls could't help it. It was just that she spent a lot of time, work and effort in making food and those girls just wolfed it down in a few seconds.
Kitty ate a entire stack of pancakes in one bite. Amara did the same with waffles. Wolfing down a entire stack in one bite. Jane was stuffing herself with doughnuts. She put two on each finger like the were huge rings. The next moment she stuffed them all in her greedy mouth. Rogue attacked the bacon with scrambled eggs as Tabitha ate a whole bug tray of sweet rolls.

"The girls are eating again." Kurt said. "Lately they're putting more attention to eating then to us."

"Don't worry Kurt," Scott said. "I heard that the professor might know what's wrong with them. Perhaps he can help them. Then their back to normal and I will have my Jane back."

"Well... before she's her old self again… she might need a big diet and do a lot of exercise," Evan said.

"Well that's true… but I love Jane. No matter which size she is. I will help her lose the weight."

The girls still gulped everything what was on the table, Sandwiches, wraps,muffins, cakes, chicken sandwiches, hamburgers. Nothing escaped the appetites. The were't just eating. They tried to stuff as much food in their mouth if was possible at once. It was surprising they did't choke. However Scott thought it was a few times very close. Kitty plopped muffins in her mouth like if it were berries. Tabitha placed five sandwiches at top of each other and stuffed the entire thing in her mouth in one go. Amara grabbed the wraps eating three at once. All girls were eating that you thought like if their life depended on it. But then all the food was gone."

"Well...that was a good breakfast," Kitty said. "BUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!"

"That was nothing," Tabitha said. "Listen to this…"

"Eh no matter how much fun this is," Amara said. "I believe professor X is waiting for us. Oh and better don'f fart. Or do you want to meet the professor with crap in your pants?"

All girls agreed that that maybe was't a good idea. All five walked to the office of Professor X. With jiggling bellies, rubbing thighs and wobbling butts. Kitty knocked on the door.

"Come in." Professor X answered, and the girls entered. "I see you all put on some weight. But I think I know how to find the answer. Kitty. can you come over to me? I'm gonna look in your mind. We really think someone is playing with your mind. But I need to be sure."

Kitty went over the Charles Xavier and stayed calm while he put his hands on her head and made contact with her. A few minutes later he let go of Kitty.

"I know who it is. It's...
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Breakfast and answers

choices: Xavier finds the Hellions. The X-Kids go to them and the girls are captured.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
"It's Emma Frost." Professor X said. The girls looked at each other in surprise. "But why would she do this?" Jean asked. "I think it is payback for the last time you and the others crossed her and her own student team." Professor X said.

Kitty scanned her memory. She remembered the X-Kids' last fight with the Hellions, Emma's team of mutants who were loyal to the Hellfire Club, which Emma belonged to. Most of the members there were mutants as well. The Hellions consisted of Empath, Catseye, Thunderbird, Roulette and Tarot. The group had broken into Area 51 for unknown reasons with Emma accompanying them.

There, the team had encountered the X-Kids, Magma, Boom-Boom and Professor X. During the fight, the Hellions were beaten and Emma had sworn revenge on them, especially the girls. But at the time, they hadn't taken her seriously. Now, it seemed that had been a big mistake.

"Like, this must be her revenge. Making us fat." Kitty realized. "But why?" Amara asked. "She must've decided it would be appropriate to make us into sumo-sized girls since the Hellions called us 'fat cats'." Jean replied. "Well we really look the part now." Rogue agreed as she eyed her jumbo orb sized belly.

"I actually thought I heard her voice in my head a few weeks ago the night before this started." Kitty admitted. "What? Why didn't you tell us this?" Tabitha asked in surprise.

"It seems that Emma's mental powers planted the suggestion into her head and then ordered her to forget who did so." Xavier replied. "I was only just able to unlock this information from Kitty's thoughts. Emma's powers are equally, if not slightly stronger, to mine." He admitted.

"Wait. If she only wanted ta make Kitty pay, why hit us?" Rogue asked. "I believe she actually meant to do it to all of you, Rogue. You, along with Jean, Amara and Tabitha were only recently affected due to her likely only wanted to largely punish Kitty." Xavier explained.

"What do we do now?" Jean asked. "The next step is finding the Hellions and try to convince Emma to reverse the damage before you all become immobile." Xavier stated. "Totally. Like, the last thing I need is to need a forklift or scooter to get around." Kitty agreed as the girls nodded.

"I shall use Cerebro to try and pinpoint the Hellions' current location since they likely abandoned their Chicago school. When I pinpoint them, I shall inform you and the other X-Men." Professor X said assuredly.

"Alright, Professor. We'll be waiting." Jean smiled as she and the other girls waddled off to relax in Kitty and Rogue's room for awhile while Xavier headed for Cerebro to try and find Emma and the Hellions.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Emma frost (White Queen)

choices: Kitty and the others wake up captured
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
"So it was Emma frost all along," Kitty said. "I just could't remember I heard her. I'm so stupid."

"Emma played you," Jane said. "You could't do anything about it. No one blames you. It was even harder for you since had those hunger attacks longer then us."

"Now we know who did it and why but... how are we gonna solve it?" Rogue asked.

"Simple," Tabitha said. "We go over there and force her to take that curse away!"

"Always the violent way right Tabitha." Jane said.

"What do you wanna do then?" Tabitha asked. "Just friendly ask her. What do you think she will do then. Sorry I put a curse on you. I take it off now and no hard feelings!"

"Well I guess Tabitha is right this time," Amara added. "I don't think she'll just take that curse away if we ask her nicely. We might need to use some force. I normally don't like if I need to use violence. But in this case I make a exception."

The girls continued talking in the office of professor X while he looked with Cerebro. After several minutes he returned.

"Did you find her?" Tabitha asked excited.

"I did. She's not far from here. She also was't hard to find. I'm a bit worried. It seems like she does't do anything to keep hidden."

"What's the address?" Tabitha asked. "You do know were she is right?"

Professor X wrote something on a piece of paper.

"This is were she is. We need to go there but not…"

But for once the girls did't listen and ran out (or more waddled) with jiggling bellies, wobbling butts and rubbing thighs. The professor looked at the door a bit surprised the girls ran away without listening to him. They normally always listened. He knew Emma well enough that she would't make this easy. Even while she had been very easy to find. That did't make sense. Emma was a telepath and she knew Cerebro. So why did't she… then it hit him. This was most likely a trap.

The girls in the meantime took a car and dove away to the address they had. Kitty and the other hoped the could stop Emma before their next hunger attack. If she does't I gonna switch to cannibalism starting with Emma herself. See how long it takes before she'll take that curse away. after a few minutes Kitty looked around surprised. This part of the city was a part were she would rather stay away. Homeless people, drunk people and criminals were here. Also a lot of old empty houses. with boards before the windows, cracks in the wall. Gardens filled with weeds.
Finally Jean stopped by a big house. It did't looked different from all other houses. A garden covered with weed. Cracked walls, closed windows with board before it and blistering paint.

"Does Emma live here?" Rogue asked in disbelieve.

"According to the address professor X gave us," Jean said.

"Do we know for sure she's here?" Amara asked. "I trust professor X but it looks like no one has been here for over...well not since I was born. Look at that house. Would one of you want to live there?"

"Well not me," Kitty said. "I don't like the neighborhood and the other houses. This house needs a lot of work. Just like the garden. All other houses and gardens around here needed a lot of work too."

"Well Emma frost is white, not green," Rogue said. "It looks like no one has been here but lets go inside anyway. Perhaps she is't there but maybe she is. I don't have a clue where she could be else."

"I can think of several places I would rather be then here," Kitty said.

They walked over the the door and opened it. As soon as the entered the heard some scratching on the floor. Probably some mice and rats who were disturbed and looked for a safe place.

"It does't look like anyone has been inside here in a while either," Amara said looking around.

"A big layer of dust everywhere." Jean said. "I don't think anyone has been here in a while."

"I don't get it," Kitty said. "How is it possible the professor and Cerebro were wrong?"

The next moment the front door closed. Then they heard footsteps on the stairs and down came Emma frost. She seemed a bit amused.

"Ah I expected you. It took you girls long enough"to find out it was me. You five don't look like last time I saw you. It seems like you all put on some weight. Haha."

"You did this to us!" Tabitha yelled. "I warn you! Take of this curse or else…"

"Or else what Miss Boom Boom. That's how they call you right. You don't scare me. Not one of you does. As for the curse… no I'm not gonna take it of."

"Take it of!" Rogue yelled. "You're strong perhaps but you can't fight all five of us!"

"I don't like to admit ít but that's probably true. But I'm not alone."

Out of the shadows came: Thunderbird, Jetstream, Cat's eye and Empath.

I took some of my best students. Capture them!"

Thunderbird tried to grab Kitty but she faded right through his arm.
Jean focused on Emma frost. It was a telepathy battle. Jean was having a hard time.

"I must confess I'm impressed," Emma said. "You have a lot of strength for such a young girl. You have potential. Guess that's why professor X put so much interest in you. You might be stronger then him some day. You could be like me But one thing you don't have is... experience!"

Wit those words Jean was knocked to the wall and was out. Kitty seemed to escape all of Frosts students by fading through them all the time
Cat's eye turned into her panther form and walked too Amara like if she was a tasty looking snack. Amara started to burn but suddenly her flames got shorter and stopped. Amara noticed she was scared to death for the predator. She was so scared. She realized it was Empath. Sure standing eye to eye with a panther was a bit scary. But Empath made it look even scarier. The next moment Empath hit her on the head with a piece of wood.
Tabitha made some of her famous balls. But before she was able to throw them Jetstream flew right beside her and she dropped her balls at her feet.

"Uh-oh!" She mumbled. "This is gonna hurt."

The next moment the bolls exploded throwing her to the wall and she passed out.
Rogue was busy fighting Thunderbird. Thanks to his Super athletic ability he was able to duck away and block any attack Rogue did. At the same time she could't avoid his attacks. Of course if she could grab him she could defeat him. But Thunderbird was't maybe the smartest member of the team but he was't so stupid he would give Rogue the ability to touch him. Finally he jumped in the air. Gave Rogue a few good kicks against her head and she passed out and fell on the floor.
Kitty noticed all her friends were defeated. The only reason she was't defeated because she faded through everyone and anything. But she knew she was't gonna win this way. Suddenly she froze. She could't move a single muscle. She knew who it was. Emma Frost. Sure she could fade through any body or object but that did't go for her mind. The next moment she passed out.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: The old house

choices: Scott, Kurt, Evan, Bobby and Jamie arrive to free them. The girls are freed.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
After what seemed like hours, Kitty slowly opened her eyes. "Uuugggh. Like, what happened?" She groaned as she slowly rose her head. As her grogginess faded, she gradually became more aware of her surroundings.

She was still in the old house, but, from the looks of it, she was in the basement now. She tried to move her hand to her head, but realized she couldn't. Looking down, she saw her hands were strapped to the arms of the large chair she was in. There was also belts strapping her legs down as well and a belt stretched over her belly.

It was then, Kitty noticed something: she was no longer in her large clothes. Instead, she was wearing only her new plus sized bra and, here she blushed in embarrassment, a thick white diaper. "What the-?" Kitty looked around and then noticed that Jean, Rogue, Tabitha and Amara were also there, strapped to chairs and clad in bras and diapers. They were just starting to wake up now too.

"Kitty? What's going on? Why're we in diapers?" Amara asked as she tried to break free, but she was too groggy to flame up much to do anything. "Like, I don't know guys." Kitty admitted.

At that moment, Emma walked downstairs with an evil grin. "Ah. I see my five big babies've woken up." she jeered as she approached a control panel. "Why're you doin' this, Frost?" Rogue snarled as she struggled to get free, her diaper crinkling.

"I wouldn't bother Miss. Rogue. Those belts were specially designed to keep your powers low enough to barely work." Emma smirked as she watched.

"Like, what're you totally gonna do to us now?" Kitty demanded. "Simple, Miss. Pryde. I'm going to use my new feeding machine to force feed all of you and make your even fatter." Emma smirked, nodding to the large machine.

"Why put us in diapers though?" Tabitha asked, nodding to hers. "Miss. Smith, what makes you think you'll be able to use the bathroom at any point during your feeding?" Emma said with a laugh.

"You won't get away with this!" Amara shouted bravely at Emma. The White Queen merely smirked at her as she pulled a lever and the large, expansive feeding machine roared into life.

Kitty went first, stopping at a large tank labeled ICE CREAM. A second later, large scoops of chocolate, vanilla, strawberry, peanut butter, mint chocolate chip, blue moon and other ice cream flavors poured out into her gullet, bulging her cheeks. She barely managed to swallow before the next wave started.

Jean was sent to a large table piled with chili cheese burgers. Before she even really knew what was happening, a mechanical hand grabbed the first burger and smashed it into her mouth. Jean tried to fight back, but another hand merely pinched her nose, forcing her to swallow so she could breathe. Both hands then began stuffing the chili cheeseburgers into her mouth at a surprising speed.

Rogue, meanwhile, was being force fed rather huge sandwiches. PB&J. Ham and Cheese. Grilled Cheese, Roast Beef. All those sandwiches were crammed into the poor fat goth girl's maw, nearly choking her.

Amara was sitting in front of a large table with pies on it. One hand picked up a cherry pie and spin it on it's finger with a second forced Amara to gobble it down, getting the filling over her face. The same happened with an apple pie. Then a blueberry pie and so on.

Tabitha, meanwhile, was parked in front of a table loaded with doughnuts. Soon, she was forced to wolf down ten at a time, her belly getting rounder and rounder as she did.

This went on for a few minutes before they switched. Tabitha went to the ice cream, Kitty to the chili cheese burgers, Jean to the sandwiches, Amara to the doughnuts and Rogue to the pies. After they'd all gone to each station at least twice, Emma smiled down at the bloated five.

"Now it's time for the second course!" she cackled as she activated the second round. This time, it was Jean who went first. Before she could even protest, a large tube was stuffed into her mouth and she felt chili running into her mouth.

Kitty was forced to eat chili cheese hotdogs while Amara and Tabitha both were force fed with large, head sized meatballs and Rogue's mouth was stuffed full of rather jumbo corndogs.

"I'll leave you to enjoy your meals." Emma laughed as she left, leaving the girls to their seeming fate. "L-like *gulp* I totally *glorp* can't take *mmmph* this much *glorp chew* more!" Kitty groaned in between chili dogs. "Me neither, Kitty. But what can we do? Our powers don't work thanks to these belts." Rogue agreed before an especially giant corn dog was shoved into her mouth, bulging her cheeks out.

At that moment, an awful smell reached their noses. "Um, guys? I think Jean's the first one to need a new diaper!" Amara called, eying Jean's very full and lumpy diaper. Then, all four of the other girls farted.

*PPPOOOORRRRRRAAAAPPPPPP!!* Went Kitty's diapered butt as hers bulged out with poop.

*BBBBLLLLOOOORRRRRTTTTTTT!* Tabitha's large butt followed.

*FFFFFRRRRRRAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!* Amara's butt blared out.

*BLLLLLLLUURRRRRTTTCCCCHHHH!!!* Rogue went a second later.

"Okay, check that. All of us need new diapees!" Tabitha remarked before a new wave of food hit them.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Kitty and the others wake up captured

choices: They hook her up to her own machine
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
"Well we have one chance," Kitty managed to say between two waves of food.

"What's that? MMMMMMMPPPPHHHH!" Tabitha asked before her mouth was stuffed to the brim with fries.

"Well the professor has the address of this house," Kitty was able to say before another wave of corn dogs was forced into her mouth.

"Of course," Jean said. "They'll look for us! MMMMMMMMPPPPPPPPHHHHHHH!"

Jean was right since Scott, Kurt, Evan, Bobby and Jamie were in their car just riding into the street.

"So this's were Emma Frost lives," Evan asked. "Professor X has a much better place."

"Well be glad we're at his school and not here," Kurt said. "I wouldn't wanna be here at night."

"Here. This is the address," Jamie said.

"Seems like Emma didn't put a lot of money in it," Evan said. "If you need to pay for the repairs it will probably cost more then the house."

"Be careful." Scott said while he and the others walked in. "I don't think Emma'll give up the girls without a fight.

"Got that right, laser beam." Thunderbird said.

He came from behind a dark spot. Also Empath, Jetstream, CatsEye and Roulette appeared. All of the smiling in a evil way some of them cracking their knuckles.

Scott did a step forward.

"Listen we don't want any trouble," He said calmly but on a convinced tone. "We just want our friends back. Five fat young girls. You might have seen them."

The next moment the Hellions started to attack. Thunderbird jumped at Scott but as fast if he was he wasn't faster then a laser beam from Cyclops.

Jetstream flew around Bobby. Hitting him when he went by. But Bobby realized this after he was hit for the third time and the next time he froze him. He fell on the floor frozen not able to move a muscle.

"You know that you're gonna lose," Roulette said and threw a black disc at Nightcrawler who was limber enough to avoid it.

"I heard from your predictions. Point is it only counts when you get hit."

The next moment he appeared behind her and give her a hard kick against her head.

Empath could control other people's emotions. Point was that Evan seemed to have only one emotion at this moment. Anger. Anger that the hellions dared to capture some of his friends. Anger was one thing he couldn't really deal with. And angry or not it also couldn't control the spikes he shot at Empath. it were tiny spikes but very precise. It did touched his body but nailed his clothes to the wall with him still in them.

Jamie or four of him were standing around Catseye, in her panther form. When two of the got her attention a third one jumped on her back. But the one on her back became two, then three and the four. All four grabbed tight at her fur, ears and tail. When a fifth and sixth appeared it was to much for Catseye. her paws couldn't carry six boys on her back.

But the last Jamie walked away from the fight. He went downstairs and found the girls. All the girls looked at him with thanks in their eyes. He quickly turned off the machines while the others arrived

All boys couldn't help it and smiled a bit at the girls. Not because of the very full diapers they were wearing. It was more since Jamie turned the machine of during the feeding. Kitty still had a large corn dog sticking out of her mouth. Jean had five large doughnuts stacked between her lips. Tabitha still had a large heap of fries sticking out of her mouth. Amara had a hot dog halfway in her mouth while Rogue had a mouth full of ice cream.

Kitty spat out the corn dog and moaned holding her belly in both hands.

"Oh! Ah! I'm, like, so totally full."

"You? I'm bursting!" Amara complained spitting out the hot dog before starting to clutch her belly.

"I really… can't eat… another bite." Tabitha said while fries fell out of her mouth as she barely managed to swallow the others.

"I think we better get out of here." Scott said.

"Wait we still need Emma to lift the curse." Kitty said. "We're stuffed now but we all know how fast our hungry versions can appear."

"We also still have five Hellions upstairs," Scott said. "I guess they won't let us leave that easy."

"Well we're full but we can also fight," Tabitha said. "They can't take ten of us. If they try we'll show 'em what a fat girl can do!"

The ten came upstairs. Thunderbird, Roulette and Catseye had recovered, Empath had freed himself. Jetstream was standing up but she was shivering

"Ready for round two?" Scott asked and hit Catseye. She tried to crawl back up but suddenly got the entire weight of Kitty on her. She stayed where she was.

Roulette ran at Kurt but suddenly bumped against Tabitha's belly who jumped for Kurt and threw a bunch of her balls right in front of her face. When they exploded she stepped backwards and fell right down the stairs.

Amara was fighting Empath. There wasn't any fear now in Amara only anger. She was fighting with (literally) burning fists and used her weight to push him back. He gave up and ran away. right out of the front door. Rogue jumped with her full weight at Jetstream. Pushing him right in front of Bobby.

"Oh no not again." He mumbled.

Bobby froze him again. Even more then before.

"You know what," Jetstream said. "How about I just walk away and we call it a tie?"

The next moment he ran away. They smiled but then Emma Frost came down. She took a look at the ten members of the X-Kids. Then at her students. But before she could do anything Scott hit her with a laser beam. Rogue picked her up and pushed her against the wall.

"Now take off this curse or else." She growled.

"Or else what?"

"I can touch you so long you end up in a coma." Rogue said.

"I can burn you like a torch!" Amara said, flaring up her fists again.

"I can fade with my hands in your body and make knots in your insides!" Kitty said.

"I can force my ball in your mouth before they explode," Tabitha said. "Can't wait to see what'll happen."

"Don't try anything Emma." Jean said. "I might be not as strong if you but I can hold you up long enough for the others to do their thing. We also have a few boys here. You can't control us all at once?"

"Fine." Emma said. "I guess I'm outnumbered. So fine."

She waved with her hand. Kitty, Tabitha, Amara, Jean and Rogue all felt like something leave their bodies, making them feel even more stuffed. All five girls moaned, holding their swollen bellies.

"So they're fine now. I cannot take away their weight. I can do things with people's minds not their body. Their appetites will still remain large. Oh and say: "hello" to Charles for me. May I go now?"
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Free

choices: The girls retain part of their large appetites. At the buffet, the girls pig out
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
The five girls looked at each other. "Nope." Jean smiled. "We're, like, totally gonna give you a taste of your own medication." Kitty giggled. With that, the five fat and diapered girls waddled back downstairs with Emma as their hostage.

Emma struggled to break free, but the five were holding her tightly. After a moment, Jean undressed Emma to her bra and Kitty forced Emma into a large diaper of her own while Amara, Tabitha and Rogue changed into fresh diapers of their own.

"You brats're gonna pay for this!" Emma snarled at Jean and Kitty as they strapped her down into a chair. "No, Emma. You're gonna pay." Jean replied as she activated the machine. With one last snarl, Emma was sent to the Ice cream tank, which began pumping large scoops into her mouth. After two minutes, Emma was sent to the doughnuts and was force fed a whole truckload, giving her a big gut before the machine zipped her to the pie feeders.

On and on it went until a roughly 700 pound Emma was brought over to the girls. She'd used her diaper four times during this and so it was very full and soaking wet from her urine. The girls smirked at her problem.

"Now, if you ever try and do something like this to us again, we'll do it even worse." Jean threatened warningly. Emma glared at her and the other girls but didn't say anything. With that, Kitty, Jean, Amara, Tabitha and Rogue waddled back upstairs, Jean and Kitty having changed into fresh diapers during Emma's force feeding.

They met up with Scott, Kurt, Bobby, Jamie and Spyke at the top of the stairs. "How'd it go?" Scott asked. "I don't think we'll need to worry about Emma for a while Scott." Jean smiled as she hugged him, her belly smooshing against his trim lean body.

"Like, can we get outta here now?" Kitty asked from behind Rogue. "Sure." Kurt smiled as the ten started to leave. The Hellions had fled so they didn't face any opposition for trying to leave. Though the girls could only fit into their thankfully elastic and stretchy t-shirts, leaving their sumo sized diapers exposed.

The ten climbed into the boys' car and sped away for home, hoping they'd seen the last of the Hellions and Emma for awhile. Even though the ride was somewhat cramped, the girls didn't mind and neither did the guys. Jean sat beside Scott in the shotgun position while Spyke, Kitty, Kurt, Rogue, Jamie, Amara, Bobby and Tabitha were all squeezed into the back seats.

Jamie sat beside Kitty, whose belly and love handles jiggled whenever they went over a pothole. Jamie felt somewhat embarrassed by his fixation on his doughy and diapered friend, but she did look pretty cute with the fat she now had. Kitty noticed him staring at her blubber and smiled before playfully ruffling his hair.

Tabitha was being oogled by Nightcrawler, who kept eying her massive gut as she rubbed and ran her hands over it.

Amara was drumming her fingers lightly on her brown orb of a tummy as she talked with Bobby, who found it hard to keep eye contact with his NR teammate for more than two minutes before returning to eyeing her belly.

Spyke and Rogue both looked awkward. Rogue because she knew Evan was also slightly eying her pale, marshmallow like belly and Evan because he knew she knew he was impressed by her new size. Regardless, the ten teens made small talk as they got closer to Bayville's city limits a few minutes later.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: They hook her up to her own machine

1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.content:
"You really taught Emma a lesson," Kurt said. "Giving her a taste of her own medicine. Oh remember we need to say 'hello' to the professor from her."

"Why would we do that?" Tabitha asked. "Why should we do her a favor? After what she's done to us?"

"I understand what you mean… but I heard she and the professor once dated," Evan said. "Long time ago. They broke up because they didn't agree on some things about mutants and became rivals. We could tell him she said: "Hi!" Not for her but for him."

"You know gals… It's strange but... I'm, like… totally hungry," Kitty said.

"You too?" Tabitha asked. "I thought it was just me."

"So you girls are hungry too?" Amara asked. "I thought we got rid of that awful curse. What's going on?"

"Well perhaps all the eating made your tummies stretch so much that they need a lot of food to fill them," Kurt said. "So they still will eat a lot... but I don't think their hungry versions will come out ever again."

"Lets hope so." Kitty said. "But I guess he's right. Sure I'm hungry and I want to eat but I don't feel like I'm gonna lose control."

"Well then why don't we stop at the buffet," Scott said. "We boys also like a good meal right guys?"

"We can eat there for free," Kitty whispered to Tabitha. "But can the boys..."

"Not our problem," Tabitha whispered. "Besides they have money."

Scott stopped at the buffet. The girls waddled inside as fast if the could. Scott wasn't entirely sure that this was the best idea. All five girls still wore their diapers since their pants were too tight. It might look a bit strange. But at the other hand so many people did strange things in America. Here in America the strangest things were possible. So why did a few fat, diapered girls matter?

The girls got their plates and went in line. Each of them pilled their plates high with food and started stuffing their faces. The boys also took some food but it wasn't a large amount. Just a normal sized meal like they normally took. Only the girls took large meals and they were really pigging out.
.
Kitty was stuffing five burgers into her mouth before swallowing them, a very big lump sliding down her throat as she did.

Jean had grabbed a whole pizza. She grabbed one side and rolled it up like a sleeping bag made it look like a huge wrap. After that she tried to stuff as much of it in her mouth as was possible.

Rogue had grabbed a entire basket of biscuits. She wasted no time and poured all the biscuits right in her mouth. Her cheeks were lumpy and full made her look like a chipmunk.

Amara was busy with her favorite. A chocolate cake. And not just any chocolate cake. A ten layer chocolate cake. Before she only had been able to look at it while drooling a bit and perhaps have a small piece before she was full. But now with her new appetite, she decided to use it to her advantage and to finally eat the entire thing.

Tabitha had something else in mind. She waddled over to the place were you could get soft served ice creams. just put you bowl or cone under it and you could get a nice ice cream. But Tabitha just put her head under it and let the ice cream just pour in her mouth right out of the machine.

Amara wolfed down the last piece of her cake and: "*BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!* Oops. Excuse me."

"Do you need to excuse for that?" Jean asked. "Listen to this: *BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!!!!* Look that's something to say Excuse me too.

Not really," Tabitha said with a mischievous grin. "*BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!* Hear that? That's how you gotta burp."

"Oh yeah? Rogue asked. "*BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!* That's how a real Southern gal burps!"

"*BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!* Guess I won!" Kitty said with a big grin at her friends.

"Nice one," Amara said. Then the lower part of her large brown tummy gurgled warningly. "Oops I think I need to…"

*BLUUUUUURRRRRRRAAAAAAAAP!!!!!!* She filled her diaper and her face turned deep red as she felt the warm, sticky and smelly poop smooshing her butt since she was sitting down at the time.

*POOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRPT!!!!!!!!!!!* This on came from Tabitha who also filled her diaper. Part because she needed too and part because she didn't want to feel Amara ashamed all by herself.

The smell of both girls started to reach the noses of all the others.

"Well to be honest. I also gotta…" Rogue started but was interrupted when: *BRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAPPPP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!* A large fart escaped her bum and resulted in a rather full diaper for her too. "Wow I gotta admit that feels a lot better.

"Well eh I need to go... get some fresh air." Kurt said and was gone.

"Uh I guess I need to go to," Scott said.

Also the other boys left since the couldn't stand how bad it smelt.

"That was nothing yet," Jean said as she began to grunt and strain, her face turning red.

*PPPPOOOOOOOOOOOTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!* Another aroma joined the other three farts.

"Like, why not," Kitty said with a smile. "I could also go for a... Oh yeah. Here it comes."

*POOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!* Kitty let out a ginormous fart that almost immediately filled her diaper completely.

"So Kitty won," Tabitha said with a laugh. "Loudest burp and loudest fart."

"And also, like, biggest dump," Kitty said, poking her extremely full diaper as it bulged out from the giant poop. It was so full, it was filled from the waistband down. You could see her poop from behind her legs and the poor diaper looked like it was going to burst any second.

"Well you know…. I have these," Jane said and grabbed some clean diapers.

"Were did you get those from? Tabitha asked.

"I took them from Emma. Short before we left. It seemed wise. And it was."

"All right but what are we gonna do now?" Amara said. "We found out we did it. She lifted the curse but we still have a huge hunger."

"And we're still very fat." Jean added, poking her jumbo tummy as it gurgled slightly from the poke.

"True," Kitty said. "But at least now we can keep our hunger under control. We still need to eat a lot to get full but we don't lose control. This way there's a chance we don't eat ourselves sick anymore. Sure we're fat and we probably gonna end up fatter… but girls... like, is that totally so bad? Amara, Jean all of you… you have some lovely female curves. And your bodies are now soft and warm. At least now your boyfriends have something to hold. You don't wanna feel bones when your hug your girlfriend. Something soft feels much nicer. If we're fine with our bodies isn't that what matter most. And as far if I could see… Scott, Jamie, Bobby, Evan and Kurt seemed to totally check out our bellies and like it."

"Hmmm. I guess that's true," Amara said. "So what do we do now?"

"I guess.... eat! Kitty said with a grin, her diaper sagging.

"After we change our diapees. I don't know about you girls, but I don't want a big diaper rash when we leave." Amara said, noticing her butt was getting pretty itchy by that point.

The girls grabbed more food after changing into fresh diapers in the girls room.

Kitty grabbed a large bowl of chill. She tried to gulp it all down but some of it landed in her shirt and face, though she didn't care. She just burped happily and kept slurping it down.

Amara in the meantime chomped down six rather large sugar cookies at once, getting crumbs on her t-shirt.

Jean and Rogue were both busy eating a large butterball turkey... at the same time using their hands and mouths. Ripping off the meat of the bones like a pack of starved wolves. Not wasting the tiniest piece of meat except what was around their mouths.

Meanwhile Tabitha enjoyed a big platter of doughnuts, shoving ten into her mouth at a time, getting powdered sugar, frosting and filling all over her face.

And the girls kept eating and eating and were... happy.
1552121321131111131112232122121121111123.title: Not such a bad end

choices: The rest of Storm's large cake
15521213211312.content:
What does Kitty decide to get for a midnight snack?

Ice Cream

The rest of Storm's large cake

or

She eats everything from the fridge

Take your pick!
15521213211312.title: She wakes up in the middle of the night, time f...

choices: She wakes up on her own
155212132113123.content:
Kitty's eyes flew wide open. She was fully awake. She looked around. There in the other bed she saw the shape of Rogue. She didn't notice Rogue went to bed. Did she sleep through that? What had happened? Suddenly she remembered. The huge dinner and her taking two slices of cake. How embarrassing. Well Storm was normally a pretty calm and understanding woman. So she probably wouldn't make a to big deal out of it. That was one good point.

She really needed to ask Professor Xavier what was going on with her. How to stop it. Or else she would soon look like The Blob. However Blob was fat but could take a lot. His fat protected him from objects of people that hit him. She didn't think she would have the same luck. Then her belly rumbled.

"Not again. I had a terrible tummy ache just a short while ago. How can I be hungry now again?"

Then she noticed outside it was pitch black. Rogue was in bed. What time was it? She looked at her alarm clock.

"Middle of the night? That makes sense. After dinner and dessert I had a tummy ache. Not so strange if you knew how much I stuffed in my belly. But that was a few hours ago. I guess the food has digested. But why am I so hungry again? I need to ask Professor Xavier. But he's asleep now. I should do so but I'm so hungry. Perhaps just a small midnight snack?"

She tried to fall asleep again but the hunger kept nagging on her. She sighed and decided, fighting it was a lot cause.
Kitty faded right through the bed, through the floor and dropped out of the ceiling. Right in the kitchen.

"At the right place. Just a small snack..." Her voice drifted of when she opened the fridge.

She didn't knew what came over her but the next moment she started to stuff anything edible in her mouth. She even ate a raw broccoli. She ripped of leafs of lettuce and ate it with a gulp of dressing. She grabbed jars of jelly and poured the sticky stuff right in her mouth. The same went for the ketchup, mustard and mayonnaise. But she kept eating everything inside. A block of cheese, slices of ham and bacon. Fish and some other stuff that was probably mend for next dinner. But Kitty didn't mind. All she cared about was filling her belly. She even ate the six sticks of butter. The she slowly opened her mouth.

"BUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRP!! Oops. Excuse me."

Kitty suddenly saw the empty fridge and all the empty jars and wrappers around her.

"Oh man. I did it again. I made a total pig out of myself. Well I'm full now. I'm just pooped and…"

The next moment she passed out right on the kitchen floor. Her belly round and bloated because of all the food in it.

15521231.content: What kind of foods does she enjoy?
15521231.title: Yes

choices: The next day Kitty begins working at McDonald's.
155212311.content:
One day, Kitty was walking through Bayville when she noticed a sign in the local McDonald's window. "'Wanted: New employee to work the counter. Must be polite, friendly and a good worker. Apply at front counter'." She read aloud. "Like, that's a good idea." She decided as she went in.

A very plump young girl was at the counter as Kitty came up to her. "Hi, I'm Kitty Pryde. Like, I'm here to totally try out for the job." She explained. "Hang on." smiled the girl, whose name was Kimberly. She went to the back and entered the manager's office. After a few minutes, Kimberly returned.

"Mrs. Hoffman'll see you in her office." she told Kitty. Kitty nodded and headed for the office. Her stomach gurgled and rumbled hungerly as she watched the other employees cooking burgers, fries, salads and other delicious foods. She reached the office and knocked on the door.

"Come in." said a voice. Kitty walked in and closed the door behind her. She found herself face to face with an heavyset woman with ginger hair and dark eyes. "Hello. I'm Kitty Pryde. I-I'm here for the job." Kitty stammered slowly. The woman smiled at this. "I see. Now, sit down and we'll talk." she said. Kitty swallowed slightly and did so.

"So, have you ever worked in a fast food join before?" Mrs. Hoffman asked kindly. "Well, no. But, like, I'm often willing to totally try out new things." Kitty smiled honestly, starting to relax.

"Now, when would you be able to come in for work?" Hoffman asked. "I can, like, totally come in every day. I usually have free time during the summer." Kitty offered. That was true. Aside from X-Men training, Kitty usually had the summer months free.

"And, like, what're the benefits for the employees?" Kitty asked after a moment. Hoffman smiled kindly. "You will get 80% off all meals that you eat here. Also, the pay is very good and you can pick your days off." She explained. Kitty was sold after hearing this.

"When do I start?" she asked with a smile. "Tomorrow. We have enough people on the counter today." Hoffman smiled as she handed Kitty her uniform: a red t-shirt, black pants and a McDonald's visor hat. Kitty nodded and left after getting her first schedule.

Tomorrow she was to work the counter from 1 PM to 6 PM. The rest of the week would be this way as well. Kitty smiled as she then ordered 2 Big Macs, four large fries and a large chocolate shake to celebrate.
155212311.title: Hamburgers

1552123111.content:
1 o'clock next day found Kitty starting her first day at McDonalds. In addition to her uniform, Kitty was also wearing a somewhat thick diaper in case she needed to use the toilet during her shift. Kimberly was there as well. When Kitty came in, she was surprised to see that, despite it still technically being lunchtime, there was barely anybody there aside from her, Kimberly, Mrs. Hoffman and some other employees.

"Like, where is everybody?" she asked Kimberly. "Oh this shift's generally the slowest during the day. We usually only get people at the drive thru during it." Kimberly explained with an unconcerned smile. Kitty still seemed surprised, but ultimately accepted the explanation. "So, what're we, like, totally gonna do today?" she asked. Kimberly smiled even brighter.

"Eat!" She smiled as she grabbed a large bag of burgers and fries and went to a booth. Kitty seemed shocked but then remembered that, as a McDonalds employee, she got 80% off every meal and so could basically eat as much as she wanted with little to no payment needed.

"I guess it'll be, like, totally okay. After all, no one's coming right now and there's four to five more hours of my shift to kill." She told herself with a smile. So, she purchased five Big Macs with onion, lettuce, tomato, cheese and ketchup, six large fries and two large chocolate malts before joining Kimberly at her booth.

The next few hours were so satisfactory they passed quickly. By the time Kitty's shift ended, her belly had visibly bloated and she had massively pooped her diaper at least four times during her pig out. To her surprise, Kimberly had revealed she too wears and uses diapers during her shifts too. That led to the duo playfully farting and blaming each other.

Kitty said goodbye to Kimberly and headed for home. She was glad when no one was in the main hall to greet her. Without making a sound, she happily went upstairs to change her diaper and lie down before dinner, hoping she could get at least most of it down without suspicion from the others as too why she was already full.
1552123111.title: The next day Kitty begins working at McDonald...

15521231112.content:
A week had passed since Kitty had started working at McDonald's. As a result of her eating during her shifts, Kitty had become visibly chubby. She'd also become good friends with Kimberly, who she enjoyed hanging out with both after school and work.

Right now, the duo were hanging out at the institute in Kitty's room, clad in only t-shirts and their thick diapers. They were talking about their early lives and so on when Kitty had an idea.

"Like, Kimberly, wanna see which of us can, like, totally fill our diapers with the most poop?" she offered with a smile. Kimberly was quiet for a moment and then smiled back. "Okay. Though I should warn you, I've been winning diaper filling contests since daycare." Kimberly smirked as she and Kitty stood up to begin the contest.

"That's kinda cool. Like, in daycare, I totally won the "Stinkiest and Fullest Diaper of the week" award." Kitty smiled proudly. Kimberly smiled at that. "I always wanted to win that award but Sharon Edwards always took it." She recalled.

With that, the duo squatted down and began pushing and straining. Gradually, their faces turned bright red as both kept straining. Finally, as they almost felt ready to call it quits, *PPPPPPPPPPOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTT!!!* Kitty's rear end made a big fart and she pushed a decent load of poo into her diaper.

"Woah! Nice start, Kitty." Kimberly smiled as she then felt her own bowel movement incoming. Sure enough, a second later,

*BBBBLLLLLOOOORRRCCCCCHHHHHHH!!!!* Kimberly's own diaper bulged slightly from her own pooping. The two girls giggled and kept pushing.

*PPPPPPPPPPPOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!*

*FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPP!!*

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBLLLLLLLLLLLLOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT TTTTTTTTT!!!*

Soon, Kitty and Kimberly's diapers were filled all the way up to their waistbands and sagging rather low so you could see the duo's naked butts slightly.

"My diaper's, like, so totally full, it doesn't have room for more." Kitty joked with a giggle as she held her diaper up with one hand. After a quick look, it was clear Kitty had won. Kimberly smiled and high fived Kitty.

"Great job, Kit. Guess we're both 'big poopers'." She giggled as Kitty just giggled and nodded before they waddled to the bathroom to change and get ready for dinner.
15521231112.title: A week later

155212311122.content:
It had been a year since Kitty started working at McDonald's and she had grown considerably fatter. She now sported a large belly that bulged over the waistband of her diapers and pants. Her face now sported a double chin and was plumper than a year ago. Her whole body, in fact, was much fatter. Kimberly was the same way as she was just as fat as her new friend Kitty was now.

In addition to their new sizes, the two girls' meals were also much bigger than they were a year ago. Now they ordered at least 20 hamburgers, fries and shakes each day, resulting in massively full diapers and two very happy fat girls.

One day, Kitty was getting ready to get to McDonald's when Jean stopped her. "Kitty... me and the others've noticed you're putting on a lot of weight lately. Maybe you should cut back on the food from McDonald's." She said gently. Kitty looked at her massive tummy pooching out over her waistband. She knew Jean was right but she couldn't help herself.

"Like, I'll totally try, Jean." she said as she went to work. At McDonald's, she met up with Kimberly. "Hey, K girl." Kimberly smiled as the duo fist bumped. "Hey, Kim. Like, what's up for today?" Kitty smiled back. "What else?" giggled Kimberly as she nodded to the pile of food already waiting for them in their favorite booth.

Kitty smiled as they sat down and began eating. Since befriending Kimberly a year ago, Kitty had told her about her powers. Though shocked, Kimberly ultimately thought it cool and their friendship had kept strong. Kimberly, meanwhile, had also told Kitty that she and Mrs. Hoffman were related: she was Mrs. Hoffman's daughter.

The meal ended the same way as always: two very full girls and massively used diapers.
155212311122.title: A year later

choices: The next day, the X-Kids and Kimberly arrive in Hawaii and meet up with Alex.
1552123111221.content:
The next day, Kitty came to McDonald's as usual, only to find most of the female employees gathered at a table. Piles of hamburgers, fries and malts were on it. Kimberly noticed Kitty and waved her friend over. "Like, what's going on?" Kitty asked.

"Mom decided to hold a contest. Whoever eats the most grub wins a week in Hawaii and can bring whoever they want with 'em." Kimberly smiled as she explained. Kitty smiled upon hearing this.

"Like, Scott's younger brother lives in Hawaii. With everything that's been going on with the X-Men, he totally hasn't had anytime to see him. If I win, we can use the trip for Scott to do so!" she squealed. With that, she joined Kimberly and the other girls in the booth.

Aside from Kitty and Kimberly, there were 4 other females going for the prize: Amber Marshall, a fairly plump African-American girl one year older than Kitty with black hair and deep brown eyes, a Chinese-American girl named Wanda Li, who worked in the kitchen as a fry cook, Alison Conner, a plump girl with brown hair and green eyes who also worked the counter like Kitty and Kimberly and Marcie Brant, an obese girl who was a year behind Kitty.

"On your mark... get set... GO!!!" Mrs. Hoffman shouted as she signaled the beginning of the competition. Kitty immediately grabbed a large cheeseburger and stuffed it into her mouth while also cramming a big fistful of fries in after it. As she chewed, she loudly slurped her malt.

As the hour ticked by, the girls gradually weakened. Amber was the first to surrender, ending with 20 hamburgers and fries and 12 malts. Alison gave in two minutes later while trying to stuff her already overfilled-with-fries-mouth with a cheeseburger. Swallowing rather forcefully, she burped and fainted in her remaining fries with a weak groan, finishing with 25 burgers and fries and 17 malts.

Marcie admitted defeat ten minutes later with 28 hamburgers and fries and 23 malts. Groaning and hiccupping loudly, she leaned back in her seat, her pants popping open due to her jumbo belly a second later.

Despite her valiant efforts, Wanda also threw in the towel with 30 hamburgers and fries and 31 malts, burping very loudly as she also leaned back in her chair, clutching her swollen tummy in clear agony.

Now, it was just Kimberly and Kitty neck-in-neck. Kimberly had eaten 33 hamburgers and fries and 30 malts while Kitty had eaten 36 hamburgers and fries as well as 40 malts. Needless to say, Kimberly was both impressed and shocked by her friends' eating.

"Dang, Kitty's really improved over the last year. She's outeaten everybody else like me. I really do hope she may win the contest for her friend, but I'd also like to win. That way I could help her by inviting her and the other X-Men to Hawaii with me." She thought to herself as she stuffed burger and fries #34 into her gullet.

Then, just as she brought burger #35 to her lips, Kimberly's large belly let out a massive gurgling grumble of protest. A second later, she moaned loudly and fainted face first onto the table as Kitty calmly finished her 44th burger and fries order as well as her final chocolate malt.

"I *burp* don't believe it. Pryde, how *urp* could *hic* you *belch* eat all that when *hic-urp* you've only begun eating like us for a year? Where does it all go?" Wanda groaned between burps and hiccups of agony.

"Like, I've totally been ordering more food each day I totally work here." Kitty explained as she licked her fingers clean. "Beside, I've always kinda had a bigger metabolism anyway." She added, patting her large belly.

In the end, Kitty won the trip and was commended for it by the others. As they headed home that night, Kimberly went with Kitty as she was allowed to spend the night with the X-Kids at the mansion.

"Y'know, Kitty... if I'd won, I was willing to take you and the others to Hawaii with me." She admitted. "Really?" Kitty asked in surprise. "Yeah. You guys're my friends. That's what friends do, right?" Kimberly smiled back as she put a fat arm over Kitty's chubby shoulders.

With that, the two fat, diapered and happy girls set off for the mansion to tell Scott and the others the good news.
1552123111221.title: The next day

choices: A week later, the X-Kids talk with Kitty about her weight
15521231112211.content:
The following day found Kitty, Scott, Jean, Kurt, Rogue, Kimberly and Spyke heading to Hawaii. At the airport, "So, is your brother a mutant too, Scott?" Kimberly asked. "Yeah. His powers are kinda like mine, but he can absorb energy and shoot it out of his chest and hands instead of his eyes." Scott explained.

A few minutes later, a tall, slightly muscular boy with dark blond hair and wearing a white Hawaiian t-shirt and dark shorts arrived. "Hey, bro!" He said as he and the equally grinning Cyclops hugged. "How're you Alex?" Jean smiled. "I'm doin' good, Jean." Alex smiled.

Then, he noticed Kitty and Kimberly. "Woah. Kitty... is that you?" He asked. "Like, yeah Alex. Am I really so fat you didn't know it was me?" Kitty asked as she ate a big candy bar. "Well, you are kinda... round." Alex admitted sheepishly. Then, he saw Kimberly.

"And you are?" He smiled politely. "I'm Kimberly Hoffman. I work at McDonald's with Kitty." Kimberly explained as Kitty nodded. "Cool." Alex smiled as the eight teenagers left the airport and headed for the Masters' house. Thankfully they had a fairly roomy house and so the kids would have their own rooms for the week.

That night, the X-Kids and Kimberly attended a luau with Alex. There was all kinds of interesting foods, like Blue Hawaiian, Mai Tai, Pupu platters, Rumaki, Ono ribs and Shrimp Ono Nui. Needless to say, Kitty and Kimberly enjoyed each one extremely, eating the majority of each helping, though they did leave some for the others.

"Man, Kitty's really lettin' herself go now, huh?" Alex remarked to Scott as they watched Kitty devour a massive amount of the Hawaiian cuisine all at once. "Yeah kind of." Scott agreed as Kimberly devoured a large helping of Blue Hawaiian while Kitty cleaned out another plate of Ono ribs.

"We may need to talk with her about it when we get home." Jean added as she watched Kitty and Kimberly giggling and laughing as they kept pigging out.

A little later, Kitty, Kimberly, Spyke, Kurt and (to her discomfort at first) Rogue were convinced by Alex to try and do the hula with several of the other kids at the luau. Though they felt a bit embarrassed at first, the five quickly got the hang of it and began enjoying themselves immensely, especially Rogue.
15521231112211.title: The next day, the X-Kids and Kimberly arrive in...

155212311122111.content:
A week later found Kitty back at the institute tanning herself by the pool, clad in only a bra and a thick diaper. As she soaked up the sun's rays, Jean and Kurt came up to her. "Like, hey guys. What's up?" Kitty asked upon noticing them.

"Kitty, we've noticed you've been putting on a lot of weight lately. We just wanted to ask you if you think you could dial back your pig outs." Kurt said gently. Kitty didn't say anything. She just looked at her big tummy thoughtfully.

Then, *SNAP!* her chair broke under Kitty's girth, causing the obese girl to plop onto the pavement on her fluffy diapered butt. "Ooomph!" She grunted as she did so.

"See, Kitty? That's what we're talking about. You gotta cut down on the junk food." Jean said kindly. Kitty was quiet for a long moment as she stood up and looked down, only to barely see the tips of her feet over her fattened middle. It was then she realized that Jean and Kurt had a point.

"Like, I guess you guys're totally right." She blushed. "Maybe you should quit your job too. That way it'll help you lose your weight quicker." Kurt added as Kitty nodded thoughtfully.

A few weeks later, Kitty had quit working at McDonald's but remained close friends with Kimberly. She'd lost a majority of weight as well, but still retained a big appetite and a large belly as part of her life. She also kept wearing and using diapers due to finding them easier than going to the toilet.
155212311122111.title: A week later, the X-Kids talk with Kitty about ...

choices: Kitty goes back the next day
155212312.content:
Kitty was walking towards the Xavier Institute after a day of shopping at the Bayville Mall. As she walked, she noticed an old fashioned bake shop. Curious, Kitty decided to check it out.

As she entered, Kitty saw it was very old fashioned on the inside. It had old chairs and tables that, despite their age, were still in very good shape. Though there weren't many people, despite it being the middle of the day, there was a fairly decent sized line.

Kitty got in line and looked at the glass case. There were cupcakes and slices of normal cakes for fairly decent prices. After a few minutes, Kitty's turn came. A plump redhaired girl around Kitty's age was working the counter.

"Hi and welcome to Swann Bakery, where we've been pleasing customers for 120 years. My name's Brianna. How may I help you?" asked the girl in a cheerful voice. Kitty looked at the options again and decided.

"Like, I'll take one of the Choco Creamed cupcakes." Kitty smiled. Brianna nodded and pulled one of said cupcakes out. It was a large chocolate cupcake with chocolate cream filling inside and white frosting and colored sprinkles on it.

"That'll be two dollars please," Brianna smiled. Kitty handed over the money, telling Brianna to keep the change. As she left, Kitty unwrapped the cupcake and took a bite. Upon contact, her taste buds erupted into singing. It was basically the best thing she'd ever eaten. Kitty wolfed down the cupcake quickly and licked her fingers to make sure she didn't miss any crumbs, frosting or filling.

"Like, that was totally the best cupcake I've ever eaten! I've totally gotta hit that place again!" Kitty smiled, letting out a gentle burp before giving her fingers one last good, long lick to make sure she'd gotten all the frosting, filling and crumbs.
155212312.title: Cake

1552123121.content:
Kitty went straight to Swann Bakery the next day since she was dying to try more of their cakes. Besides, it was the closest shop to the mall anyway. As she entered the shop, it was empty of people, which Kitty guessed was fairly common since it was pretty early.

What Kitty didn't know was that she'd put on a little weight from the cupcake yesterday. It wasn't noticeable, twenty pounds at the most, bringing her weight from 90 lbs. to 110. Instead of Brittney, who had worked the counter yesterday, there was another girl. She was slightly plumper than Brittney and had long ginger hair pulled into a ponytail.

"Hi. I'm Rita. Welcome ta Swann Bakery. What c'n I get a'fore ye, lass?" she asked in a Scottish accent, smiling and showing her double chin. Kitty looked over all the cakes before deciding.

"Like, I'll totally take the chocolate cake," Kitty said, pointing to the cake behind the case. "Okay. We be havin' a special deal today. Buy one an' get four a'fore free," said Rita smiling.

Kitty thought that was a weird offer but took it anyway. She sat down at a table and started eating all four cakes, leaving no crumbs. She was soon licking globs of chocolate off her fingers as Rita came up to her.

"Woah. Ye really enjoyed the cakes, didn't ye, lass?" Rita remarked, surprised that Kitty had managed to eat all four cakes.

"Yeah. They were, like, totally amazing. Like, I'm Kitty by the way." Kitty smiled as she and Rita shook hands.

"Well, we be havin' a job opening for a new taste tester. The owner's takin' interviews in the back." Rita shrugged.

"Like, that'd totally be awesome." Kitty smiled, figuring she could use the extra money. With a quick nod, Rita went to the back before returning a few minutes later.

"Miss. Swann'll see ye in the back," Rachel said, helping Kitty up. What Kitty didn't know was that now she had ballooned from 100 pounds to 120, giving her a chubby belly due to the four cakes adding twenty pounds to her weight.
1552123121.title: Kitty goes back the next day

choices: Kitty's friends start to notice something
Dani's next phase of the plan
15521231211.content:
Alicia Swann was in her office, thinking over her plans. She was a attractive 20 something year old woman with long brown hair. She had only taken the bakery over a year ago from her late parents. However, more modern bakeries were getting the attention nowadays. But, Alicia had developed a plan to stop this. "I'm so close to my plans for world dominance. Once everyone gets addicted to my cakes, they'll all be too fat to stop me! It'll teach them to ignore my family's business. " She smiled.

Her thoughts were interrupted by a knock on the door from Rita. "What is it, Rita?" Alicia asked with a fake smile as the young girl waddled in with Kitty behind.

"Hey, Alicia. This' Kitty. She's here about the position." Rita said, pointing to Kitty before leaving the two. Alicia took a moment to look Kitty over. It was clear she'd enjoyed the bakery's cakes, judging from her visible chubby belly and the chocolate frosting smeared around her mouth.

"Hi miss..." Kitty began but was cut off by Alicia waving her hand, hitting her dark blonde hair.

"Please, call me Alicia. I hate the whole formal thing." Alicia said with a smile.

"First I'm gonna ask you some questions and you just answer them to see if you get the job." Alicia added with a smile. In reality, it wasn't a food taste tester she was looking for, but someone who would promote her cakes and it looked like Kitty fit the bill, but she needed to make it look like an actual interview.

"So, first question: Have you ever worked in a bakery before?" Alicia asked as Kitty sat across from her, looking nervous.

"Well, no. But, like, I totally make cupcakes sometimes." Kitty said, a little nervously. Alicia just gave her a warm smile.

"Very good. When would you be able to work?" asked Alicia, tapping her fingers on the desk.

"Like, I can totally come in everyday after school. I usually have a ton of free time then." Kitty offered. That was true. Aside from missions and training, Kitty usually did have everyday after school free.

"Excellent. Now for the final and most important question: How do you like our cakes?" Alicia asked, even though she already knew.

"Like, they're totally awesome! The best cakes I've ever had!" Kitty smiled, rubbing her chubby belly in delight.

"Ok. I think I've heard enough. Welcome aboard." Alicia said, standing up with Kitty as they shook hands. Kitty was feeling pretty proud about getting the best job in the world in her mind.

"Like, when do I start?" Kitty asked, ready to start eating some of those yummy cakes.

"Right now." Said Alicia, quickly calling Rita, who waddled in carrying Kitty's new uniform. It consisted of a red t-shirt, a red visor hat and stretchy black pants. Rita was also holding what looked like a thick diaper. Kitty grabbed both, looking at Alicia in confusion.

"Oh, I forgot to mention that all employees are required to wear diapers so we can have 100% of our employees' time." Alicia explained. Kitty nodded after a moment and ducked into the bathroom to change. A second later, she came out in her new work clothes, the t-shirt already stretched tightly across her belly. "You look perfect." Alicia smiled.

"Thanks. Like, I totally can't wait to try more cakes." Kitty smiled as her belly rumbled, wanting more cake.

"Alright. Go take a seat near the counter. I'll have Rita bring you the first batch." Alicia ordered. Kitty nodded and walked to the front. Alicia went to the kitchen, where six cupcakes with purple frosting were all ready for Kitty. Alicia smirked and then injected a brainwashing serum into them. It would take a few weeks to kick in, but she could wait. "Rita, the first batch is ready." Alicia called.

"Got it boss." said Rita as she grabbed the tray and took it out to Kitty, who was waiting patiently. "Here you go." said Rita, setting the tray down.

"Thanks." Kitty said as she began to eat. She ate cupcake after cupcake until they were all gone. Then, Rita brought out four large chocolate birthday cakes, with Kitty eating them all up. She was so focused on eating that she didn't notice she pooped her diaper twice as she sat back, rubbing her full, large belly.

A few weeks later...
15521231211.title: The interview

choices: Rogue and Jean manage to snap Kitty out of it
155212312111.content:
A few weeks had passed since Kitty got the job and there had been quiet a few changes with her. The first thing was that she had completely fallen under Alicia's brainwashing. Also, her size had increased quite a bit. Her belly was becoming as round as the rest of her, causing her to resemble a sumo wrestler. Her shirt stretched over the large tummy, which now looked like a wrecking ball.

She'd also been going around school, telling everybody about this amazing bakery. This led to quite a few female students and teachers becoming fat. With the exception of the other X-Kids and male staff and students, everybody was becoming bigger. Kitty walked into class late due to finishing her third cake of the morning. "Like, sorry I'm late." Kitty said, taking her seat, causing it to crack under her blubbery and diapered girth.

"It's fine," said the teacher, not really caring as she stuffed a cupcake into her mouth, causing a button on her shirt to pop off. Kitty then pulled out a large cheesecake with whipped cream from her bag and started eating it. This concerned Spyke and Kurt, who'd noticed her increased size like Rogue, Scott and Jean had. Kurt decided to speak up.

"Hey Kitty, maybe you should cut back on the cakes. You're getting pretty big." Kurt said, leaning from his desk and poking her in her large belly. "Like, I totally have no idea what you're talking about. Besides, tasting the cakes is really good money." Kitty said. Thanks to Alicia's brainwashing, Kitty was oblivious to her weight unless ordered otherwise. After that, the X-Kids gave up.

During lunchtime, the X-Kids were sitting together except for Kitty, who was off doing something. All the X-Kids were eating their lunch while the rest of the school (except the male students) were currently eating cakes.

"Something wrong's going on here. Kitty's been getting really fat since she started working at that bakery and she's acting really strange." Scott said with a concerned expression on his face.

"Yeah and a lot of the girls're getting fat too. Even the cheerleaders." Jean said, nodding to the table where said students were sitting. The cheerleaders really were pretty chubby. In fact, every female in the cafeteria also ranged from chubby to fat size wise.

"Look at Taryn." Kurt said, nodding to Jean and Scott's friend. Taryn was currently eating a large chocolate cake that seemed to be four layers thick with large pieces of chocolate on it. She was definitely obese as her belly resembled a wrecking ball and her whole body was as big as Kitty's. Yet, like the other girls, she didn't seem to care as she happily scarfed down the cake, frosting smearing over her face as she did.

"This has gotta be connected ta Kitty an' that bakery." Rogue said with a thoughtful look on her face as she crunched her apple.

"Man, I dunno 'bout you guys, but I think we should investigate that bakery an' see what's happenin' with the K-girl." Spyke suggested with concern for his fellow X-Men, earning nods from the others. The rest of the day went by fairly normally, aside from the fact that Kitty was absent for that time.

After school found them sneaking to Swann bakery, which was now a factory due to increase in demand for their cakes. All five snuck into the factory and saw a whole group of obese, diapered girls making cakes while in the middle of it all was Kitty. She was sitting at a table with Alicia watching her while Rita handed more cakes over for Kitty.

Several of the workers had befriended Kitty over the last few weeks and, like her, were under Alicia's mind controlling serum so they didn't remember most of their original lives aside from their names and were aware of their current sumo-sized weights.

"That's right, Kitty. Keep eating. With your help, soon the world's females will be under my control!" Alicia laughed evilly as Kitty pooped her diaper, the stench carrying around the factory. The X-Kids decided to make themselves known after this.

"Step away from our friend!" Kurt shouted as they appeared from behind a bunch of boxes. Kitty didn't even stop eating her cakes. Alicia rolled her eyes and turned to Kitty.

"Kitty, please help us deal with these fools. Attack." Alicia ordered. Kitty quickly stopped eating her latest cake and charged at her friends surprisingly quick for someone of her girth. Rogue got knocked out almost instantly by Kitty's large belly, being caught off guard for said attack. The others soon followed suit as they didn't want to use their powers out of fear of hurting their friend. Alicia looked over the knocked out X-Kids and suddenly had an idea.

"Kitty, I want you to tie these two up, change them into the company uniform and diapers and force feed them. Rita and Suzanne, help me take those three to be frozen." Alicia ordered, nodding to Jean and Rogue and Scott, Kurt and Spyke respectively as she, along with Rita and a large African-American girl with black hair tied in a ponytail grabbed the latter three and drug them to the factory's enormous freezer.

"Yes," said Kitty nodding as she grabbed two uniforms and diapers for Jean and Rogue. She quickly changed them and tied them up to two chairs. When Rogue and Jean woke up, the first thing they noticed was the diapers and that they were tied up. Before they could even speak, they were being force fed numerous cakes. As time passed, Jean and Rogue started to become fatter and fatter, their bellies becoming rounder and they had no choice, but use their diapers, causing Kitty to laugh as she watched her obese and helpless friends poop and pee their diapers again.
155212312111.title: Kitty's friends start to notice something

1552123121111.content:
Alicia, Rita and Suzanne quickly finished freezing Scott, Kurt and Spyke, making them look like blocks of ice. Alicia smiled at the handy work in evil delight. "Alright. With that taken care of, I have some work to go over." Alicia said, heading to the office while Suzanne went back to work with the other girls.

"Rita, don't forget to lock up the antidote cupcake!" ordered Alicia, who had made said cupcake in case she ever accidently ate one of her cakes. "Aye, lass." Rita said as Alicia went into her office. Rita went over to lock up the cupcake, when the timer went off for some other cakes. "Och. Alicia'll kill me if I let the cakes burn." said a worried Rita, waddling to the ovens.

Unknown to either Rita or Alicia, Scott's optic beam was charging up and a second later, he had freed himself, causing him to fall to his knees and hands. "Finally." remarked Scott as he got up and quickly began freeing Spyke and Kurt. Within minutes, the duo were freed.

"Thanks man." Spyke said as Scott helped him up. "Vere are Jean und Rogue?" Kurt asked, looking for said duo. "I dunno but I overheard Alicia talking about an antidote cupcake that can destroy the brainwashing. We just need to feed it to Kitty, then we'll try and find Rogue and Jean." Scott replied, earning nods from the duo as he grabbed the large pink frosted and rainbow sprinkled cupcake as they left.

The trio started looking around the factory and what they saw a few minutes later shocked them. There was Rogue and Jean, tied up, donned in the bakery's uniforms and diapers and being force fed cake. The duo had put on quite a bit of weight, the t-shirts riding up above their bellybuttons. Kitty was still force feeding them, often swiping bites from the cakes herself.

"Kitty, stop!" Kurt called, startling Kitty as Scott quickly used his optic blasts to free Rogue and Jean, who quickly used their new weight to pin Kitty down as they tackled her.

"Quick! Get this in her mouth!" Scott called, tossing the cupcake to Rogue, who quickly stuffed it into Kitty's mouth. Kitty, out of habit, ate it and then burped loudly. It took a couple of minutes for the antidote to take hold.

"Errg. Like, what happened?" Kitty asked as Jean and Rogue managed to get off her. Then, all the memories of her time mind controlled came flooding in. "Like, oh man guys. I'm so totally sorry." Kitty said, feeling awful for hurting her friends.
