"It's okay, Kit. Ya can make it up by gettin' Alicia for us while we try an' free Rita and her friends." Rogue smiled as she helped Kitty up. Kitty nodded and took off fairly quickly despite her weight and full diaper. Soon, she reached Alicia's office and phased through the door, shocking Alicia.

"Kitty? What is it? I told you to force feed those brats!" Alicia commanded. "Like, I'm totally me again, Alicia! My friend Jean's, like, totally going to free Rita and the others now." Kitty smiled.

"NO!!! That freak'll pay for this!!!" Alicia snarled as she grabbed a tube filled with red liquid. "Once I make her drink this, your idiot friend will be addicted just like you were!" she laughed. "Like, no way!" Kitty shouted, tackling Alicia and pinning her under her gut. Quickly, Kitty grabbed the vial and forced it's entire contents into Alicia's throat. Within seconds, Alicia swelled up into a sumo version of herself, knocking Kitty off.

"What've you done to me?!?!? You stupid mutie!" Alicia roared as she tackled Kitty with her girth, sending the duo toppling into the main factory. "Kitty!" Kurt shouted as he fought Brianna, who was wielding a rolling pin.

Despite some difficulty, Alicia and Kitty managed to stand up. "Like, it's okay Kurt! You guys get Rita and the others free! I'll totally stop Alicia!" Kitty shouted as she and Alicia commenced a sumo-wrestling match.

"On it!" Kurt shouted as he managed to evade Brianna's pin and then knocked her down with a kick to her double chin. Scott meanwhile was fighting Rita and Suzanne while Spyke dealt with two Asian girls and Rogue wrestled with a sumo-sized Hindu girl.

"No one can stop me, Pryde!" Alicia snarled in delight as she belly-flopped onto Kitty. However, Kitty smirked as she phased out from Alicia and then sat on her, pinning Alicia to the floor. "EEEuuggghh!! Stupid wide load mutie! Get off me!" Alicia shrieked in fury as she wiggled and jiggled in dismay. However, Kitty just smirked and pooped her diaper again.

"Now, Jean!" Scott shouted as he dodged Rita's attack with a knife and eggbeater. Jean closed her eyes and focused hard on the girls. Alicia smirked evilly as Jean began straining slightly but then, to her horror, she saw Rita and the other girls freeze mid-attack.

"Wh-what's happnin'?" Rita stammered in shock as she looked at Cyclops, laying before her feet. "I don't know. The last thing I remember is going into Swann bakery and eating a slice of chocolate cake." Brianna admitted as she helped Kurt up, having just knocked him down with a round kick to his chest. "Yeah. Me too. What're the X-Men doin' here?" agreed one of Evan's Asian opponents.

"We came to save our friend from Alicia." Scott explained. "Do you guys remember anythin' from the last few months or so?" asked Rogue, looking at her Hindu opponent. "N-no. It's all a blur of cake and hazy memories." the girl said. "They're telling the truth, Cyclops." Jean confirmed as she kept scanning the other girls' minds. "The serum must've locked your memories away the longer you consumed it." Scott realized. "What serum?" asked the younger Asian girl from beside her big sister and Evan.

"A mind control serum that Alicia here used to get you girls to do her bidding." Rogue replied. "I don't believe it!" said the Hindu girl in outrage. "You took us all from our homes, our families and our lives just to do your evil bidding?!?!?" she snarled at Alicia.

"So what? My family have been top bakers for 120 years! But no one wants to use old fashioned bakeries for weddings or things anymore! You morons prefer using more modern and newfangled ones instead!" Alicia spat from under Kitty's very full diaper.

"Well, you'll have lots of time to think about things where you're going, Alicia." Jean frowned. "What about us?" asked Brianna nervously. "Don't worry. you were all innocent. As long as we tell the police that, you'll be okay." Scott smiled kindly. "What're your names? We know Suzanne, Rita and Brianna from Kitty talking about them but.." He added.

"I'm Parvati Koothrapali from Queens. My family owns a popular eatery there." said Rogue's Hindu opponent with a grin. "I'm Wanda Yeung and this is my baby sis Cho." said the bigger Asian girl from beside Spyke as her sister smiled and waved. "S'up?" Cho smiled as Wanda rolled her eyes in amusement.

Jean used her telepathy to unlock each girl's memories from before and during their time under Alicia's brainwash. Wanda and Cho remembered coming to Swann bakery, having gone there to pick up a delivery for their mom, only to end up applying for a job after trying a free sample. Brianna recalled joining the staff after applying for a job there due to trying a sample at a supermarket.

Suzanne had ended up at the bakery when Rita, revealed to be her best friend, had suggested it to her. Parvati, meanwhile, had wound up there due to her mother's friend also recommending it as a good after school job.

A few weeks later, Kitty, Jean and Rogue were having a victory party in Kitty's room. The girls, due to being brainwashed, had been cleared of charges, just like Scott had said. They had kept in touch with Kitty and the X-Kids and both Wanda and Cho were revealed to be mutants and would join the institute next year. Rita, meanwhile, had taken over the bakery and was doing a good job running it as it was discovered she was Alicia's maternal cousin.

Meanwhile, the girls had all returned to normal size due to the antidote Alicia kept in her office. However, Alicia had been barred from doing so by the X-Kids as punishment. Alicia had been jailed and was now currently awaiting trial. The Bayville High female students and staff were all back to normal via the antidote as well. Well... almost all of them.

"Like, good thing we totally decided against using the cure to loose this blubber." Kitty smiled to Jean and Rogue as they ate their way through heaps of junk food. Jean was eating numerous creampuffs, Rogue was chomping down on peanut butter, snickerdoodle and chocolate chip cookies and Kitty was eating numerous cakes. They were also clad in only t-shirts and diapers.

"Yeah. I can't believe we ever hated being fat. We're still pretty active and agile even with our current sizes and we're really strong!" Jean smiled before stuffing six big creampuffs into her mouth, smearing powdered sugar and frosting on her face and mouth.

At that moment, Kitty, eating a large cake with her hands, pooped her diaper. "Oopsie!" She blushed as the stench filled the room. "Good thing we also decided ta keep wearin' and usin' diapers!" Rogue joked, causing them to laugh as they continued their party.
1552123121111.title: Scott frees himself

1552123131.content:
Kitty was on her way home when she noticed a new doughnut shop. Since she'd never seen it before, she decided to go inside.

When she walked inside, Kitty noticed the shop was very retro themed. As she walked up to the counter, she rose an eyebrow at some of the names since they were all stuff like "the gut puncher" and "the stuffer". "Like, those are totally strange names for doughnuts." Kitty thought to herself as she was brought out of her thoughts by the woman working behind the counter.

"Hello. Welcome to Doughnut Paradise. How may I help you?" said the woman in a much too cheery tone for the job she had in Kitty's opinion. Kitty looked at the menu and took a few seconds before making her mind up.

"Like, I'll have two gut punchers," Kitty said. The woman nodded and pulled two gut punchers out from the display case. Kitty was surprised by the size of them. They were as round as her head with red and blue sprinkles on them. The woman put them into a to-go bag.

"Ok miss, that'll be three dollars." said the woman in her cheery voice. Kitty was surprised by how cheap the doughnuts were given their size, but nevertheless handed over a ten and told the woman to keep the change. Once out of the shop, Kitty pulled one of the doughnuts out and took a bite. Her taste buds exploded, it was the best thing she'd ever tasted and she kept eating as she walked. By the time she got back to the mansion, she had finished both doughnuts and was rubbing her bloated belly.

"Like, I totally need to go there again!" Kitty said to herself, letting out a jumbo burp, still rubbing her belly.
1552123131.title: Doughnuts

155212313132.content:
It had been a month since Kitty had first entered the doughnut shop and she had been going three times a day for the last month, her orders getting larger and larger and that wasn't the only thing getting larger.

Kitty had also put on quiet a bit of weight due to her new diet. She was pretty round as you could see her belly through her tight cream t-shirt and her blue jeans looked painfully tight while showing her large, round butt.

She was in the middle of eating a doughnut when she was called to go on a mission. So she changed into her X-Man uniform, though it wasn't fitting as well either, showing off her round. She also seemed oblivious to her weight gain. As Kitty was about to zip up her uniform...
155212313132.title: Noticably rounder

1552123131322.content:
Kitty was tugging at her navy blue and purple uniform when she heard a loud ripping sound. She looked down to see her uniform had ripped down the side, letting her love handle spill out. "Oh man. Like, I must've totally shrunk it in the wash." Kitty muttered, still completely oblivious to her weight gain as she quickly pulled the uniform off and placed it in the bin, promising to get a new one.

"Like, I'm totally sure the others can handle whatever threat's come up," Kitty said, tugging on her civilian clothes with a lot of effort. Once she got her clothes on, her belly rumbled and she decided it was best to grab some doughnuts and waddled to the doughnut shop. When she arrived, she found there weren't too many customers, which wasn't surprising since it was still pretty early.

"Hello, Kitty. I see you're in again," smiled the woman behind the counter. Kitty had been in the shop so often, she was on first name basis with most of the employees who were always cheerful.

"Hey, Betty. Like, can I totally get my usual order?" Kitty asked. Betty nodded and stuffed 20 doughnuts into a box. Three were of different kinds since Kitty's taste in doughnuts had greatly improved. she quickly thanked Betty and waddled out of the shop, her belly jiggling as she did so.

By the time she'd reached the mansion, Kitty had eaten six of her 20 doughnuts, sprinkles and powdered sugar covering her mouth as she flopped onto the living room couch, making her belly jiggle as she laid on her back, using one hand to pick her bellybutton and using the other to eat the rest of her doughnuts.
1552123131322.title: It rips

15521231313222.content:
Scott, Jean, Kurt, Rogue and Spyke were all sitting around. There wasn't any missions or anyone needing help so they decided to just have a relaxing day. But Scott noticed someone was missing. "Hey, where's Kitty?" He asked, picking some loose fabric from his blue sweater, the dark lenses of his glasses watching the door.

"She's probably at that doughnut shop again," Jean said, rolling her eyes as she tucked some of her red hair behind her ear. "I think she's spending too much time there. I think she's getting kind of..."

Before Jean could finish her sentence, there was a loud cracking sound. A second later, they saw Kitty waddling up to the door while using one hand to eat one of the doughnuts from a very big bag of them. But as she got up to the door and tried to go through, she found that she was stuck. Her big love handles pressed against the doorframe. She tried to free herself but couldn't. After a minute, she gave up, huffing and puffing and her round face slightly red.

"Like, hey guys. Can you help me?" Kitty asked, waving her flabby arms, half a doughnut in her mouth. "Kurt, you teleport and push from behind while I pull," Scott said. Kur nodded and teleported behind Kitty and the duo started to push and pull. It took a couple of minutes until Kitty was completely free.

"Like, thanks guys." Kitty said, shoving another doughnut into her mouth. "Maybe you should cut back on the doughnuts," said Kurt, clearly concerned for Kitty as she waddled to the couch. "I'm, like, totally fine." Kitty said, flopping on the couch, causing her whole body to jiggle and repositioned herself so she was laying on her back, making her burp loudly with a giggle following afterward. As she made herself comfortable, the other moved away to talk about her for a few minutes.

"Guys, Ah'm worried about Kitty. She's gettin' huge and Ah bet it's somethin' ta do with that doughnut shop she's been going too." Rogue said with a worried look towards Kitty as she happily scarfed her large bag of doughnuts, burying her head into the bag.

"You're right. Maybe we should go check the place out." Jean said with a shrug.

"Alright. Kurt, Jean and I'll go check it out while Rogue, you and Spyke keep an eye on Kitty to make sure she doesn't get any bigger." Scott said. Kurt then grabbed Jean and Scott's shoulders and teleported them to an ally behind the doughnut shop. They looked around and saw an open window.

"Well, that's lucky." Kurt said as they all climbed through the window when they saw...
15521231313222.title: A month later

choices: Kitty is rescued by her friends
155212313132221.content:
As Scott, Jean and Kurt entered the shop through the window, they saw a middle aged man that had a whole mad scientist look about him, seeing as he was talking to himself. Jean signaled for them to hide behind some barrels and they listened to the mad scientist talking to himself. "Yes. My test subject is coming along perfectly, now that Miss. Pryde is growing huge. Soon, I will release my doughnuts around the world and everyone will be too fat to resist me taking over the world!" laughed Eugene Sprinkles. The trio decided it was time to make their presence known.

"Not if we stop you," said Kurt as he, Jean and Scott revealed themselves. "Ah, I see Kitty's little friends have come to put a stop to my plans." said Sprinkles with a huge smirk on his face.

"We will stop you," said Scott. But as soon as he stopped talking, a strange mist filled the room, making Scott, Jean and Kurt pass out. Sprinkles walked over to them smirking. "Don't worry you will all wake up soon with a little soreness." He smirked.

This current situation had put a big dent in his plans. He would need to put his off hand monitoring and take on a more practical approach. Grabbing a very large bag of doughnuts, he left for the X-Mansion. Upon showing up, he saw Rogue and Spyke arguing over something in the kitchen while Kitty was still laying on the couch, holding her empty bag of doughnuts with a sigh. Smirking, Sprinkles went to the front of the mansion and started speaking through an open window, "Come on, Kitty. Don't you want some tasty doughnuts?" said Sprinkles, waving the large bag of doughnuts back and forth.

"Doughnuts..." Kitty said in an almost trance like state as she managed to get up and waddled to the door, turning sideways so she could get through. She then followed Sprinkles, with him feeding her doughnuts as he led her to his mansion, which took awhile to get to. Once there, Sprinkles helped Kitty onto a large king sized bed as she munched on doughnuts, moaning in delight as she did, getting frosting, sprinkles and sugar all over herself as she devoured tray after tray of them while laying either on her belly or back.

A few days later, Sprinkles ran into a problem. Kitty seemed to have entered an eating trance, an unforeseen side effect of having nothing to eat but doughnuts, though the scientist didn't mind this side effect, it also brought out another side effect. Due to being in an eating trance, Kitty didn't notice she was peeing and pooping her pants due to forgetting about going to the bathroom. The scientist struggled to find away to fix this as he had to keep repeatedly clean her underpants and pants before deciding on putting her in diapers to deal with the problem.

Taking advantage of Kitty sleeping soundly, drooling in her sleep and sucking her thumb, he put her in a large thick diaper, taking time to lovingly jiggle her big belly and love handles. This diaper wasn't like normal ones. It was able to be cleaned after each use, even the wettest pee or stickiest poop couldn't stain it and it never wore out. The diaper was also very soft inside with fluffy padding. It wasn't long before this task was done and he went back to his main mission of spreading his doughnuts around the world.

A month later...
155212313132221.title: A bad guy

1552123131322211.content:
It had been a month since Kitty ended up in Sprinkle's care. Though Kitty didn't seem to notice the passing time since she spent most of it eating or sleeping or, in some occasions, eating while sleeping, notably at night. It became normal for Mr. Sparkles to come downstairs and find Kitty with her head in the fridge, loudly scarfing down doughnuts in between snores while her large diapered butt jiggled and wiggled with each movement.

Mr. Sprinkles was quiet happy with how much Kitty had grown. Her belly was now so big, it hung over the waistband of her diaper while her face was like a blob of dough with a double chin, plus her arms and legs were squishy and flabby, her fingers, hands, feet and toes were all plump and her boobs had swollen considerably as well and her butt was like a very ripe pumpkin.

She had also mostly outgrown all but her stretchy bra and her diaper over the last month. Though she briefly felt embarrassed, Kitty quickly forgot all about it and went back to her eating.

In order to see if Kitty was still mobile, Sprinkles did an experiment in which he had her waddle to the living room. He found that, though she was able to do so, Kitty was left very out of breath and quite slow. She then flopped onto her belly and started eating the very big doughnuts left for her while still laying down.

After the experiment, Mr. Sprinkles quickly changed into a smart suit. He had a meeting with a high ranking government official to get his doughnut franchise spread around the world. After checking to make sure that Kitty was still in an eating trance and had enough doughnuts to make her full and sleepy, he started to leave, only for a thick cloud of smoke to appear in front of him.

As the smoke cleared, he saw it was five mutant teenagers, three of who he recognized from the month before when they broke into his shop. All five were very shocked to see Kitty, semi-naked, fat and diapered while she started on another doughnut.

"Wow. Kitty's as big as a pig," Rogue remarked, looking at her obese teammate and best friend. "Why did you make our friend fat?" Scott asked, glaring at Mr. Sprinkles.

"Oh, your friend is just helping me with my plan to conquer the world," Mr. Sprinkles smirked as he unleashed a pink mist. However, he was left confused by the fact it didn't have any effect on the five teenagers. He was even more shocked by the effect it had on Kitty.

"Hey. Like, where am I? What's goin' on?" Kitty asked, looking around in confusion at her friends and the mad scientist. When she looked down, she could only just see her feet over her big belly. "Like, why am I so fat?!?!?" She asked, shaking her belly and thus causing it to jiggle and bounce.

"Ve'll explain later," Kurt said as he and the others began fighting Sprinkles. Despite their efforts, Sprinkles was quite slippery and managed to avoid their physical or telekinetic attacks. As he got near Kitty, she saw her chance and threw herself at him. Before he could move, Kitty belly flopped on him, knocking him out cold. Scott and Kurt quickly heaved her up while Jean and Spyke tied up the Mr. Sprinkles.

"Thanks guys. So, like, what happened?" Kitty asked, still getting used to her girth and blushing bright red at the fact she was naked aside from her bra and crinkly undergarment.

"Basically, you were used as a test subject by the scientist dude who wanted to make everybody fat so he could rule the world." Spyke explained, having been told of the man's plan by Scott, Jean and Kurt after the trio had returned to the mansion a month prior.

"Like, okay," Kitty said, clearly still confused over the whole ordeal.

"Uh, Kitty... are ya wearin' a diaper?" Rogue asked, trying and failing not to laugh at how silly Kitty looked in the extra large diaper. "Like, I totally don't know why." said Kitty in embarrassment, her round cheeks blushing even deeper bright red as she poked the undergarment.

"We'll figure that out later," Kurt smiled as he teleported the gang home, leaving Sprinkles to the authorities.

A year later found Kitty heading to hang with her friends. Though she had dropped most of the weight, returning her face, boobs, arms, feet, legs, butt, hands, toes and fingers to normal, she nevertheless sported a rather large belly that hugged her shirts and sweaters. She also retained her jumbo appetite as well. Despite this, she was happy this way and her friends knew and supported it. Kitty was still able to go on missions and was actually still fairly agile despite her remaining fat.

However, unknown to the other X-Kids, Kitty still wore the thick, cleanable diaper she'd been introduced to by Mr. Sprinkles. It made her feel comfy and safe.
1552123131322211.title: Kitty is rescued by her friends

1552123132.content:
Kitty and her friends were sitting in an ice cream parlor in one of the booths. They'd decided it would be a nice treat to go get ice cream together. They were looking through the menus, trying to decide on what each of them wanted. "Wow. Like, these flavors look totally amazing!" Kitty smiled, showing a picture of a bowl of strawberry ice cream with chocolate sauce, earning a hungry stare from the other X-Kids.

"Yeah, I know. Not to mention they've got really large ice cream sundaes here. They look incredible." Scott agreed, showing the others, who licked their lips in hunger as they eyed the image. This gave Rogue an idea as she stared at the menu.

"Hey, Kitty. Ah dare ya to eat an entire sundae by yourself without any help from us. If ya do, Ah'll give ya 20 bucks." Rogue offered with a smirk. Kitty thought about it. On one hand, the picture made the sundae look massive. But then, on the other, 20 dollars was 20 dollars.

"Like, that twenty dollars is totally mine!" Kitty smirked back as she closed her menu. After waiting a few seconds after Scott got up to place their orders before returning to take his seat next to Jean. A few minutes later, a waitress arrived with five bowls of ice cream: mint for Jean, chocolate for Kurt, strawberry for Scott and two peanut butter ice creams for Rogue and Spyke. Then, she turned to Kitty.

"I'll bring your order in just a second," smiled the waitress as she went back, leaving Kitty to watch her friends eat their ice creams. A minute later, the waitress arrived and placed a massive sundae in front of Kitty. It had large scoops of ice cream, which were drenched in hot fudge sauce, a generous amount of whipped cream and a huge red cherry on top. Kitty's mouth was watering and her friends were shocked by the size of the sundae.

"Ha! There's no way ya can eat all'a that!" Rogue smirked, already gloating.

"Like, nope! That 20 dollars is totally mine!" said Kitty, grabbing her spoon and digging in. Her taste buds exploded with flavor. She kept eating and eating until a half-hour later, the sundae was gone, leaving a very green looking Kitty clutching her bloated belly, her face filled with pain.

"Kitty? Are you alright? You don't look so good." Kurt said with concern for his friend.

"Like, I'm totally fine..." said Kitty. She was then interrupted by herself slapping her hand over her mouth as she felt bile raising in her throat while feeling herself starting to gag, making her cheeks puff up, but Kitty managed to swallow it down, releasing her hand and letting out a large burp. "Excuse me." said Kitty and then she turned to Rogue. "Like, pay up." Kitty said with a smug smile, despite her poor belly's pain.

"Ah still can't believe ya managed ta eat it all," Rogue said, rolling her eyes as she forked over the money and Kurt and Scott helped Kitty out of the booth.

"Like, yeah. But it totally tasted amazing! I have to, like, totally do this again," said Kitty as she followed her friends out of the shop.
1552123132.title: Ice cream

15521231321.content:
It had been a whole week since the group of mutant teens went to the ice cream parlor and unbeknownst to the others, Kitty had been going back once a day to get a cup of ice cream, resulting in her putting on a little weight. Nothing major, just five pounds. None of her friends noticed this because they spend 99% of the time together.

One day the gang decided to visit the ice cream parlor again for another treat after a busy week as they took their seat in a booth. "I still can't believe you managed to eat a whole sundae last week," Jean said with a giggle as she looked over the ice cream menu.

"Yeah. But it tasted totally amazing," Kitty said, licking her lips as she imagined the sundae despite the fact that she'd almost thrown up all over the table the last time she'd had it. Scott then had an idea.

"Hey, Kitty. I'll bet you 100 dollars that you can't eat two of those sundaes," said Scott with a smug grin, remembering the state Kitty had been in after eating just one last week. Kitty thought about it. Two sundaes were a lot to eat, but her appetite had been increasing over the past week. Plus, she could use the 100 dollars to buy something. After a couple more seconds of thinking, she decided.

"I accept your dare," Kitty said with a smirk. Jean went over and placed the order and returned a minute later. After ten minutes, two waitresses came to the table. One was holding the rest of the group's orders while the second held Kitty's two large sundaes similar to the one she'd ordered last time. After saying thanks to the duo, the rest of the group ate their ice creams while watching Kitty as she devoured the first sundae, getting hot fudge all over her face. But as she started the second one, she slowed down, starting to feel full. But she still ate and ate until the last sundae was gone, leaving Kitty looking very green. Even her ears had turned green.

"I can't believe I lost 100 dollars," sighed Scott as he handed Kitty the money. Kitty was about to retort but she then felt bile raising in her throat. She quickly got up, grateful to have chosen to sit next to the booth's opening, and ran off to the bathroom surprisingly quick for being so bloated like she was.

Upon reaching the bathroom, she entered the nearest cubical and threw up straight into the toilet, thick brown liquid hitting the water. After a few minutes, Jean and Rogue entered as Kitty barfed one more time, nearly dunking her head into the toilet as she did.

"You okay, Kitty?" Jean asked, looking at her bloated friend bent over the toilet.

"Yeah. Like, I totally think I got it all out of my system." Kitty said as Rogue helped her up and back to the rest of the group.
15521231321.title: A week later

155212313211.content:
It had been a whole month since Kitty had done her second sundae dare. Ever since that day, Kitty had been making multiple trips to the ice cream parlor daily, mainly getting ice cream cones. This had led to a massive change in her weight and appearance.

Her belly now hung over the waistband of her way too tight pants, her boobs had gone up at least two cup sizes while her face had gotten a bit rounder with chubby cheeks and a double chin coming in. All her friends had noticed Kitty's change in weight, but had decided against saying anything that might hurt their friend's feelings.

But there was something her friends didn't know. Due to having numerous peeing and pooping accidents in her pants (mainly the latter), Kitty had resorted to wearing diapers, which had two benefits in her mind. One was she didn't have to stop eating when she needed to use the toilet plus it made her feel more comfortable. One day, Kitty was back in the parlor with her friends when Jean had a small smirk on her face.

"Hey, Kitty. I bet you can't..." Jean began, but was interrupted by Kitty.

"Like, let me guess... you totally wanna bet that, like, I totally can't eat a whole sundae." Kitty said, rolling her eyes. Eating a whole sundae had become such an easy task for her at this point, she could probably finish two and still have room for at least seven ice cream cones.

"Actually, I was gonna bet you couldn't eat a whole banana split," Jean said, pointing to a picture on the menu, making Kitty drool slightly.

"Like, bring it on!" said Kitty with a confident smirk as Scott went to place their order and returned to the group. After a few minutes, two waitresses carried the banana split over and placed it in front of Kitty, who was surprised by the size of it. It had three bananas, several scoops of chocolate, blue moon, vanilla and strawberry ice cream, hot fudge and a big spray of whipped cream on top, complete with a cherry on top. Suddenly, Kitty didn't feel confident about eating it, but nevertheless grabbed a spoon and started to eat.

A half hour later, Kitty had managed to eat half of the banana split before she started to rub her belly, looking very queasy. Seeing that their friend needed help, Spyke and Rogue started cheering her on.

"C'mon K-girl! You can do it!" Evan said encouragingly to Kitty. "Listen ta him, Kit! Ya can't let that oversized dessert beat ya!" Rogue agreed with an equally encouraging smile. Feeling a bit better and having freed up some room in her belly due to twice using her diaper, Kitty grabbed her spoon and started to eat the rest of the banana split.

Once she was done, she leaned back, rubbing her belly with hot fudge sauce on her cheeks and bits of ice cream on her shirt and sweater. "Wow. I can't believe you actually ate all that," Jean said, a little surprised by how much Kitty had eaten.

Kitty just smirked, still rubbing her swollen belly and thinking that she was getting very good at this eating ice cream thing as Kurt helped her up from the booth and she waddled after her friends, burping and hiccupping on the way home.
155212313211.title: A month later

1552123132111.content:
Another three weeks had passed and Kitty had been visiting the ice cream parlor even more often than before and most of the time she would end up ordering a sundae maybe two if she was extra hungry.

A lot of changes had happened to Kitty. She put on even more weight. Her belly had grown bigger along with her boobs and butt and she had fully developed a double chin that wobbled as she talked and a third one was sneaking up on her. She also had to upgrade her wardrobe due to popping the button of her pants while eating one of her sundaes. She had also gotten a bigger sweater and t-shirt, but they still seemed very tight, highlighting her belly and love handles.

She even had to get bigger diapers to contain her growing butt, though Kitty still seemed pretty oblivious to her massive weight gain. She thought it was only a few pounds at the most.

Kitty was lying on the couch watching TV, the remote control laying on her belly when suddenly her belly let out a massive rumble, causing the remote to jiggle and bounce on it. "Wow. Like, I totally better grab something to eat. It's totally almost dinnertime." thought Kitty as she got up and waddled to the kitchen to start making herself dinner, even though it wasn't anywhere near dinnertime.

Along with her visits to the ice cream parlor, her appetite at home had grown as well, making her eat more often and larger amounts. Kitty finished making her dinner, which looked like it could feed three people and started to eat it quite messily, with some of it getting on her clothes and face. Kurt walked past and rose an eyebrow, but didn't say anything.

Later that night, Kitty was laying in bed, trying to sleep, but she was feeling too hungry to sleep. Rolling over, she saw that her clock read midnight. "Hmm... Like, I totally guess a quick midnight snack totally couldn't hurt." Kitty thought as she got out of bed, her pink pajama t-shirt clinging to her belly and her matching shorts looking like they were going to burst at any minute. It didn't exactly help that she was wearing her thick diaper underneath them as well.

Kitty waddled out of her room, going slow as possible to try and not wake anyone up. When she got to the kitchen, she started to make a sandwich with cheese, ham, tomato, lettuce, mayo, five pickles, lots of ketchup and an olive on top while also grabbing a carton of milk.

Rogue was awakened by creaking floorboards and quickly jumped out of bed, following the sound and found a light in the kitchen. Peeking her head in, she saw Kitty gulping down her massive midnight snack and downing a carton of milk.

"Alright. This is gettin' outta hand," Rogue said quietly, rolling her eyes as she left Kitty to enjoy her midnight snack. The next day, Rogue met her friends in the kitchen, except for Kitty, who was still sleeping. "Hey. Is it me or is Kitty gettin' really fat lately?" Rogue asked as she grabbed a cinnamon roll.

"She is getting pretty big. Yesterday I walked by and she was eating a meal that would feed three people," Kurt said, a little worried for his friend.

"An' last night Ah saw her eatin' a large sandwich and downin' an entire carton of milk," Rogue said.

"Do you think we should say something?" Jean asked just as they heard the sound of creaking floorboards and a few minutes later, Kitty waddled in. "Hey guys. Like, what're you talking about?" She asked, waddling over to the fridge and opening it.

"Kitty, we need to talk to you about something..." Scott started, trying to find a nice way to say that Kitty was getting fat, but was interrupted by Rogue.

"Kitty, you're gettin' fat an' eatin' a ton," Rogue said, poking Kitty's belly, her finger sinking into Kitty's belly fat, which caused Kitty to slap her hand away.

"Like, what're you guys talking about? I'm totally not getting fat. I, like, only put on a few pounds at the most," Kitty said, in denial of her about her weight.

"But you are getting fat and you've been eating everything. You really need to cut back," Kurt said, earning nods from the rest of the group.

"Like, you guys are totally just being mean," Kitty said, grabbing a bag of Cheetos and waddling away in a huff, leaving her friends very confused and all promising to help Kitty loose weight.
1552123132111.title: Three weeks later

choices: Everyone at school notices her weight gain
15521231321111.content:
It had been a whole week since Kitty's friends had confronted her about her weight gain and her diet had taken an even bigger turn. Every day for breakfast, she would have a stack of pancakes covered in maple syrup and a whole box of doughnuts with mixed kinds.

She usually also had a bunch of snacks to tie her over until lunchtime where she had three PB&J sandwiches, 12 chocolate chip cookies and a large soda to wash it all down. And when dinnertime arrived, Kitty usually ate fourths of whatever was being served except for fruits and vegetables, which she wouldn't touch. During one meal, Scott decided to speak up.

"Kitty, you really need to cut back on the meals, plus all the junk food you've been eating." said Scott, causing Kitty to pause in the middle of eating her fourth plate of pasta.

"I agree with Scott. You really do need to cut back like we told you last week. You're getting even bigger." said Jean, who was sitting closest to Kitty and was poking her finger into Kitty's much bigger belly, her finger sinking into the flab. Kitty slapped her hand away.

"First of all, I'm, like, totally not fat and second of all, I'm totally not addicted to junk food." Kitty said, grabbing her plate of pasta and waddling away, eating her pasta as she did. As she reached her room, she was slightly out of breath. As she laid down on her bed, she noticed a leftover chocolate bar poking out of her underpants drawer. This gave her an idea.

"Like, if my friends totally have a problem with me eating junk food, I'll just hide it in my room." Kitty thought to herself as she started picking places to hide her junk food. She then waited until midnight when everybody was asleep and then waddled down to the kitchen, grabbed several types of junk food and then carried them back to her room.

A few days later, the gang walked into Kitty's room while she was out. They were looking for a couple of study notes Kitty had agreed to let Evan and Kurt look over for an upcoming test. After a couple of minutes looking, Rogue grew bored and decided to sit on Kitty's bed.

As soon as her butt touched the bed, she felt something crumple under her butt. She quickly jumped up and pulled the blankets back to reveal a smooshed banana cream pie and a pizza box. containing a half eaten pepperoni and sausage pizza. "Okay. That's just plain gross," said Rogue, lifting the destroyed pie and pizza up to show the others.

"You think Kitty's been hiding junk food?" asked Kurt, raising an eyebrow. "Looks like it. We can't let her keep it. We need to find the rest. Start looking." Scott ordered. Everybody started to look. After a few minutes, Jean found a massive stash. There was several types of junk food. Spyke grabbed a bag and started putting the junk food in the bag just as Kitty waddled in and saw her friends destroying her junk food supply.

"Like, what're you guys doing?!?!?!?" Kitty shouted, shocked at what her friends were doing. Kurt decided to speak up since he was the more diplomatic of the group.

"Look Kitty, ve are doing this for your own good. You've got a junk food problem and ve are just trying to help you. Ve're your friends. You need to trust us." Kurt said in a calming tone, trying to get his friend to understand.

"NO YOU'RE NOT! LIKE, YOU'RE DOING THIS TO HURT ME!" Kitty screamed, stomping her foot and causing her whole body to jiggle like jelly. "You know what? Forget you guys! Like, I'm totally going to school!" Kitty screamed as she started waddling away to school.

What next?
15521231321111.title: A week later

choices: Kitty finally admits she has a problem
155212313211111.content:
Kitty finally made it to school. It took a bit longer than usual because she had to keep stopping every few minutes to catch her breath. When she got into the building, she waddled straight to her locker where she grabbed a package of cookies she'd been hiding in her locker and started to eat them five at a time.

Kitty didn't notice that most of the school had been looking at her. Everybody had noticed her weight gain by now. Most didn't care and went about their own business but some were laughing behind her back as the bell rang.

Kitty made her way to class, bumping into a few classmates with her huge belly, which she was completely oblivious too. When she got to class, she spent most of it sneaking bits of food from her bag, mostly candy and cookies. She did this for every class until lunchtime.

There, she got herself four trays of food from hamburgers to pizza slices to corn dogs and ate them, causing several of the students to stare in amazement at how much she was eating. After half an hour, Kitty had finally finished eating, leaving herself covered with sauce and bits of pepperoni and she had also used her diaper at least three times while she was eating.

Luckily for her, she always kept a few spare diapers in her bag. She was going to change once her bloating went down and she was starting to feel slightly sick. After ten minutes of rubbing her belly and trying not to throw up, two cheerleaders came up to the table with mean looks on their faces. Kitty noticed them. "Hey." said Kitty, covering her mouth with her hand to stop a big burp.

"Wow, Pryde. You've really turned into a fat pig, haven't you?" said one of the cheerleaders, poking Kitty in her large squishy belly. Before Kitty could respond after barely avoiding the sudden urge to urp, cheerleader number two spoke up.

"Yeah. You've turned into a big whale," laughed the other cheerleader, causing the other one to laugh and Kitty to blush. "Like, you guys are totally just mean," Kitty said, getting up with some difficulty and waddling away, the cheerleaders laughing behind her.

Kitty made her way to the toilets where she spent another half hour sitting on a toilet seat before she finally felt like her food had digested enough for her to actually change her very full, wet and stinky diaper. Once she was changed, she suddenly got a craving for ice cream again.

After a few minutes of thinking it over, Kitty decided to give into her cravings. "Like, I've totally only got two classes left away. Plus, I can, like, totally get notes from Jean and Kurt anyway." Kitty thought, wadding out of the toilets and down the quiet hallway to the exit.

After a half hour of waddling, Kitty arrived at the ice cream parlor and ordered five of every flavor of ice cream cones and two sundaes. The waitress working there was shocked by the order for one person, but nevertheless, she told Kitty the first part of the order would be out in a couple of minutes. Kitty smiled, showing off her double chin and waddled off to one of the booths, where she squeezed herself into one.

A few minutes later, a waitress came up with a tray holding six different types of ice cream cones which Kitty instantly started to dig into, not caring that they were dripping onto her clothes. "Like, oh well. They're totally already dirty from lunch," said Kitty, loudly licking a chocolate ice cream cone before loudly crunching the cone after licking every drop of ice cream out of it.

Once she was done, two waitresses walked over, carrying both sundaes. New ones with huge bananas, chocolate, vanilla, strawberry and mint ice cream with hot fudge and whipped cream with a cherry on top. Kitty dug in with glee. Half an hour later, Kitty was left feeling sick with two empty sundae bowls in front of her. Her face was deep green, her eyes rolled in their sockets and her tongue was lolling out of her mouth as she alternated between burping, hiccupping and panting. Her face, table and clothes were a mess. Half eaten ice cream cones littered the table and different flavors of ice cream were smeared over her face.

She was brought out of her thoughts by her friends showing up. "Hey, Kitty. Are you alright? Ve heard about vat happened at school." said Kurt.

"Like, I'm totally fine." Kitty smiled. Then *GGGURGGGGLLLEEEEE* went her large belly. "Like, oh poopy diapers. I so totally don't feel so go..." Kitty said before throwing up all over her friends. "Oops," Kitty blushed, seeing her friends covered with barf.

"Let's just get you home," Rogue said, rolling her eyes as she wiped Kitty's vomit out of her hair while Scott and Kurt helped Kitty up and then home.

Later that night, Kitty went for a midnight snack. When she saw some ice cream that was on the floor after eating a lot of it and other junk foods,, she figured "what the hell" and loudly licked it up. She was just starting to dip a big block of chocolate into a pot of gravy she had made when her friends came inside.
155212313211111.title: Everyone at school notices her weight gain

1552123132111111.content:
The X-Kids looked at Kitty in shock as they saw her bent on her knees, licking ice cream from the floor and with a chocolate bar in her hand. Kitty looked up at her friends and blushed with embarrassment at them seeing her doing this.

While looking down, she saw her belly touching the floor. For the first time, she realized just how big she really was. Kurt could see his friend was embarrassed by the whole thing and went over to help her.

"Kitty, are you alright?" He asked gently, helping Kitty to her feet, which was a challenge as Kitty was twice his size now. "Ok. Like, I totally may've put on a little weight," admitted Kitty, only to be given a look by her friends. "Okay. Like, maybe a ton of weight." Kitty said, looking down and making her double chins visible.

"Now admit ya've got a junk food problem." said Rogue, rolling her eyes while folding her arms over her chest and leaning against the doorway.

"Like, I still don't have a problem Rogue." Kitty insisted, crossing her bloated arms over her chest and pouting.

"We literally just saw you licking ice cream off the floor while holding a block of chocolate." Jean said, raising an eyebrow.

"Alright. Like you guys totally have a point." Kitty said, blushing furiously.

"Don't worry, Kitty. We'll help you get through this." Scott said, earning nods from the others.

That night had happened a few months prior and Kitty's friends had helped her loose a great deal of weight, though she still retained a large belly that was visible through her shirts. Her junk food habit had been tough to break, but they'd managed to do it, though she still retained a big appetite.

However, one thing that hadn't changed was her usage of diapers. She was currently sitting on her bed in only a thick diaper and a red t-shirt. After a moment, she let out a giant fart as she pooped her diaper and smiled. "Like, I totally love using my diaper." She giggled, laying on her back and poking her tummy, causing her burp loudly while she then enjoyed her full and smelly diaper rubbing it's sticky, poopy load against her behind. Sure, she knew it would become itchy later as a result, but she still really loved it.
1552123132111111.title: Kitty finally admits she has a problem

1552123133.content: What other foods could it be?
1552123133.title: Others

15521231331.content:
Kitty and Jean were walking back home from school when they walked past a sweet shop. "Come on, Jean! Let's, like, totally get ourselves a treat." Kitty said, dragging Jean into the small shop.

"Okay. Why not?" Jean said as they started to look around the shop. It had many types of sweets and candy. From M&Ms to large chocolate bars. The duo kept looking through the options until Kitty found one that looked pretty good.

"What about this?" Kitty asked, holding up a large chocolate bar in a purple wrapper with black writing on it. "BIG FAT CHOCO PUNCH Bar" it proclaimed on the wrapper. "Like, it looks totally nice." Kitty said, handing it over to Jean to look over.

"It looks pretty big, but it'll do." Jean said as she and Kitty walked over to the counter and placed the bar on the counter. The cashier then told them there was a special deal that would allow them to get 60 bars for free. The two girls shrugged at each other. Free chocolate is free chocolate.

As they exited the shop, Kitty picked a bar out of the bag, broke it in half with both her and Jean eating part of it. "Wow. This' amazing!" Jean said.

"Like, it totally tastes awesome!" Kitty agreed, taking a bite. Both girls were unaware that, by the time they got home, they had eaten 10 chocolate bars apiece between them.
15521231331.title: Chocolate bars

choices: Kitty nearly eats the ticket but Jean stops her.
Jean nearly eats the ticket, though Kitty manages to stop her in time
155212313311.content:
A week had passed since Kitty and Jean had started eating the Big Fat Coco Punch Bars. They'd eaten all sixty bars by Wednesday and so went back for more. By now, they were much bigger in size and weight.

Kitty and Jean's bellies now hung over their pants' waistbands, their boobs had gone up at least two cup sizes, their faces were rounder and sported double chins, their bodies were fat overall and they both had bigger and plumper butts.

There was also something else about them that was new. Per Jean's suggestion, they now also wore and used thick diapers. Kitty had to admit that this idea was pretty good since it allowed them to eat nonstop without needing toilet breaks and they did feel comfy.

Right now, the duo were in Jean's room, eating more of the chocolate bars. Scott, Kurt, Rogue and Evan knew of their friends' weight gain but didn't say anything since they didn't want to hurt their friends' feelings.

"Like, I can't believe we'd never heard of these candy bars before until last week." Kitty smiled as she stuffed two very big pieces into her mouth, swallowing and burping loudly, chocolate smeared over her mouth.

"I know. They're so delicious. I really love 'em." Jean agreed with a smile as she managed to inhale three bars at once.

The duo kept eating until dinner and then resumed this afterwards. The next day, they went to the store again. As they came up to it, Kitty noticed a sign in the window.

"Like, 'Want a free tour of where your favorite goodies are made? Then find a Choco Extreme Factory's golden ticket in a Big Fat Choco Punch Bar for the experience of a lifetime'!" She read aloud to Jean. The two girls looked at each other in delight. They had the same idea.

Quickly, they ran over to said bars and started grabbing as many as they could carry. Luckily, they had been there enough that their massive amounts of candy were now free of charge. Wobbling slightly from the weight of the giant stacks, the two X-Kids headed for the institute with their precious loads.

Once there, the duo went into Kitty and Rogue's bedroom and set to work eating the chocolate bars at top speed. Neither of them talked much, nor did they stop. Not even when they both wet and pooped their diapers. They just shrugged at each other after noticing their lumpy diapers and kept pigging out. They were determined to find that ticket and thus go on the tour.
155212313311.title: A week later

1552123133111.content:
After almost an hour of eating, Kitty and Jean were starting to get discouraged about finding the ticket. Wrappers of already eaten candy bars laid scattered all over the room and the duo's diapers were very full by now as they were starting to itch and feel uncomfortable due to how full and wet they were.

"Like, this is totally starting to seem impossible, Jean. Besides, my diaper's totally filled to the waistband with my poopies." Kitty sighed after wolfing down her 120th bar. "I know, Kitty. But we can't give up now. Let's just keep eating." Jean smiled gently as she ate her 121st bar. Kitty moaned slightly but nevertheless grabbed bar #121 from her pile.

She unwrapped it and was just about to sink her teeth into the rich milk chocolate when Jean let out a yelp. "KITTY! DON'T EAT THAT CANDY BAR YET!" She yelped, tackling the surprised Kitty off the bed, the duo landing with Kitty on bottom and Jean on top in only t-shirts and extremely full smelly and itchy diapers.

"Owie! Jean, like, what was that totally for?!?!?" Kitty protested as her older friend and teammate rolled off her, allowing Kitty to sit up, still holding the bar.

"Look at the back of the candy bar." Jean said slowly and gently. Kitty frowned slightly, but did so anyway. Then, as she slowly turned the bar over to look at its' back, a flash of gold hit the light. She gasped as she pulled out the gold ticket.

"You did it, Kitty!" Jean squealed as she and Kitty hugged tightly, their bodies squishing against each other. "Yeah. I guess I, like, totally did!" giggled Kitty in delight.

Jean took the ticket and began reading the message aloud. ""Greetings to the lucky winner or winners of this gold ticket from Mrs. Garcia. With this ticket I invite you to tour my factory for one whole day. You may bring one person with you on the tour. You will get to see how you're favorite candies are made and afterwards, when it's time to leave, you will be sent home with all the sweets you and your guest can ever eat'! Be sure to bring this ticket with you when you arrive. The tour will begin at your earliest convenience'." She read to Kitty. "So, we could, like, totally go tomorrow since we don't have school?" Kitty asked hopefully.

"Sure thing, Kitty. Let's go ahead and clean up the wrappers and then we can change our yucky diapers." Jean smiled as she and Kitty started to do so, their diapers sagging so much, you could see their butts poking out if you were going past the room at that moment.

The duo finished cleaning up and then changed their diapers, pulled their pants on and then went for dinner. Scott, Rogue, Kurt and Spyke didn't say anything as they watched their two obese teammates pig out as usual. Though the four were surprised when Kitty and Jean went to bed two hours later, simply stating they felt sleepy from their dinner and candy binge as they did.

Kitty and Jean spent half the night dreaming about the tour the next day. Jean dreamed about eating more and more while being fed her candy by Scott while only in a bra and a large diaper.

Kitty, meanwhile, dreamed about eating everything in sight since it was candy flavored or made of sugary goodies. When Rogue came up to bed not long after, it was to find Kitty chewing on her spare pillow. The southern goth merely smirked as she went to bed.
1552123133111.title: Kitty nearly eats the ticket but Jean stops her.

choices: Jose shows them the Edible Diaper Room. The girls change and pig out.
15521231331111.content:
The next day found Jean and Kitty arriving at the Choco Extreme Factory. It was a very big warehouse-like building. The duo didn't say anything as they approached the doors.

A moment later, a handsome looking tour guide came out. He wore a purple tailcoat, a black bowtie, kaki pants and black shoes. Upon seeing the overweight and diapered girls, he smiled at them.

"Hello. You must be our lucky winners of the tour. I'm Jose Garcia, Mrs. Garcia's son and heir to this factory. I will be your tour guide today." He said to the duo. "Yeah. I'm Jean Grey and this is my friend Kitty Pryde." Jean smiled back as Kitty waved to him.

"Alright. Follow me then. Let's get this tour started." smiled Jose as they headed into the factory. The entrance seemed to be the same as any old warehouse. Jose then led the duo towards a large set of metal doors. "This room is the heart and soul of my mama's whole factory. It contains some of her old and new creations." He told Jean and Kitty, who watched as he unlocked the doors and opened them.

"Ladies, I give you: the chocolate room." He grinned as the doors swung open to reveal a large room filled with numerous types of candies and other sweets. Jean and Kitty couldn't believe their eyes as they took in this wonderful sight.

"Like, this is totally like Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory!" Kitty squealed as she licked her lips. "Feel free to eat as much as you desire!" Jose smiled.

Well, he didn't have to tell those two bloated X-Kids twice. They tore down the steps and began their pig out. Jean went first, grabbing a massive gummy bear and sinking her teeth into it while Kitty split open a large candy pumpkin and started eating it's chocolate inners with her hands.

Jose smiled as he watched the two girls making pigs of themselves. It was clear that the duo loved his mother's candy and were happy to be here. His family had been making sweets for years but had only started the Choco Extreme company a month ago due to moving to the US a year prior following his father's death.

Meanwhile, Kitty was eating a large handful of jelly beans while Jean inhaled a long roll of taffy. The two girls noticed each other's actions, but beamed brightly at each other. The candy was really yummy and they just couldn't help themselves.

So, they kept on eating and eating and eating, their bellies bulging over the waistbands of their pants and diapers by now. Finally, the duo decided to take a break, Kitty licking a lollipop as big as her head while Jean kept chewing on a giant glob of saltwater taffy. "Like, this is totally the yummiest candy I've ever eaten!" Kitty groaned in delight, patting her belly with her free hand as she crunched down the last of her lollipop.

"Tell me about it, Kitty. I don't see how this day could get any better!" Jean agreed as she sucked up the last of her taffy and burped loudly, wiping her mouth with the back of her hand.

A little latter, the duo were following Jose over a massive vat of melted chocolate. Several employees were tending to it, making it ready for when it was needed for a recipe.

They were a little ways from above the vat when Kitty's nose twitched. "What is it?" Jean asked. "Like, is it me or does this walkway totally smell like gingerbread?" Kitty replied. Jean leaned over and sniffed the railing herself. "You're right. It does smell like gingerbread." she realized in shock.

"Like, I'm sure Jose totally wouldn't mind if we eat a tiny bit." Kitty smiled. Jean looked up. Jose was busy talking to an employee at the edge of the walkway. "Okay. But just a bit." She agreed. With that, Kitty starting to nibble the floorboards while Jean chewed on the railing. After a few minutes, "Okay, let's go." Jean whispered. But just as they started forward, the floor gave way under them.

"Kitty, how much of the floorboards did you eat?!?!?" Jean screamed as they plummeted towards the vat. "Like, I totally didn't think it was that muuuuccccchhhh!!!!" Kitty screamed back in alarm. Then *KER-SLOOPPPSSSSHHH!!!* The duo landed in the chocolate.

Hearing both the screams and the splash, Jose looked over in alarm. "Ladies?!?! Are you alright?!?!?" He called. When there was no answer, he quickly ordered the employees to stop the chocolate's flowing throughout the factory in case the X-Girls ended up in danger.

When he reached the bottom, a female employee used two hooks to fish Jean and Kitty out. After a nerve wracking minute, the hooks surfaced, pulling the two girls out. They were covered head to toe in sticky, gooey chocolate. "Are you two alright?" Jose asked in concern.

"Yeah. We just, like, totally got carried away with tasting the walkway." Kitty explained sheepishly as she started lapping the chocolate from her arms and fingers with her tongue. "Here, let me help. Then you can do me." Jean offered. Kitty stood still as Jean started licking her clean, beginning with her face. "J-Jean! That, like, t-t-t-totally tickles!" Kitty giggled as Jean's tongue ran over her tummy and into her bellybutton a few minutes later. Once Jean had cleaned Kitty up the best she could, the youngest X-Man did the same for Jean. With some help from some wash cloths, the rest of the cleanup went by fairly quickly.

Then, *PPPORRRRPPPPTTTT!!!* Kitty farted and her diaper immediately bulged and sagged. "Like, did you bring any diapers for us in case we made a poopy or wet ourselves?" Kitty asked Jean. The redhead blushed sheepishly.

"No. I figured we'd be okay and I left them in the X-Van for after the tour." Jean admitted as Kitty frowned slightly. The brunette just sighed and smiled.

"It's okay, Jean. Like, I guess I can totally wait until we get back to the X-Van for a diapee change." She said kindly. Jean smiled and then, *BBBOOOORRRRRCCCCHHHHH!!!!* Out came a giant fart and load of poop from her big booty.

"Oh crap." Jean sighed. "Well, at least I totally have company in my misery." Kitty giggled as she hugged Jean, who just giggled and smiled as well.

At that moment, Jose came up. "Pardon me, ladies but I could not help but overhear your little problem. If you will follow me, I think I can help you." He smiled. The two girls shrugged and followed Jose farther into the factory.
15521231331111.title: The next day

choices: Kitty and Jean get caught hiding their goodies in an old room.
155212313311111.content:
Kitty and Jean followed Jose deeper into the factory. Soon, they reached a door marked "The Edible Diaper Room".

"Like, is this totally a joke, Jose?" Kitty asked him, frowning slightly at the door. "It is no joke, ladies. You see, my momma decided to try and create edible undergarments for children, since I am certain you two have no doubt hear of edible underwear?" Jose smiled.

Kitty and Jean eyed each other and nodded. "Well, Momma decided to do the same with young children's clothes. She decided to start with diapers since those technically are our first clothes when we are newborns and toddlers." Jose explained. The two girls looked at each other, their expressions a mix of surprised and curious.

"So, what flavors do they come in?" Jean asked. "All sorts. So far, we have created chocolate, vanilla, lemon, strawberry, raspberry, blueberry, lime, coconut, key lime, peach, banana, orange, marmalade, etc." Jose smiled, At that, Jean and Kitty giggled to each other in delight.

"But, like, are they only for eating or can they also be used to... y'know... do your 'business' in?" Kitty asked. "You can use them for both. The diapers contain a special chemical that allows you to eat them, even after using them." Jose explained.

"So... you're saying that, if we wanted to, we could... eat our own urine and poop?" Jean asked, wrinkling her nose slightly in disgust. "Si. But the chemical makes them taste the same flavor as the diaper itself and contains a special formula that allows you to eat the soiled diaper without any aftertastes on your breath." Jose smiled.

"Okay. I guess we can try them." Jean decided. Kitty squealed and phased through the door. Jose and Jean followed a second later by opening and walking through the door. Luckily, Jose didn't seem to mind his tourists being mutants.

Jean and Kitty's eyes went wide with wonder. Everywhere they looked they saw diapers of different colors, marking their different flavors. "Why not try the mint ones first?" Jose smiled, tossing both girls two mint green diapers. "One is for you to wear and the second is for your taste test." He explained.

Kitty wasted no time and managed to tag her full diaper off and slip the new one on in minutes after quickly wiping her butt off so it didn't suffer a diaper rash. She smiled as the fresh minty smell hit her nostrils. "Like, this is totally the freshest diaper I've ever smelled!" She giggled.

Jean also put a mint diaper on and grinned at the smell. "Alright, Kitty. Shall we?" She smiled, holding up the second diaper.

"Like, let's Jean." Kitty smiled. With that, the duo sunk their teeth into the diapers. As they chewed, they moaned in delight at the taste. "Like, who'd ever think a diaper would totally taste so yummy to your tummy?" Kitty remarked as she crunched the rest of the diaper.

"I know. We gotta have more!" Jean agreed. With that, the duo grabbed two more diapers, this time coconut for Jean and bubblegum for Kitty and this time, both were chewy. Soon, the two X-Kids had eaten half the supplies.

"I trust you two are very satisfied now?" Jose smiled to the two girls. "Like, totally." Kitty smiled, patting her large belly as it hung over her waistband. "Same here." Jean agreed, poking her belly.

Soon, the tour ended and the two X-Girls were given their promised treats, including several large boxes of edible diapers. The duo thanked Jose and climbed into the X-Van, grateful for having chosen said automobile for the trip due to it's size.
155212313311111.title: Jose shows them the Edible Diaper Room. The gir...

choices: Kitty goes back two days later
15521231332.content:
One day, Kitty was walking through downtown Bayville when she noticed a sign in the nearby Pizza Hut. "Like, 'All-U-Can-Eat Pizza Fest. Gorge yourself on as much pizza as you want, free of charge'!" Kitty read aloud in delight. "That's, like, totally awesome!" She giggled in happiness as she went inside.

"Hi! I'm, like, totally here for the All-U-Can-Eat Pizza Fest." She smiled to the employee. "Great. Just name the type of pizza or pizzas you'd like to eat and we'll bring you as much as you can hold." the girl smiled. "Like, I'll take an extra large pepperoni pizza please." Kitty smiled. "Alrighty. Just take a seat and we'll bring it to you soon." the girl beamed as Kitty raced over to a booth and sat down, licking her lips in eagerness. Soon, a massive pepperoni pizza was placed in front of her. "Enjoy and happy eating!" said the girl. "Like, thank you!" Kitty smiled, grabbing a big slice and taking a giant bite, pulling a great big chunk of cheese off it.

And so, Kitty ate, and ate, and ate, and ate, and ate, and ate, and ate, and ate, and ate, and ate, and ate, and ate, and ate, and ate, and ate. Trays after trays of pizza piled up on her table as did large bottles of Mr. Pepper soda, her favorite soda. Grease and sauce smeared on her face, as well as her pink sweater and cream t-shirt as her belly grew rounder and rounder.

Finally, "Excuse me, miss. But it's midnight now. I'm afraid I'm gonna need you to leave." said the girl to Kitty as she was given her final pizza of the day. Kitty, who's belly had swollen up so much it was pressing against her table, looked up in shock just as she got ready to eat her final pie's first slice.

"Like, I've been here for eight hours?!?!?!" She asked in shock, wiping her mouth with her sleeve. The girl nodded. "You got really into the zone with your eating that you probably lost track of time." she said with sympathy. Kitty agreed after a moment. "Would you like me to box up this pie for ya?" the girl asked. Kitty shook her head. "Like, no need." she smiled.

Then, to the girl's shock, Kitty simply rolled up the pizza and shoved the roll completely into her mouth, bulging her cheeks out like a chipmunk's. She chewed heavily for a moment and then swallowed the giant mouthful of pizza with a giant gulp.

The girl just stared in shock at Kitty's impressive display. "You must've been hungry." she remarked as Kitty patted her big belly. "Thank *UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPP!!!* you!" smiled Kitty, letting out a giant burp as she rubbed her gut before leaving while sucking her grease and tomato sauce covered fingers on the way home.

"Like, I've totally gotta have more pizza in my diet!" Kitty smiled as she went home, using her other hand to rub and pat her bloated belly in delight.
15521231332.title: Pizza

choices: Kitty begins ordering from the takeout menu. The others find out days later.
155212313321.content:
Two days had passed since Kitty's pizza gorge. She'd deflated quite a bit by now. She was on her way home from shopping when her belly rumbled. "Like, totally time to get some pizza!" Kitty smiled as she entered the pizza shop. The same girl from two days earlier was there.

"Hey, Kitty." she smiled, having learned Kitty's name during her pizza gorge. "What can I get you today?" "Like, I'll have three pizzas and six Mr. Pepper's, please!" Kitty grinned. The girl nodded and went to fulfill Kitty's order while Kitty went to her booth.

Soon, Kitty was eating her way through the three large pepperoni pizzas and drinking the six big bottles of Mr. Pepper. The young girl watched in delight at Kitty's massive appetite. "Like, I totally forgot to ask you two days ago, what's your name?" Kitty asked her as she gulped down her 3rd Mr. Pepper, her belly becoming chubbier by now.

"I'm Suzanne Conner." said the girl. "My mom and dad run this pizza place. I told them about you the other night and they said you can eat here as long as you want." Suzanne added with a grin.

"Like, thanks." Kitty smiled as she finished up her final pizza and then guzzled down her 4th, 5th and 6th bottles of soda. Now, her belly was starting to bulge over the waistband of her pants again. With a smile, Kitty slowly stood up, a hand lovingly on her big round potbelly.

"I'd better go now, otherwise I'd, like, totally need to roll home!" She giggled as she came up to the counter to pay for her pizzas and sodas. "Okay. I hope I'll see you again soon." Suzanne smiled as she handed Kitty her change. Then, she had an idea.

"Y'know, we could deliver your pizzas to you at your home." Suzanne offered. Kitty thought about it for a few minutes. Then, she smiled. "Like, I'll take it." she smiled as Suzanne handed her a takeout menu with the restaurant's phone number on the back.

"Thanks, Kitty. Come again soon!" she called as Kitty left with a wide smile, one hand holding the takeout menu and the other once again patting and rubbing her big gut.

When she got home, Kitty hid the takeout menu in her dresser drawer and then waited for dinner, rubbing and playing with her bloated tummy, burping every time she did the latter to her belly.
155212313321.title: Kitty goes back two days later

choices: Kitty's sweater pops open, exposing her big doughy belly.
Kitty lets out a large fart. Her belly is then exposed.
1552123133211.content:
Several days had passed since Kitty had learned of the pizza place's takeout menu. She'd been ordering from it every two days. This had triggered quite a change in her weight as her belly became rounder and rounder with each order. It got to the point where Kitty secretly bought a stretchy girdle to keep herself looking thin. She also made sure to eat her usual light meals when with the others.

However, the other X-Men was discovering just how much pizza Kitty was eating now as they began finding pizza boxes scattered throughout the mansion. Scott found ten in the trash can in the kitchen. Jean and Kurt found twelve in another trash can by the garages.

Meanwhile, Wolverine found 8 extra large pizza boxes in the Danger Room's control booth while Ororo found 11 in the X-Van's trunk. And Spyke and Rogue found no less than 27 boxes in Kitty's closet, resulting in 68 pizzas in total. Finally, the team decided to talk with Kitty about her pizza addiction.

*BURP!* Kitty burped on this day, having just eaten 5 Super Duper Pepperoni pizzas, washing it down with three Mr. Peppers in the rec room. "Like, I'm so full." She groaned, rubbing her now much bigger, squishier and rounder belly in agony. "Too much pizza and soda. What'm I gonna do with a belly like this? I, like, totally can't let the others see I've been putting on weight!"

As her girdle wasn't with her, Kitty quickly began trying to button her sweater, only for it to refuse. "Like, come on, you dumb sweater! Button already!" After saying this, Kitty managed to close the sweater up, hiding her giant belly. "YES!" she squealed in victory.

Then, "Attention, my fellow X-Men, report to my office at once!" Professor X said mentally. "Oh boy." Kitty said as she slowly staggered for the room in question.

Meanwhile, Logan, Storm, Cyclops, Jean, Kurt, Rogue and Spyke were already in Xavier's. "How're we gonna talk to Kitty about this?" Kurt asked.

"Ah dunno. As much as Ah think we should be brutally honest with her, Ah ain't sure that'll work this time." Rogue said, actually sounding concerned for her friend.

"Well, we must say something. Kitty clearly must be putting on weight by now because of her unhealthy eating." Ororo remarked with concern as she thought of the bubbly, friendly girl.

"I'm with you, 'Roro. Half-Pint's gonna need to cut back on the pizza before we gotta use either the X-Van and/or X-Jet just ta get her to an' from school and whatnot." Logan agreed.

At that moment, Kitty came in, her sweater's buttons straining against her large belly but managing to hold on as she came in the room.

"Like, hey guys. What's up?" Kitty asked innocently. "Hey, Kitty." Kurt smiled. "Where've you been, sugar?" Rogue asked suspiciously.

"Oh, um, like, nowhere." Kitty said quickly, not wanting to tell them about her gorging, unaware the others were already aware of it and that it was the reason for this meeting.

Then, her tummy rumbled ominously. "Uh oh." Kitty gulped nervously as this happened.
1552123133211.title: Kitty begins ordering from the takeout menu. Th...

choices: Kitty manages to get away with it. She eventually pigs out.
Rogue discovers Kitty's stash and blabs on her.
15521231332112.content:
Then, *PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!* Kitty let out a massive fart. The others stared at her in disbelief. "Like, excuse me." Kitty blushed sheepishly. Then, *PING!* The button on Kitty's sweater popped open.

Her large belly flopped out a second later. "Like, oh big fat poopy diapers." Kitty sighed in dismay. "Kitten, I believe your pizza addiction is getting out of hand." Storm said, eyeing the large, doughy, squishy and swollen ball of a stomach Kitty was now sporting. "Like, this is totally water weight." Kitty replied quickly. All of the other X-Men looked at her, clearly not buying her story.

"Kitty, I am afraid that is the reason I called this meeting. Over the last several weeks, you have been ordering numerous pizzas and sodas from your favorite pizza place. We have seen the evidence you left laying around the mansion. We all agree: you must cut back your pizza intake." Xavier said. "Like, no way Professor! I'm, like, totally okay!" Kitty insisted. Then, her belly gurgled.

"Um, like, hang on." a very sheepish Kitty said as she quickly darted into the next door bathroom. After a few minutes, Kitty came out in relief, having taken a large poop. "Anyway, guys, I'm totally fine." she told them.

"Kitty, starting tomorrow, I am putting you on an exercise regime. You will do two hours of exercise each morning every day and eat only fruits, vegetables and other healthy foods." Xavier said gently, but firmly. "But Professor-!!" Kitty whined. "That is final, young lady." Xavier said with a serious and warning frown. Kitty pouted and stormed away, her belly jiggling like a rather big bowl of Jell-O.

The next morning, Kitty was rudely awoken at 5 o'clock by her alarm, which had been set by Logan. With a whimpering moan, she rolled out of bed and changed into a t-shirt and sweat pants before heading outside to meet up with Wolverine.

Sure enough, Logan was already waiting for her, clad in his uniform. "Mornin', half-pint." he said. Kitty merely glared at him through her droopy eyelids.

"For yer first morning, I thought we'd start with a 5 mile jog." He told her. Kitty didn't say anything. She just nodded reluctantly. Soon, the duo were jogging along the path leading up to the mansion gates. Well, Logan reached them anyway. When he looked back, Kitty was laying on her back, sweating, wheezing and panting heavily. "Did... I... like *pant* *wheeze* *gasp* even... get... close... Mr. Logan?" Kitty gulped out. Logan had to admit Kitty did do fairly well despite her girth.

She had been fairly close to the gates when she'd had to stop. "Not bad, half-pint." Logan told her as he heaved her up. "Great. Can we, like, go in now?" Kitty asked, her breathing getting back to normal. "Nope. Ya still have pushups, sit ups and that kinda thing to do first." Logan said bluntly. Kitty didn't even bother holding back her moaning whine of protest as she reluctantly dropped to her hands and knees to begin her pushups.

Two hours later, Kitty practically dragging herself into the mansion, sweaty, greasy and pooped. Jean and Scott watched with concern. "Y'know Kitty, if you hadn't eaten so much pizza, this'd be a lot easier for you." Scott pointed out gently.

"Like... bite... my... big... chubby... butt... Cyke..." Kitty panted in response as she heaved herself up onto her legs, which felt like jelly. She just barely managed to climb up to her room before they gave out, causing Kitty to flop onto her bed face first.

"Like, I'll totally never make it through these next few weeks on only rabbit food and exercise!" She groaned into her sheets. Then, an idea came to her. "Like, I'll hide junk food around the mansion so I can snack before, during or after exercises! As long as I keep up my exercising and eat healthier meals, I'll, like, totally get away with it!" Kitty smiled excitedly.

So, Kitty began going around that night while the others slept, hiding candy bars in her dresser, cookies in the Danger Room's control booth and doughnuts in her bathroom, while also storing some Hostess cupcakes in her desk.
15521231332112.title: Kitty lets out a large fart. Her belly is then ...

155212313321121.content:
A few weeks passed. Kitty's plan seemed to work as, due to her mainly exercising and dieting, she lost most of her doughy belly. She would occasionally sneak a snack or two but the others luckily didn't catch on.

One night, Kitty was snoring softly when her stomach rumbled quietly. Kitty woke with a start upon hearing this. "Like, I need a snack." she whispered so not to wake Rogue, who was sleeping peacefully in her bed across the room. Kitty looked at her alarm clock and saw it was 12:01.

Quietly, Kitty phased herself downstairs, landing neatly in the kitchen. She turned and opened the refrigerator. "Like, just a tiny snack..." she told herself. Then, it happened. All of Kitty's restraint from the last several weeks left her and she became ravenous.

Kitty quickly grabbed a plate of brownies and shoveled each one into her mouth, chewing and gulping loudly before chugging a whole carton of milk down. Then she grabbed a package of uncooked bacon and stuffed handfuls of it into her mouth, licking the packaging clean before tossing it aside.

On and on it went, Kitty devouring everything in the fridge. She cleaned out an entire jar of pickles following the bacon, then a loaf of bread before she poured six jars of jam into her mouth, getting them on her face and t-shirt. She then devoured a block of cheese, a whole ham and a package of chicken following that.

She even cleared out the veggies and fruits, eating an entire thing of grapes from the vines. Strawberries, cherries, apples and so on all went into her now starting to swell up again belly. Then, she devoured carrots, tomatoes, cabbage and the like.

When she got to the lettuce, Kitty just ripped leaves off and then guzzled down a bottle of dressing to wash it down. And then, she saw a big chocolate cake with red frosting and a note. "'For Kitty, as a reward for sticking with your diet. Love, Ororo'." The note read. But Kitty didn't know or care about it. All she cared about was getting that cake in her belly. She tossed the note aside, grabbed a fork and began loudly chowing down on the cake. Soon, the plater had been licked clean and Kitty was passed out on the floor, snoring as she rubbed her jumbo belly with a moan of pleasure.

The next morning, Rogue woke up and found Kitty's bed empty. Frowning, she got up and went downstairs. When she then entered the kitchen, the southern goth couldn't believe it. The kitchen looked like it'd been hit by a hurricane. Empty food packages, bowls, wrappers and so on were scattered everywhere. The fridge was open and all that was left was a single olive and the lightbulb. And there, passed out in front of the fridge, was a very bloated, snoring Kitty. Her face was a mess with jam, frosting, crumbs, grease and dressing, as was her pink nighttime t-shirt.

"Guess all that exercisin' and dietin' took its' toll on Kitty an' her body decided to rebel last night." Rogue thought to herself as Kitty starting to stir. With a loud moan, Kitty slowly heaved herself up into a sitting position. Slowly, her eyes focused on Rogue and then the debris of last night's pig out.

Upon seeing the debris and realizing what'd happened, Kitty's eyes filled with tears. "Rogue! Like, I totally ate everything in the kitchen last night! I'm so sorry! I-I-I didn't mean to! I just felt so hungry, I kept eating and eating!" She cried as she began sobbing.

"It's okay, Kit. Ah kinda thought that might happen sooner or later. It ain't surprisin', given your dieting an' everythang." Rogue said with a smile as she helped her teammate up with a grin. Kitty hiccupped and smiled slightly as well.

"Like, what're we gonna tell the others?" She asked nervously. "Ah'm sure they'll understand if we just say what happened." said Rogue with sympathy as they started cleaning up the mess.
