Rogue was right. While shocked by Kitty's actions the night before, the other X-Men did accept that what happened was in fact an accident. In time, Kitty's weight returned to normal again, though her appetite remained larger than before.
155212313321121.title: Kitty manages to get away with it. She eventual...

15521231333.content: Here's some more food choices.
15521231333.title: More food

155212313331.content:
Kitty was walking down the street when her stomach started rumbling. She'd had to skip breakfast that morning so she headed towards main street where most of the fast food restaurants were located. She saw a McDonald's, Burger King and Wendy's but she noticed a KFC at the end of the street. "Hmm. I haven't had KFC in awhile "said Kitty as she headed towards the fast food joint. She noticed a sign in the window advertising a meal deal: a whole bucket of chicken and fries and a whole bottle of coke for 3.99. "Like, that's totally a good deal." said Kitty as she walked into the restaurant. It looked like a normal KFC apart from a huge painting of chickens on the wall. Kitty walked over to the counter where a employee was standing "Hey I would like your meal deal please "said Kitty with a smile.

"Sure it'll just be a few minutes." said the employee a couple of minutes later Kitty's order was ready. "Here you go. That'll be 3.99." said the employee handing over the bucket of chicken the fries and the coke. Kitty handed over the money, took her order and started to dig into the bucket of chicken her taste buds exploding with flavor. She got so caught up in the taste she didn't notice until she finished that she had eaten the whole bucket and fries and drank all of her coke "Hmm. I gotta to do this again "said Kitty rubbing her bloated belly
155212313331.title: Fried chicken (KFC)

1552123133312.content:
It had been a month since Kitty first went to KFC and it had a bit of an effect on her waistline, giving her a sight pot belly, not that she seemed to notice. She'd been making many trips to KFC that most of the staff knew her by name. Kitty woke up one morning, her belly rumbling. She got out of bed, scratching her belly and making it jiggle a bit. She walked into the kitchen and looked in the fridge, only to find it empty. That only made her belly rumble even more. "Well it, like, totally looks like it's KFC for breakfast." laughed Kitty to herself as she quickly got changed into some slightly tight clothes, made her way to the KFC and entered. She was greeted by one of the employees at the counter

"Hello Kitty how're you doing? " asked the employee, smiling at Kitty

"Hey. I'm doing good and I'll, like, totally have my usual." said Kitty with a smile. She waited few minutes till her order was ready and was getting ready to go to a table when she was stopped by the employee.

"You know we're hiring at the moment. We get a 15 % per cent discount and get to take home any of the leftover chicken "said the employee with a smile. Kitty took a couple of minutes to think about it. A discount would be nice and plus she could get even more food to eat.

"Sure. That'd be, like, totally amazing." said Kitty with a massive smile as she ate a large bite of chicken

"Cool. I'll arrange the interview for you tomorrow. Good luck." said the employee. Kitty nodded and started to eat the rest of her food.
1552123133312.title: A month later

15521231333121.content:
The next morning Kitty walked into the KFC and walked up to the counter. She was really hungry but decided it was better to wait until after the interview and then have a bucket of chicken. It was a different employee from the one from yesterday. "Hey I'm Kitty. I'm, like, here for an interview." said Kitty, trying to ignore the rumbling in her stomach and hoping to get this over and done with soon.

"Yeah sure. The manager's office is just at the end of the kitchen." said the employee, pointing to the door past the kitchen. Kitty nodded and said thanks and wondered through the kitchen, trying not to drool at the smell of cooking chicken and fries. She somehow managed this and knocked on the door. It opened to show a middle aged woman wearing a red work shirt.

"Ah you must be Kitty. I'm Miss. Johnson." said Miss Johnson shaking Kitty's hand. Kitty then took a seat and Miss. Johnson asked Kitty a bunch of questions which Kitty answered honestly. "Ok you got the job. Will you be able to start today?" asked Miss. Johnson.

"Really? Like, that's amazing." said Kitty excitedly. "and sure." she added happily. Miss. Johnson handed Kitty over a red work shirt, a pair of black trousers and a thick diaper. Kitty raised her eye brows. "Like, what's this for?" asked Kitty, confused.

"At to make sure you don't take too many bathroom brakes." said Miss. Johnson. Kitty just nodded and quickly got changed. "Ok you can start off with counter work and feel free to eat some food while your working." said Miss. Johnson, leading Kitty to the counter and leaving. Kitty spent the next eight hours eating food and serving customers. That night when she got home, she was really bloated and walked in to see the rest of her friends just hanging out.

"Where you been?" asked Rogue with a curious look.

"I got a job at KFC. Like, I'm going to bed 'cause I'm really tired." said Kitty, resting her hand on belly and going to bed completely forgotten that she was still wearing her very full diaper.
15521231333121.title: At the interview

choices: Kitty friends start to worry about her weight
They find out about Kitty's diaper
155212313331211.content:
It had been a month since Kitty had gotten the job and it wasn't really much work. Her shifts were usually in afternoon to night where it was usually very quiet which meant she spent the majority of her shifts eating chicken and fries which had left more weight to her waistline making her officially fat. Her red work shirt was super tight around her belly it rising up just above her belly button, she had gotten pretty used to the diapers and they did save her a lot of time. At the moment she had just finished serving a customer and was just taking a bite of it few fries when Miss. Johnson walked up to her from the office.

"Kitty I want to say I'm very happy with how you've been working the last couple of days." said Miss. Johnson with a huge smile.

"Thanks." said Kitty blushing as she took a few more fries that she dipped into a tub of ketchup.

"I been so happy with your performance that I decided to promote you to assistant manager. Congratulations. You'll be getting a few extra dollars and get even more food that you're allowed to eat." said Miss. Johnson, shaking Kitty's hand.

"Thanks you that amazing "said Kitty happy to be promoted but was mostly happy about getting more chicken and fries to eat later that night Kitty came back home after her shift belly completely stuffed she saw the others hanging around the living room "hey guys "said Kitty greeting her friends

"Hey how was your shift?" asked Rogue, looking over from the tv.

"It was good. I got promoted to assistant manager?" said Kitty smiling, showing her double chin and making it jiggle.

"Awesome." said Scott the others nodded and Kitty went upstairs to change her very full diaper.

"Is it just me or does Kitty look really big?" asked Jean with a shrug.

"Yeah it probably just from work. She'll lose it eventually "said Rogue with a shrug as they all turned back to the TV.
155212313331211.title: A month later

choices: Rogue starts to gain weight as well
Rogue doesn't gain weight but use her diaper
1552123133312111.content:
After a couple of more days, Kitty's friends start to get a little worried about her. She seemed to be getting bigger and bigger and there always seemed to be a horrible smell coming off of her that none of them could pinpoint what was actually causing the smell. "Do any of you guys think it weird about what's happenin' to Kitty. She's getting fat and she smells a lot of the time." remarked Rogue, looking at her friends.

"Yeah it as been a bit weird. It started when she started working." said Scott with a shrug as he and the others were watching a TV show.

"Maybe we should investigate and start with Kitty's room." suggested Kurt, getting a nod from the others. They quickly turned the tv off and went to look in Kitty's room. After looking for ten minutes they found some old KFC buckets. They were about to give up looking when Rogue found some diapers in one of the drawers.

"Why does Kitty have a bunch of diapers in her drawers?" asked Rogue, lifting one of the diapers up and showing the others one of the diapers rising her eyebrows. But before anyone could reply, Kitty walked in and her face fell as soon as she saw Rogue holding one of her diapers. Before anyone could say anything, she started to cry and ran off to the boathouse. Everyone started to look for her. After an hour, Rogue found Kitty by following the smell of a very dirty diaper and saw Kitty crying, wearing a now very full diaper. "Hey Kitty. It's ok. We know you wear diapers. It's ok." said Rogue, comforting her friend after Kitty calmed down. "Why do you need to wear a diaper anyway?" asked Rogue.

"They're for work." said Kitty with a shrug as they stood up.

"Maybe I should come with you to make sure it's ok." said Rogue with a shrug

"Ok I got promoted so you can take my old role "said Kitty excitedly the next day Kitty and Rogue walked into KFC. Kitty had phoned Miss. Johnson last night, telling her she'd hired Rogue. Kitty gave her the uniform and a diaper

"Really,?" Asked Rogue, raising her eyebrows.

"It's the rules." said Kitty. Rogue rolled her eyes, put the diaper and uniform on and went to work at the counter.
1552123133312111.title: Kitty friends start to worry about her weight

15521231333121111.content:
It had been a couple of weeks since Rogue had joined Kitty at working at KFC and a lot of changes had happened to both Kitty and Rogue. Kitty had grown fatter as she had outgrown two of her uniforms and her new one was starting to look very tight, showing off her big belly.

Rogue had also put on a little weight. Not as much as Kitty but enough that she was starting to look quite chubby and had started to use her diapers more and more frequently.

One night after their shift, they went into the living room carrying five buckets of chicken and fries each and laid them down on the table but before they could begin their feast, Kitty needed to change her diaper but she was starting to have trouble doing it herself due to her girth. "Here Ah'll help ya." said Rogue as she helped Kitty lie down so she could change her. Luckily for them everyone else was asleep.

"So how are you enjoying working at KFC?" asked Kitty as Rogue finished up changing Kitty

"It's been ok. I've kinda gotten use to using diapers even if they're a bit annoyin' but the free food is amazing." said Rogue, helping pull Kitty up but suddenly felt her own diaper become really wet. "Oops." said Rogue, blushing a bit as she realized that she had wet herself again, causing her thick diapee to sag slightly.

"Here I'll, like, totally change you since you changed me." said Kitty laughing as Rogue nodded and laid down, letting Kitty change her while being careful not to touch Rogue's skin with her bare hands. After all that was done, they both dug into their feast eating until there wasn't anything left and both sat back bloated, rubbing their stuffed bellies.
15521231333121111.title: Rogue starts to gain weight as well

choices: Their friends start worrying about their weight
155212313331211111.content:
A month later Rogue and Kitty had grown even fatter than they were a month ago. Kitty was still bigger than Rogue by quite a bit but thanks to all the food she was eating, Rogue was quickly catching up to Kitty and Rogue had became more comfortable with wearing her diapers. One day Kitty and Rogue walked into the KFC to see it was completely empty apart from a few employees who looked bored out of their minds. It wasn't surprising at it so empty it was snowing pretty bad. "Well it looks like there's nothing to really do." said Rogue leaning against the counter, her belly pressing into it, highlighting how big her belly had became.

"Well on the bright side we can, like, totally eat for the whole shift." replied Kitty with a smirk as she popped a french fry into her mouth then grabbed a bit of chicken and started eating along with her bigger friend. They spent the next few hours eating and taking a few diaper changes in between as well. Finally, Kitty looked up at the clock and saw it the end of their shift. "Hmm. Like, that already totally went quickly." said Kitty rubbing her bloated belly and struggling to get up from her chair.

"Yeah it really did." said Rogue, getting up using one hand to rub her bloated belly and another to fill a few bags with buckets of chicken and fries for them to take home. It took them awhile to make the short trip back to the mansion, thanks to the heavy snow but by the time they got back they were really hungry again despite the fact they had spent the last few hours doing nothing else but eating.

"Looks like it time to, like, totally eat again." said Kitty as she placed all the food on the table. Rogue was about to sit down and join Kitty when she smelt a really bad stench coming from her friend, making Rogue raise her eyebrows.

"Ah take it from the smell that ya messed your diaper. Do ya want me to change you?" asked Rogue, smirking as she already knew the answer.

"Yes." said Kitty, laughing as she laid down on the floor and Rogue grabbed a diaper from one of their hiding spots. She quickly got changed and both enjoyed their food.
155212313331211111.title: A month later

1552123133312111111.content:
Kitty and Rogue were stuffing themselves in the kitchen one day while their friends were in the living room, watching them stuff their faces which made Spyke roll her eyes as he flipped through the channels on the tv. "Has anyone else noticed that Kitty and Rogue are getting pretty fat?" said Spyke, putting the controller down on the seat and looking at his friends.

"Yeah they have gotten pretty big. Kitty got big when she started working at KFC then Rogue joined her and ballooned up as well." said Scott with a shrug, looking over to Kitty who was wiping some sauce running down her double chins while Rogue was rubbing her huge belly while eating some chicken.

"Maybe they been taking too much advantage of the staff discount. Do you think we should talk to them about it?" Asked Kurt.

"Yeah I think we should. Let's go." said Jean as they all got up and walked into the kitchen where Rogue and Kitty were still eating. "Hmm guys we need to talk to you guys about something." said Jean with a serious look.

"What is it?" asked Kitty as she eat a couple more fries.

"We think you guys are getting fat." said Spyke, poking both Kitty and Rogue in their large bellies. Both looked down to see that they couldn't their feet due to their bellies blocking their view.

"Maybe we put on a little weight." said Rogue and Kitty nodded, both blushing at the fact they were fat.

"Maybe quite the job and lay off the chicken." said Scott with a chuckle. A few months later Kitty and Rogue had quite their jobs and had lost some of the weight but still had big bellies and they still wore diapers and changed each other without the others finding out.
1552123133312111111.title: Their friends start worrying about their weight

155212313333.content: What other foods are there?
155212313333.title: More food

choices: Meeting with a sumo-sized Jess and Rebecca. The team learn who makes the cookies
1552123133331.content:
One day, Kitty Pryde, Kurt Wagner, Rogue and Evan Daniels were walking through Bayville Mall. Kitty was fuming over a mistake that her favorite store had made with outfitting her for a new sweater. Instead of either a small or medium, she was made a large.

"Like, that was totally humiliating! Anyone can totally see I'm, like, so not a large!" Kitty growled to her fellow X-Kids and friends. "Kitty, get over it. It was probably a mistake. Ah still say ya could've taken the large an' had Ororo or Jean take it down." Rogue sighed in annoyance at her best friend, roommate and teammate's ranting.

"Vhy don't we get something to eat? It may help you relax." Kurt offered, nodding to a nearby cookie store. Kitty sighed and shrugged her agreement. So, the four went inside the shop. Even though it had only been open for a week, it seemed to be doing extremely well business wise. Kitty, Kurt, Rogue and Evan all stood in front of the counter and a rather obese young woman came up to them. "Hello. May I help you?" she asked. "I'll take four peanut butter cookies please." Kurt said. "Snickerdoodles for me." Rogue added. "I'll take the chocolate chip cookies." Spyke piped up. "And you, honey?" the woman asked Kitty.

Kitty bit her lip as she struggled to decide which one she really wanted to have since she loved cookies. "Why not try a Passion Patty?" suggested the woman, holding up said cookie. It was a chocolate cookie with mint inside. "Like, okay." Kitty shrugged as she took it and tossed it into her mouth. After chewing it for a moment, her eyes popped open. Every sugary goody she'd ever eaten danced in front of her. After a second, "Like wow! These are so totally yummy! So chocolatey and minty..." she moaned in delight.

"I think she likes them." said Kurt with a smile as he, Rogue and Evan grabbed their cookies and walked out. They had to wait a few minutes for Kitty to follow them though. When Kitty stumbled out at last, the trio couldn't believe it. Kitty was carrying at least 10 boxes of Passion Patties. "Uh, Kitty. Isn't that kinda goin' overboard?" Rogue asked. "Like, no way Rogue. These cookies are totally awesome." Kitty smiled, already popping another one into her mouth in delight. The trio didn't say anything as they left, Kitty still eating cookie after cookie. By the time they reached the mansion, Kitty had eaten two boxes.

A day later, Scott Summers and Jean Grey were walking down the main staircase when they saw Kitty buying cookies from some Girl Scouts. "Like, thanks girls. These cookies are, like, totally yummy." Kitty was saying as she turned around, arms overflowing with what seemed to be the entire troop's supply of Passion Patties.

"Uh, Kitty? How many cookies did you buy?" Scott asked in shock. "Like, it's no big deal, Scott. I just totally love these Passion Patties!" Kitty explained with a grin as she handed a box to Scott and Jean. "Like, go ahead and try them. I think you'll like 'em too!" she giggled as she skipped to her room, already eating another cookie. "Kurt and the others were right. Kitty is forming an addiction to these cookies." Scott said to Jean.

"Maybe we should have Mr. McCoy run some tests on them to be safe." Jean suggested. Scott nodded and quickly sent the box to Hank's lab via a chute in the nearby wall as they then went to hang out with Kurt and the others.

Soon, Hank had started running his tests on the cookies and Professor X called the X-Kids into the meeting chamber. "Hank has just started running his tests on the Passion Patties that Scott gave him. Though he isn't sure at this moment, he believes one ingredient could be rather addicting." Xavier told them. "So where do we go from here?" Scott asked. "I've been running for traces of Passion Patties in other cities. The first area they have appeared in is in Denver Colorado." Xavier explained, nodding to said dot on the screen. "Has anyone bought them?" Jean asked.

"A Miss. Jessie Clearwater. She lives with her young daughter Rebecca at 1347 Belmont Street." Xavier said. "I'd like for you to talk with them and see if they may have any leads on the cookies." Professor X said. "Right, Professor!" Scott said promptly.

With that, the six X-Kids took off for the X-Jet and set off for Denver, Kitty munching on her 4th box of Passion Patties.
1552123133331.title: Cookies

choices: The team reaches the factory. Kitty (now sumo sized) tries to find more cookies
15521231333311.content:
A few hours later, the X-Kids had reached Denver, Colorado and were currently at Jess and Rebecca Clearwater's house. Scott rang the doorbell and a second later, a massive young woman with brown eyes and black hair answered the door. "Yes? Can I help you?" she asked with a smile. None of the X-Kids spoke at first as they eyed the picture of Jess and Rebecca Xavier had given them.

There, the two females were slim and trim looking. Not like the sumo sized lady in front of them. "Jess? Jess Clearwater?" asked Scott awkwardly. "Yeah. That's me." Jess smiled as Kitty kept munching on her fifth box of Passion Patties. "Did you happen to see a Girl Scout nearby. I've been waiting all morning for mine and Becca's cookies. Quit my job and pulled Rebecca outta school yesterday we don't miss any deliveries." She added as a very plump eleven year old girl with black hair and blue eyes came up, her belly poking through her red t-shirt. The X-Kids just stared at her in shock. She was only a year younger than Multiple, but she had to be at least two times his size weight wise. "Hi. My name's Rebecca. Did you see a Girl Scout with our Passion Patties?" smiled the girl.

"Um, no sorry. We haven't." Jean replied honestly. "Shame. We just love Happy Girl Cookie Time!" Jess smiled as she moved back slightly so the X-Kids could look inside the rather nice looking house. "See?" The X-Kids just stared in shock. There had to be at least 50 to 60 empty boxes of Passion Patties scattered around the living room, hallway and the staircase.

"Oh sure. We've put on some weight. But, y'know, it's been worth it." Jesse added sheepishly as Rebecca nodded in delight. "Mom even wrote Ms. Netterman and told her that!" Rebecca chirped, her belly and double chin jiggling as she hopped slightly.

"Ms. Netterman?" Rogue asked. "Oh yeah. Hazel Netterman. I went to school with her when we were your guys' age. She was kinda a lard ball cause her parents owned our hometown's bakery. I admit I didn't do much to help her when we were kids and teenagers and she was getting picked on, but now, she's my idol!" Jess explained with a grin. "Are you guys really the X-Men?" Rebecca suddenly asked.

"Yeah we are." Spyke smiled. "Cool! I've read all about your adventures! I idolize you!" Rebecca exclaimed in delight. "Could I get your autographs?" she asked shyly. "Sure. If your mom agrees." Jean smiled. "It's okay with me, Becca." Jess smiled. "YES!" Rebecca cheered as she waddled to her room to grab a pen and some paper. "She's a sweet kid." Kurt remarked. "Yeah. Ever since her dad died a year ago, she's been so quiet and withdrawn outside her friends. Reading about your adventures is a great way for her to be a kid." Jess smiled. "She says you're her hero." she added to Kitty. "Like, I'm flattered." Kitty smiled, still eating cookies.

"Do you know where Ms. Netterman is now?" Jean asked Jess as Rebecca came back with a notebook and a pen for the team's autographs. "Yeah. She sent me a coupon for a month's supply of Passion Patties yesterday. I still have the envelope." Jess smiled as she handed it over.

"Looks like she's in the Swiss Alps." Scott remarked in surprise. "Then, that's where we'll go." Jean smiled before they autographed Rebecca's notebook. "It was good to meet you guys. If you're in Bayville sometime, maybe we can babysit Rebecca. We have a student who's around her age group she might like to meet." Scott told them. "Can we Mom?!?! Can we?!?!?" Rebecca asked, sounding so excited, it looked like she was gonna wet and/or poop her pants from excitement. "Well, spring break is next week. We'll see kiddo." Jess smiled. Rebecca squealed in delight and hugged her mother, her chubby arms barely reaching around her mom's middle. "See you soon." Scott smiled as the team left.

"So ya got the address of Ms. Netterman?" Rogue asked Scott as they climbed back onto the X-Jet. "Yeah. She's in the Swiss Alps." Scott replied as they set off for said mountains.
15521231333311.title: Meeting with a sumo-sized Jess and Rebecca. The...

choices: Follow Jean Scott and Spyke's fight with the guards
Follow Kitty trying to find more cookies
Follow Kurt and Rogue trying to find Kitty
155212313333111.content:
On the way to the mountains the X-Kids were sitting around the jet as they headed for the Swiss Alps when they noticed that Kitty was getting pretty fat her belly was huge and she was eating more of the cookies. "Hmm Kitty don't you think you had enough? You're getting pretty big." said Kurt rising his eyebrow as he eyed Kitty's bulging potbelly.

"I'm, like, totally fine." said Kitty, taking another bite. "Y'know, maybe ya should've just bought the large sweater." Rogue said. "Yeah, K-Girl. 'Cause if you keep eating those cookies, you're not gonna be a small or medium anymore." Spyke pointed out. "Oh. Ha-ha. This', like, totally only my second box." Kitty huffed. "Yeah, since we got on the jet." Rogue pointed out. "Whatever." Kitty huffed. Then, they heard they were about to land. Kitty struggled to get her seatbelt on. It took a lot of huffing and puffing to get the two sides connected, leaving her breathless when they landed. Soon, they were at the foot of the mountain. "Like, why couldn't we have just totally landed at the top?" asked the now sumo sized Kitty, moaning as she saw how far they had to climb.

"Because landing a jet next to the factory is a bit too obvious." said Jean, rolling her eyes as they started to climb the mountain. When they finally reached the factory they saw a line for a tour of the massive factory up ahead.

"You, like, totally gotta be kidding me. We could've just went with a tour instead of climbing up this thing!?!?!?" complained Kitty completely out of breath as she gasped and wheezed behind Kurt and Rogue.

"On the plus side at least we don't have to break in." said Rogue as they joined the line for the tour. Soon they were moved to a group of tour buses and started to look around the factory. A bunch of girl scouts were giving a way free samples which Kitty happily ate after taking the tray. When the tour guide wasn't paying attention and the team snuck off. It took a couple of minutes for them to notice that Kitty wasn't following them.

"Where did Kitty go?" asked Spyke looking around confused.

"I'm not sure. Kurt and Rogue, you guys go find her and the rest of you with me." ordered Jean. Both Kurt and Rogue nodded and went to find their friend while everyone else went to the main production area where they saw a bunch of fat men being feed cookies as they made and packaged them.

"Well that's the strangest workers compensation I've ever seen." said Scott looking at the scene before him. Before anyone could reply two very fat girl scouts guards burst through a side door
155212313333111.title: The team reaches the factory. Kitty (now sumo s...

choices: Becca finds the trio and explains everything. The others face "Death by Cookie".
1552123133331112.content:
Meanwhile, "Like, must find cookies! Must find cookies! Must find cookies!" Kitty was saying as she ran through a hallway, looking into different rooms as she kept up her search. On her fourth try, Kitty opened the door and, upon seeing what was inside, excitedly clasped her hands together, her eyes shimmering in delight before running into the room.

At the same time, Scott, Jean and Spyke were being cornered by the two massive girl scout guards. One, a sumo sized Asian woman with glasses, swung a meaty fist at Jean, sending her flying into the wall. "JEAN!" Scott shouted, barely moving out of the second woman's way in time. Having taken care of Jean for that moment, the first woman turned her sights on Evan.

Thinking quickly, Spyke popped one of his spike as a staff he could use as a weapon from his wrist. Smirking, the Asian woman lunged at him, only for Evan to briefly swipe her off her feet with his spike, giving him time to go to try and help Cyke, who was still struggling with the blonde guard. Jean was only just starting to recover nearby but it wouldn't be soon enough to help Scott.

"Hey, fatty lady!" Spyke shouted to her as she hauled Scott off his feet, his collar in her meaty fist, the other drawn back to deck him. "Wanna dance with someone? The Spyke Man's ready." Evan added with a smile, popping smaller spikes out of his arms, hands and shoulders to prove his point to her. The woman grunted and threw Scott down on his back, nearly knocking the wind out of him.

With a smirk, the second girl charged and managed to briefly grab Spyke, only to yelp in agony as she began poking herself on his spikes. The second she released him, Evan, using his spike as a vaulting device, flew forward and slammed his feet into her soft tummy. "OOOMPPPHHHH!!!!" She grunted as she went flying over Scott and the railing before landing on the production floor below. "Nice one dude." Scott smiled to Evan, who grinned back, only for the Asian woman to grab and quickly overpower them both.

"Forgot about her." Spyke groaned in agony as he laid underneath Scott. Sensing victory, the woman, having climbed onto the railing, leapt off it, preparing to perform a big belly flop on them, only to freeze mid fall. Startled, the trio turned to see Jean with one hand out, clearly using her powers to stop the woman's descent. With a grunt of effort due to the woman's weight, the young telepath and telekinetic girl hurled the woman over the railing and on top of her friend. "You guys okay?" she asked as she helped Spyke and Cyclops stand up again.

"Yeah we're fine, Jean." Scott smiled as he dusted himself off. "Man, those troop leaders sure pack a punch." Spyke remarked as he massaged his sore jaw. "Tell me about it. One second I'm ready to fight and the next the anvil chorus was going off in my head." Jean agreed with a knowing smile as the trio set off to try and find Kitty or at least Nightcrawler and Rogue.

Meanwhile, Rogue and Kurt were busy looking for Kitty. Right now, they were in some sort of laboratory. Curious, Kurt went to a large boiler like object in the center of the room and turned it's valve lever. A blue drop of liquid dripped onto his finger. He was just about to lick it when, "Kurt! Don't! This stuff's gotta be what's makin' people so dang addicted to the cookies." Rogue said as she took a small test tube and filled it with the liquid to give to Hank when they got home. "Mein gott! Maybe if I vas addicted, I probably vouldn't know how chilly it is in here." Kurt remarked as he shivered. "You're right. It is kinda nippy in here. Maybe that's a clue too." Rogue remarked as she finally felt the chill in the air.

Then, "Rogue, call me crazy, but I think zat might be a clue too." Kurt said, nodding to a map on the nearby computer screen. It contained locations like Queens, New York, Jackson, Mississippi, Malibu, California and Shaker Heights Ohio. "Wonder why she's got these areas marked?" Kurt wondered. "Because they're where my cookies are to be sent." said a voice. Turning around in shock, the duo saw a young woman, not much older than Jess, with black hair and dark eyes, in the doorway.

"Hazel Netterman, Ah presume?" Rogue guessed. "Yes. That is me. The greatest cookie maker in the world! Or, at least I will be once I began sending my Passion Patties around the world!" Hazel laughed as her obese right hand woman, a brunette named Toll, smirked in equal delight. "Toll, deal with these muties for me, please." Hazel added with a laugh as she left. Toll first tried by using a gun that fired the Passion Patties like bullets, only for Rogue and Kurt to dodge these with ease. Then, she tried the physical approach, only for that to backfire as well, Without a word, she quickly left. "Come on, we'd better find Kitty an' get outta here." Rogue said as she and Kurt set off again.

Soon, the duo reached the gift shop. "We should've known." Kurt sighed as he and Rogue looked inside and found Kitty happily wolfing down box after box of Passion Patties. She had already eaten six and was on her 7th. After popping one into her mouth, she loudly sucked on her finger before eating more. "Kitty!" Rogue hissed. Hearing this, Kitty looked up as her friends came in.

"Like, hey guys! See, I told you I'd, like, totally find more free samples!" Kitty smiled, pulling a cookie out. "Here, try one!" Rogue, who was being offered the cookie, quickly snatched it out of Kitty's chubby hand. "No! We gotta find the others and get outta here!" she ordered.

Then, "Not so fast, muties!" smirked Toll as she and several other girl scout troops surrounded the trio, armed with cookie guns. The trio didn't say anything but they knew even with their powers, there was no way they could avoid having the tourists get hurt should they try and fight. Unknown to the two groups, however, a young girl was watching from the hallway.

Upon the group heading into the hall, Rebecca quickly ducked behind some crates as Toll and her men marched Kitty, Kurt and Rogue to where Hazel was. Rebecca then popped up after the group had gone past.

"Oh man, oh man! Kitty and the others're in big trouble! What do I do?!?!? I know, I'll tell Scott, Jean and Evan! They can help!!" she told herself as she quickly raced off to find her new friends and tell them of their teammate's situation ASAP.
1552123133331112.title: Follow Kitty trying to find more cookies

choices: The team faces off with Hazel. Rebecca reveals a surprising secret in the fight.
15521231333311121.content:
As Rebecca went to find Scott, Jean and Spyke, Kitty, Kurt and Rogue were being led into a room with three chairs and a weird device hanging from the ceiling as Hazel waited for them. "Welcome, muties. I'm so glad to see you here." she smirked as the Girl Scout minions strapped Kitty, Kurt and Rogue to the chairs. "Vat is that thing?" Kurt asked, nodding to the machine on the ceiling.

"Allow me to introduce you freaks to the Feeder. It's designed to force feed you until you're either obese or explode!" she cackled in delight, grabbing the remote control. "Prepare for 'Death by Cookie'!" she giggled, activating the machine. The Feeder slowly lowered a large Passion Patty to Kitty and then crammed it into the young girl's mouth. Kitty, surprised at first, then smiled in delight. "Like, yummy!" she smiled. "Why're ya doin' this?" Rogue demanded to Hazel before a Passion Patty was jammed into her mouth.

"You see, I was once a chubby girl when I was your age and my parents ran a bakery during that time. Those fools I had to call classmates bullied me daily and those who didn't or only took part in the bullying reluctantly still didn't bail me out. I've waited 16 years for my revenge. Now, I will fatten those who foolishly bullied me and make them the fat ones!" Hazel cackled in delight.

"You're insane! Fattening people merely because you were teased for being out of shape yourself!" Kurt protested, only for a cookie to be stuffed into his mouth as well. "You freaks are one to talk. Your kind hasn't exactly been accepted warmly yet either." Hazel spat as she activated the autopilot for the Feeder. "Now, while the Feeder handles you fools, I'm off to oversee the first shipping operation of my cookies." Hazel cackled as she, Toll and the other minions left, Kitty, Kurt and Rogue still being force fed.

Meanwhile, Rebecca was still looking for Scott, Jean and Evan. Turning around a corner, she literally plowed into Jean, knocking them over. "What the-? Rebecca?!?!? What're you doing here?!?!" Scott asked in shock. "I-I'm sorry, Cyclops. I wanted to join you guys so I snuck onto the X-Jet before you guys got on board and hid in the bathroom." Rebecca confessed sheepishly as she and Jean got back on their feet.

"Do you have any idea how dangerous and stupid that was? Your mom's probably goin' outta her mind wondering where you are, kiddo." Spyke said firmly but gently. "There's no time for that! Shadowcat, Nightcrawler and Rogue're in trouble! Miss. Netterman's taken them hostage! We gotta help them!" Rebecca said quickly. "Let's move." Scott said firmly, going into leader mode as he, Jean, Spyke and Rebecca hurried to where the latter had seen the trio being taken.

Inside the Feeder's room, Kitty, Kurt and Rogue were still being force fed, Kitty being the only one enjoying it. "Well, if we explode, it's been nice knowin' ya and the others." Rogue said before another cookie entered her mouth. "Ditto." Kurt agreed. Then, Rebecca, Scott, Jean and Spyke arrived. "Rebecca? Like, what're you totally doing here?" Kitty asked in shock. "She snuck onboard the X-Jet before we came here." Scott explained as he freed Rogue and the others freed Kurt and Kitty.

At that moment, the Feeder started for Kitty again. "Wait! Like, it's totally my turn again!" Kitty squealed in delight, only for Scott to pull her and Rebecca away in time. "Guys, enough with the cookies!" He told them firmly.

"Yeah! We gotta stop Hazel before she sends those cookies ta all her old classmates as revenge for their bullying!" Rogue agreed. Then, "REBECCA JOSEPHINE CLEARWATER!!!" Jess shouted as she stormed in, anger and relief on her face.

"What the hell were you thinkin' running off like that?!?!? You scared me half to death when I found your note!" Jess shouted at Rebecca, who looked very guilty and timid. "Mom, I..." she began slowly. "Mrs. Clearwater, like, Rebecca totally helped save me, Kurt and Rogue just now! She told the others where we were!" Kitty explained quickly, coming to her new friend's aid. "It's true, ma'am." confirmed Rogue as the others nodded.

Jess, upon hearing this, clamed down, her anger draining and replaced with surprise. "You did?" she asked. "Yeah Mom. I did." Rebecca smiled proudly. "If it wasn't for Rebecca, we'd probably still be looking for them by now." Scott agreed. "Where's Hazel now? I managed to hear you guys mention her motives. I can't believe it. I never thought she'd harbor a grudge against me for not helping her against her tormentors for this long." Jess finally said after a moment.

"It looks like she's headin' for Iceland. That must be where her main supply area is now." Rogue said, nodding to the screen in the room. "Then, let's move." Scott said as the eight headed for the X-Jet, Kitty, Rebecca and Jess all grabbing large armfuls of Passion Patties boxes as they went. Soon, the X-Jet was heading full speed for both Iceland and Hazel's shipping area.
15521231333311121.title: Becca finds the trio and explains everything. T...

155212313333111211.content:
Soon, the eight reached Iceland and located the factory. Carefully, the group headed into the building. Taking cover behind some massive crates filled with giant piles of Passion Patties, the X-Kids, Rebecca and Jess noticed Hazel talking with Toll and one of the large, obese men working for her.

"I want the first load to Indiana ready within the hour!" Hazel was saying as Toll nodded loyally. Behind the crates, "How're we gonna stop her, Scott?" Jean asked quietly. "I'm not sure." Scott admitted. "Vat I vant to know is why it is so chilly in here." Kurt remarked as he rubbed his arms and hopped up and down, trying to keep warm.

"Like, it's probably because of the cookies." Kitty said, reaching into her pants and pulling a melting Passion Patty out of them. "See? Like, heat totally makes them all melty. So sad right?" she added sadly as she stared at it, Rebecca and Jess both voicing their own dismay at the cookie's melting.

"So, we just gotta warm it up in here." Scott realized, eying the machine that controlled the temperature of the warehouse. Kitty quickly popped the melting cookie into her mouth and then sucked her partially stained finger off as she chewed. "Cover me." Scott told her and the others as he dropped down and started for the machine.

Seeing him, two Girl Scout troop leaders started for him, only for Jean, Kitty, Jess, Rebecca, Rogue and Kurt to shove several of the crates they were hiding behind onto said women. The noise caused Hazel, Toll and the male workers to look up in surprise.

"It's those useless muties again!" Hazel snarled. "Toll, take care of them!" she ordered. Kurt, Jean, Spyke, Rogue and Kitty all hopped down while Jean used her telekinesis to help Jess and Rebecca down just as Toll lumbered up to them.

"Like, I'll deal with her! You guys stop Hazel and the others!" Kitty called. The other X-Kids nodded and took off to fight Hazel's other goons while Rebecca and Jess tried to stay out of the way while still stuffing themselves with cookies.

"I, like, totally don't know what half-baked idea you're cooking up, but it's toast!" Kitty snarled at Toll before they began their sumo wrestling match. Initially Toll had the upper hand as she managed to flip Kitty onto her back, only for Kitty to grab her ankle, tripping her and allowing Kitty to belly flop on top of her, knocking the wind out of Toll. "Like, try that on for size!" Kitty giggled at the knocked out Toll as she heaved her massive sumo body back up again.

Meanwhile, Scott had reached the machine and was currently working away to figure it out in order to warm the factory up as Jean covered him using a telekinetic shielding. Spyke, Rogue and Kurt were all dealing with the sumo sized male workers, who despite having great strength and size to their advantage, were no match for the slimmer, quicker and super powered X-Kids. Spyke managed to pin six of them to the wall with his spikes, Rogue, using her powers, absorbed one of her opponent's strength to hers, allowing her to floor the other eight she was fighting while Kurt also quickly dispatched his opponents by teleporting them into different areas as they charged him, causing them to knock themselves out.

At the same time, Rebecca and Jess were still pigging out on the Passion Patties. Unknown to them, Hazel was watching them with an evil smile on her face. "Time to say goodbye, you stupid fool." she smirked as she released a giant crate from the crane above the duo. Rebecca noticed this as she shoved two big handfuls of cookies into her mouth. "MOM, LOOK OUT!!!" She screamed through her bulging cheeks. Jess looked up in time to see the crate but she could never move aside in time.

But, just as the crate plummeted towards her, it stopped. Jess, having closed her eyes, looked up and saw the crate hovering a few feet from her head. Thinking Jean had saved her, she turned to thank Jean, only to see the redheaded X-Kid still protecting Scott from their attackers. Slowly, she turned her head slightly and saw, to her great shock, it was Rebecca. Her chubby hands were in the air like Jean's and she was straining slightly from the weight. With a determined grunt, Becca tossed the massive crate towards the rest of Spyke, Rogue and Kurt's attackers, taking them down as the crate burst, covering the goons in a mountain sized pile of Passion Patties.

"Mein gott!" Kurt yelped, having seen this as Rogue and Spyke also looked on in shock. Seeing three more Girl Scout troop leaders heading for Jess, Rebecca snarled in rage. "GET AWAY FROM MY MOM!!!!" She screamed, several bony spikes shooting from her arms, fingertips and shoulders, pinning the trio to the wall, two upright and the middle one upside down.

With a loud "BAMF!" Rebecca teleported over to the X-Kids. "That was awesome, Rebecca! How'd you-?" Rogue began as a large male worker lumbered for them. Rebecca, not even missing a beat, whirled, grabbed the guy by his overall straps and, with one hand, threw him into Hazel, who screamed in horror and outrage as he pinned her down.

"Scott, how's that machine coming?" Jean asked as she dropped the shield as all of Hazel's minions were defeated. "Got it!" shouted Scott as he activated the heat feature. After a moment, the cookies began melting inside the giant crates, leaking out in the process. "NO!!!! YOU IDIOTS!!!" Hazel screamed as Rebecca pulled her free and restrained her by pinning her arms down to her sides. "Like, time for you to have a taste of your own medicine!" Kitty smirked after Rogue handed her the test tube of blue liquid. "NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" Hazel screamed in horror as Kitty forced the liquid into her mouth. Within seconds, Hazel ballooned into a sumo version of herself, roughly the same size and weight as Jess.

"Must have cookies! Must have cookies!" Hazel whimpered after Rebecca released her as she waddled over to the melted cookies and began scarfing them down loudly as the X-Kids smiled in victory.

Soon, the police had arrived and were taking Hazel, Toll and their goons away as Professor X and Beast had also arrived. "Well done, my X-Men. You saved the world from Hazel's 'sweet' revenge." Xavier smiled proudly. "Thanks, Professor. But, like, it totally wasn't just us." Kitty smiled, a chubby arm around Rebecca's shoulder as she smiled shyly as Xavier and Hank.

"Rebecca, it seems you are a mutant. Gifted with superhuman strength and the ability to mimic other people's skills, powers and, if I'm not mistaken, also their personalities, memories and so on." Xavier smiled. Rebecca nodded gently. "It's true." she said and turned to Jess, who wasn't saying anything.

"Momma, I'm a mutant. I discovered my powers a month ago after the anniversary of Dad's death. I didn't wanna tell you because I was afraid you'd freak out and hate me." She confessed, tears rolling down her plump cheeks. "Oh, Becky honey. I'd never hate you. I love you, mutant or not." Jess smiled as she hugged her smiling daughter. "Besides, your dad and I always figured it might happen." she confessed as they broke apart after a moment. "How?" Kurt asked.

"Before Rebecca was born, her dad was working at his chemical company when a generator began going crazy. Julian donned a hazmat suit and went in. He managed to get things under control again but not before taking a massive dose of radiation, even through the suit. When we learned a week later that I had become pregnant, we knew our child might have a mutation." Jess explained. "We just thought she'd reach puberty beforehand." she confessed. "Not all mutants wait until then for their powers to show up." Jean said.

"She's right. Jamie was only ten when his powers began to develop and he was eleven like Becca when his duplication mutation surfaced." Scott confirmed. Rebecca smiled in delight at this discovery. "Mrs. Clearwater, if you would, I would like to talk with you and Rebecca at the institute." Xavier smiled. Jess nodded and she and Rebecca began to head for the X-Jet together.

"Like, did you work out an antidote for the cookies, Mr. McCoy?" Kitty asked, poking her belly. "Yes I did, Kitty. It's at the mansion and I've already sent out more of it to those Hazel's cookies effected." Hank smiled as the team followed the Clearwaters onto the X-Jet together for home.

A week later, everybody who'd eaten Passion Patties and ballooned up were back to their normal weight and the cookies destroyed. Hazel was sentenced to 60 years in prison for her plans and her minions ended up suffering similar sentencings as well.

As for Rebecca, she was offered a place at Xavier's as while her mimicking power was very controlled, her super strength still had rough edges as she accidently smashed the front door open while opening it and broke a doorknob off another when she closed it, forcing Kitty to phase half the group out of the room while Kurt teleported the others after the meeting. Rebecca accepted the offer and joined the New Recruits under the codename "Mimic".

Though shy at first, she quickly became friends with the others, especially Amara, Tabitha, Kitty, Jamie and, to everybody's shock, Rogue. As Rebecca still needed some paperwork from her previous school in order to transfer to and attend Bayville Elementary like most of the NRs, excluding Magma and Boom-Boom both of whom were already attending Bayville High with the older kids, Rebecca was being home schooled by Hank, Storm and Professor X. She soon proved to be very intelligent.

Per Kitty's request, Rebecca was now her roommate. The duo often spent nights talking, laughing and staying up late. Sometimes, Professor X would go by their room and find them asleep in the same bed, Kitty's arm drooped protectively over Rebecca's chest, making them resemble an older sister sharing a bed with her little sister.

Though Rebecca did miss her friends and mom, she was allowed to see Jess on certain weekends. She was very happy with her new friends and life.
155212313333111211.title: The team faces off with Hazel. Rebecca reveals ...

15521231333331.content:
One day Kitty Pryde, Jean Grey and Rogue were walking through the Bayville High Carnival that was being held all week long. It was to raise money for repairs to the school gymnasium which had recently been partially destroyed during a battle between the X-Kids and the Brotherhood of Bayville.

"Like, this carnival is totally awesome." Kitty smiled as she walked between her two teammates and friends. At that moment, Jean noticed a cotton candy booth. "Let's get some." she said after Rogue noticed it and pointed it out to Kitty. With that, the trio went over to the booth.

"Hi. Three please." Jean smiled as she handed some money over. The guy grabbed three cones and set to work filling them with the cotton candy. Kitty and Jean's were bright pink while Rogue took the blue colored one. They thanked the guy and walked away. "Like, I've never totally tried cotton candy before." Kitty remarked as she looked at hers. "It's really good, Kitty." Jean smiled as she took a fairly big bite out of hers.

Kitty shrugged and took a tiny bite. Then, her eyes widened as she felt the cottony treat slide down her throat. It really was tasty. Without a word, she quickly inhaled the rest of her cone to Jean and Rogue's shock. "Wow. Enjoy it, did ya?" Rogue remarked, eying Kitty as she loudly licked her fingers clean of the cotton candy that'd stuck to her fingers.

"Yeah. Like, I totally need more food." Kitty smiled as she still felt hungry. "Well, there's a few more booths over there that're selling food." Jean offered. Without a word, Shadowcat raced off to said stands in hunger. "Ya think we should go after her?" Rogue asked.

"Nah. I'm sure she'll be okay on her own. We'll just go find a table and wait for her." Jean smiled assuredly as she watched Kitty reach a funnel cake stand. Rogue didn't say anything but then she nodded and followed Jean to the picnic tables nearby.

After a while, Kitty came up, holding a large tray containing two rather large hot dogs slathered in ketchup, mustard and relish as well as a big helping of funnel cake and a large glass of lemonade.

"Woah, Kitty. Are you sure you can eat that much food?" Jean asked. "Like, I'm totally sure, Jean." Kitty smiled as she picked up her first hot dog and took a jumbo bite out of it, smearing ketchup onto her face.

Kitty quickly tore through the food on her tray in minutes, not leaving a single crumb. After it was over, Kitty was loudly slurping her lemonade as she rubbed her stuffed belly. "Like, I totally think I'm good." Kitty smiled as she stood up, still slurping up her beverage as Jean and Rogue also stood up, still shocked their friend had eaten all that junk food so quickly.

"Guess you were hungry." remarked Rogue as Kitty finished her massive lemonade and tossed the cup into the trashcan with her wrappers and things.

"Yeah *BUUUUURRRRPPPP!!!* Excuse me. Like, I'll totally need to come back here again." Kitty smiled as the trio left, holding their prizes from the carnival games they'd played beforehand.
15521231333331.title: Cotton Candy

choices: Lance comes over and teases Kitty
Kitty decides to go with Kurt on the Hurl A Whirl (throws up after the ride).
155212313333313.content:
Two days had passed since Kitty had tasted her first cotton candy. Now she was going back four times a day to eat more of the delicious carnival food. She had doubled her intake by now and would get two large orders of everything, like four large hot dogs, two large helpings of funnel cake and at least two massive lemonades as well as 2 large bags of cotton candy.

This was taking a toll on her figure as Kitty was now plump. Her face was rounder and softer looking with chubby cheeks and a double chin. Meanwhile, she also now sported a bigger butt and meatier thighs that strained her black pants. Her legs had also become plumper, as had her feet and her toes were much chubbier looking. The same held true for her arms, hands and fingers.

The biggest part of her though, was her belly as it bulged visibly under her red t-shirt, the buttons straining against her squishy, bloated tummy. Despite this, Kitty kept eating the carnival food daily. Right now, Kitty was hurrying into the carnival grounds for her 2nd helping that day as Kurt, Rogue, Scott and Jean all watched.

"Is it me or is Kitty becoming too addicted to this unhealthy carnival food?" Kurt asked as they watched Kitty excitedly picking up her tray of free carnival foods. Since she'd been there so often in the last two days, the workers allowed her to take her orders for free.

"I think you're right, Kurt. She has been getting pretty plump lately." Scott agreed as Kitty sat down at a picnic table and began wolfing down her pile of junk food at top speed as usual. "Should we tell her?" Jean asked, unsure of hurting her friend's feelings.

"Ah think we should." Rogue said promptly as she came over to Kitty, followed by the others. "Hey, Kit. Can we talk?" Rogue asked once she reached her friend.

"*Mmph.* Like, sure Rogue. What's up?" Kitty asked after swallowing her giant mouthful of funnel cake and then grabbing her second jumbo lemonade and beginning to guzzle it down with very big slurps.

"Well, uh... Kitty... over the last two days you've been eating a lot of these carnival food and, uh... well..." Scott began slowly, unsure how to tell his friend the truth. Kurt decided to break the silence and get to the point.

"Kitty, you're getting rather round." He told her, gently poking her belly, his furry finger sinking slightly into her gut. Kitty, still slurping her lemonade, gently pulled his hand away. "Like, I'm totally okay, guys. It's not like I'm as big as Blob." she huffed as she finished it and began her third.

"Well, just make sure ya don't, sugar. Otherwise we're gonna need a flatbed or somethin' ta get ya to an' from school." Rogue said gently to her best friend and teammate. With that, the others left to enjoy the carnival's other attractions, leaving Kitty behind as she happily rubbed her belly while slurping up her lemonades, her belly straining even more against her tight red t-shirt.
155212313333313.title: Two days later

choices: Kitty decides to enter. She ends up winning the contest and a chunk of money
Kitty decides against it. Sticks to eating her normal load of carnival food.
1552123133333131.content:
Kitty was just sitting at the picnic table, slurping her lemonade and rubbing her tummy when she heard an unwelcome voice. "Well, well, well, if it isn't my Pretty Kitty." Jeered Brotherhood leader and Kitty's ex-boyfriend Lance Alvers. The duo had dated briefly before mutants were exposed a few days ago and after the fight between their teams in the school parking lot during the school board meeting, the duo had wisely decided to break up, knowing they could never be together while on such polar opposite teams.

"Like, what is it, Lance?" Kitty huffed in equal contempt as she started her fourth lemonade after tossing the third cup away. "I just wanted to see if you're missing me yet?" Lance replied with a smirk. "Like I miss my hideous pyramid shaped hat." Kitty retorted, recalling the hat that she had bought. It had claimed to simulate brain power and Kitty had been freaking out over a Geometry test at the time. Though she ultimately aced the test, she had finally noticed how weird the hat looked after wearing it in front of a mirror.

Lance smirked as he sat down across from her. "Looks like you've been puttin' on some weight." He remarked, pointing to her belly as it pressed lightly against the table. "Like, maybe I have. So what?" Kitty snarked as she rubbed her gut defensively.

"Oh, nothing. It's just..." Now Lance was turning bright red as he awkwardly rubbed the back of his head. "Like, what?" Kitty asked, her anger slipping away slightly. Lance stammered for a second and then he blurted it out loud. "I've always kinda liked chubby or fat girls." For a moment, neither teenager said anything. Lance because he was embarrassed and Kitty because she was shocked.

"Oh." Was all Kitty said, her eyes wide in shock. "I never said anything about it because I wasn't sure if you'd like to put on weight." Lance explained. Kitty didn't say a word for a long time. She just slowly sipped her lemonade in thought as she went over Lance's confession.

"Lance?" She finally said after a moment. "Hmmm?" Lance asked, looking up. Then, Kitty broke out in a smile. "Wanna ride the Fairs wheel with me?" she offered. Lance was quiet for a moment, then he smiled, nodded and followed Kitty to said ride, Kitty quickly gulping the rest of her lemonade down and tossing it into the trash bin as they reached the ride.

They climbed in, Kitty with some difficulty due to her belly, and then they enjoyed the ride. After riding on the wheel twice, they got off, laughing and talking as if they'd never broken up. "Like, what should we do next?" Kitty asked Lance with a smile.

Lance was about to answer when he noticed a hot dog eating contest. At least four other girls had entered so far and there was room for one more. He quickly pointed this out to Kitty. "Wanna try it?" He asked. Kitty was quiet for a long minute as she considered it.
1552123133333131.title: Lance comes over and teases Kitty

15521231333331311.content:
After a moment, "Like, sure. I'll totally enter." Kitty smiled as she went over and signed in before being lead to a seat in front of a very massive pile of fresh hot dogs with ketchup and mustard. Kitty swallowed nervously but nevertheless remained seated. She looked at her opponents. Three of them were equally unsure of themselves, but the fourth was smirking, clearly sure of her victory.

"Like, hi. I'm Kitty. Who're you?" Kitty said to her politely. The girl, who towered over Kitty by at leas five to six inches, smirked and pushed her blonde hair back. "I'm Samantha Heffernan, junior. If you have any idea about winning this little competition, mutie, I'll make it clear to you now: you'll lose." she said in a superior tone of voice. Kitty was shocked at this girl's rudeness and arrogance.

Before she could say anything, the referee came up with a microphone in his hand. "Ladies and Gentleman, welcome to the 1st Annual Bayville Hot Dog Eating Contest! Our competitors tonight will try to eat as many hot dogs as possible. The winner will receive a check for 10,000 dollars!" He announced. Kitty thought her jaw was gonna drop onto the table. Ten thousand dollars! That would be enough to give a donation to the school for repairs and she'd have enough left over to buy anything she wanted!

Samantha seemed to notice what Kitty was thinking about. "Don't bother planning on how you're gonna spent that loot, mutie. I'm going to win and add it to my inheritance." she smirked smugly. "Like, don't bet on it, creep!" Kitty snarled determinedly as she prepared for the signal to start.

"On your mark... get set... GO!!!!" the referee bellowed as the girls set to work gorging themselves. Samantha was the first to start shoveling hot dogs into her mouth, chewing loudly and smacking her lips. Kitty, however, was keeping up fairly well herself.

As the contest went on, the other girls began surrendering to their now stuffed and aching bellies. The first one had eaten 40 hot dogs before she fell back in her chair, clutching her tummy in agony while burping ominously.

The second one lasted to hot dog #49 before surrendering to her own aching belly with a massive and deep burp as she laid her head down on the table.

Girl number three lasted six more hot dogs than her friend before she got a major bellyache and fell off her chair and onto her back, moaning and hiccupping in agony as she rubbed her gurgling tummy.

Now it was just Kitty and Samantha left. Lance was cheering loudly for Kitty and several of their other peers, who weren't anti-mutant, were as well. "Come on, Kitty! you can do it!" Lance shouted as Kitty gulped down her 69th hot dog. Samantha, meanwhile, was starting to slow down. She was on her 71st hot dog when her tummy let out a giant rumble, causing her to turn green and hightail it into a nearby porta-potty, barfing loudly.

Meanwhile, Kitty was calmly finishing the 79th and final hot dog on her tray. With a sigh, she leaned back, patting her belly in delight. "And the new winner with 79 hot dogs: Kitty Pryde! the ref shouted as Kitty heaved herself up and thrust both hands into the air in victory as the crowd cheered. Kitty accepted the large check and shook hands with the ref and Kelly, who looked like he wanted to break his hand after touching hers.

"Great *urp* job, Kitty." said the first challenger, a black haired and green eyed Caucasian girl in Kitty's grade as she stifled a burp while patting her mostly calm again tummy. "Like, thanks Rachel." Kitty smiled as they high fived. The second girl, an African-American with braids, spoke next. "Yeah. It was cool to see this new side of you." said the girl, whose name was Ruthie Palmer, a senior in Scott and Jean's year as she rubbed and patted her big brown boulder of a gut.

The third, who was still somewhat sick looking, came up next. "I'm *burp* with *hic* them, *urp* Kitty. You were *ugh* totally *belch* awesome." said Selene Raymond as she kept rubbing her big pregnant looking belly. "Like, thanks you guys." Kitty smiled.

Samantha then staggered out of the porta potty, her face dull green now and she looked rather weak, but upon seeing Kitty holding the giant check under her flabby arm, she seemed to regain her strength as she stomped over, getting into Kitty's face.

"You cheated, you lousy mutie! I don't know how, but YOU CHEATED!!! THAT MONEY WAS GONNA BE MINE!!!!" She screamed, Kitty gagging slightly at the stench of Samantha's breath. "Like, I totally didn't cheat, Samantha! If I had, I would've been disqualified! Besides, you were just gonna use all the money on yourself!" Kitty retorted in disgust.

At that, Rachel, Ruthie and Selene came up. "Leave her alone, Sam." Ruthie ordered. "Yeah. Just 'cause she's a mutant doesn't mean she's a cheater." Rachel agreed. "Kitty's a really nice person. She's not an arrogant know-it-all like you are, Sam!" Selena added with a frown. Samantha scoffed and crossed her arms.

"Shows what you morons know, coming from poor, lower class families. I am extremely perfect." She jeered. Kitty smirked as an idea came to her. "Like, do you guys totally wanna grab something to eat?" she asked with a wink to her new friends. The trio giggled as they realized what Kitty was doing. "Sure. What'd ya have in mind, Kit?" Ruthie asked with a grin.

"Oh, like, maybe more hot dogs with ketchup, mustard, pickles, relish, onions, chili and/or cheese." Kitty offered with a smirk as she saw Samantha pale again. "And greasy corn dogs with fries." added Selene, catching onto the plan, causing Samantha to turn dark green this time. "And big helpings of funnel cake and candy apples." Rachel smirked as Samantha clamped her hand over her mouth. "Don't forget the cotton candy and lemonade!" Ruthie giggled. At that, the very green as a leaf Samantha let out an ominous burp, her cheeks bulging behind her hand and she turned and nearly flew back into the porta potty, slamming the door shut as she barely turned her head over the toilet in time.

"Like, thanks guys." Kitty smiled as she slapped hands with the trio again. "No prob. See you tomorrow?" Rachel smiled. "Like, sure thing." Kitty giggled as the trio set off to meet up with friends or family while she went to meet up with Lance.

"Kitty, that was awesome!" Lance cheered as he gently hugged her. "Thanks. Like, can we go and get something to eat? All this talk about food, like, totally made me hungry." Kitty smiled as her belly rumbled in agreement. Then, *RRRRRIIIIPPPP!!!* Her pants split right down the middle. "Oops." she blushed as Lance smiled and quickly used the check to cover her underpants as they went to the food booths.
15521231333331311.title: Kitty decides to enter. She ends up winning the...

choices: Kitty rides the Hurl-A-Whirl with Kurt and Rogue (gets sick after the ride)
Flashforward to Saturday. Kitty gorges herself sick while with the Brotherhood
155212313333313111.content:
The next day, Kitty went back to the carnival for her usual 1st order of junk foods. After grabbing the tray, she went to the booth. Upon seeing her, the worker's eyes went wide in delight. "I was watching you last night, Kitty. You were awesome in the hot dog eating contest!" He smiled in delight. "Like, thanks, Brian." Kitty giggled with a blush. "I don't think you knew this, but the rules stated that the winner of the contest is allowed to eat however much they want, whenever they want." Brain smiled. At that, Kitty grinned in delight.

"Like, then I'll take my usual order and a large Banana Fudge Sundae." Kitty smiled. Brian nodded and set to work. Soon, Kitty was eating her massive tray of food, now including a giant sundae with chocolate, vanilla and strawberry ice cream with both hot fudge sauce and bits of fudge on it, three bananas, a giant spray of whipped cream and a cherry on top. She was just starting said sundae when Lance came up.

"Hey, Pretty Kitty." He smiled. "Like, hey Lance. Guess what? Since I totally won the hot dog eating contest last night, I can totally eat even more food whenever I want to!" Kitty smiled, popping a big spoonful of ice cream into her gullet. "Cool. Hey listen, I was wondering if..." Lance paused and blushed again. "What Lance?" Kitty asked as she shoved another spoonful of ice cream into her mouth. "I was wondering if you'd be interested in hanging out on Saturday. I know this neat new All-You-Can-Eat buffet you may like." Lance offered. Kitty thought about it as she finished the rest of her sundae, licking the bowl clean as she did.

"Like, I guess I can totally make it." She smiled. Lance smiled at his becoming obese girlfriend. "Cool. I'll either pick you up at 6 or we'll meet there. Knowing Summers, it's probably better if we meet there." He said. "Like, can't wait." Kitty smiled as she began chugging lemonade #3 as they got up and moved in separate directions. Lance to meet up with the Brotherhood nearby and Kitty to hang out with Kurt and Rogue. As it was spring break, they didn't need to worry about school, hence why Kitty had began going to get four helpings each day.

Through out the day, Kitty was congratulated for her victory in the previous night's contest by several of the students as she kept going back for more food, her red t-shirt's buttons straining against her larger belly each time.
155212313333313111.title: The next day

choices: The next day's Saturday. Kitty's day at the buffet with the Brotherhood
Kitty goes to the carnival with the X-Kids first
1552123133333131111.content:
A little later, Kitty, Kurt and Rogue were walking through the fairground when Kurt noticed a ride. "Hey, wanna go on that ride?" He asked, nodding to it. The two girls turned to look. It was the Hurl-A-Whirl. "Like, I'm not sure about that, Kurt." Kitty said as she chomped on corndogs and a large bag of popcorn, having already popped her bottom button off her t-shirt.

"Ah think it'll be okay, Kitty." Rogue smiled assuredly to her best friend and teammate. Kitty finished eating her corn dogs and popcorn before giving in. "Okay. But if I, like, totally urp, I'm gonna say you two convinced me to do this." she warned as they climbed in and leaned against the wall, holding onto the railings beside them. Luckily for the trio, they were the only ones riding the Hurl-A-Whirl right now. The operator helped strap them in and then started the ride. Slowly, the machine began twirling and then it got faster and faster and faster.

Soon it was running at it's top speed. Inside, the three X-Kids felt gravity pressing on them as the machine whirled like a top. Kurt whooped in delight as his hair blew around due to the wind the ride was kicking up.

"THIS IS SO AAAAAWWWWWWWWWWWWWSSSSSSSSSSOOOOMMMMMMMMMMEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!" He shouted over the roar of the wind and the ride's rattling and whirring. Rogue actually seemed to be enjoying herself as well as she too was smiling.

"AH'M WITH YA, KURT! THIS IS REALLY COOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL!!!!" She whooped as her own hair blew around as they spun around at top speed.

Kitty, however, wasn't having a good time. Her very stuffed belly was flip flopping and doing summersaults every minute. She was starting to wish she hadn't eaten that second Banana Fudge Sundae or that popcorn and those corn dogs. As the machine kept twirling them around, Kitty turned lime green as a giant wave of nausea hit her hard, her tummy rumbling ominously.

"Kitty, are you alvight?!?!?!" Kurt asked upon noticing her expression and hearing her gut's rumbling and gurgling. "Nooo... *urp* Like, I totally think I'm gonna be si-" Kitty managed to get out before she felt a giant amount of bile rushing up her throat. Her cheeks bulged out like a chipmunk's and then, *BBBBOOOOURRRGGGGHHHHHHHHH!!!!* Kitty vomited loud and hard into the middle of the ride's floor.

"Kurt, maybe we shoulda listened ta her." Rogue remarked with concern. "I think she'll be fine." Kurt said as Kitty rose her head, still pale apple green. "Not done yet." she mumbled, guessing Rogue's question, vomit on her chin before she bent over again. *BBBBLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLOOOOORRRRRRRRRFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF!!!!!* She barfed again, even more this time, with her sick getting on her t-shirt and sandals as well.

Fortunately, the operator had heard this barfing episode and quickly stopped the ride. "Are you alright, Miss. Pryde?" he asked, remembering her from the previous night's contest as Kitty dang near crawled out of the ride, clutching her large tummy as it kept feeling very, very queasy. "Like, I will be once I totally... *UUUUrrrrrrpppppp!!* Gotta go!" Kitty yelped as she flew into a nearby porta-potty, slamming the door shut. *HHHHUURURRRRRRKKKKKKKK!!!!* She vomited a second later, Rogue wincing in sympathy while Kurt went to hang out with Amanda Soften, his girlfriend and one of the few people to have known about the X-Kids' powers until mutantkind was exposed.

Soon, Scott and Jean arrived and found Rogue by the porta-potties. "Hey, Rogue. Where's Kitty?" Scott asked. Before Rogue could answer, "*HHHHHUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHH!!!* Like, my poor tummy! Why did I totally eat that second sundae!" Kitty moaned from inside after barfing for the umpteenth time. Slowly, she stumbled out, still visibly green and weak looking.

Then, Kurt came up with Amanda. "Hey guys." Amanda smiled to the four. "Hey, 'Manda." Rogue smiled. "Hi." Kitty mumbled weakly as she rubbed her seemingly calm again belly. "Feeling better?" Kurt asked. "Like, a little bit." "We swung by the food booths and Brian gave this to give to you." Jean said as she held up Kitty's 4th and final tray of hot dogs, funnel cake, cotton candy, lemonades and two of the Banana Fudge Sundaes. Upon seeing this, Kitty immediately turned green again, let out a giant deep burp as her cheeks bulged and quickly ducked back into the stall. "Ah don't think she's gonna be hungry for a few hours guys." Rogue said, wincing as Kitty's vomiting could be heard inside the toilet. Kitty ultimately stayed in the portable toilet for another hour before finally recovering enough to head home. By the next day, she was well again.
1552123133333131111.title: Kitty rides the Hurl-A-Whirl with Kurt and Rogu...

choices: Kitty does one last pig out at the carnival before it closes the next day.
15521231333331311111.content:
The next morning, Kitty woke up feeling much better than she had the night before. That was a good thing too, as tonight was her going to the buffet with the Brotherhood. That night, Kitty managed to leave the mansion without raising too many questions and headed off for the buffet.

Lance, Toad, Pietro and Blob were already there, waiting for Kitty. "There she is, yo!" Toad called as Kitty entered the buffet and located their table. "Like, this is a totally awesome looking place guys." Kitty smiled as she sat beside Lance. She felt glad she hadn't pigged out yet so she had a lot of room in her belly.

"Well, can we eat now, Lance?" Blob asked, clearly tired of waiting. "Yeah, Blob. We can." Lance smiled as the five got up and headed for the serving stations. Kitty grabbed a plate, but then changed her mind and simply grabbed a tray like Blob had done and began piling it with hot dogs, corn dogs, funnel cake, pie, pizza, french fries, burgers, cupcakes and biscuits.

Once she returned to the table, she began inhaling the food at top speed like Blob. The Brotherhood boys just watched in disbelief as Kitty inhaled all the food in minutes, her belly swelling up as she did. "This is way freaky, yo. I never thought we'd see somebody else who could eat like Freddy." Toad remarked. "Yeah. And this' comin' from me." Blob agreed in equal awe and impressment as Kitty loudly inhaled six corn dogs at once, pulling the sticks out completely clean with a loud belch.

As she kept eating, Kitty's t-shirt strained to remain intact. However, as Kitty finished her 3rd tray, the buttons simply gave up. *PING!* *PING!* *PING!* *PING!* *PING!* All five of them went as they popped off, flying in different directions. Kitty didn't even seem to care. She just kept eating and eating and eating and eating and eating!

Finally, "Ooooohhh godddddd.... *UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPP!!!* Like, I totally think I overdid it." Kitty groaned, massaging her large belly with her hands as she leaned back in agony.

"You alright, Kitty Kat?" Quicksilver asked. "Y-Yeah, Pietro. Just *BURP!* a little queasy." Kitty moaned as she kept messaging her tummy while quietly burping and hiccupping. "C'mon. We'd better get you home." Lance said as he helped Kitty up and the four helped her to Lance's Jeep.

Soon, they arrived at Xavier's. Kitty managed to climb out, thanked Lance and the others and slowly waddled up to the mansion, burping, hiccupping and occasionally farting loudly as she came in. When asked by Cyclops and the others, Kitty merely replied she'd taken advantage of her new discount thing at the carnival as she went to bed still fully clothed.
15521231333331311111.title: The next day's Saturday. Kitty's day at...

155212313333313111111.content:
The next day, Kitty went back to the carnival for the last time. It was closing that night and she wanted to make the most of it. Upon arriving, Shadowcat headed straight for the food booths. Brian noticed her right away. "Hey, Kitty. Your usual?" He guessed with a smile.

"Like, you totally know it!" Kitty smiled as he handed her the massive tray of hot dogs, cotton candy, lemonade, funnel cake and sundaes. Kitty plopped down on a picnic bench and began eating. While the other X-Kids hung out at the rides and games while occasionally going to get some food, Kitty stayed at that bench all day. She just kept eating and eating, and eating and eating.

Tray after tray after tray piled up on her table as she gorged herself. Her belly grew rounder and round, filing up her lap. She grew fatter and fatter, her girth causing the poor bench to bend and creak warningly. Kitty didn't even stop until *CRACK!* the bench finally gave way to her massive butt, sending the bloated X-Girl crashing to the grass.

*OOOOMMMMPPPPPHHHHH!* Kitty grunted as she landed on her poor backside with a jiggle rippling through her body. "Like, guess that's totally a sign I've been eating too much lately." she remarked with a shrug as she went back to eating while sitting on the grass.

Kitty just kept on gorging herself, unaware that Scott and the others had grown tired of waiting for her when it was time to go home and left without her. Nor did she notice as the other carnival goers left as well or when her shirt buttons popped open again. She didn't care as long as she kept eating and drinking herself full to bursting.

Finally, as dusk began to fall, one of the employees came up to Kitty, who was finishing up her 30th tray of food. Her face was a mess of cotton candy, funnel cake, ketchup, mustard, relish, ice cream, whipped cream and hot fudge sauce as was her t-shirt.

"Excuse me, Miss. Pryde... but the carnival's getting ready to close now. You'll have to leave." He told her politely. Kitty nodded as she stifled a very big burp, her cheeks bulging while she did. "Like, okay. Thanks for a totally awesome week!" she giggled as she heaved herself up and staggered away, burping, hiccupping and farting loudly as she did while also licking the remains of her her feast off her face and fingers as she did.

It took a few weeks, but Kitty ultimately lost a majority of her girth by summer break. Despite this, her new appetite and a rather round belly remained with her. However, she was very happy with her new look and appetite with Scott and the others accepting it due to their friendship with her.

Though they did end up needing to hid their snacks from her most of the time due to her hunger reaching the same level as Blob's.
155212313333313111111.title: Kitty does one last pig out at the carnival bef...

choices: Kitty goes back the next day. Gets chicken curry and korma
155212313333331.content:
One afternoon, Kitty, Scott, Jean, Kurt, Rogue and Spyke entered an Indian restaurant. They had recently won a fight against the Brotherhood of Bayville and had decided to go out and celebrate. A young girl, not much older than the six themselves, came up.

"Good afternoon. Welcome to the Bombay Palace. My name is Padma Koothrappali and I will be your waitress. What may I get you?" she said with a smile. Scott and the others ordered first and then it was Kitty's turn. Kitty looked at her menu thoughtfully before making her decision.

"Like, I'll have an order of the chicken Korma." Kitty said. Korma was a dish consisting of either meat or vegetables braised with yogurt or cream, water or stock and spices resulting in a thick sauce or glaze. Padma nodded and went to fill the orders, leaving the X-Kids to talk about their recent victory.

Soon, Padma arrived with the team's orders. But, to Kitty's surprise, she received 5 of the chicken kormas. "Um, like, I totally didn't order this much." Kitty said in surprise. "My mother always says that a girl should always have a healthy appetite." Padma smiled. Kitty shrugged and picked up her fork. She took a bite, and her eyes widened in delight at the taste. "Like, this is totally YUMMY!" She squealed and began bolting down each helping as the others and Padma watched in shock.

"Ah think she likes it." Rogue remarked as she watched Kitty wolfing down her korma. Finally, Kitty was licking her 5th bowl clean as the others stared at her in shock. "Are you alright, miss?" Padma asked. Kitty nodded after setting the bowl down.

"Like, yeah. It was *BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPP!!!!* totally good! *UUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPP!!!*" Kitty said, letting out two big burps due to the sauces' spiciness.
