Scott paid for the meal and the six X-Kids left, Kitty burping every so often on the way home. That night, Kitty, as she laid in bed, couldn't stop thinking about the delicious Indian cuisine she'd tasted that afternoon. "Like it really was so yummy. I'll totally need to stop by there again soon." Kitty smiled as she went to sleep, dreaming about korma and other Indian foods.
155212313333331.title: Indian Cuisine

choices: Kitty goes back the next day. Gets even more food thanks to Padma's mom.
1552123133333311.content:
The next day found Kitty going back to Bombay Palace. Padma smiled upon seeing her new friend again. "Hey, Kitty. It is good to see you again." she smiled as she led Kitty to a table. "Like, thanks, Padma. I'll totally take six kormas and chicken curry today." Kitty smiled.

Padma nodded and went to the kitchen. Soon, Kitty had six of said order in front of her. Without wasting a beat, she began scarfing them down like she was starving. Padma smiled as she watched the young girl. Slowly, Kitty's normally thin belly began to bulge as it became filled with delicious, spicy Indian food.

Soon, *UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPP!!!!* Kitty let out a big burp as she rubbed her new potbelly, her plates licked clean once again. She leaned back and sighed in delight at how stuffed she felt.

"Like, that was so totally yummy." she sighed to Padma, who was watching in amusement. "You really do know how to put the food away, don't you?" Padma remarked with a smile. Kitty smiled back. Then, *PPPPPPPPPPPOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRTTTTTT!!!*

Her butt let out a big fart due to the sauces in the curry and korma. "Like, pardon *BBBBEEEELLLLLLCCCCCHHHHHHH!!!* me!" She blushed with a burp and a giggle.

Padma laughed as she helped her friend up. "Y'know, my mother asked if she could meet you after I told her how much you love our food." she said with a grin. Kitty was quiet. "She's a really good cook." Padma offered with a smile, knowing that may hook Kitty. She was right. Kitty's eyes lit up at the thought of even more yummy Indian foods.

"Like, sure! Is tomorrow totally good for you guys?" Kitty asked. Padma smiled. "Yeah. Mom said she'll take tomorrow off. We live in an apartment upstairs so you can just come right on in." She replied. Kitty was about to reply when,

*OOOOOOOOORRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!* *BBBBUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!* Two big burps escaped her lips. The two girls giggled in amusement. "Like, maybe next time I should totally go easy on the sauce.' Kitty smiled as she licked some of it off her finger a second later.

She said goodbye to Padma and headed for home, her potbelly gurgling slightly due to the gas inside her, causing her to burp and fart loudly on occasion as she came back to the mansion.

"Hey, Kitty. Where were you?" Scott asked as he ran into her outside the mansion. "Like, I went back to Bombay Palace and had some more of their yummy food." Kitty replied, stifling a very big burp with her hand as she quickly darted inside and headed for the bathroom, the spicy sauces causing her to need to take a poop because of her now slightly upset tummy.
1552123133333311.title: Kitty goes back the next day. Gets chicken curr...

choices: Kitty goes back two days later. Ends up spending the night with Padma
15521231333333111.content:
The next day found Kitty going back to Bombay Palace after school. Padma was waiting for her when she came in. "You made it! C'mon! Mom's upstairs already!" she smiled, taking Kitty by the arm and practically dragged Shadowcat up the stairs.

Soon, they entered a fairly roomy apartment. Kitty looked around as she stood in the doorway. It looked very neat. There were a few things paying homage to the Koothrappali's Indian homage, like fancy curtains and a few elephant statues, but that was it. Padma seemed to notice Kitty's surprise.

"You were thinking of something like on TV, right?" she guessed with a grin. Kitty blushed deeply. She hadn't meant to be so obvious. "Like, I-" she began nervously. Padma just giggled. "It's okay, Kitty. I'm used to it. Believe it or not, I wasn't actually born in India. I was born here in the US after my parents immigrated here. Don't get me wrong, they loved India but they wanted more for me since they both came from poor families." Padma explained gently.

At that moment, an older woman came out of the kitchen. "Ah! You must be Miss. Kitty Pryde! Padma told me about you." she smiled upon seeing Kitty. Kitty smiled and nodded. "Like, that's me, ma'am." she said. Mrs. Koothrappali smiled again. "Come, come! I've been making a big meal for you." she smiled, leading the two girls to the kitchen/dining room.

Once Kitty sat down, Padma's mom quickly placed a large helping of chicken curry in front of her along with an equally large helping of korma. Kitty quickly wolfed both down quickly, moaning in delight at the taste. Mrs. Koothrappali smiled at the sight as she put another, even bigger helping of curry on Kitty's plate.

Soon, Kitty's belly had swollen up even more, making her potbelly more gut-like in appearance. She'd eaten at least 10 of both chicken curry and korma. Now, Mrs. Koothrappali placed a plate of poppadom and pita bread in front of her. Without even missing a beat, Kitty quickly began eating that, soon licking the plate clean.

Mrs. Koothrappali and Padma, who'd been eating as well, smiled at their new friend. Then, Kitty opened her mouth.

*OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP P!!!!* She belched loudly. "Like, excuse me." she apologized with a blush. "It is alright, Kitty. That shows me you enjoy the food." Mrs. Koothrappali smiled as she gently rubbed Kitty's belly.

*PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT TTTT!!!* Kitty farted in response. "Like, I think I totally gotta use the bathroom." Kitty said, the lower part of her belly rumbling in agreement. Mrs. Koothrappali smiled. "I have just the thing for you." she replied and went into the bathroom. She came out a second later, holding a thick diaper.

"Like, a diaper?" Kitty asked in bewilderment. "Yes. Padma wears them too." Mrs. Koothrappali said assuredly. Padma nodded and, to Kitty's shock, pulled her pants down to reveal an equally thick diaper. "Mom didn't really have time to potty train me when I was a kid so I just kept wearing and using 'em." She explained to the surprised Kitty.

Kitty was silent as she thought it over. But then, her tummy let out another ominous rumble and she practically phased her diaper on. Not a moment too soon. *BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBLLLLLLLLLLLLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRCCCCCHHHHHH!!!* With that giant fart, Kitty filled her diaper with a massive poop.

"Like, thanks." She told Mrs. Koothrappali, who smiled before going to clean up the table. As she worked, Kitty and Padma talked while sitting on the couch in the living room. "So, like, if you don't mind me asking, where's your dad?" asked Kitty. At this, Padma became sad. "Like, I-I'm sorry. You totally don't need to answer if..." Kitty began quickly.

"No. It's okay." Padma smiled gently. She took a deep breath. "It happened two years ago. Mom and Dad were driving home from Temple. It was rainy so the road's were slick. A car was coming into the intersection at the same time from the opposite direction and hit them. They were both taken to the hospital. Mom survived since she was on the passenger side but Dad... he died two days later." Padma explained.

Kitty didn't say anything. Then, she slowly hugged her new friend. Padma, though surprised, smiled and returned the hug. A little later, Kitty (now in a fresh diaper and with several more in her backpack) said goodbye to Padma and her mom and headed for home, her belly noticeably rounder and bigger.
15521231333333111.title: Kitty goes back the next day. Gets even more fo...

choices: Kitty's friends get concerned about her weight
155212313333331111.content:
Two days later, Kitty returned to Bombay Palace. She and Padma had met at school and had decided to have a sleepover, having cleared with Professor X and Mrs. Koothrappali beforehand. She headed up to the apartment and knocked on the door. A second later, Padma opened it, already clad in a t-shirt and a thick diaper. "Hey Kitty!" she smiled as they hugged.

"Like, thanks for inviting me." Kitty smiled back. "You just want more food." Padma smirked as she playfully poked Kitty's gut, causing its' owner to blush. "Like, maybe." Kitty giggled. At that moment, Mrs. Koothrappali poked her head out from the kitchen.

"Ah, hello Kitty. I have just finished up a meal for the two of you." She smiled. Hearing this, Kitty quickly dropped her sleeping bag and suitcase and ran to the table. There was a massive meal of chicken curry, korma and poppadom and pita breads waiting.

"Like, thanks Mrs. Koothrappali." she smiled. "Hey, Kitty, I have an idea." Padma said as they sat down to eat. "Like, what is it?" Kitty asked as she began pouring spicy sauce on her korma. "Let's see who can eat the most food with the sauce on it before needing a drink. Loser has to change the winner's diaper." Padma offered. "Like, sure." Kitty smiled.

Together, they poured a massive amount of the sauce onto their first meal and then ate it. Kitty felt the heat from the sauce but otherwise felt okay. Padma, since it was the first round, looked to have the same reaction.

They kept eating and eating with more and more of the sauce added with each course. Finally, after eating a piece of pita bread drowned in the sauce, Padma couldn't take it anymore and grabbed her glass of water, chugging it loudly.

"Like, are you okay?" Kitty asked. Padma didn't answer until she drained the glass. "Yeah. I... just forgot... I can only take... a certain amount of spicy sauce." gasped Padma as she fanned her tongue. Then, with a *PPPPPPPPPPPPPPOOOOOTTTTTT!!* Kitty filled her diaper.

The two girls didn't say anything at first and then, "A deal's a deal." smiled Padma as she nodded to the floor. Kitty slowly got on her back and Padma changed her diaper in a matter of minutes. "Like, thanks." Kitty smiled once she was in a fresh one.

"You're welcome." Padma smiled back. The rest of the night went like any girl sleepover. They did their hair and nails, told stories about their lives and gossiped a little about the boys they liked. Finally, they fell asleep in Padma's bedroom at midnight.
155212313333331111.title: Kitty goes back two days later. Ends up spendin...

1552123133333311111.content:
The next day, Kitty returned to the Institute after eating a massive breakfast thanks to Mrs. Koothrappali. She had just walked in, humming to herself as she did, when she noticed Kurt and Rogue watching her from the steps.

"Hey, guys. Like, what's up?" Kitty asked as they came downstairs. "Kitty, we gotta talk to you." Rogue said, nodding to the couch. Kitty nodded after a moment and then sat down with Kurt on one side and Rogue on the other. "Like, going on?" She asked cheerfully.

"Well, we know you've been eating quite a bit lately." Kurt began slowly, poking Kitty's much bigger belly. *BURP!!!* Kitty burped as a result with a blush.

"Like, I guess I have totally put on extra weight." Kitty agreed sheepishly. "We're just saying maybe ya should cut down on the amount of food you're eatin'." Rogue explained to her friend, roommate and teammate. Kitty was quiet for a moment as she thought over the request.

Then, she smiled and nodded. "Like, I guess you guys're totally right. If I keep this up, I'm gonna need a forklift to get around." She joked as she put a hand on her belly. The trio then went to get breakfast, with Kitty making sure to not eat too many doughnuts, bagels, cinnamon rolls and so on.

A few weeks passed and Kitty gradually slimmed back to her normal size and weight. Despite this, she remained close friends with Padma and her mother. Padma eventually learned of Kitty being a mutant, but accepted it very well, as did her mother.

Unknown to the other X-Kids, meanwhile, Kitty kept wearing and using her new diapers. They were very comfy and made her feel safe and secure.
1552123133333311111.title: Kitty's friends get concerned about her weight

choices: Vegetables accidently gene spliced to taste like junk foods
155212313333332.title: More ideas

choices: Next morning, Kitty's gotten chubby, but shrugs it off
1552123133333321.content:
One day, Kitty was watching TV when she noticed an ad. It featured new veggies that had apparently been gene spliced to have more healthy things in them. Deciding to check it out, Kitty left the mansion and located a stand handing out free samples.

"Like, could I try the carrot?" She asked the woman behind the counter. The woman smiled and nodded, handing Kitty the carrot. Kitty took it and bit into it. Upon doing so, her eyes widened. Instead of tasting more carrot-like, the carrot actually tasted like cake. Quickly polishing it off, Kitty looked at the woman.

"Like, got any other of those new veggies?" She asked. The woman nodded and handed over some radishes. Kitty eagerly took one bite and moaned in delight at the peanut butter cookie taste. She then tried a potato and discovered they tasted like cheeseburgers.

"Awesome! Like, I'll take a few pounds of carrots, potatoes, cabbage and radishes." She requested. The woman smiled and prepared said request. Soon, Kitty had paid for them and was heading home while eating a cheeseburger potato.

Upon returning to the mansion, Kitty placed the veggies in the kitchen and then grabbed a few carrots before heading up to her room and spent the rest of the day eating the cake flavored carrots as she read until dinnertime. Luckily, no one touched her veggies so they didn't notice the different tastes.

Kitty went to bed, feeling very happy. "Like, if these veggies'd come along when I totally first started eating them, I'd have enjoyed them right from the start." she giggled to herself as she went happily to sleep.
1552123133333321.title: Vegetables accidently gene spliced to taste lik...

choices: Kitty goes to where the veggies are made and takes advantage of the discount.
15521231333333211.content:
The next day, Kitty woke up with a yawn as she stretched. Unknown to her, she was noticeably chubbier due to the veggies from the day before. Humming happily, she got dressed, her belly poking out from under her cream t-shirt, and went downstairs for breakfast.

Scott, Jean, Kurt, Rogue and Spyke were already there, finishing up their breakfasts. "Like, hey guys." Kitty smiled as she came into the dining room. The other X-Kids eyed Kitty's chubbier belly as she began getting her breakfast. She didn't even notice the stares until she sat down with her pancakes, bacon and toast. "Like, why're you guys staring?" She asked, her first forkful of food near her mouth.

"Um, Kitty... I think you're putting on weight." Scott said, eying Kitty's noticeably chubby tummy. Kitty frowned at this. "Like, no I'm not guys. I'm totally fine." she said as she stuffed the pancakes into her mouth. The others rose their eyebrows but didn't say anything farther about this.

After breakfast, Kitty went to watch TV in the rec room. As she watched cartoons, a commercial for the veggies began playing. At the end of it, she discovered that they offered discounts for students like her. Upon hearing this, she got an idea.

"I can, like, totally get even more of those yummy veggies since I'm a high school student. I'll bet I can, like, totally get twice as many as I did yesterday." Kitty thought to herself excitedly as she kept watching her cartoons while thinking about all of this in her head.
15521231333333211.title: Next morning, Kitty's gotten chubby, but sh...

choices: A week later, Kitty shares the veggies with Jean, Rogue, Magma and Boom-Boom
155212313333332111.content:
Later that afternoon, Kitty went to the factory where the veggies were being made. A worker came up as soon as she entered the door. "Hello. I'm Lester Torrents, co-manager of this factory. How may I help you?" he smiled.

"I'm Kitty Pryde. Like, I totally came down here about the discount since I'm a student at Bayville High." Kitty explained with a smile. Lester smiled again. "Of course, young lady. Come with me." He told Kitty. Kitty smiled and followed Lester into the factory.

As she was given a tour, Kitty couldn't help but feel happy about the whole thing. She'd never really enjoyed eating many veggies like turnips, cabbage and others, but now, with the junk food thing in them, they weren't so awful.

Halfway through the tour, Kitty's chubby belly rumbled quietly, letting the15-year-old know it was starting to become very hungry. Noticing that Lester had gone farther ahead to talk with an employee, Kitty headed for the next room of the tour.

Opening the door, Kitty couldn't believe it. Inside was piles of carrots, turnips, potatoes, cabbages, lettuce, radishes, onions and even broccoli. "Like, this is totally the best tour ever!" She squealed in delight as she charged the pile of junk food flavored health foods.

Grabbing a piece of broccoli, Kitty shoved it into her mouth and moaned in delight. It tasted just like a banana cream pie. Eagerly, she grabbed an onion and tried that, discovering it tasted exactly like a hot fudge sundae. The lettuce tasted like cupcakes, the turnips tasted like red velvet cake and so on.

Finally, Kitty had eaten several of each veggie and was considerably fatter. Letting out a stifled burp, Kitty heaved herself up and staggered out, having stuffed her pockets and her bag with as many of the veggies as they could hold, thankful Lester had ended the tour to talk with one of the other employees.

When Kitty got back to the mansion, she found Kurt, Rogue, Scott, Jean and Spyke in the living room. "Kitty, where've you been?" Asked Jean upon noticing her friend. "Like, just out." Kitty answered quickly.

Then, *BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPP!!!!!* Kitty let out a massive fart that split her pants, showing off her pink underpants to the team.

"Oops." Kitty blushed bright red as she quickly covered the large hole with her bag and raced to her bedroom before the team could say anything else.
155212313333332111.title: Kitty goes to where the veggies are made and ta...

choices: 3 weeks later, the other girls discover their WG when they outgrow their clothes
1552123133333321111.content:
A week had passed since Kitty's tour of the factory and she was much fatter. Her belly was much bigger and rounder, hanging over the waistband of her pants, her arms, toes, feet, fingers, thighs, butt and boobs were also much softer and plumper and she had gained a double chin.

She had also finally noticed her weight gain after she stopped being able to fit into her clothes easily two days ago. Though intitally embarrassed, Kitty had ultimately accepted it. She had to admit she looked cute with her extra blubber.

Today, she was eating some pie flavored broccoli and red velvet cake flavored turnips when Jean, Rogue, Amara and Tabitha came into the kitchen. "Hey, guys." Kitty said with a smile. "Hey, Kitty." Tabitha smiled back.

"Like, would you guys totally like to try some these veggies? They're really good." Kitty offered with a smile. The other four girls shrugged and grabbed one. Jean took a carrot, Tabitha grabbed a big fat onion, Rogue took a fairly big potato and Amara took a piece of broccoli respectively.

Tabitha was the first one to take a bite of her veggie. Upon tasting the hot fudge sundae flavoring, she moaned in delight. "It tastes just like a hot fudge sundae!" She moaned through her bulging cheeks as she began wolfing the rest of it down and grabbing another.

Jean, meanwhile, bit into her carrot and nearly wept in delight at the chocolate cake flavoring of the carrot. "Chocolate cake! Just like my mom makes!" She groaned as she crammed the carrot into her mouth and grabbed two more.

Rogue and Amara, meanwhile, both gave equal sounds of delight at their respective veggie's junk food flavorings. With that, the four girls began eagerly scarfing down the piles of carrots, onions, potatoes and broccoli as Kitty watched, having already eaten her fill.

As she watched them do so, Kitty noticed the four starting to visibly put on weight, their normally trim tummies slowly turning pudgy and poking out from under their shirts while their boobs, butts, thighs, hips, feet, toes, arms, hands and finger began swelling up as well. Kitty thought about telling her friends about their WG, but decided against it.

Finally, the now noticeably chubbier girls finished licking their plates clean and burped in unison, big grins on their faces. "Those were the best veggies we've ever had!" Amara smiled as she rubbed her potbelly obliviously.

"Like, why don't we totally have a movie night?" Kitty offered. The others agreed and they went to change into their jammies while Kitty prepared more of the junk food veggies for their movie night.

The rest of the night was spent by the girls eating themselves sick on the veggies and putting on more weight with each one consumed.
1552123133333321111.title: A week later, Kitty shares the veggies with Jea...

choices: The girls discover the veggies were incorrectly created and stop eating them
15521231333333211111.content:
3 weeks had passed since Jean, Rogue, Amara and Tabitha had started eating the junk food veggies themselves. They had, like Kitty, begun putting on a large amount of weight as a result. Despite this, they remained oblivious of it.

"UUuuugggghhh!! C'mon! Fit would ya?!?" Rogue groaned as she struggled to pull her leggings all the way up her plumper booty. Finally, she managed to inch them up enough that her butt was completely covered. She then struggled to pull up her skirt somewhat but managed to pull it up as well before sitting on her bed, wheezing and gasping heavily.

It wasn't just her leggings or skirt either. Her black sleeveless top and green see through shirt were both rather tight on her noticeably fatter body, her belly being visible under the latter one. She had grown considerably over the last three weeks of junk food veggies. Her face was doughy and had a double chin, her arms and legs were plump and squishy looking, her hands and feet were fatter and her fingers and toes were all swollen as well. Add that with her softer and squishier boobs and hippo butt and thighs, and you had an obese Rogue.

Wiping her sweaty brow, Rogue heaved herself up and started to the kitchen. "Ah wonder if the others're havin' trouble with their clothes too." She wondered as she slowly walked to the kitchen.

In Jean's room, "Oh come on, pants! You just gotta fit!" Jean was pleading to her light purple pants as she struggled to button them up. Like Rogue, Jean was much larger than before. Her face was round and doughy looking with a double chin, her arms, butt, feet, legs, boobs, belly, hips and thighs were all fat as well. Her yellow sweater could barely fit over her plump middle and it hung over the waistband of her pants. Finally, wheezing and gasping like Rogue had been, Jean managed to button her pants before going downstairs as well.

In her room, Kitty yawned and rolled out of bed, her massive belly rumbling and gurgling for those yummy veggies. "Like, I totally hope the others've save me some. They've totally been pigging out on them lately." Kitty smiled as she tugged on her tight blue pants, cream t-shirt and pink sweater, her belly bulging under the latter two and hanging over the waistband of the former.

When she got downstairs, Kitty saw Tabitha, Amara, Jean and Rogue all ready downstairs. Kitty couldn't believe how big the four had become over the last three weeks. They all looked like they'd been blown up by giant pumps.

Tabitha's big gut hung over the waistband of her unbuttoned pants while her double chins wobbled as she ate her massive pile of junk veggies contentedly. Amara, meanwhile, was toasting some of hers with her powers before eating them. She and Tabby looked like giant boulders due to how round shaped they were. Rogue and Jean, meanwhile, looked like oddly rounded out pears.

"Like, hey guys." Kitty smiled gently as she came in. "Mmmph. 'Ey 'Itty." Mumbled Tabitha through a very big mouthful of cheeseburger potatoes. "Anyone else notice their clothes're tighter than normal?" asked Amara as she nodded to her own very tight looking clothes.

"Yeah. But Ah think they probably shrunk in the wash." Rogue shrugged as she shoveled a handful of red velvet cake flavored turnips into her mouth. The others, except Kitty, nodded in agreement. Kitty didn't know why, but she still felt like she shouldn't say anything to her friends about their new chunky appearances.

"I say we'd better go clothes shopping today." Jean said in agreement before cramming six carrots into her maw at once, chewing loudly and nosily. The other girls agreed and soon had squeezed into Jean's SUV and were heading to the Bayville Mall.

Soon, the five girls were in a plus sized store, buying up extra large t-shirts and stretchy sweatpants before heading home and eating more and more of the veggies. Kitty decided, as she pigged out with them, that she should probably take the girls to the factory tomorrow and find out what was going on.
15521231333333211111.title: 3 weeks later, the other girls discover they...

155212313333332111111.content:
The next day, the five girls went to the factory to find out more about the veggies They were greeted by a young woman. "Hello. My name's Brooke Yeung. I'm the creator of the veggies." she smiled to them.

"I'm Kitty Pryde. Like, that's Jean Grey, Tabitha Smith, Amara Aquilla and Rogue. We've been eating the veggies for the last four weeks now and, as you can, like, totally see, we've bloated up a bit." Kitty smiled, nodding to herself and the other four plump girls.

"Alright. We've been getting quite a few calls about the veggies' side effects for some time now and we think we may finally have the reason." Brooke said to them. "What is it?" Tabitha asked as she loudly crunched on a cake flavored carrot while scratching her belly.

"It seems we made a slight error in making the junk food flavoring. It does work in making the veggies taste like the junk food in the spray, but the chemicals remove all the nutrition from the veggie, thus making them more addictive and causing weight gain in a matter of hours." Brooke explained.

"And you didn't notice until now?" Rogue asked as she shoved a massive handful of turnips into her own mouth. "We honestly thought they were ready for distribution. We didn't catch on until concerned parents began calling us to reveal their kids were bloating up and eating more than usual." Brooke confessed.

"So like, how long does the addiction last?" Kitty asked as she munched on a cheeseburger potato. "We've discovered the addiction only lasts for a few weeks. Unfortunately, the bloating doesn't go away, nor does the person's increased appetite." Brooke answered.

"So we'll recover from the addictions but not our bigger appetite or bloating?" Jean asked as she loudly scarfed down a large piece of broccoli. "I'm afraid so. I'm sure the bloating will go down if you exercise but the appetite will remain forever." Brooke confirmed in sympathy.

A few weeks later, the girls were relaxing at the mansion. They had stopped eating the veggies and gotten rid of them. Brooke was right. Aside from their bloated appearances and massive appetites, things had returned to normal.

"I gotta admit, this is kinda nice." Jean smiled as she, Kitty, Rogue Tabitha and Amara pigged out on their massive lunch, consisting of PB&J sandwiches, cake, pie, ice cream, pizza, hamburgers, hot dogs and other junk food.

"Totally. And like, the others are totally cool with it." Kitty smiled as she inhaled a massive PB&J sandwich a second later, burping loudly after doing so. She was right. the other X-Kids and New Recruits were perfectly fine with the five girls' new weights and appetites, as were Professor X, Storm, Beast and even Wolverine.

Later, Rogue had just entered her and Kitty's room when she noticed a large box under Kitty's bed. "What the heck?" She wondered as she pulled it out and opened it.

The southern goth couldn't believe it. Inside were very familiar looking carrots, potatoes, lettuce, turnips, broccoli and other junk food flavored veggies.

Picking up the box, Rogue went downstairs with it and went to the living room, where Kitty, Jean, Tabitha and Amara were all lounging, rubbing and playing with their massive tummies.

Upon seeing Rogue holding her box, Kitty's face filled with alarm. "Like, where'd you find that?!?!?" She yelped in alarm. "Under yo' bed, sugar. Ya left part of it stickin' out." Rogue replied with a smile.

"What's in it?" Tabitha asked as she sat up on the couch she was laying on with some difficulty, wheezing slightly as she managed to do so after two tries.

"Turns out Kitty here's been smugglin' those veggies under her bed." Rogue replied as she showed the contents to Jean and the others, Kitty blushing very brightly.

"Kitty..." began Jean slowly. "I know, I know! Like, I was totally gonna throw them out but then I tasted one turnip and I couldn't do it! You guys know I've, like, totally never been crazy about most veggies since I was in diapers!" Kitty confessed.

"Kitty... it's okay. You were the first one of us to taste these so it's understandable that your addiction isn't completely gone yet." Jean said assuredly as the others, even Rogue, nodded in agreement.

Ultimately, Kitty's addiction did leave her completely two days later and left her free to enjoy her other massive meals with her friends as they got bigger and heavier.

15521232111.title: Frankenstein-like castle

155212321111.content:
Arrival

"Alright, be careful, everyone. The Professor said it could be dangerous here so just take things slowly." Scott Summers, alias Cyclops, said to teammates Jean Grey, Kurt Wagner, Rogue, Spyke and Shadowcat. Professor X had sent the six teenagers to the castle as Cerebro had apparently detected a mutant signature there.

"It's gonna be okay, Scott," said Jean assuredly as they entered the huge, fairly creepy looking castle. It was old and rather dirty. It looked like no one'd been there in a very, very, very long time as a result.

"I think we'll cover more ground if we split up." Scott decided after a moment. "I'll take those two hallways. Rogue, you go and cover the third and fourth hallways. Nightcrawler, you and Spyke take upstairs while Jean comes with me." He ordered a second later.

"Like, what about me, Scott?" Kitty asked him. "You can take the downstairs," Scott decided. "We'll meet back here in two hours." He added as he and Jean set off down the first hallway's corner, Rogue took the third while Kurt and Evan teleported upstairs, leaving Kitty by her lonesome.

The 15-year-old mutant gulped nervously. She'd always been somewhat jumpy about creepy places and things and this was definitely one of the most frightening places she's ever seen or been in yet. Everything looked dark and very spooky.

Kitty was so scared, she felt like she was gonna barf, cry, scream, poop and wet her uniform all at once as she kept looking around in fright. She thought it this castle looked like something out of an old horror movie she'd seen with Rogue, Kurt and Evan. She'd been so scared afterwards, she couldn't sleep for a week unless she used a night light or, if she was really freaked out, Rogue had allowed her to sleep with her, which'd surprised Kitty due to Rogue's often grouchy and/or aloof personality.

Unfortunately, the movie had also resulted in Kitty being the butt of numerous pranks by Kurt and Spyke as a result until Logan intervened after a prank involving Kurt and Spyke dressed as the movie's monsters made Kitty wet and mess herself in front of the other students and faint. The duo ended up with two months probation and had to clean the vehicles owned by the X-Men twice during that time.

Now, Kitty was ready to be brave. Sure, she'd led a sheltered life with her parents before coming to the X-Men a year ago, but she was willing to help this new mutant if it was possible. She also know that if she stayed put or hid in the X-Van for the next hour or so, she'd never hear the end of it from Kurt and Evan when they and the others found out should she do one or the other.

"Like, there's n-n-nothing to t-t-t-totally b-b-b-be scared a-a-a-about, Kitty. G-g-g-get a grip." she told herself nervously, stammering as she did. "Like, it's totally now or never." She thought to herself as she eyed the grandfather clock nearby.

Then, taking a deep breath, Kitty dove into the floor, using her mutant powers to phase through the stone flooring to the downstairs level.
155212321111.title: A potion

1552123211111.content:
After reaching the downstairs level, Kitty noticed she had landed in a strange looking laboratory. As she looked around, she was very surprised by the lab.

Despite the castle's age, everything here was brand new. Bright lights filled the room, showing off new lab equipment, beakers, microscopes and the like. Despite the creepy castle, it didn't look like a mad scientist's lab at all. This place looked like a normal science or chemistry class and had a nice, almost cozy atmosphere around it.

"Like, total freaky-ness." Kitty whispered in amazement as she kept looking around the large room at all the amazing looking chemicals and projects.

It was clear that someone had either been there recently or was still there. Liquids were bubbling and in some cases, frothing in several beakers over still turned on burners, a nearby computer was still on (but on the screensaver), the lights were still on and a half drank cup of water was on a table.

As she walked towards the computer, Kitty noticed a large pink potion bubbling and somewhat gurgling nearby. Aside from the friendly coloring, it smelled heavenly. "Like, what's this?" Kitty asked as she slowly approached it nervously.

As Kitty did so, the smell grew stronger. Kitty now realized it smelled like melted chocolate and other yummy smells like freshly baked cookies, brownies and other desserts mixed into one doozy of a wonderful smell.

At that moment, Kitty's tummy grumbled with hunger. Blushing, she put her hand on it. "Like, I totally knew I shouldn't have skipped lunch, but Scott totally hurried us out here before I could even grab an apple." She sighed in dismay.

She looked around carefully. If Scott or the others were here, they'd likely urge her to reconsider what she was thinking of doing right now. But the potion did look and smell very tasty. Surely, if she took an itsy, witsy sip, it wouldn't hurt, would it?

"Like, I'm totally sure a sip wouldn't hurt." Kitty smiled as she carefully lifted the beaker up and bought it to her lips. Slowly, the small stream of pink liquid flowed over her lips onto her tongue and taste buds. It smelled like chocolate but tasted like fresh apple pie going down her throat. Kitty let a little more pour in before gently removing the beaker from her lips, running her tongue over her lips in case some of the potion had stayed behind.

"Wow!, Like this stuff totally tastes..."
1552123211111.title: She lands into a laboratory

15521232111111.content:
"...yummy!" Kitty cheered as she then proceeded to guzzle down the entire beaker's contents down, gulping loudly as she did. She finished it a second later and placed the beaker back where she'd found it, a giant grin on her face as she wiped her mouth with the back of her hand.

"Now, like, it's totally time to go back looking for clues on this new-" Kitty started to say with a grin when she suddenly stopped.

*GGGURRGGGGLLLEEEEEEEE!!* Kitty's eyes went as big as headlights as she touched her stomach, which had made the large gurgle. "Hey! Like what's-" Then, her cheeks swelled up to the size of beachballs and then, *UUUUUUURRRRRRRPPPPPPP!!!!*.

Kitty let out a ginormous burp that shook the walls and tables. "Woah! Like, excuse me!" she blushed in understandable embarrassment. But, despite the humiliation from that big burp, Kitty realized that she also felt... happy about it.

"Like, why am I totally happy about it?" Kitty wondered in surprise. Then, *GGGRRROOWWWWLLLL!!!!!* Her belly let out another growl. "Oh no! Like, now wha-"

*PPPPPPOOOOOOOOOOOOTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!!!* This time, Kitty let out a giant, smelly fart. Now, instead of being embarrassed, she actually laughed. "Wow! Like, that was kinda totally cool!" she giggled as she waved her hand behind her butt.

Out of curiosity, Kitty picked the empty beaker up again and noticed a label on it "Like, 'Tiana Mobley's Secret Dessert Sauce. Just one drop and you can have whatever dessert for dinner you please with the appearance of your healthful food'!" She read aloud, her eyebrows raising in surprise.

"Like, I don't know any kid or teen who'd totally want the ability to do that!" Kitty smirked as she pocketed the beaker, promising to have Beast, Professor X or even the new mutant (who Kitty strongly suspected of making this potion) test it.

Kitty then set off, not noticing that there was a small label on the beaker that had this notice on it.

Said label read: "'Caution: Not to be consumed by females with the 'X' gene. Will cause brief period of increased appetite, burping, farting, body odor, pooping and other forms of slobbiness while consuming fattening and/or greasy foods until sauce wears off'."
15521232111111.title: "Yummy! I'm gonna have more!"

choices: Fried chicken and cake (Kitty resumes burping and farting).
155212321111111.content:
Kitty was just leaving to continue her search for the new mutant when, *GGGGURRRRGGGLLLEEEE!!!!* Her stomach gurgled loudly, so loudly in fact, that Kitty half expected the others to hear and come investigate. Though she was relieved when no one did.

"Like, I'm totally starving now!" Kitty whined, rubbing her belly. Even though she'd had a fairly large breakfast, it had been hours ago. Now, Kitty felt so hungry she was convinced she could eat an entire barnyard. Her poor tummy felt so empty and abandoned, Kitty swore it felt like she was totally skin and bones.

"There's gotta be, like, a kitchen or something totally around here." Kitty remarked as she kept a hand around her stomach while beginning to look around. After a few minutes, she'd found her goal.

"Please, like, let there be something totally yummy in here for me to eat!" she pleaded as she opened the door. The second she did so, her eyes popped wide open and her tongue flopped out of her mouth.

There was fried chicken, pie, cake, doughnuts, ham, hot dogs, corn dogs, Twinkies, cupcakes, hamburgers, ice cream sundaes and other greasy, fattening foods. It looked like it'd been recently made since they were all still fresh looking.

"Like, I've totally hit the junk food jackpot!" Kitty squealed excitedly, running up to the large table and sitting down in the chair at the head of said table.

"Now, what should I, like, totally eat first?" wondered Kitty aloud, licking her lips and grinning eagerly at all the unhealthy foods in front of her.

Everything looked so good to the young X-Man that she couldn't decide. Normally, she would avoid the meat items due to her being a Vegan, but now she was so hungry, she couldn't care less.

"Like, I guess I'll totally try the..."
155212321111111.title: Goes to find kitchen (WG)

choices: Soda (Kitty poops her uniform and gets bad BO)
1552123211111111.content:
Kitty ultimately chose the fried chicken. Grabbing a big drumstick, she sunk her teeth into it and moaned at tasting how much grease was in it. The grease smeared her cheeks and lips as she tor a fairly large chunk of meat off and chewed loudly and nosily.

She then swallowed and burped loudly. *BBBBBUUUUUUURRRRRAAAAPPPPP!!!!* "Excuse me!" Kitty giggled as she then tore another chunk off the drumstick.

After that, Kitty tore through the fried chicken fairly quickly. By the time she was done, she was burping up a storm. *BBBUUURRRPPPPP!!!* *AAARRRRAAAPPPPPPPP!!!!* *OOOOOOOORRRRRPPPPPPP!!!* *BEEEELLLLLLCCCCHHHH!!* *UUUUURRRRPPPPPPPPP!!!*

"Wow! Like, I've totally never *UUURRRRPPPP!!!* burped this *BBBEEEELLLLCCCHHHH!!* loudly in my *AAAARRAAAPPPP!* *OOOORRRRRRAAPPPP!!!* life!" She giggled.

"Like, what should I try next? *BBBUURRRRRPPPP!*" Kitty eyed the table in delight. There was still numerous desserts and snack foods to eat. "Like *UUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPP!!* I think *BUURRRAAAPPP!!* I'll try *OOOORRRRPPP!* the cake!" Kitty smiled, grabbing the seven layer cake.

She grabbed a fork, but something in her told her that was a bad idea. Kitty eyed the fork thoughtfully and then tossed it aside. "Like *UUURRRRRPPPPP!!!* there's totally *BBBBUUURRRRAAAPPPPPPP1!!* more than one *OOORRRRPPPP!!!!* way to eat a cake!" she smiled and then, she plunged face first into the cake.

Soon, she was loudly chomping, inhaling and slurping up the cake, burping and now farting, in between each bite. "Like this is *UUUURRRAAAPPPPP!!!* totally *PPPPPOOOTTTT!!!* the yummiest *BBUUUURRRRRPPPPPPPP!!!!* cake I've ever *BBEEEEELLLLCCCHHHH!!!* *PPPOOOOTTTT!!!* had!" She grinned, her face a mess of frosting and crumbs as she began licking it off with her tongue and using a napkin to wipe the parts of it that her tongue couldn't reach off, only to eat her napkin a second later.

Now, Kitty was also sporting a noticeable belly, which was starting to sag over her uniform's utility belt. "Like *BBUUURRRPPP!!* *BBBLLAAARRRPPPP!!!* I totally wonder what I should eat next?" She remarked.
1552123211111111.title: Fried chicken and cake (resume burping and farting

choices: Scott and the others find her (Kitty keeps eating and briefly loses her manners)
15521232111111111.content:
Kitty licked her greasy and frosting covered lips. "Like I am kinda *OOOORRRPPPP!!!* thirsty." she remarked with another smelly burp and then a fart. *FFFRRRAAAPPPPPPP!!!!!*

Then, she noticed a large soda bottle. Kitty quickly grabbed it and took a swing. It tasted really yummy. "Mmmmm! Like, it's orange soda! *UUURRRAAAPPPPPPP!!!!*" She burped and started chugging it down like crazy.

As she did, Kitty started changing. Her body odor became very stinky, pit stains formed under her arms and a big sweat stain appeared on her chest. Finally, Kitty finished the bottle and tossed it aside. *BBBBURRRRRRAAAOOORRRRPPPPP!!!* She burped, loud and long.

"Like, that soda *PPPPOOOTTTTTTTT!!!* was totally *UUUURRRRRPPPPPP!!!!* good!" Kitty giggled, loudly smacking her lips. Then, her body odor hit her nostrils. "Eeeeeww!! Like, I totally stink! *BELCH!* I smell like gym socks in a dirty dia-*UURRRP*-per!" she burped in disgust.

And then, her large belly started gurgling like crazy. "NNNUUGGGHHH! L-Like what's-NNNNN-happening?!?!?" Kitty wailed as she found herself started to fart up a storm, more smellier and nosier poots than she had unleashed yet since she'd started doing so.

*PPPOOOOOOTTTTT* *FRRRRAAAPPPPPPP* *BLARRRRAAAPPPPPP!!!* Kitty doubled over in agony, clutching her large tummy.

With more giant and smelly farts and a few grunts of pain, Kitty felt a very big, hot and stinky pile of poop enter her pants. The load bulged the seat of her pants and made them sag. "Like I totally just *UUURRRPPP!!!* pooped my uniform!" she shrieked in disbelief.

*BBBBLOOOORRRRRRCCCCHHHH!!!!!* Another load of poo entered her pants, making them bulge and sag more. Kitty just stared at her lumpy pants in dismay and embarrassment.

"Like, what's *BBBURRRPPPP!!!* happening *PPPPPPOOOOTTTTTT!!!* to me?!?!?!?" She asked as she scratched her armpit.

Kitty knew she needed to try and find Scott and the others and get help for her new slobby urges, but the remaining food called out to her, just waiting to be eaten. Kitty tried to fight it, but the urge to eat more and fill her fat, yet still feeling empty tummy was too much for the 15-year-old mutant to bear.
15521232111111111.title: Soda (Kitty poops her uniform and gets bad BO)

choices: Tiana explains about her still in development dessert tasting sauce & her powers
155212321111111111.content:
Meanwhile, Scott, Jean, Kurt, Rogue and Spyke had reunited in the main hall of the castle. The two hours had lapsed and they hadn't found the new mutant they'd been looking for.

"Where's Kitty?" asked Scott as he realized their youngest teammate wasn't with them. "Maybe she got lost or something." Kurt offered with concern. Despite his teasing of Kitty, he really considered her his friend and they did have fun together.

"I'll try to pick up her thoughts." Jean said after a moment. She put her hands to her head and began to concentrate. "Kitty? Kitty, where are you? It's Jean. Let me know if you can hear my voice." She said telepathically. Everybody waited a few minutes.

Then, "Jean? *UUURRRRPPPP!!!* Excuse me. Like, I'm okay. I'm in the downstairs basement kitchen. *BBBUURRRAAAPPP!!* Like, there's totally something wrong though. I, like, totally need you guys to *BEEEELLLLLCCCCHHHH!!!!* come down and see for your selves!!!" Kitty's response told Jean a second later.

"What's up, Jean?" Spyke asked. "Kitty's downstairs in the kitchen. She sounded a little freaked out though. We'd better get down there." replied Jean seriously as the five hurried to the nearby staircase leading to the basement.

They'd only gone down a few steps when Rogue froze. "Pee-yew! What the heck died down here?!?!?" She asked, pinching her nose as a very terrible odor hit it. "Oh man! I smell it too, Rogue. It reeks here!" Spyke groaned as he quickly held his nose.

"Mein gott! And you guys zink my smoke during teleportation smells awful!" Kurt agreed, blocking his nose as the poopy and body odor combined stench hit his nose as well.

"It's coming from the kitchen." Scott said, blocking his nose and mouth as well. The five bravely raced in. What they saw, they couldn't believe.

There was Kitty, scarfing down greasy, fattening foods like a pig. She nosily gobbled down Twinkies, chewing with her mouth open while scratching her armpits before grabbing two burgers and inhaling those, smearing ketchup, mustard and grease on her already sweat covered and food stained uniform. "Ah think we just found what's makin' that smell." Rogue said in shock as Kitty burped loudly before farting with a giggle as she kept eating, burping, farting, pooping and sweating.

The X-Kids couldn't believe it. Kitty was always so neat, tidy, polite and clean. Now, she was a complete slob. None of them spoke as they watched Kitty finally reached the final part of her messily eaten meal: a massive banana split with chocolate, vanilla, strawberry, blue moon, peanut butte and mint chip flavored ice cream, three bananas, a massive amount of hot fudge and whipped cream and a cherry on top by eating with her face like a dog. Finally, Kitty loudly lapped up the last of the melted ice cream and leaned back in her poop filled pants, rubbing her very big belly.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP !!!!!!!* She let out the biggest burp yet. "K-Kitty? Is that you?" Jean stammered slowly. Hearing this, Kitty turned her now chubby head. Upon seeing her friends, her eyes widened in humiliation and horror.

"Guys! *BBUURRRRPPPPP!!!* Like, I'm so sorry you *PPPPOOOORRRRTTTTTTT!!!* gotta see me like *OOOOORRRRPP!!!* this! I've become a *UUUURRRRRAAAAPPPPPP!!!* total slob! I can't control myself!" She sobbed, burying her greasy, sweaty face into her hands, letting out another giant fart in the process.

"Kitty, it's okay. What happened?" Scott replied slowly as he bravely approached the younger girl. Kitty looked up, let out a small hiccup and began to explain.

"Like, I phased into the basement to look for the new mutant and I found this laboratory. I noticed a pink potion and I drank it, thinking it was okay. Then, I, like totally began burping a lot. I got hungry so I came here and after I started eating the fried chicken and cake, I also started farting a ton. But it felt... good to let myself go like that. Then, I drank a bottle of orange soda and... I, like, totally began pooping my pants and losing my manners as you guys just saw." Kitty explained.

"Do you have the beaker the potion came in?" Jean asked. Kitty nodded and, with some difficulty, pulled it out of her belt. Jean took the beaker and found the caution sign.

"I know why you're a slob, Kitty. This thing apparently causes any girl with the "X"-Gene to become a slob for a brief time until this sauce wears off." She explained. "Like, I totally didn't notice that label." Kitty admitted sheepishly.

"It's okay, Kit. We just gotta get ya back ta normal. 'Cause, Ah dunno 'bout anyone else, but Ah ain't exactly eager to ride home with your poopy pants stinkin' up the X-Van." Rogue smirked teasingly. Kitty just stuck her tongue out at Rogue and grinned back.

"The Professor said Tiana was the new mutant's name. She may've created this sauce." Jean said as she read the main label. "But where is she?" Scott asked.

"I'm right here." said a new voice. The six teenagers turned and saw a girl, not much older than Jean and Scott, with black hair in a ponytail and brown eyes. She was tan skinned and fairly good looking.

"Tiana Mobley?" Jean guessed. "That's me, ma'am." Tiana smiled kindly. "We're the X-Men. As you can see, our friend drank your sauce and is suffering the side effects from it since we're mutants like you. Can you help us?" Scott asked.

Tiana looked at Kitty in sympathy as the 15-year-old let out a squeaky fart and picked her nose. "Yeah. I can." Tiana smiled as she came over.
155212321111111111.title: Scott and the others find her (Kitty keeps eati...

1552123211111111111.content:
Soon, "So, your powers is the ability to make any type of meal out of thin air?" Scott asked Tiana as she kept working on the antidote for Kitty's slobby problem.

"Basically. I also have some super strength, agility and speed." Tiana replied as she put the antidote over a burner to cook. "I gotta say, Tiana. You really seem to know your way around chemicals and things." Jean replied, clearly impressed.

"Cooking's a lot like chemistry and I've always loved both, even before I became a mutant." Tiana smiled as she faced them.

"So, what's with this crazy sauce ya've been trying to make?" Rogue asked as Kitty (who's slobbiness had slowed down to a crawl by now), merely picked her nose again and ate the mucus she'd gotten from it before scratching her armpits.

"The idea is that if your younger kids, cousins or siblings refuses to eat their fruits and veggies at meals, just slip a little of the sauce on and they taste exactly like their favorite desserts. Problem solved." Tiana explained.

"But something went wrong when you tried it out on yourself?" guessed Kurt. "Yep. First time I tried it, I ended up like Kitty for five hours. Luckily though, I'd anticipated this and had created the serum I'm rebrewing now." She smiled.

"I think if I either have help with the next batch or work more on it, I can perfect it so it'll be safe enough for everybody to use it, including us mutant girls." Tiana added with a confident smile.

"Like, it does work in the tasting like your favorite dessert area." Kitty grinned. "Why was all that food out earlier?" Spyke asked.

"I knew you guys were coming when your Professor contacted me telepathically and I decided to whip up a quick snack for you once we'd met." Tiana explained as she carefully removed the new beaker from the burner as the potion was now ready.

"Okay, Kitty. Drink this. Since I've been experimenting with both formulas, I engineered this one to help slim you down a bit quicker. You'll still be a bit bloated and hungry, but it won't be as bad as before." She said to Shadowcat.

Kitty slowly took the potion and slowly took a sip. "YUCK! Like, it totally tastes like boiled cabbage and brussel sprouts!" She groaned, sticking her tongue out in disgust. But she nevertheless took a deep breath, plugged her nose and gulped the rest of the antidote down.

After a moment, Kitty felt herself slowly shrinking back to her normal size. The pit stains vanished from her uniform, her face cleared up the grease and sweat that had been on it and even her uniform pants and panties became clean again.

A second later, a normal, though still fat, Kitty stood before the team with a wide grin. "Like, it totally worked!" Kitty squealed in delight.

"Thank you, Tiana." Scott smiled as they shook hands. "Do you want to come with us to meet Professor X?" Jean asked. Tiana was quiet for a moment. Then, she smiled.

"Sure." She beamed as she joined the six teenagers in leaving the castle that had been her home for the last month since she came to Bayville to make her fortune with her sauce.

Sure enough, things worked out in the end. Tiana, with help from Beast, managed to perfect the sauce and began selling it to different stores. Within two months, she had made enough money to start her own company and she decided to do so, having stayed at the institute during that time to get better control of her super strength, agility and speed abilities.

Though the X-Kids (especially Kitty) were sad to see her go as they had became close friends with her (and also enjoyed her cooking), they still saw her on weekends and Tiana often sent them homemade cookies, cakes or other foods every two weeks.

Although, most of the X-Kids often had to keep their halves safe from Kitty, who still retained her new big appetite. In addition, Kitty had also decided to wear and use thick diapers in case she needed to go to the bathroom during meals or snacks.

Though it somewhat surprised the X-Kids at first, they ultimately accepted this change in Kitty's lifestyle and supported her as they knew she was happy being fat and diapered.

One afternoon, Jean Grey and Rogue were arguing in the living room of the Xavier Institute. "Rogue, I'm getting sick and tire of you calling me 'Miss. Popular' all the time!" Jean was saying in annoyance. "Well ya definitely act like ya are, sugar! Straight As, captain of the girls soccer team and everybody gushes over you!" Rogue replied in annoyance, arms crossed and a frown on her face.

Jean just stood there fuming. "Face it, Jean. You're so popular, Ah think ya couldn't keep your popularity if ya became a fat slob!" Rogue added. Jean went redder than ever at the snarky remark. "Oh yeah? Well, I'll prove to you I can be a fat slob and keep my interests and friends outside of the institute!" She spat and stormed off to her room.

That night at dinner, Jean came down to find they were having fried chicken, corn on the cob and biscuits. She started to eat her first piece of chicken neatly, but upon seeing Rogue smirking at this, Jean dropped her fork and began loudly eating her massive drumstick with her hands, getting grease and sauce on her hands, lips and face. None of the others said a word as they watched Jean chewing her chicken loudly while also smacking her lips.

After finishing her chicken, Jean tore into the corn like a shark, sending pieces of it flying as she tore through each cob, smearing butter onto her face as well before grabbing a big fat biscuit and plopping it into her mouth as well while chewing loudly with her mouth open, leaving her friends (except Rogue) in shock and slight disgust.

"Um, Jean? Are you okay?" Scott asked her. Jean looked at him for a moment, sauce and butter smeared around her face and on her cheeks. Then, *UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPP!!!* She belched loudly, rubbing her full stomach. "Yeah. I'm fine Scott. I just got a little hungry tonight." she explained quickly. After that, Jean got up and quickly left the room. The others shrugged and went back to their conversations except for Rogue, who smirked to herself. "This is gonna be fun, seein' if Jean really can keep this up. She'll be friendless in a week." She thought as she finished her dinner and then went to her and Kitty's bedroom to relax.

155221111.content:
Rogue was wrong when she thought Jean wouldn't keep up her slobbiness at Bayville High. During her classes, Jean stuffed herself with candy bars she had sneaked out from the mansion, making sure to smear them on her face and sweater, chewing loudly as she sat in class, occasionally farting audibly.

Most of Jean's peers and teachers were shocked by Jean's sudden change in personality overnight. Yesterday, she wouldn't've done something like this but now, she seemed like she didn't care anymore. Luckily for Jean, since this was the first time she'd done this, the teachers mainly let it slide aside from a few dirty looks whenever Jean burped or farted loudly while the students merely smirked in amusement at their friend or classmate's antics.

At lunch, Jean went to the lunch line, licking her lips eagerly. When it was her turn, she smiled at the lunch ladies. "Fill 'er up!" she smiled, pointing to her tray. A lunch lady went for a plate, but Jean merely shook her head. "No plate! Just fill it up please!" Jean stated firmly. With that, the lunch ladies set to work, piling sub sandwiches, doughnuts, cake, pie, cookies, pizza, burgers and other cafeteria food onto her tray. Once they were done, Jean smiled and walked towards Scott, Kitty, Kurt and Rogue's table.

The four friends couldn't believe what they were seeing as Jean came up with her massively close to overflowing tray. "Jean! Like, what're you doing with all that food?!?!?" Kitty asked in shock. "I'm just really hungry today, Kitty." Jean smiled as she sat down. "Jean, that amount of food is meant for the Blob, not you!" Kurt said in equal disbelief. Jean then had an idea as she looked at Rogue and smirked. Rogue knew right away what was gonna happen.

Jean turned towards the Brotherhood's table where Fred "the Blob" Dukes was sitting with Toad, Quicksilver and Avalanche. "Hey, Blob!" she shouted, causing the four to look up in surprise and then fury upon seeing Jean was the one addressing them. "Whadda ya want, Grey?" Blob asked, having just begun on his own massive tray of food.

"I bet I can eat more than you before lunch is over!" Jean shouted. At that, the whole cafeteria went as silent as a graveyard. No one had ever challenged Fred to an eating contest since he'd arrived and they all saw how much he can eat. And now, here was Jean Grey, captain of the soccer team, challenging him. You could tell the Brotherhood was just as shocked as the X-Kids and their other peers.

"Unless you're too chicken to do it." Jean added calmly. Fred's face went back from surprised to fury. "Oh yeah?!?!? You're on, Miss. Popular!" He snarled as he stomped over to the X-Kids' table with his tray. Scott and the others stood up as the rest of the student body present gathered around to watch the contest.

"Who'll time us?" Jean asked. Scott rose his hand as he set his watch to it's stopwatch feature. "On your mark... get set... GO!!!" he shouted. With that, Blob and Jean plowed into their heaps of food. Jean quickly shoved a triple cheeseburger into her mouth and swallowed it whole, though with some difficulty before cramming two giant handfuls of cookies into her mouth, smearing crumbs and chocolate around her mouth.

After a few minutes, it became clear that although Blob was pretty good, Jean, despite this being her first time, was equally, if not better, to him. Several of the other students started taking bets on who would win while others all cheered their respective choices on, the X-Kids obviously rooting for Jean while the Brotherhood boys cheered Fred on. Finally, to everybody's shock, Fred dropped his last piece of pie, looking queasy as Jean victoriously plopped the last cake slice into her mouth.

"And Jean wins!" Scott shouted as the X-Kids (excluding Rogue) and Jean's other supporters whooped and cheered as Jean panted and leaned back in relief, her belly swollen to the size of a watermelon and her face and sweater covered in grease, sugar, frosting, ketchup, mustard, tomato sauce and other foods. To everybody's great shock, Fred then offered a large hand to Jean, who looked at him in shock.

"Great job, Jean." He smiled as Jean slowly shook his hand with a grin of her own. "Thanks. Almost thought I was gonna loose there." she replied. "We should do this again sometime." Fred grinned as he stood up and went off to his next period with the Brotherhood boys following, all of them wearing impressed expressions on their faces as they looked at Jean.

"Like, Jean! That was, like, totally incredible!" Kitty gushed as she hugged her friend. "Ja. You actually defeated the Blob at his own game!" Kurt agreed. "That was wicked, Jean!" agreed soccer teammate Taryn. "Thanks, Taryn." Jean smiled as the group set off for their last few classes of the day, with Jean burping and farting during most of them.

Later that night, Jean called Storm, Kitty, Rogue, Amara and Tabitha to the dining room. When the five X-Ladies reached said room, they found the dining room table covered with numerous large soda bottles. "Like, what's all this, Jean?" asked Kitty as she picked her nose before farting loudly.

"Oh, I figured I'd challenge you guys to a burping contest." Jean explained with a smile. "Cool. I've been wanting to try and face you since I heard about Kitty an' Rogue's burp-off the other day." Tabby smiled as she scratched her butt very obviously. "I don't know, Jean." Amara said anxiously as she picked her bellybutton.

"C'mon, 'Mara. It'll be awesome." Tabitha smiled as even Storm smiled encouragingly. Amara sighed, but then nodded as she sat down with the others. Once they did, Jean grinned at her friends.

"On your mark... get set... CHUG!" She yelled as she grabbed a massive bottle of root beer and loudly guzzled it down, spilling some onto her food and pit stained sweater. She tossed the bottle aside and then opened her mouth as she felt gas rising up.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPP!!!* She belched loudly a second later. She smirked at the others. "Your turn, Ororo." Jean smiled at Ororo, who swallowed nervously as she picked up a large Sprite bottle and loudly gulped it down in surprisingly big chugs. Once it was empty, she tossed it aside and waited. After a few seconds...

*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!! * Storm burped loudly, triumphing Jean's. "Like, nice one, Ororo!" Kitty cheered as the others, except for Jean, nodded.

"Okay, Amara. Your turn." said Rogue as she dug a finger in her ear before wiping the earwax off on her shirt. Amara timidly grabbed a bottle of grape soda and began sipping it. "'Mara, you're not gonna get burp burps if you don't guzzle it." Tabitha said as she tilted Amara's head back, grabbed a funnel, installed it into her friend's mouth and quickly poured the whole bottle down it and Amara's throat nonstop.

*GLUG* *GLUG* *GLUG* *GLUG* *GLUG* *GLUG* Magma went as the soda thundered down her throat and into her bigger potbelly. Within seconds, it rumbled loudly as it bloated with gas.

*OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPP PPPPPP!!!* She belched loudly, sending Tabitha's hair flying back slightly. "Nice one, Amara." Rogue smiled as she took her turn, chugging down a large orange soda.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEL LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCHHHHHHH!!!* She belched out a second later.

On and on it went, each of the six X-Ladies guzzling a soda and burping loudly, each one triumphing over the previous one every time.

Finally, it was down to Jean. Kitty had just unleashed a very big impressive burp. Jean quickly gulped/guzzled down her Pepsi bottle and tossed it into her pile. Then, it happened.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB BBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!*

She let out the biggest burp of all out of the six, knocking her friends off their seats in shock. Jean smiled as she look at her friends in delight.

"Oh yeah! I won! I won!" She giggled as she squatted down in Rogue's face and then, *PPPPPPRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTT!* Let out a big smelly poot into the goth's face before dancing over and doing the same to Kitty, Tabitha, Amara and Storm.

"Guess you guys are no match for Jean Grey, the biggest fartin', burpin' and slobbiest girl in the mansion and probably in Bayville!" She giggled as she left. "She did have a pretty good burp." Kitty admitted as she and the others stood up and began cleaning up the mess, burping, farting and hiccupping as they did.

15523123211.content:
One day, Rogue was fuming in her and Kitty's bedroom. "Ah'm so sick of people tryin' ta get me to be like Jean all the time! Why can't they see Ah ain't ever gonna be like her?" she growled to herself. As she read her horror novel, Rogue thought of ways to rebel against being made by everybody to act like Jean.

As she leaned back to read, Rogue had an idea. "'Course, it'll be a bit weird at first, but Ah'm through tryin' ta mimic Miss. Perfect all the time. So they're just gonna need ta get over it." Rogue thought to herself with a wide grin as she kept reading.

That night at dinner, Rogue, Scott, Jean, Kurt and Kitty were eating together. The New Mutants (excluding Tabitha "Boom-Boom" Smith and Amara "Magma" Aquilla) had gone on a survival trip with Wolverine and Beast, leaving Professor X and Storm behind while Spyke had left the team recently to join the Morlocks.

Tonight's dinner was turkey, mashed potatoes and green beans. Rogue loaded her plate and then, to the other X-Kids' shock, began scarfing her massive meal down with only her hands, getting grease, gravy and crumbs everywhere. She also chewed with her mouth open and licked and smacked her lips and fingers while Scott and the others watched in slight disgust and disbelief.

"Um, Rogue? Are you alvight?" Kurt asked his foster sister. Rogue, cheeks bulging, looked at him as she loudly swallowed her food with a giant gulp and then, *UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPP!!*

She let out a massive burp before patting her full stomach. "Yeah, Kurt. Ah was just hungry, that's all." She said as she stood up and went to her and Kitty's room. The others shrugged and went back to talking or finishing their meals, except for Kitty, who watched her teammate and best friend with a thoughtful expression on her face as she chewed on her turkey drumstick.
15523123211.title: Gets tired of people wanting her to be like Jean

choices: The next day, Kitty, Amara and Tabitha decide to join Rogue in being fat slobs.
155231232111.content:
The next day, Rogue came downstairs for breakfast. She found Kitty, Boom-Boom and Magma in the room. Scott and the others had already finished their breakfasts and were off either training, doing homework or going out into Bayville for the day.

Rogue grabbed a plate and piled it with doughnuts, pancakes and bacon. Once again, she made sure to eat everything sloppily, stuffing each doughnut onto her fingers and then eating them that way, stuffing handfuls of greasy bacon into her mouth and then swallowing the entire stack of pancakes in one giant gulp, burping loudly before licking and smacking her fingers off loudly.

Kitty, Tabitha and Amara just watched their friend in disbelief. "Rogue? Like, are you totally okay?" Kitty asked. Rogue, still sucking on her index finger, looked up and quickly pulled said finger from her mouth. "Yeah, Kitty. Ah'm fine. Jus' really hungry again." She explained simply.

Tabby spoke up now. "Hey, Rogue. Wanna have a burping/farting contest with me?" She offered. Rogue was quiet for a moment as she thought about the offer. "Alright. You're on, Tabitha." She smiled.

Soon, the duo had several bottles of soda in front of them as Kitty and Amara watched. "You ready to lose, Boom-Boom?" Rogue smirked. "Bring it, Stripes." Tabitha retorted with a laugh. "Like, on your marks... get set... CHUG!" Kitty shouted a second later.

Rogue quickly snagged a large Dr. Pepper bottle and began loudly chugging it down. After she tossed it aside, she didn't have to wait long for the gas to bubble up inside her.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPP!!!* She belched loudly into Tabitha's face, making the blonde mutant's hair blow back slightly. Tabitha just calmly smirked as she grabbed a huge orange soda and guzzled it down at lightning speed.

*OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPP!!!* She belched back into Rogue's face, making the southern goth's own hair blow back. "Top that, Rogue!" Tabby giggled with a smile.

On and on it went, the duo kept chugging and guzzling their way through the sodas, their burps getting bigger and louder each time, and each one topping the other.

*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPP !!!*

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEELLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLCCCC CCCCCCCCHHH!!*

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP PPPPP!*

"Who's gonna win?" asked Amara to Kitty as their respective best friends kept burping louder and louder. "Like, I totally don't know, Amara. But I'll bet it's gonna be impressive to see who does." Kitty whispered back.

*SSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRREEEEEEEEEEEEENNNNNNNNDDDDDEEERRRRRRR TOOOOOOO MMMMMEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE, BBBBBBBBBBBOOOOOOOOOMMMMMM-BBBBBBBBBBOOOOOOOOOMMMMMMM!!!* Rogue burped loudly a second later with a smirk.

*FFFFFFFFFFFFFOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGGGEEEEEEEEETTTTTT IIIIIIIIITTTTTTTTTTTT, SSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSTTTTTTTTTTTTRRRRRRRIIIIIIIIIIPPPPPPPPPPPPSSSSSSSS!!!* Tabitha belched back almost immediately after.

Ultimately, Tabitha won with that burp as both of these recent burps had come after the duo's final soda chugs. "Now let's get on to the fartin' contest." Rogue smirked, confident she would win this one.

However, it was ultimately Tabby who also won this contest as well. "Guess Ah know why ya went with 'Boom-Boom' as your codename." Rogue smirked as she and Boom-Boom shook hands afterwards. The four then spend the rest of the day hanging out together.

15523131.content:
One afternoon, Rogue was alone in her bedroom at the institute, while thinking about something she'd really wanted to do lately. Ever since she could remember, Rogue had always secretly loved wearing and using diapers, even after undergoing toilet training. However, she'd never acted on it due to Destiny's predicting powers alerting her whenever Rogue tried to buy diapers at the store.

But now, she figured she had the perfect chance to do so. Making sure none of the others were coming, Rogue tugged off her leggings, skirt, underpants and boots before putting a thick, fluffy diaper on and standing up. Then, she grabbed a large jar of chocolate chip cookies she'd smuggled from the kitchen earlier that day. In addition to her love of diapers, Rogue had also decided to put on some extra weight.

She was just shoving the second cookie into her mouth, when Storm came in. "Rogue, Kitty asked me to-" but then the weather witch stopped short upon seeing both Rogue's diaper and the huge jar of cookies. For a moment, neither of them said a word. Then, Ororo broke the silence.

"Rogue... why are you wearing a diaper and eating an entire jar of cookies?" she asked gently. Rogue blushed and stammered for a moment before taking a deep breath. "Ah... Ah've always wanted ta wear an' use diapers again an' gain weight. Since movin' here, Ah've been lookin' for a good time to do so an' now seemed like it." She confessed with a sheepish expression.

But Ororo didn't say anything for the longest time. Then, she slowly sat down on Rogue's bed beside her. "Rogue, believe it or not... I too have often wondered what that would be like." she confessed with a wide grin. Rogue's jaw dropped in shock. "Really? Ah... Ah never knew that." She finally managed to get out.

"It is true. As a child, I loathed toilet training and wished to remain in my diapers. Even as I matured, I still missed how comfy they were, even after I had relieved myself in them but could never act upon my urgings because my parents and sister Vi were usually around." Storm admitted with a grin.

"Well, ya know what? Ah think it's time, we actually do it. We'll gain weight while wearin' and usin' our diapers." Rogue smiled as she offered a cookie to Ororo, who smiled while taking it and then grabbing a spare diaper, quickly putting it on and smiling as she felt the comfy padding on her butt again for the first time since she was a toddler.

The duo thus spent the rest of the day, eating and lazing around in their diapers, occasionally changing each other's whenever they peed and/or pooped in them, giggling like little kids as they did this.
